papers.title: Subverting Telegram's End-to-End Encryption
papers.authors: Benoît Cogliati, Jordan Ethan, Ashwin Jha
papers.abstract: Telegram is a popular secure messaging service with third biggest user base as of 2021. In this paper, we analyze the security of Telegram’s end-to-end encryption (E2EE) protocol in presence of mass-surveillance. Specifically, we show >that Telegram’s E2EE protocol is susceptible to fairly efficient algorithm substitution attacks. While official Telegram clients should be protected against this type of attack due their open-source nature and reproducible builds, this could potentially lead to a very efficient state sponsored surveillance of private communications over Telegram, either on individuals through a targeted attack or massively through some compromised third-party clients. We provide an efficient algorithm substitution attack against MTProto2.0 — the underlying authenticated encryption scheme — that recovers significant amount of encryption key material with a very high probability with few queries and fairly low latency. This could potentially lead to a very efficient state sponsored surveillance of private communications over Telegram, either through a targeted attack or a compromised third-party app. Our attack exploits MTProto2.0’s degree of freedom in choosing the random padding length and padding value. Accordingly, we strongly recommend that Telegram should revise MTProto2.0’s padding methodology. In particular, we show that a minor change in the padding description of MTProto2.0 makes it subversion-resistant in most of the practical scenarios. As a side-effect, we generalize the underlying mode of operation in MTProto2.0, as MTProto-G, and show that this generalization is a multi-user secure deterministic authenticated encryption scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: Telegram是一种受欢迎的安全信息服务，截至2021年拥有第三大用户群。本文分析了大规模监控环境下电报端到端加密(E2EE)协议的安全性。具体来说，我们表明> Telegram的E2EE协议容易受到相当有效的算法替换攻击。虽然官方Telegram客户端由于其开源性质和可复制的构建而应受到保护，但这可能会导致非常有效的国家支持的对Telegram上私人通信的监控，要么通过有针对性的攻击对个人进行监控，要么通过一些受损的第三方客户端进行大规模监控。我们提供了一种针对MTProto2.0(底层认证加密方案)的高效算法替换攻击，该攻击能够以很高的概率恢复大量的加密密钥材料，并且查询很少，延迟相当低。这可能会导致非常有效的国家支持的对Telegram上的私人通信的监控，无论是通过有针对性的攻击还是妥协的第三方应用程序。我们的攻击利用了MTProto2.0在选择随机填充长度和填充值方面的自由度。因此，我们强烈建议Telegram修改MTProto2.0的填充方法。特别是，我们表明MTProto2.0的填充描述中的微小变化使其在大多数实际场景中具有抗颠覆性。作为副作用，我们将MTProto2.0中的底层操作模式概括为MTProto-G，并表明这种概括是多用户安全的确定性认证加密方案。
papers.title_zh: 颠覆Telegram的端到端加密

papers.title: Attacking the IETF/ISO Standard for Internal Re-keying CTR-ACPKM
papers.authors: Orr Dunkelman, Shibam Ghosh, Eran Lambooij
papers.abstract: Encrypting too much data using the same key is a bad practice from a security perspective. Hence, it is customary to perform re-keying after a given amount of data is transmitted. While in many cases, the re-keying is done using a fresh execution of some key exchange protocol (e.g., in IKE or TLS), there are scenarios where internal re-keying, i.e., without exchange of information, is performed, mostly due to performance reasons.Originally suggested by Abdalla and Bellare, there are several proposals on how to perform this internal re-keying mechanism. For example, Liliya et al. offered the CryptoPro Key Meshing (CPKM) to be used together with GOST 28147-89 (known as the GOST block cipher). Later, ISO and the IETF adopted the Advanced CryptoPro Key Meshing (ACKPM) in ISO 10116 and RFC 8645, respectively.In this paper, we study the security of ACPKM and CPKM. We show that the internal re-keying suffers from an entropy loss in successive repetitions of the rekeying mechanism. We show some attacks based on this issue. The most prominent one has time and data complexities of O(2κ/2) and success rate of O(2−κ/4) for a κ-bit key.Furthermore, we show that a malicious block cipher designer or a faulty implementation can exploit the ACPKM (or the original CPKM) mechanism to significantly hinder the security of a protocol employing ACPKM (or CPKM). Namely, we show that in such cases, the entropy of the re-keyed key can be greatly reduced.
papers.abstract_zh: 从安全角度来看，使用同一个密钥加密太多数据是一种不好的做法。因此，习惯上是在给定数量的数据被传输后执行密钥更新。虽然在许多情况下，使用某个密钥交换协议(例如，在IKE或TLS中)的新执行来完成密钥更新，但是存在主要由于性能原因而执行内部密钥更新(即，不交换信息)的情况。最初由Abdalla和Bellare提出，有几个关于如何执行这种内部密钥更新机制的提议。例如，Liliya等人提供了CryptoPro密钥网格(CPKM)与GOST 28147-89(称为GOST分组密码)一起使用。后来，ISO和IETF分别在ISO 10116和RFC 8645中采用了高级CryptoPro密钥网格化(ACKPM)。本文研究了ACPKM和CPKM的安全性。我们证明了内部密钥更新在密钥更新机制的连续重复中遭受熵损失。我们展示了一些基于这个问题的攻击。最突出的一个是时间和数据复杂度为O(2κ/2 ),一个κ位密钥的成功率为O(2κ/4)。此外，我们证明了恶意的分组密码设计者或有缺陷的实现可以利用ACPKM(或原始CPKM)机制来显著地阻碍使用ACPKM(或CPKM)的协议的安全性。也就是说，我们证明了在这种情况下，密钥更新后的熵可以大大降低。
papers.title_zh: 攻击IETF/ISO内部密钥更新标准CTR-ACPKM

papers.title: Finding Collisions for Round-Reduced Romulus-H
papers.authors: Marcel Nageler, Felix Pallua, Maria Eichlseder
papers.abstract: The hash function Romulus-H is a finalist in the NIST Lightweight Cryptography competition. It is based on the Hirose double block-length (DBL) construction which is provably secure when used with an ideal block cipher. However, in practice, ideal block ciphers can only be approximated. Therefore, the security of concrete instantiations must be cryptanalyzed carefully; the security margin may be higher or lower than in the secret-key setting. So far, the Hirose DBL construction has been studied with only a few other block ciphers, like IDEA and AES. However, Romulus-H uses Hirose DBL with the SKINNY block cipher where only very little analysis has been published so far. In this work, we present the first practical analysis of Romulus-H. We propose a new framework for finding collisions in hash functions based on the Hirose DBL construction. This is in contrast to previous work that only focused on free-start collisions. Our framework is based on the idea of joint differential characteristics which capture the relationship between the two block cipher calls in the Hirose DBL construction. To identify good joint differential characteristics, we propose a combination of MILP and CP models. Then, we use these characteristics in another CP model to find collisions. Finally, we apply this framework to Romulus-H and find practical collisions of the hash function for 10 out of 40 rounds and practical semi-free-start collisions for up to 14 rounds.
papers.abstract_zh: 散列函数Romulus-H是NIST轻量级加密竞赛的决赛选手。它基于Hirose双分组长度(DBL)构造，当与理想分组密码一起使用时，它是可证明安全的。然而，在实践中，理想的分组密码只能是近似的。因此，必须仔细分析具体实例的安全性；安全余量可以高于或低于秘密密钥设置中的安全余量。到目前为止，Hirose DBL构造只与其他几个分组密码一起研究，如IDEA和AES。然而，罗穆卢斯-H将广濑DBL与瘦分组密码一起使用，到目前为止只有很少的分析被发表。在这项工作中，我们提出了Romulus-H的第一个实际分析。我们提出了一个新的框架来寻找哈希函数的冲突的基础上广濑DBL建设。这与以前只关注自由启动碰撞的工作形成了对比。我们的框架是基于联合差分特征的思想，它捕获了Hirose DBL构造中两个分组密码调用之间的关系。为了识别良好的联合差分特性，我们提出了MILP和CP模型的组合。然后，我们在另一个CP模型中使用这些特征来寻找碰撞。最后，我们将此框架应用于Romulus-H，并发现40轮中有10轮的散列函数的实际冲突和多达14轮的实际半自由启动冲突。
papers.title_zh: 为Round-Reduced Romulus-H寻找碰撞

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of Reduced Round ChaCha - New Attack & Deeper Analysis
papers.authors: Sabyasachi Dey, Hirendra Kumar Garai, Subhamoy Maitra
papers.abstract: In this paper we present several analyses on ChaCha, a software stream cipher. First, we consider a divide-and-conquer approach on the secret key bits by partitioning them. The partitions are based on multiple input-output differentials to obtain a significantly improved attack on 6-round ChaCha256 with a complexity of 299.48. It is 240 times faster than the currently best known attack. This is the first time an attack on a round reduced ChaCha with a complexity smaller than 2k/2, where the secret key is of k bits, has been successful.Further, all the attack complexities related to ChaCha are theoretically estimated in general and there are several questions in this regard as pointed out by Dey, Garai, Sarkar and Sharma in Eurocrypt 2022. In this regard, we propose a toy version of ChaCha, with a 32-bit secret key, on which the attacks can be implemented completely to verify whether the theoretical estimates are justified. This idea is implemented for our proposed attack on 6 rounds. Finally, we show that it is possible to estimate the success probabilities of these kinds of PNB-based differential attacks more accurately. Our methodology explains how different cryptanalytic results can be evaluated with better accuracy rather than claiming that the success probability is significantly better than 50%.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文对ChaCha这一软件流密码进行了分析。首先，我们考虑通过对密钥比特进行划分来对它们进行分治的方法。这些划分基于多个输入输出差分，以获得对复杂度为299.48的6轮ChaCha256的显著改进的攻击。它比目前最著名的攻击快240倍。这是第一次成功地攻击复杂度小于2k/2的循环简化的ChaCha，其中密钥是k比特。此外，所有与ChaCha相关的攻击复杂性一般都是理论上的估计，这方面有几个问题，如Dey、Garai、Sarkar和Sharma在Eurocrypt 2022中指出的。在这方面，我们提出了一个玩具版的ChaCha，它有一个32位的密钥，在这个密钥上可以完全实现攻击，以验证理论估计是否合理。这个想法是为我们提出的6轮攻击而实现的。最后，我们证明了更准确地估计这类基于PNB的差分攻击的成功概率是可能的。我们的方法解释了不同的密码分析结果如何能够以更好的准确性进行评估，而不是声称成功概率明显好于50%。
papers.title_zh: 约化轮查查的密码分析——新的攻击和更深层次的分析

papers.title: SoK: Modeling for Large S-boxes Oriented to Differential Probabilities and Linear Correlations
papers.authors: Ling Sun, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: Automatic methods for differential and linear characteristic search are well-established at the moment. Typically, the designers of novel ciphers also give preliminary analytical findings for analysing the differential and linear properties using automatic techniques. However, neither MILP-based nor SAT/SMT-based approaches have fully resolved the problem of searching for actual differential and linear characteristics of ciphers with large S-boxes. To tackle the issue, we present three strategies for developing SAT models for 8-bit S-boxes that are geared toward differential probabilities and linear correlations. While these approaches cannot guarantee a minimum model size, the time needed to obtain models is drastically reduced. The newly proposed SAT model for large S-boxes enables us to establish that the upper bound on the differential probability for 14 rounds of SKINNY-128 is 2−131, thereby completing the unsuccessful work of Abdelkhalek et al. We also analyse the seven AES-based constructions C1 - C7 designed by Jean and Nikolić and compute the minimum number of active S-boxes necessary to cause an internal collision using the SAT method. For two constructions C3 and C5, the current lower bound on the number of active S-boxes is increased, resulting in a more precise security analysis for these two structures.
papers.abstract_zh: 目前，用于微分和线性特征搜索的自动方法已经很好地建立。典型地，新密码的设计者也给出初步的分析发现，用于使用自动技术分析微分和线性特性。然而，基于MILP或基于SAT/SMT的方法都没有完全解决搜索具有大S盒的密码的实际差分和线性特征的问题。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了三种策略来开发8位S盒的SAT模型，这些模型面向差分概率和线性相关性。虽然这些方法不能保证最小的模型尺寸，但获得模型所需的时间却大大减少了。新提出的大型S盒SAT模型使我们能够确定14轮SKINNY-128的差分概率上限为2131，从而完成了Abdelkhalek等人的失败工作。我们还分析了Jean和Nikoli设计的七种基于AES的结构C1 - C7，并使用SAT方法计算了引起内部碰撞所需的活动S盒的最小数量。对于C3和C5这两种结构，活动S盒数量的当前下限增加了，从而导致对这两种结构的更精确的安全性分析。
papers.title_zh: SoK:面向差分概率和线性相关的大型S盒建模

papers.title: SAT-aided Automatic Search of Boomerang Distinguishers for ARX Ciphers
papers.authors: Dachao Wang, Baocang Wang, Siwei Sun
papers.abstract: In Addition-Rotation-Xor (ARX) ciphers, the large domain size obstructs the application of the boomerang connectivity table. In this paper, we explore the problem of computing this table for a modular addition and the automatic search of boomerang characteristics for ARX ciphers. We provide dynamic programming algorithms to efficiently compute this table and its variants. These algorithms are the most efficient up to now. For the boomerang connectivity table, the execution time is 42(n − 1) simple operations while the previous algorithm costs 82(n − 1) simple operations, which generates a smaller model in the searching phase. After rewriting these algorithms with boolean expressions, we construct the corresponding Boolean Satisfiability Problem models. Two automatic search frameworks are also proposed based on these models. This is the first time bringing the SAT-aided automatic search techniques into finding boomerang attacks on ARX ciphers. Finally, under these frameworks, we find out the first verifiable 10-round boomerang trail for SPECK32/64 with probability 2−29.15 and a 12-round trail for SPECK48/72 with probability 2−44.15. These are the best distinguishers for them so far. We also perceive that the previous boomerang attacks on LEA are constructed with an incorrect computation of the boomerang connection probability. The result is then fixed by our frameworks.
papers.abstract_zh: 此外，旋转异或(ARX)密码，大的域大小阻碍了回旋镖连接表的应用。在本文中，我们探讨了计算这个表的问题，为一个模加法和自动搜索回飞棒的特点，为ARX密码。我们提供动态编程算法来有效地计算这个表及其变体。这些算法是迄今为止最有效的。对于回飞镖连通性表，执行时间为42(n-1)次简单运算，而之前的算法需要82(n-1)次简单运算，这在搜索阶段生成了一个较小的模型。用布尔表达式重写这些算法后，我们构造了相应的布尔可满足性问题模型。基于这些模型，提出了两个自动搜索框架。这是第一次将SAT辅助自动搜索技术应用于寻找对ARX密码的回旋镖攻击。最后，在这些框架下，我们找到了SPECK32/64以概率229.15的第一个可验证的10轮回旋镖轨迹和SPECK48/72以概率244.15的12轮轨迹。这些是迄今为止对它们来说最好的区分器。我们还发现，以前对LEA的回旋镖攻击是通过对回旋镖连接概率的错误计算构建的。结果由我们的框架决定。
papers.title_zh: ARX密码飞镖识别器的SAT辅助自动搜索

papers.title: Tight Multi-User Security Bound of DbHtS
papers.authors: Nilanjan Datta, Avijit Dutta, Mridul Nandi, Suprita Talnikar
papers.abstract: . In CRYPTO’21, Shen et al. have proved in the ideal cipher model that Two-Keyed-DbHtS construction is secure up to 2 2 n/ 3 queries in the multi-user setting independent of the number of users, where the underlying double-block hash function H of the Two-Keyed-DbHtS construction is realized as the concatenation of two independent n -bit keyed hash functions ( H K h , 1 , H K h , 2 ) such that each of the n -bit keyed hash function is O (2 − n ) universal and regular. They have also demonstrated the applicability of their result to the key-reduced variants of DbHtS MACs, including 2K-SUM-ECBC , 2K-PMAC_Plus and 2K-LightMAC_Plus without requiring domain separation technique and proved 2 n/ 3-bit multi-user security of these constructions in the ideal cipher model. Recently, Guo and Wang have invalidated the security claim of Shen et al.’s result by exhibiting three constructions, which are the instantiations of the Two-Keyed-DbHtS framework, such that each of their n -bit keyed hash functions being O (2 − n ) universal and regular, while the constructions themselves are secure only up to the birthday bound. In this work, we show a suﬃcient condition on the underlying Double-block Hash ( DbH ) function, under which we prove 3 n/ 4-bit multi-user security of the Two-Keyed-DbHtS construction in the ideal-cipher model. As an instantiation, we show that two-keyed Polyhash-based DbHtS construction is multi-user secure up to 2 3 n/ 4 queries in the ideal-cipher model. Furthermore, due to the generic attack on DbHtS constructions by Gaëtan et al. in CRYPTO’18, our derived bound for the construction is tight.
papers.abstract_zh: 。在CRYPTO’21中，Shen等人已经在理想密码模型中证明了双密钥DbHtS构造在多用户设置中对于2 ^ 2n/3个查询是安全的，而与用户的数量无关，其中双密钥DbHtS构造的基础双块散列函数H被实现为两个独立的n位密钥散列函数(H K h，1，H K h，2)的级联，使得每个n位密钥散列函数是O(2n)通用和正则的。他们还在不需要域分离技术的情况下证明了他们的结果对DbHtS MACs的密钥简化变体的适用性，包括2K-SUM-ECBC、2K-PMAC_Plus和2K-LightMAC_Plus，并且在理想密码模型中证明了这些构造的2 n/ 3比特多用户安全性。最近，郭和王通过展示三个构造，使沈等人的结果的安全性声明无效，这三个构造是双密钥DbHtS框架的实例化，使得他们的每个n位密钥hash函数都是O(2n)泛正则的，而构造本身仅在生日界限内是安全的。在这篇文章中，我们给出了双块Hash ( DbH)函数的一个suﬃcient条件，在此条件下，我们证明了理想密码模型中双密钥DbH构造的3 n/ 4位多用户安全性。作为一个实例，我们证明了在理想密码模型下，基于双密钥多重散列的DbHtS构造是多用户安全的，最多可达2 ^ 3n/4次查询。此外，由于gatan等人在CRYPTO'18中对DbHtS构造的一般攻击，我们对该构造的导出界限是严格的。
papers.title_zh: DbHtS的多用户紧安全边界

papers.title: Indifferentiability of the Sponge Construction with a Restricted Number of Message Blocks
papers.authors: Charlotte Lefevre
papers.abstract: The sponge construction is a popular method for hashing. Quickly after its introduction, the sponge was proven to be tightly indifferentiable from a random oracle up to ≈ 2c/2 queries, where c is the capacity. However, this bound is not tight when the number of message blocks absorbed is restricted to ℓ < ⌈ c / 2(b−c) ⌉ + 1 (but still an arbitrary number of blocks can be squeezed). In this work, we show that this restriction leads to indifferentiability from a random oracle up to ≈ min { 2b/2, max { 2c/2, 2b−ℓ×(b−c) }} queries, where b > c is the permutation size. Depending on the parameters chosen, this result allows to have enhanced security or to absorb at a larger rate for applications that require a fixed-length input hash function.
papers.abstract_zh: 海绵构造是一种流行的散列方法。在它被引入之后，海绵很快被证明对于高达≈ 2c/2的随机oracle查询是严格不可微的，其中c是容量。然而，当吸收的消息块的数量被限制为ℓ<⌈c/2(BC)⌉+1时，这个界限并不严格(但是仍然可以压缩任意数量的块)。在这项工作中，我们证明了这种限制导致从随机预言直到≈ min { 2b/2，max { 2c/2，2b−ℓ×(b−c) }}查询的不可微性，其中b > c是排列大小。根据所选择的参数，该结果允许具有增强的安全性，或者对于需要固定长度输入散列函数的应用以更大的速率吸收。
papers.title_zh: 具有有限数量信息块的海绵结构的不可微性

papers.title: Chosen-Key Secure Even-Mansour Cipher from a Single Permutation
papers.authors: Shanjie Xu, Qi Da, Chun Guo
papers.abstract: At EUROCRYPT 2015, Cogliati and Seurin proved that the 4-round Iterated Even-Mansour (IEM) cipher with Independent random Permutations and no key schedule EMIP4(k, u) = k⊕p4 ( k⊕p3 ( k⊕p2 (k⊕p1 (k⊕u)))) is sequentially indifferentiable from an ideal cipher, which implies chosen-key security in the sense of correlation intractability. In practice, however, blockciphers such as the AES typically employ the same permutation at each round. To bridge the gap, we prove that the 4-round IEM cipher EMSP[φ]p4 (k, u) = k4⊕p (k3⊕p (k2⊕p(k1⊕p(k0⊕u)))), whose round keys ki = φi(k) are derived using an affine permutation φ : {0, 1}n → {0, 1}n with certain properties, is sequentially indifferentiable from an ideal cipher. The function φ can be a linear orthomorphism, or φ(k) := k≫a for some fixed integer a using cyclic shift. To our knowledge, this is the first indifferentiability-type result for blockciphers using identical round functions.
papers.abstract_zh: 在EUROCRYPT 2015上，Cogliati和Seurin证明了具有独立随机排列和无密钥表的4轮迭代偶数曼苏尔(IEM)密码EMIP4(k，u) = k⊕p4 ( k⊕p3 ( k⊕p2 (k⊕p1 (k⊕u)))与理想密码是序列不可微的，这意味着在难以相关的意义上的选择密钥安全性。然而，实际上，诸如AES之类的块密码通常在每一轮都采用相同的排列。为了弥补这个缺口，我们证明了4轮IEM密码EMSP[φ]p4 (k，u) = k4⊕p (k3⊕p (k2⊕p(k1⊕p(k0⊕u)))，其轮密钥ki = φi(k)是使用具有某些性质的仿射置换φ{ 0，1}n → {0，1}n导出的，它与理想密码是序列不可微的。对于使用循环移位的某个固定整数a，函数φ可以是线性正形，或者φ(k) := k≫a。据我们所知，这是使用相同轮函数的分组密码的第一个不可微型结果。
papers.title_zh: 基于单个置换的选择密钥安全偶数曼苏尔密码

papers.title: Secure Message Authentication in the Presence of Leakage and Faults
papers.authors: Francesco Berti, Chun Guo, Thomas Peters, Yaobin Shen, François-Xavier Standaert
papers.abstract: Security against side-channels and faults is a must for the deployment of embedded cryptography. A wide body of research has investigated solutions to secure implementations against these attacks at different abstraction levels. Yet, to a large extent, current solutions focus on one or the other threat. In this paper, we initiate a mode-level study of cryptographic primitives that can ensure security in a (new and practically-motivated) adversarial model combining leakage and faults. Our goal is to identify constructions that do not require a uniform protection of all their operations against both attack vectors. For this purpose, we first introduce a versatile and intuitive model to capture leakage and faults. We then show that a MAC from Asiacrypt 2021 natively enables a leveled implementation for fault resilience where only its underlying tweakable block cipher must be protected, if only the tag verification can be faulted. We finally describe two approaches to amplify security for fault resilience when also the tag generation can be faulted. One is based on iteration and requires the adversary to inject increasingly large faults to succeed. The other is based on randomness and allows provable security against differential faults.
papers.abstract_zh: 针对旁路和故障的安全性是嵌入式密码系统部署的必要条件。大量的研究调查了在不同抽象层次上保护实现免受这些攻击的解决方案。然而，在很大程度上，当前的解决方案只关注一个或另一个威胁。在本文中，我们发起了一个模式级的密码原语研究，它可以在一个(新的和实际驱动的)结合泄漏和错误的对抗模型中确保安全性。我们的目标是识别不需要针对两种攻击媒介统一保护所有操作的结构。为此，我们首先引入一个通用且直观的模型来捕捉泄漏和故障。然后，我们展示了来自Asiacrypt 2021的MAC固有地支持故障恢复的分级实现，其中只有其底层可调整分组密码必须被保护，如果只有标签验证可能出错的话。最后，我们描述了当标签生成也可能出错时，增强故障恢复的安全性的两种方法。一种是基于迭代，要求对手注入越来越大的错误才能成功。另一种是基于随机性，并允许对差分故障的可证明的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 存在泄漏和故障时的安全消息认证

papers.title: Understanding the Duplex and Its Security
papers.authors: Bart Mennink
papers.abstract: At SAC 2011, Bertoni et al. introduced the keyed duplex construction as a tool to build permutation based authenticated encryption schemes. The construction was generalized to full-state absorption by Mennink et al. (ASIACRYPT 2015). Daemen et al. (ASIACRYPT 2017) generalized it further to cover much more use cases, and proved security of this general construction, and Dobraunig and Mennink (ASIACRYPT 2019) derived a leakage resilience security bound for this construction. Due to its generality, the full-state keyed duplex construction that we know today has plethora applications, but the flip side of the coin is that the general construction is hard to grasp and the corresponding security bounds are very complex. Consequently, the state-of-the-art results on the full-state keyed duplex construction are not used to the fullest. In this work, we revisit the history of the duplex construction, give a comprehensive discussion of its possibilities and limitations, and demonstrate how the two security bounds (of Daemen et al. and Dobraunig and Mennink) can be interpreted in particular applications of the duplex.
papers.title_zh: 了解双工及其安全性
papers.abstract_zh: 在SAC 2011上，贝尔托尼等人推出了密钥双工结构，作为构建基于置换的认证加密方案的工具。Mennink等人(ASIACRYPT 2015)将这种结构推广到全状态吸收。代蒙等人(ASIACRYPT 2017)将其进一步推广，以涵盖更多的使用案例，并证明了这种一般结构的安全性，而Dobraunig和Mennink (ASIACRYPT 2019)推导出了这种结构的泄漏弹性安全界限。由于其通用性，我们今天知道的全状态键控双工结构有过多的应用，但硬币的另一面是，一般结构很难掌握，相应的安全界限非常复杂。因此，全状态键控双工结构的最新成果没有得到充分利用。在这篇文章中，我们回顾了双工结构的历史，对其可能性和局限性进行了全面的讨论，并展示了在双工结构的特定应用中如何解释两个安全界限(代蒙等人和多布拉尼格和门宁克)。

papers.title: Optimally Secure Tweakable Block Ciphers with a Large Tweak from n-bit Block Ciphers
papers.authors: Yaobin Shen, François-Xavier Standaert
papers.abstract: We consider the design of a tweakable block cipher from a block cipher whose inputs and outputs are of size n bits. The main goal is to achieve 2n security with a large tweak (i.e., more than n bits). Previously, Mennink at FSE’15 and Wang et al. at Asiacrypt’16 proposed constructions that can achieve 2n security. Yet, these constructions can have a tweak size up to n-bit only. As evident from recent research, a tweakable block cipher with a large tweak is generally helpful as a building block for modes of operation, typical applications including MACs, authenticated encryption, leakage-resistant cryptography and full-disk encryption.We begin with how to design a tweakable block cipher with 2n-bit tweak and n-bit security from two block cipher calls. For this purpose, we do an exhaustive search for tweakable block ciphers with 2n-bit tweaks from two block cipher calls, and show that all of them suffer from birthday-bound attacks. Next, we investigate the possibility to design a tweakable block cipher with 2n-bit tweak and n-bit security from three block cipher calls. We start with some conditions to build such a tweakable block cipher and propose a natural construction, called G̃1, that likely meets them. After inspection, we find a weakness in G̃1 which leads to a birthday-bound attack. Based on G̃1, we then propose another construction, called G̃2, that can avoid this weakness. We finally prove that G̃2 can achieve n-bit security with 2n-bit tweak.
papers.title_zh: 对n位分组密码进行较大调整的最优安全可调分组密码
papers.abstract_zh: 我们考虑从输入和输出大小为n位的分组密码设计可调分组密码。主要目标是通过大调整(即超过n位)实现2n安全性。之前，15的Mennink和Asiacrypt 16的Wang等人提出了可以实现2n安全性的构造。然而，这些结构最多只能有n位的调整大小。最近的研究表明，具有大调整的可调整分组密码通常有助于作为操作模式、典型应用(包括MAC、认证加密、防泄漏加密和全磁盘加密)的构建块。我们从如何根据两次分组密码调用设计具有2n位调整和n位安全性的可调整分组密码开始。为此，我们从两次分组密码调用中彻底搜索了具有2n位调整的可调整分组密码，并表明它们都遭受生日限制攻击。接下来，我们研究了从三个分组密码调用中设计具有2n位调整和n位安全性的可调整分组密码的可能性。我们从建立这样一个可调整的分组密码的一些条件开始，并提出了一个可能满足这些条件的自然构造，称为G̃1。经过检查，我们发现了G̃1的一个弱点，这导致了一次生日绑定攻击。基于G̃1，我们提出了另一种结构，称为G̃2，可以避免这一弱点。我们最终证明了G̃2可以用2n比特的调整达到n比特的安全性。

papers.title: EliMAC: Speeding Up LightMAC by around 20%
papers.authors: Christoph Dobraunig, Bart Mennink, Samuel Neves
papers.abstract: Universal hash functions play a prominent role in the design of message authentication codes and the like. Whereas it is known how to build highly efficient sequential universal hash functions, parallel non-algebraic universal hash function designs are always built on top of a PRP. In such case, one employs a relatively strong primitive to obtain a function with a relatively weak security model. In this work, we present EliHash, a construction of a parallel universal hash function from non-compressing universal hash functions, and we back it up with supporting security analysis. We use this construction to design EliMAC, a message authentication code similar to LightMAC. We consider a heuristic instantiation of EliMAC with roundreduced AES, and argue that this instantiation of EliMAC is much more efficient than LightMAC, it is around 21% faster, and additionally allows for precomputation of the keys, albeit with a stronger assumption on the AES primitive than in LightMAC. These observations are backed up with an implementation of our scheme.
papers.title_zh: EliMAC:将LightMAC的速度提高了约20%
papers.abstract_zh: 通用散列函数在消息认证码等的设计中起着重要的作用。尽管已知如何构建高效的顺序通用散列函数，但并行非代数通用散列函数设计总是构建在PRP之上。在这种情况下，采用相对强的原语来获得具有相对弱的安全模型的函数。在这篇文章中，我们提出了EliHash，一个由非压缩通用哈希函数构造的并行通用哈希函数，并且我们用支持性安全分析来支持它。我们使用这种构造来设计EliMAC，一种类似于LightMAC的消息认证码。我们考虑了具有roundreduced AES的EliMAC的启发式实例化，并认为EliMAC的这种实例化比LightMAC更有效，它快大约21%,并且另外允许预先计算密钥，尽管与LightMAC相比，对AES原语有更强的假设。我们的方案的实施支持了这些观察。

papers.title: Bounded Surjective Quadratic Functions over Fnp for MPC-/ZK-/FHE-Friendly Symmetric Primitives
papers.authors: Lorenzo Grassi
papers.abstract: Motivated by new applications such as secure Multi-Party Computation (MPC), Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE), and Zero-Knowledge proofs (ZK), many MPC-, FHE- and ZK-friendly symmetric-key primitives that minimize the< number of multiplications over Fp for a large prime p have been recently proposed in the literature. These symmetric primitives are usually defined via invertible functions, including (i) Feistel and Lai-Massey schemes and (ii) SPN constructions instantiated with invertible non-linear S-Boxes. However, the “invertibility” property is actually never required in any of the mentioned applications.In this paper, we discuss the possibility to set up MPC-/FHE-/ZK-friendly symmetric primitives instantiated with non-invertible bounded surjective functions. In contrast to one-to-one functions, each output of a l-bounded surjective function admits at most l pre-images. The simplest example is the square map x → x2 over Fp for a prime p ≥ 3, which is (obviously) 2-bounded surjective. When working over Fnp for n ≥ 2, we set up bounded surjective functions by re-considering the recent results proposed by Grassi, Onofri, Pedicini and Sozzi at FSE/ToSC 2022 as starting points. Given a quadratic local map F : Fmp → Fp for m ∈ {1, 2, 3}, they proved that the shift-invariant non-linear function over Fnp defined as SF (x0, x1, . . . , xn−1) = y0∥y1∥ . . . ∥yn−1 where yi := F(xi, xi+1) is never invertible for any n ≥ 2 · m − 1. Here, we prove that • the quadratic function F : Fmp → Fp for m ∈ {1, 2} that minimizes the probability of having a collision for SF over Fnp is of the form F(x0, x1) = x20 + x1 (or equivalent);• the function SF over Fnp defined as before via F(x0, x1) = x20 +x1 (or equivalent) is 2n-bounded surjective.As concrete applications, we propose modified versions of the MPC-friendly schemes MiMC, HadesMiMC, and (partially of) Hydra, and of the FHE-friendly schemes Masta, Pasta, and Rubato. By instantiating them with the bounded surjective quadratic functions proposed in this paper, we are able to improve the security and/or the performances in the target applications/protocols.
papers.title_zh: MPC-/ZK-/FHE友好对称基元的Fnp上的有界满射二次函数
papers.abstract_zh: 在诸如安全多方计算(MPC)、全同态加密(FHE)和零知识证明(ZK)等新应用的推动下，最近在文献中提出了许多MPC、FHE和ZK友好的对称密钥原语，它们最小化了大素数p在Fp上的乘法次数。这些对称原语通常通过可逆函数定义，包括(i) Feistel和Lai-Massey方案和(ii)用可逆非线性S盒实例化的SPN构造。然而，“可逆性”属性实际上在任何提到的应用中都是不需要的。本文讨论了用不可逆有界满射函数实例化MPC-/FHE-/ZK友好对称原语的可能性。与一对一函数相反，l-有界满射函数的每个输出最多允许l个前像。最简单的例子是素数p ≥ 3的Fp上的平方映射x → x2，(显然)是2-有界满射。当对n ≥ 2的Fnp进行研究时，我们通过重新考虑由格拉西、奥诺弗里、皮迪尼和索兹在FSE/ToSC 2022上提出的最新结果作为起点，建立了有界满射函数。给定m ∈ {1，2，3}的二次局部映射F : Fmp → Fp，他们证明了Fnp上的移位不变非线性函数定义为SF (x0，x1，.。。，xn 1)= y0∨y1∨。。。∑yn 1其中yi := F(xi，xi+1)对任何n≥2m-1都不可逆。这里，我们证明了使SF在Fnp上发生碰撞的概率最小化的m ∈ {1，2}的二次函数F : Fmp → Fp的形式为F(x0，x1) = x20 + x1(或等价)；Fnp上的函数SF通过F(x0，x1) = x20 +x1(或等价)定义为2n有界满射。作为具体应用，我们提出了MPC友好方案MiMC、HadesMiMC和(部分)Hydra的修改版本，以及FHE友好方案Masta、Pasta和Rubato的修改版本。通过用本文提出的有界满射二次函数实例化它们，我们能够提高目标应用/协议的安全性和/或性能。

papers.title: Towards the Links of Cryptanalytic Methods on MPC/FHE/ZK-Friendly Symmetric-Key Primitives
papers.authors: Shiyao Chen, Chun Guo, Jian Guo, Li Liu, Meiqin Wang, Puwen Wei, Zeyu Xu
papers.abstract: Symmetric-key primitives designed over the prime field Fp with odd characteristics, rather than the traditional Fn2 , are becoming the most popular choice for MPC/FHE/ZK-protocols for better efficiencies. However, the security of Fp is less understood as there are highly nontrivial gaps when extending the cryptanalysis tools and experiences built on Fn2 in the past few decades to Fp.At CRYPTO 2015, Sun et al. established the links among impossible differential, zero-correlation linear, and integral cryptanalysis over Fn2 from the perspective of distinguishers. In this paper, following the definition of linear correlations over Fp by Baignères, Stern and Vaudenay at SAC 2007, we successfully establish comprehensive links over Fp, by reproducing the proofs and offering alternatives when necessary. Interesting and important differences between Fp and Fn2 are observed.- Zero-correlation linear hulls can not lead to integral distinguishers for some cases over Fp, while this is always possible over Fn2proven by Sun et al..- When the newly established links are applied to GMiMC, its impossible differential, zero-correlation linear hull and integral distinguishers can be increased by up to 3 rounds for most of the cases, and even to an arbitrary number of rounds for some special and limited cases, which only appeared in Fp. It should be noted that all these distinguishers do not invalidate GMiMC’s security claims.The development of the theories over Fp behind these links, and properties identified (be it similar or different) will bring clearer and easier understanding of security of primitives in this emerging Fp field, which we believe will provide useful guides for future cryptanalysis and design.
papers.title_zh: MPC/FHE/ZK友好对称密钥基元上密码分析方法的联系
papers.abstract_zh: 在具有奇数特征的素域Fp上设计的对称密钥原语，而不是传统的Fn2，正成为MPC/FHE/ZK协议的最受欢迎的选择，以提高效率。然而，Fp的安全性不太为人所知，因为当将过去几十年中基于Fn2构建的密码分析工具和经验扩展到Fp时，存在非常大的差距。在CRYPTO 2015上，孙等人从区分器的角度建立了Fn2上不可能差分、零相关线性和整数密码分析之间的联系。在本文中，根据baigneres，Stern和Vaudenay在SAC 2007上对Fp上的线性相关性的定义，我们通过复制证明并在必要时提供替代方案，成功地建立了Fp上的全面联系。观察到Fp和Fn2之间有趣且重要的差异。-在Fp上的某些情况下，零相关线性外壳不能导致积分鉴别器，而这在Sun等人所证明的fn2上总是可能的..-当新建立的链接应用于GMiMC时，其不可能微分、零相关线性壳和积分区分器在大多数情况下可以增加到3轮，在一些特殊和有限的情况下甚至可以增加到任意轮数，这种情况只出现在Fp中。应该注意的是，所有这些区分符都不会使GMiMC的安全声明无效。这些链接背后的Fp上的理论的发展，以及所识别的属性(无论是相似的还是不同的)将带来对这个新兴的Fp领域中的原语的安全性的更清楚和更容易的理解，我们相信这将为未来的密码分析和设计提供有用的指导。

papers.title: Practical Related-Key Forgery Attacks on Full-Round TinyJAMBU-192/256
papers.authors: Orr Dunkelman, Shibam Ghosh, Eran Lambooij
papers.abstract: TinyJAMBU is one of the finalists in the NIST lightweight cryptography competition. It is considered to be one of the more efficient ciphers in the competition and has undergone extensive analysis in recent years as both the keyed permutation as well as the mode are new designs. In this paper we present a related-key forgery attack on the updated TinyJAMBU-v2 scheme with 256- and 192-bit keys. We introduce a high probability related-key differential attack where the differences are only introduced into the key state. Therefore, the characteristic is applicable to the TinyJAMBU mode and can be used to mount a forgery attack. The time and data complexity of the forgery are 233 using 214 related-keys for the 256-bit key version, and 243 using 216 related-keys for the 192-bit key version.For the 128-bit key we construct a related-key differential characteristic on the full keyed permutation of TinyJAMBU with a probability of 2−16. We extend the relatedkey differential characteristics on TinyJAMBU to practical-time key-recovery attacks that extract the full key from the keyed permutation with a time and data complexity of 224, 221, and 219 for respectively the 128-, 192-, and 256-bit key variants.All characteristics are experimentally verified and we provide key nonce pairs that produce the same tag to show the feasibility of the forgery attack. We note that the designers do not claim related-key security, however, the attacks proposed in this paper suggest that the scheme is not key-commiting, which has been recently identified as a favorable property for AEAD schemes.
papers.title_zh: 对全轮TinyJAMBU-192/256的实用相关密钥伪造攻击
papers.abstract_zh: TinyJAMBU是NIST轻量级加密竞赛的决赛选手之一。它被认为是竞争中最有效的密码之一，近年来经过了广泛的分析，因为密钥排列和模式都是新的设计。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个对更新的TinyJAMBU-v2方案的相关密钥伪造攻击。我们引入了一种高概率的相关密钥差分攻击，其中差异仅被引入到密钥状态中。因此，该特征适用于TinyJAMBU模式，并可用于发起伪造攻击。对于256位密钥版本，使用214个相关密钥伪造的时间和数据复杂度是233，而对于192位密钥版本，使用216个相关密钥伪造的时间和数据复杂度是243。对于128位密钥，我们以216的概率在TinyJAMBU的全密钥置换上构建相关密钥差分特征。我们将TinyJAMBU上的relatedkey差分特征扩展到实际时间密钥恢复攻击，这种攻击从密钥排列中提取完整密钥，对于128位、192位和256位密钥变体，时间和数据复杂度分别为224、221和219。所有特征都经过实验验证，我们提供产生相同标签的密钥随机数对来显示伪造攻击的可行性。我们注意到设计者没有声明相关密钥的安全性，然而，本文提出的攻击表明该方案不是密钥提交的，这最近被认为是AEAD方案的一个有利属性。

papers.title: Boosting Differential-Linear Cryptanalysis of ChaCha7 with MILP
papers.authors: Emanuele Bellini, David Gérault, Juan Grados, Rusydi H. Makarim, Thomas Peyrin
papers.abstract: In this paper, we present an improved differential-linear cryptanalysis of the ChaCha stream cipher. Our main contributions are new differential-linear distinguishers that we were able to build thanks to the following improvements: a) we considered a larger search space, including 2-bit differences (besides 1-bit differences) for the difference at the beginning of the differential part of the differential-linear trail; b) a better choice of mask between the differential and linear parts; c) a carefully crafted MILP tool that finds linear trails with higher correlation for the linear part. We eventually obtain a new distinguisher for ChaCha reduced to 7 rounds that requires 2166.89 computations, improving the previous record (ASIACRYPT 2022) by a factor of 247. Also, we obtain a distinguisher for ChaCha reduced to 7.5 rounds that requires 2251.4 computations, being the first time of a distinguisher against ChaCha reduced to 7.5 rounds. Using our MILP tool, we also found a 5-round differential-linear distinguisher. When combined with the probabilistic neutral bits (PNB) framework, we obtain a key-recovery attack on ChaCha reduced to 7 rounds with a computational complexity of 2206.8, improving by a factor 214.2 upon the recent result published at EUROCRYPT 2022.
papers.title_zh: 用MILP增强ChaCha7的差分线性密码分析
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了一种改进的ChaCha流密码差分线性密码分析方法。我们的主要贡献是新的差分线性区分器，由于以下改进，我们能够构建这些区分器:a)我们考虑了更大的搜索空间，包括在差分线性踪迹的差分部分的开始的差分的2比特差分(除了1比特差分之外);b)在微分和线性部分之间更好地选择掩模；c)一个精心制作的MILP工具，该工具为线性部分寻找具有更高相关性的线性轨迹。我们最终为ChaCha获得了一个新的区分符，减少到7轮，需要2166.89次计算，将先前的记录(ASIACRYPT 2022)提高了247倍。此外，我们获得了一个用于ChaCha减少到7.5轮的区分器，它需要2251.4次计算，这是第一次将区分器用于ChaCha减少到7.5轮。使用我们的MILP工具，我们还发现了一个5轮差分线性区分器。当与概率中性比特(PNB)框架结合时，我们获得了对ChaCha的密钥恢复攻击，该攻击减少到7轮，计算复杂度为2206.8，比最近在EUROCRYPT 2022上发表的结果提高了214.2倍。

papers.title: Classical and Quantum Meet-in-the-Middle Nostradamus Attacks on AES-like Hashing
papers.authors: Zhiyu Zhang, Siwei Sun, Caibing Wang, Lei Hu
papers.abstract: At EUROCRYPT 2006, Kelsey and Kohno proposed the so-called chosen target forced-prefix (CTFP) preimage attack, where for any challenge prefix P, the attacker can generate a suffix S such that H(P∥S) = y for some hash value y published in advance by the attacker. Consequently, the attacker can pretend to predict some event represented by P she did not know before, and thus this type of attack is also known as the Nostradamus attack. At ASIACRYPT 2022, Benedikt et al. convert Kelsey et al.’s attack to a quantum one, reducing the time complexity from O(√n · 22n/3) to O( 3√n · 23n/7). CTFP preimage attack is less investigated in the literature than (second-)preimage and collision attacks and lacks dedicated methods. In this paper, we propose the first dedicated Nostradamus attack based on the meet-in-the-middle (MITM) attack, and the MITM Nostradamus attack could be up to quadratically accelerated in the quantum setting. According to the recent works on MITM preimage attacks on AES-like hashing, we build an automatic tool to search for optimal MITM Nostradamus attacks and model the tradeoff between the offline and online phases. We apply our method to AES-MMO and Whirlpool, and obtain the first dedicated attack on round-reduced version of these hash functions. Our method and automatic tool are applicable to other AES-like hashings.
papers.title_zh: 基于AES-like哈希的经典和量子中间相遇诺查丹玛斯攻击
papers.abstract_zh: 在EUROCRYPT 2006上，Kelsey和Kohno提出了所谓的选择目标强制前缀(CTFP)原像攻击，其中对于任何挑战前缀P，攻击者都可以生成一个后缀S，使得H(P∑S)= y表示攻击者预先发布的某个哈希值y。因此，攻击者可以假装预测她以前不知道的由P表示的某个事件，因此这种类型的攻击也被称为诺查丹玛斯攻击。在ASIACRYPT 2022上，Benedikt等人将Kelsey等人的攻击转化为量子攻击，将时间复杂度从O(√n 22n/3)降低到O( 3√n 23n/7)。与(第二)原像和碰撞攻击相比，CTFP原像攻击在文献中较少被研究，并且缺乏专门的方法。在本文中，我们提出了第一个基于MITM攻击的专用诺查丹玛斯攻击，并且MITM诺查丹玛斯攻击在量子环境下可以被二次加速。根据最近关于AES-like hashing的MITM原像攻击的工作，我们建立了一个自动工具来搜索最优的MITM诺查丹玛斯攻击，并对离线和在线阶段之间的权衡进行建模。我们将我们的方法应用于AES-MMO和Whirlpool，并获得了对这些散列函数的轮约简版本的首次专门攻击。我们的方法和自动化工具适用于其他类似AES的哈希算法。

2021.journals_title: IACR Transactions on Symmetric Cryptology, Volume 2021

papers.title: Atom: A Stream Cipher with Double Key Filter
papers.authors: Subhadeep Banik, Andrea Caforio, Takanori Isobe, Fukang Liu, Willi Meier, Kosei Sakamoto, Santanu Sarkar
papers.abstract: It has been common knowledge that for a stream cipher to be secure against generic TMD tradeoff attacks, the size of its internal state in bits needs to be at least twice the size of the length of its secret key. In FSE 2015, Armknecht and Mikhalev however proposed the stream cipher Sprout with a Grain-like architecture, whose internal state was equal in size with its secret key and yet resistant against TMD attacks. Although Sprout had other weaknesses, it germinated a sequence of stream cipher designs like Lizard and Plantlet with short internal states. Both these designs have had cryptanalytic results reported against them. In this paper, we propose the stream cipher Atom that has an internal state of 159 bits and offers a security of 128 bits. Atom uses two key filters simultaneously to thwart certain cryptanalytic attacks that have been recently reported against keystream generators. In addition, we found that our design is one of the smallest stream ciphers that offers this security level, and we prove in this paper that Atom resists all the attacks that have been proposed against stream ciphers so far in literature. On the face of it, Atom also builds on the basic structure of the Grain family of stream ciphers. However, we try to prove that by including the additional key filter in the architecture of Atom we can make it immune to all cryptanalytic advances proposed against stream ciphers in recent cryptographic literature.
papers.abstract_zh: 众所周知，为了使流密码免受一般的TMD折衷攻击，其内部状态的比特大小需要至少是其密钥长度的两倍。然而，在2015年FSE大会上，Armknecht和Mikhalev提出了具有颗粒状架构的流密码Sprout，其内部状态与其密钥大小相等，但仍能抵抗TMD攻击。虽然Sprout还有其他的弱点，但是它萌发了一系列的流密码设计，像蜥蜴和具有短内部状态的小植物。这两种设计都有针对它们的密码分析结果。在本文中，我们提出了一个内部状态为159位的流密码原子，并提供了128位的安全性。Atom同时使用两个密钥过滤器来阻止最近报告的针对密钥流生成器的某些密码分析攻击。此外，我们发现我们的设计是提供这种安全级别的最小的流密码之一，并且我们在本文中证明了Atom抵抗迄今为止文献中针对流密码提出的所有攻击。从表面上看，Atom也建立在流密码的Grain家族的基本结构上。然而，我们试图证明，通过在Atom的体系结构中包括附加的密钥过滤器，我们可以使其不受最近密码文献中针对流密码提出的所有密码分析进展的影响。
papers.title_zh: Atom:一种具有双密钥过滤器的流密码

papers.title: Orthros: A Low-Latency PRF
papers.authors: Subhadeep Banik, Takanori Isobe, Fukang Liu, Kazuhiko Minematsu, Kosei Sakamoto
papers.abstract: We present Orthros, a 128-bit block pseudorandom function. It is designed with primary focus on latency of fully unrolled circuits. For this purpose, we adopt a parallel structure comprising two keyed permutations. The round function of each permutation is similar to Midori, a low-energy block cipher, however we thoroughly revise it to reduce latency, and introduce different rounds to significantly improve cryptographic strength in a small number of rounds. We provide a comprehensive, dedicated security analysis. For hardware implementation, Orthros achieves the lowest latency among the state-of-the-art low-latency primitives. For example, using the STM 90nm library, Orthros achieves a minimum latency of around 2.4 ns, while other constructions like PRINCE, Midori-128 and QARMA9-128-σ0 achieve 2.56 ns, 4.10 ns, 4.38 ns respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了Orthros，一个128位分组伪随机函数。它的设计主要关注完全展开电路的延迟。为此，我们采用包含两个键控排列的并行结构。每个排列的循环函数类似于低能量分组密码美岛莉，但是我们彻底修改了它以减少延迟，并引入不同的循环以在少量循环中显著提高加密强度。我们提供全面、专业的安全分析。对于硬件实现，Orthros在最先进的低延迟原语中实现了最低的延迟。例如，使用STM 90nm库，Orthros实现了约2.4 ns的最小延迟，而其他结构如PRINCE、美岛莉-128和QARMA9-128-σ0分别实现了2.56 ns、4.10 ns和4.38 ns。
papers.title_zh: Orthros:一种低延迟PRF

papers.title: MOE: Multiplication Operated Encryption with Trojan Resilience
papers.authors: Olivier Bronchain, Sebastian Faust, Virginie Lallemand, Gregor Leander, Léo Perrin, François-Xavier Standaert
papers.abstract: In order to lower costs, the fabrication of Integrated Circuits (ICs) is increasingly delegated to offshore contract foundries, making them exposed to malicious modifications, known as hardware Trojans. Recent works have demonstrated that a strong form of Trojan-resilience can be obtained from untrusted chips by exploiting secret sharing and Multi-Party Computation (MPC), yet with significant cost overheads. In this paper, we study the possibility of building a symmetric cipher enabling similar guarantees in a more efficient manner. To reach this goal, we exploit a simple round structure mixing a modular multiplication and a multiplication with a binary matrix. Besides being motivated as a new block cipher design for Trojan resilience, our research also exposes the cryptographic properties of the modular multiplication, which is of independent interest.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了降低成本，集成电路(IC)的制造越来越多地委托给离岸合同代工厂，使他们暴露于恶意修改，即所谓的硬件木马。最近的工作已经证明，通过利用秘密共享和多方计算(MPC ),可以从不可信的芯片获得一种强形式的抗木马能力，但是具有显著的成本开销。在本文中，我们研究了建立一个对称密码的可能性，以更有效的方式实现类似的保证。为了达到这个目标，我们采用了一种简单的循环结构，混合了模乘和与二进制矩阵的乘法。除了作为一种新的分组密码设计的动机，我们的研究还揭示了模乘的密码学性质，这是独立的兴趣。
papers.title_zh: MOE:具有木马恢复能力的乘法运算加密

papers.title: Misuse-Free Key-Recovery and Distinguishing Attacks on 7-Round Ascon
papers.authors: Raghvendra Rohit, Kai Hu, Sumanta Sarkar, Siwei Sun
papers.abstract: Being one of the winning algorithms of the CAESAR competition and currently a second round candidate of the NIST lightweight cryptography standardization project, the authenticated encryption scheme Ascon (designed by Dobraunig, Eichlseder, Mendel, and Schläffer) has withstood extensive self and third-party cryptanalysis. The best known attack on Ascon could only penetrate up to 7 (out of 12) rounds due to Li et al. (ToSC Vol I, 2017). However, it violates the data limit of 264 blocks per key specified by the designers. Moreover, the best known distinguishers of Ascon in the AEAD context reach only 6 rounds. To fill these gaps, we revisit the security of 7-round Ascon in the nonce-respecting setting without violating the data limit as specified in the design. First, we introduce a new superpoly-recovery technique named as partial polynomial multiplication for which computations take place between the so-called degree-d homogeneous parts of the involved Boolean functions for a 2d-dimensional cube. We apply this method to 7-round Ascon and present several key recovery attacks. Our best attack can recover the 128-bit secret key with a time complexity of about 2123 7-round Ascon permutations and requires 264 data and 2101 bits memory. Also, based on division properties, we identify several 60 dimensional cubes whose superpolies are constant zero after 7 rounds. We further improve the cube distinguishers for 4, 5 and 6 rounds. Although our results are far from threatening the security of full 12-round Ascon, they provide new insights in the security analysis of Ascon.
papers.abstract_zh: 认证加密方案Ascon(由Dobraunig、Eichlseder、Mendel和Schlä ffer设计)是CAESAR竞赛的获奖算法之一，目前是NIST轻量级密码标准化项目的第二轮候选方案，它经受住了广泛的自我和第三方密码分析。由于李等人(ToSC Vol I，2017)，对Ascon的最著名攻击最多只能穿透7轮(共12轮)。然而，它违反了设计者规定的每个键264个块的数据限制。此外，在AEAD环境中，Ascon最著名的区分器只能达到6轮。为了填补这些空白，我们在不违反设计中规定的数据限制的情况下，重新考察了7轮Ascon在随机数方面的安全性。首先，我们介绍了一种新的超多重恢复技术，称为部分多项式乘法，其计算发生在二维立方体的相关布尔函数的所谓d次齐次部分之间。我们将这种方法应用于7轮Ascon，并提出了几个关键恢复攻击。我们最好的攻击可以恢复128位密钥，时间复杂度约为2123个7轮Ascon排列，需要264个数据和2101位存储器。此外，基于除法性质，我们确定了几个60维立方体，它们的超重迭在7轮后恒定为零。我们进一步改进了4轮、5轮和6轮的立方体区分器。虽然我们的结果远未威胁到完整的12轮Ascon的安全性，但它们为Ascon的安全性分析提供了新的见解。
papers.title_zh: 7轮Ascon上的无误用密钥恢复和区分攻击

papers.title: Towards Key-recovery-attack Friendly Distinguishers: Application to GIFT-128
papers.authors: Rui Zong, Xiaoyang Dong, Huaifeng Chen, Yiyuan Luo, Si Wang, Zheng Li
papers.abstract: When analyzing a block cipher, the first step is to search for some valid distinguishers, for example, the differential trails in the differential cryptanalysis and the linear trails in the linear cryptanalysis. A distinguisher is advantageous if it can be utilized to attack more rounds and the amount of the involved key bits during the key-recovery process is small, as this leads to a long attack with a low complexity. In this article, we propose a two-step strategy to search for such advantageous distinguishers. This strategy is inspired by the intuition that if a differential is advantageous only when some properties are satisfied, then we can predefine some constraints describing these properties and search for the differentials in the small set. As applications, our strategy is used to analyze GIFT-128, which was proposed in CHES 2017. Based on some 20-round differentials, we give the first 27-round differential attack on GIFT-128, which covers one more round than the best previous result. Also, based on two 17-round linear trails, we give the first linear hull attack on GIFT-128, which covers 22 rounds. In addition, we also give some results on two GIFT-128 based AEADs GIFT-COFB and SUNDAE-GIFT.
papers.abstract_zh: 在分析分组密码时，第一步是寻找一些有效的鉴别符，例如差分密码分析中的差分踪迹和线性密码分析中的线性踪迹。如果区分符可以用于攻击更多轮次，并且在密钥恢复过程中涉及的密钥比特数量很少，则区分符是有利的，因为这将导致低复杂度的长攻击。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个两步策略来寻找这种有利的区分。这种策略受到直觉的启发，即如果一个微分只有在满足某些性质时才是有利的，那么我们可以预先定义一些描述这些性质的约束，并在小集合中搜索微分。作为应用，我们的策略用于分析CHES 2017中提出的GIFT-128。基于一些20轮差分，我们给出了对GIFT-128的第一个27轮差分攻击，它比以前最好的结果多覆盖一轮。此外，基于两个17轮线性轨迹，我们给出了GIFT-128上的第一个线性船体攻击，它覆盖了22轮。此外，我们还给出了两个基于GIFT-128的AEADs GIFT-COFB和Sunda-GIFT的一些结果。
papers.title_zh: 密钥恢复攻击友好鉴别器:GIFT-128的应用

papers.title: Exploiting Weak Diffusion of Gimli: Improved Distinguishers and Preimage Attacks
papers.authors: Fukang Liu, Takanori Isobe, Willi Meier
papers.abstract: The Gimli permutation proposed in CHES 2017 was designed for cross-platform performance. One main strategy to achieve such a goal is to utilize a sparse linear layer (Small-Swap and Big-Swap), which occurs every two rounds. In addition, the round constant addition occurs every four rounds and only one 32-bit word is affected by it. The above two facts have been recently exploited to construct a distinguisher for the full Gimli permutation with time complexity 264. By utilizing a new property of the SP-box, we demonstrate that the time complexity of the full-round distinguisher can be further reduced to 252 while a significant bias still remains. Moreover, for the 18-round Gimli permutation, we could construct a distinguisher even with only 2 queries. Apart from the permutation itself, the weak diffusion can also be utilized to accelerate the preimage attacks on reduced Gimli-Hash and Gimli-XOF-128 with a divide-and-conquer method. As a consequence, the preimage attacks on reduced Gimli-Hash and Gimli-XOF-128 can reach up to 5 rounds and 9 rounds, respectively. Since Gimli is included in the second round candidates in NIST’s Lightweight Cryptography Standardization process, we expect that our analysis can further advance the understanding of Gimli. To the best of our knowledge, the distinguishing attacks and preimage attacks are the best so far.
papers.abstract_zh: CHES 2017中提出的吉姆利排列是为跨平台性能而设计的。实现这一目标的一个主要策略是利用稀疏线性层(小交换和大交换)，每两轮进行一次。此外，循环常数加法每四轮发生一次，只有一个32位字受其影响。上述两个事实最近已经被用来为时间复杂度为264的全吉姆利置换构造区分器。通过利用SP-box的一个新的性质，我们证明了全轮鉴别器的时间复杂度可以进一步降低到252，而仍然存在显著的偏差。此外，对于18轮吉姆利置换，我们甚至可以用两个查询来构造一个区分器。除了置换本身，弱扩散还可以被用来通过分治法加速对简化的吉姆利-哈希和吉姆利-XOF-128的原像攻击。因此，对简化的吉姆利-哈希和吉姆利-XOF-128的原像攻击可以分别达到5轮和9轮。由于吉姆利被列入了NIST轻量级密码标准化进程的第二轮候选名单，我们希望我们的分析能够进一步加深对吉姆利的了解。据我们所知，区别攻击和原像攻击是目前为止最好的。
papers.title_zh: 利用吉姆利的弱扩散:改进的区分器和原像攻击

papers.title: Improved Preimage Attacks on 4-Round Keccak-224/256
papers.authors: Le He, Xiaoen Lin, Hongbo Yu
papers.abstract: In this paper, we provide an improved method on preimage attacks of standard 3-round Keccak-224/256. Our method is based on the work by Li and Sun. Their strategy is to find a 2-block preimage instead of a 1-block one by constructing the first and second message blocks in two stages. Under this strategy, they design a new linear structure for 2-round Keccak-224/256 with 194 degrees of freedom left, which is able to construct the second message block with a complexity of 231/262. However, the bottleneck of this strategy is that the first stage needs much more expense than the second one. Therefore, we improve the first stage by using two techniques. The first technique is constructing multi-block messages rather than one-block message in the first stage, which can reach a better inner state. The second technique is setting restricting equations more efficiently, which can work in 3-round Keccak-256. As a result, the complexity of finding a preimage for 3-round Keccak-224/256 can be decreased from 238/281 to 232/265.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇文章中，我们提供了一种改进的方法对原像攻击的标准3轮Keccak-224/256。我们的方法是以李和孙的工作为基础的。他们的策略是通过分两个阶段构建第一个和第二个消息块，找到一个2块原像，而不是1块原像。在这种策略下，他们为2轮Keccak-224/256设计了一种新的线性结构，剩下194个自由度，能够构造复杂度为231/262的第二个消息块。然而，这种策略的瓶颈是第一阶段比第二阶段需要更多的开销。因此，我们通过使用两种技术来改进第一阶段。第一种技术是在第一阶段构造多块消息而不是一个块消息，这样可以达到更好的内部状态。第二种技术是更有效地设置约束方程，这可以在3轮Keccak-256中工作。结果，找到3轮Keccak-224/256的原像的复杂度可以从238/281降低到232/265。
papers.title_zh: 改进了4回合Keccak-224/256的原像攻击

papers.title: Algebraic Collision Attacks on Keccak
papers.authors: Rachelle Heim Boissier, Camille Noûs, Yann Rotella
papers.abstract: In this paper, we analyze the collision resistance of the two smallest versions of Keccak which have a width of 200 and 400 bits respectively. We show that algebraic and linearization techniques can serve collision cryptanalysis by using some interesting properties of the linear part of the round function of Keccak. We present an attack on the Keccak versions that could be used in lightweight cryptography reduced to two rounds. For Keccak[40, 160] (resp. Keccak[72, 128] and Keccak[144, 256]) our attack has a computational complexity of 273 (resp. 252.5 and 2101.5) Keccak calls.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文分析了Keccak的两个最小版本的抗碰撞性，这两个版本的宽度分别为200和400比特。通过使用Keccak轮函数线性部分的一些有趣的性质，我们证明了代数和线性化技术可以为碰撞密码分析服务。我们提出了对Keccak版本的攻击，该版本可用于简化为两轮的轻量级加密。对于凯克[40，160](分别。Keccak[72，128]和Keccak[144，256])我们的攻击具有273的计算复杂度(分别为。252.5和2101.5) Keccak调用。
papers.title_zh: 对Keccak的代数碰撞攻击

papers.title: Accelerating the Search of Differential and Linear Characteristics with the SAT Method
papers.authors: Ling Sun, Wei Wang, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: Abstract. The introduction of the automatic search boosts the cryptanalysis of symmetric-key primitives to some degree. However, the performance of the automatic search is not always satisfactory for the search of long trails or ciphers with large state sizes. Compared with the extensive attention on the enhancement for the search with the mixed integer linear programming (MILP) method, few works care for the acceleration of the automatic search with the Boolean satisfiability problem (SAT) or satisfiability modulo theories (SMT) method. This paper intends to fill this vacancy. Firstly, with the additional encoding variables of the sequential counter circuit for the original objective function in the standard SAT method, we put forward a new encoding method to convert the Matsui’s bounding conditions into Boolean formulas. This approach does not rely on new auxiliary variables and significantly reduces the consumption of clauses for integrating multiple bounding conditions into one SAT problem. Then, we evaluate the accelerating effect of the novel encoding method under different sets of bounding conditions. With the observations and experience in the tests, a strategy on how to create the sets of bounding conditions that probably achieve extraordinary advances is proposed. The new idea is applied to search for optimal differential and linear characteristics for multiple ciphers. For PRESENT, GIFT-64, RECTANGLE, LBlock, TWINE, and some versions in SIMON and SPECK families of block ciphers, we obtain the complete bounds (full rounds) on the number of active S-boxes, the differential probability, as well as the linear bias. The acceleration method is also employed to speed up the search of related-key differential trails for GIFT-64. Based on the newly identified 18-round distinguisher with probability 2−58, we launch a 26-round key-recovery attack with 260.96 chosen plaintexts. To our knowledge, this is the longest attack on GIFT-64. Lastly, we note that the attack result is far from threatening the security of GIFT-64 since the designers recommended users to double the number of rounds under the related-key attack setting.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象。自动搜索的引入在一定程度上提高了对称密钥原语的安全性。然而，对于具有大状态大小的长踪迹或密码的搜索，自动搜索的性能并不总是令人满意的。与广泛关注混合整数线性规划(MILP)方法对搜索的增强相比，很少有人关心布尔可满足性问题(SAT)或可满足性模理论(SMT)方法对自动搜索的加速。本文旨在填补这一空白。首先，通过在标准SAT方法中为原目标函数增加顺序计数电路的编码变量，我们提出了一种新的编码方法，将Matsui的边界条件转化为布尔公式。这种方法不依赖于新的辅助变量，大大减少了将多个约束条件集成到一个SAT问题中的子句消耗。然后，我们评估了新编码方法在不同边界条件下的加速效果。根据测试中的观察和经验，提出了如何创建可能实现非凡进步的边界条件集的策略。这一新思想被应用于寻找多重密码的最佳差分和线性特性。对于目前的GIFT-64、RECTANGLE、LBlock、TWINE以及SIMON和SPECK族中的一些版本的分组密码，我们获得了关于活动S盒的数目、差分概率以及线性偏差的完整界(满轮)。加速方法也被用于加速GIFT-64的相关键差异轨迹的搜索。基于新确定的概率为258的18轮区分符，我们用260.96个选择的明文发起26轮密钥恢复攻击。据我们所知，这是对GIFT-64最长的攻击。最后，我们注意到攻击结果远未威胁到GIFT-64的安全性，因为设计者建议用户在相关键攻击设置下加倍回合数。
papers.title_zh: 用SAT方法加速微分和线性特征的搜索

papers.title: Quantum Free-Start Collision Attacks on Double Block Length Hashing with Round-Reduced AES-256
papers.authors: Amit Kumar Chauhan, Abhishek Kumar, Somitra Kumar Sanadhya
papers.abstract: Recently, Hosoyamada and Sasaki (EUROCRYPT 2020), and Xiaoyang Dong et al. (ASIACRYPT 2020) proposed quantum collision attacks against AES-like hashing modes AES-MMO and AES-MP. Their collision attacks are based on the quantum version of the rebound attack technique exploiting the differential trails whose probabilities are too low to be useful in the classical setting but large enough in the quantum setting. In this work, we present dedicated quantum free-start collision attacks on Hirose’s double block length compression function instantiated with AES-256, namely HCF-AES-256. The best publicly known classical attack against HCF-AES-256 covers up to 9 out of 14 rounds. We present a new 10-round differential trail for HCF-AES-256 with probability 2−160, and use it to find collisions with a quantum version of the rebound attack. Our attack succeeds with a time complexity of 285.11 and requires 216 qRAM in the quantum-attack setting, where an attacker can make only classical queries to the oracle and perform offline computations. We also present a quantum free-start collision attack on HCF-AES-256 with a time complexity of 286.07 which outperforms Chailloux, Naya-Plasencia, and Schrottenloher’s generic quantum collision attack (ASIACRYPT 2017) in a model when large qRAM is not available.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，Hosoyamada和Sasaki (EUROCRYPT 2020)以及Xiaoyang Dong等人(ASIACRYPT 2020)提出了针对AES-like哈希模式AES-MMO和AES-MP的量子碰撞攻击。他们的碰撞攻击是基于量子版本的反弹攻击技术，利用了差分尾迹，其概率太低，在经典设置中没有用，但在量子设置中足够大。在这项工作中，我们提出了专门的量子自由开始碰撞攻击Hirose的双块长压缩函数与AES-256实例化，即HCF-AES-256。最广为人知的对HCF-AES-256的经典攻击覆盖了14轮中的9轮。我们为概率为2160的HCF-AES-256提出了一个新的10轮差分轨迹，并使用它来寻找反弹攻击的量子版本的碰撞。我们的攻击成功了，时间复杂度为285.11，在量子攻击环境中需要216 qRAM，攻击者只能对oracle进行经典查询并执行离线计算。我们还提出了对HCF-AES-256的量子自由启动碰撞攻击，时间复杂度为286.07，在大qRAM不可用的模型中，其性能优于Chailloux、Naya-Plasencia和Schrottenloher的一般量子碰撞攻击(ASIACRYPT 2017)。
papers.title_zh: 基于舍入AES-256的双块长哈希的量子自由开始碰撞攻击

papers.title: Provably Quantum-Secure Tweakable Block Ciphers
papers.authors: Akinori Hosoyamada, Tetsu Iwata
papers.abstract: Recent results on quantum cryptanalysis show that some symmetric key schemes can be broken in polynomial time even if they are proven to be secure in the classical setting. Liskov, Rivest, and Wagner showed that secure tweakable block ciphers can be constructed from secure block ciphers in the classical setting. However, Kaplan et al. showed that their scheme can be broken by polynomial time quantum superposition attacks, even if underlying block ciphers are quantum-secure. Since then, it remains open if there exists a mode of block ciphers to build quantum-secure tweakable block ciphers. This paper settles the problem in the reduction-based provable security paradigm. We show the first design of quantum-secure tweakable block ciphers based on quantum-secure block ciphers, and present a provable security bound. Our construction is simple, and when instantiated with a quantum-secure n-bit block cipher, it is secure against attacks that query arbitrary quantum superpositions of plaintexts and tweaks up to O(2n/6) quantum queries. Our security proofs use the compressed oracle technique introduced by Zhandry. More precisely, we use an alternative formalization of the technique introduced by Hosoyamada and Iwata.
papers.abstract_zh: 量子密码分析的最新结果表明，一些对称密钥方案即使在经典环境下被证明是安全的，也可以在多项式时间内被破解。Liskov、Rivest和Wagner证明了安全可调分组密码可以在经典环境下从安全分组密码中构造出来。然而，Kaplan等人表明，即使底层分组密码是量子安全的，他们的方案也可以被多项式时间量子叠加攻击破解。从那时起，如果存在一种分组密码模式来构建量子安全的可调分组密码，它仍然是开放的。本文解决了基于约简的可证安全范式中的问题。我们给出了基于量子安全分组密码的量子安全可调分组密码的首次设计，并给出了一个可证明的安全界。我们的构造很简单，当用量子安全的n比特分组密码实例化时，它可以安全地抵抗查询明文的任意量子叠加和调整高达O(2n/6)个量子查询的攻击。我们的安全证明使用了Zhandry介绍的压缩oracle技术。更准确地说，我们使用Hosoyamada和Iwata介绍的技术的另一种形式化。
papers.title_zh: 可证明量子安全的可调分组密码

papers.title: Resistance of SNOW-V against Fast Correlation Attacks
papers.authors: Xinxin Gong, Bin Zhang
papers.abstract: SNOW-V is a new member in the SNOW family of stream ciphers, hoping to be competitive in the 5G mobile communication system. In this paper, we study the resistance of SNOW-V against bitwise fast correlation attacks by constructing bitwise linear approximations. First, we propose and summarize some efficient algorithms using the slice-like techniques to compute the bitwise linear approximations of certain types of composition functions composed of basic operations like ⊞, ⊕, Permutation, and S-box, which have been widely used in word-oriented stream ciphers such as SNOW-like ciphers. Then, using these algorithms, we find a number of stronger linear approximations for the FSM of the two variants of SNOW-V given in the design document, i.e., SNOW-V σ0 and SNOW-V⊞8, ⊞8. For SNOW-V σ0, where there is no byte-wise permutation, we find some bitwise linear approximations of the FSM with the SEI (Squared Euclidean Imbalance) around 2−37.34 and mount a bitwise fast correlation attack with the time complexity 2251.93 and memory complexity 2244, given 2103.83 keystream outputs, which improves greatly the results in the design document. For SNOW-V⊞8, ⊞8, where both of the two 32-bit adders in the FSM are replaced by 8-bit adders, we find our best bitwise linear approximations of the FSM with the SEI 2−174.14, while the best byte-wise linear approximation in the design document of SNOW-V has the SEI 2−214.80. Finally, we study the security of a closer variant of SNOW-V, denoted by SNOW-V⊞32, ⊞8, where only the 32-bit adder used for updating the first register is replaced by the 8-bit adder, while everything else remains identical. For SNOW-V⊞32, ⊞8, we derive many mask tuples yielding the bitwise linear approximations of the FSM with the SEI larger than 2−184. Using these linear approximations, we mount a fast correlation attack with the time complexity 2377.01 and a memory complexity 2363, given 2253.73 keystream outputs. Note that neither of our attack threatens the security of SNOW-V. We hope our research could further help in understanding bitwise linear approximation attacks and also the structure of SNOW-like stream ciphers.
papers.abstract_zh: SNOW-V是SNOW系列流密码中的新成员，希望在5G移动通信系统中具有竞争力。本文通过构造逐位线性近似，研究了SNOW-V抵抗逐位快速相关攻击的能力。首先，我们提出并总结了一些有效的算法，这些算法使用类切片技术来计算某些类型的复合函数的逐位线性近似，这些复合函数由⊞、⊕、置换和s盒等基本运算组成，这些运算已广泛用于面向字的流密码，如类雪密码。然后，使用这些算法，我们找到了设计文件中给出的SNOW-V的两个变体(即SNOW-V σ0和⊞8. snow-v⊞8)的FSM的多个更强线性近似对于SNOW-V σ0，其中没有按字节排列，我们找到了一些按位线性近似的FSM，SEI(平方欧几里德不平衡)约为237.34，并在给定2103.83个密钥流输出的情况下，发起了时间复杂度为2251.93、存储器复杂度为2244的按位快速相关攻击，这极大地改善了设计文档中的结果。对于⊞8 SNOW-V⊞8，FSM中的两个32位加法器都被8位加法器取代，我们发现我们的最佳FSM逐位线性近似为sei 2 174.14，而snow-v设计文档中的最佳字节线性近似为sei 2 214.80。最后，我们研究SNOW-V的一个更接近的变体的安全性，该变体由⊞8的SNOW-V⊞32表示，其中只有用于更新第一寄存器的32位加法器被8位加法器取代，而其他一切保持不变。对于⊞8的SNOW-V⊞32，我们推导出许多掩码元组，产生SEI大于2184的FSM的逐位线性近似。在给定2253.73个密钥流输出的情况下，使用这些线性近似，我们发起了时间复杂度为2377.01、存储复杂度为2363的快速相关攻击。请注意，我们的攻击都不会威胁SNOW-V的安全性。我们希望我们的研究可以进一步帮助理解逐位线性近似攻击以及SNOW-like流密码的结构。
papers.title_zh: SNOW-V对快速相关攻击的抵抗能力

papers.title: On the Relationships between Different Methods for Degree Evaluation
papers.authors: Siwei Chen, Zejun Xiang, Xiangyong Zeng, Shasha Zhang
papers.abstract: In this paper, we compare several non-tight degree evaluation methods i.e., Boura and Canteaut’s formula, Carlet’s formula as well as Liu’s numeric mapping and division property proposed by Todo, and hope to find the best one from these methods for practical applications. Specifically, for the substitution-permutation-network (SPN) ciphers, we first deeply explore the relationships between division property of an Sbox and its algebraic properties (e.g., the algebraic degree of its inverse). Based on these findings, we can prove theoretically that division property is never worse than Boura and Canteaut’s and Carlet’s formulas, and we also experimentally verified that the division property can indeed give a better bound than the latter two methods. In addition, for the nonlinear feedback shift registers (NFSR) based ciphers, according to the propagation of division property and the core idea of numeric mapping, we give a strict proof that the estimated degree using division property is never greater than that of numeric mapping. Moreover, our experimental results on Trivium and Kreyvium indicate the division property actually derives a much better bound than the numeric mapping. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first time to give a formal discussion on the relationships between division property and other degree evaluation methods, and we present the first theoretical proof and give the experimental verification to illustrate that division property is the optimal one among these methods in terms of the accuracy of the upper bounds on algebraic degree.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要:本文比较了几种非紧度评价方法，即Boura和Canteaut公式、Carlet公式以及Todo提出的Liu的数值映射和除法性质，希望从中找出一种最佳的方法，以便实际应用。特别地，对于置换网络(SPN)密码，我们首先深入研究了Sbox的除法性质与其代数性质(例如，其逆的代数次数)之间的关系。基于这些发现，我们可以从理论上证明除法性质决不会比Boura和Canteaut以及Carlet的公式差，并且我们也从实验上验证了除法性质确实可以给出比后两种方法更好的界。此外，对于基于非线性反馈移位寄存器(NFSR)的密码，根据除法性质的推广和数值映射的核心思想，我们给出了一个严格的证明:利用除法性质估计的次数不会大于数值映射估计的次数。此外，我们在Trivium和Kreyvium上的实验结果表明，除法性质实际上得到一个比数值映射更好的界。据我们所知，这是第一次正式讨论除性质与其他度评价方法之间的关系，并且我们给出了第一个理论证明和实验验证，以说明就代数度上界的精度而言，除性质是这些方法中的最佳方法。
papers.title_zh: 不同学位评定方法之间的关系

papers.title: Rocca: An Efficient AES-based Encryption Scheme for Beyond 5G
papers.authors: Kosei Sakamoto, Fukang Liu, Yuto Nakano, Shinsaku Kiyomoto, Takanori Isobe
papers.abstract: In this paper, we present an AES-based authenticated-encryption with associated-data scheme called Rocca, with the purpose to reach the requirements on the speed and security in 6G systems. To achieve ultra-fast software implementations, the basic design strategy is to take full advantage of the AES-NI and SIMD instructions as that of the AEGIS family and Tiaoxin-346. Although Jean and Nikolić have generalized the way to construct efficient round functions using only one round of AES (aesenc) and 128-bit XOR operation and have found several efficient candidates, there still seems to exist potential to further improve it regarding speed and state size. In order to minimize the critical path of one round, we remove the case of applying both aesenc and XOR in a cascade way for one round. By introducing a cost-free block permutation in the round function, we are able to search for candidates in a larger space without sacrificing the performance. Consequently, we obtain more efficient constructions with a smaller state size than candidates by Jean and Nikolić. Based on the newly-discovered round function, we carefully design the corresponding AEAD scheme with 256-bit security by taking several reported attacks on the AEGIS family and Tiaxion-346 into account. Our AEAD scheme can reach 138Gbps which is 4 times faster than the AEAD scheme of SNOW-V. Rocca is also much faster than other efficient schemes with 256-bit key length, e.g. AEGIS-256 and AES-256-GCM. As far as we know, Rocca is the first dedicated cryptographic algorithm targeting 6 systems, i.e., 256-bit key length and the speed of more than 100 Gbps.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了满足第六代移动通信系统对速度和安全性的要求，本文提出了一种基于AES的关联数据认证加密方案Rocca。为了实现超快速的软件实现，基本设计策略是充分利用AES-NI和SIMD指令，就像AEGIS系列和调节-346一样。虽然Jean和Nikoli已经概括了仅使用一轮AES (aesenc)和128位XOR运算来构造有效的轮函数的方法，并且已经找到了几个有效的候选，但是在速度和状态大小方面似乎仍然存在进一步改进的潜力。为了最小化一轮的关键路径，我们去除了以级联方式对一轮应用aesenc和XOR的情况。通过在round函数中引入一个免费的块置换，我们能够在一个更大的空间中搜索候选项，而不会牺牲性能。因此，与Jean和Nikoli的候选方案相比，我们获得了具有更小状态尺寸的更有效的构造。基于新发现的round函数，我们考虑到对AEGIS家族和Tiaxion-346的攻击，精心设计了相应的具有256位安全性的AEAD方案。我们的AEAD方案可以达到138Gbps，比SNOW-V的AEAD方案快4倍。Rocca也比其他256位密钥长度的高效方案快得多，例如AEGIS-256和AES-256-GCM。据我们所知，Rocca是第一个针对6个系统的专用密码算法，即256位密钥长度和100 Gbps以上的速度。
papers.title_zh: Rocca:一种基于AES的高效超5G加密方案

papers.title: Permutation Based EDM: An Inverse Free BBB Secure PRF
papers.authors: Avijit Dutta, Mridul Nandi, Suprita Talnikar
papers.abstract: In CRYPTO 2019, Chen et al. have initiated an interesting research direction in designing PRF based on public permutations. They have proposed two beyond the birthday bound secure n-bit to n-bit PRF constructions, i.e., SoEM22 and SoKAC21, which are built on public permutations, where n is the size of the permutation. However, both of their constructions require two independent instances of public permutations. In FSE 2020, Chakraborti et al. have proposed a single public permutation based n-bit to n-bit beyond the birthday bound secure PRF, which they refer to as PDMMAC. Although the construction is minimal in the number of permutations, it requires the inverse call of its underlying permutation in their design. Coming up with a beyond the birthday bound secure public permutation based n-bit to n-bit PRF with a single permutation and two forward calls was left as an open problem in their paper. In this work, we propose pEDM, a single permutation based n-bit to n-bit PRF with two calls that do not require invertibility of the permutation. We have shown that our construction is secured against all adaptive information-theoretic distinguishers that make roughly up to 22n/3 construction and primitive queries. Moreover, we have also shown a matching attack with similar query complexity that establishes the tightness of our security bound.
papers.abstract_zh: 在CRYPTO 2019中，陈等人在设计基于公共置换的PRF方面开创了一个有趣的研究方向。他们提出了两种超越生日界限的安全n位到n位PRF构造，即SoEM22和SoKAC21，它们建立在公共置换上，其中n是置换的大小。然而，它们的构造都需要两个独立的公共置换实例。在FSE 2020中，Chakraborti等人提出了基于n比特到n比特的单个公共置换，超出了生日界限的安全PRF，他们将其称为PDMMAC。尽管这种构造在排列的数量上是最小的，但在设计中它需要对其基础排列的反向调用。在他们的论文中，提出基于n位到n位PRF的超越生日界限的安全公共置换，具有单个置换和两个前向调用，是一个公开的问题。在这项工作中，我们提出了pEDM，一种基于单个置换的n位到n位PRF，具有两个调用，不要求置换的可逆性。我们已经证明，我们的构造是安全的，可以抵抗所有的自适应信息论区分器，这些区分器大约产生22n/3个构造和原始查询。此外，我们还展示了一个具有相似查询复杂性的匹配攻击，它建立了我们的安全界限的紧密性。
papers.title_zh: 基于置换的EDM:一种逆自由BBB安全PRF

papers.title: Comparing Large-unit and Bitwise Linear Approximations of SNOW 2.0 and SNOW 3G and Related Attacks
papers.authors: Xinxin Gong, Bin Zhang
papers.abstract: In this paper, we study and compare the byte-wise and bitwise linear approximations of SNOW 2.0 and SNOW 3G, and present a fast correlation attack on SNOW 3G by using our newly found bitwise linear approximations. On one side, we reconsider the relation between the large-unit linear approximation and the smallerunit/ bitwise ones derived from the large-unit one, showing that approximations on large-unit alphabets have advantages over all the smaller-unit/bitwise ones in linear attacks. But then on the other side, by comparing the byte-wise and bitwise linear approximations of SNOW 2.0 and SNOW 3G respectively, we have found many concrete examples of 8-bit linear approximations whose certain 1-dimensional/bitwise linear approximations have almost the same SEI (Squared Euclidean Imbalance) as that of the original 8-bit ones. That is, each of these byte-wise linear approximations is dominated by a single bitwise approximation, and thus the whole SEI is not essentially larger than the SEI of the dominating single bitwise approximation. Since correlation attacks can be more efficiently implemented using bitwise approximations rather than large-unit approximations, improvements over the large-unit linear approximation attacks are possible for SNOW 2.0 and SNOW 3G. For SNOW 3G, we make a careful search of the bitwise masks for the linear approximations of the FSM and obtain many mask tuples which yield high correlations. By using these bitwise linear approximations, we mount a fast correlation attack to recover the initial state of the LFSR with the time/memory/data/pre-computation complexities all upper bounded by 2174.16, improving slightly the previous best one which used an 8-bit (vectorized) linear approximation in a correlation attack with all the complexities upper bounded by 2176.56. Though not a significant improvement, our research results illustrate that we have an opportunity to achieve improvement over the large-unit attacks by using bitwise linear approximations in a linear approximation attack, and provide a newinsight on the relation between large-unit and bitwise linear approximations.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们研究和比较了SNOW 2.0和SNOW 3G的逐字节和逐位线性近似，并利用我们新发现的逐位线性近似对SNOW 3G提出了一种快速相关攻击。一方面，我们重新考虑了大单位线性近似与由大单位线性近似导出的小单位/位线性近似之间的关系，表明在线性攻击中，大单位字母上的近似优于所有小单位/位线性近似。但另一方面，通过分别比较SNOW 2.0和SNOW 3G的逐字节和逐位线性近似，我们发现了许多8位线性近似的具体示例，其某些一维/逐位线性近似与原始8位线性近似具有几乎相同的SEI(平方欧几里德不平衡)。也就是说，这些逐字节线性近似中的每一个都由单个逐位近似支配，因此整个SEI本质上并不大于支配的单个逐位近似的SEI。由于使用逐位近似比大单位近似可以更有效地实现相关攻击，因此SNOW 2.0和SNOW 3G有可能改进大单位线性近似攻击。对于SNOW 3G，我们仔细搜索FSM的线性近似的逐位掩码，并获得许多产生高相关性的掩码元组。通过使用这些逐位线性近似，我们安装了一个快速相关攻击来恢复LFSR的初始状态，其时间/存储器/数据/预计算复杂度的上限均为2174.16，稍微改进了之前的最佳方案，该方案在相关攻击中使用了8位(矢量化)线性近似，所有复杂度的上限均为2176.56。虽然不是一个显著的改进，但我们的研究结果表明，我们有机会通过在线性近似攻击中使用逐位线性近似来实现对大单位攻击的改进，并提供了关于大单位和逐位线性近似之间关系的新见解。
papers.title_zh: SNOW 2.0和SNOW 3G的大单位和逐位线性近似以及相关攻击的比较

papers.title: Weak Keys in Reduced AEGIS and Tiaoxin
papers.authors: Fukang Liu, Takanori Isobe, Willi Meier, Kosei Sakamoto
papers.abstract: AEGIS-128 and Tiaoxin-346 (Tiaoxin for short) are two AES-based primitives submitted to the CAESAR competition. Among them, AEGIS-128 has been selected in the final portfolio for high-performance applications, while Tiaoxin is a third-round candidate. Although both primitives adopt a stream cipher based design, they are quite different from the well-known bit-oriented stream ciphers like Trivium and the Grain family. Their common feature consists in the round update function, where the state is divided into several 128-bit words and each word has the option to pass through an AES round or not. During the 6-year CAESAR competition, it is surprising that for both primitives there is no third-party cryptanalysis of the initialization phase. Due to the similarities in both primitives, we are motivated to investigate whether there is a common way to evaluate the security of their initialization phases. Our technical contribution is to write the expressions of the internal states in terms of the nonce and the key by treating a 128-bit word as a unit and then carefully study how to simplify these expressions by adding proper conditions. As a result, we find that there are several groups of weak keys with 296 keys each in 5-round AEGIS-128 and 8-round Tiaoxin, which allows us to construct integral distinguishers with time complexity 232 and data complexity 232. Based on the distinguisher, the time complexity to recover the weak key is 272 for 5-round AEGIS-128. However, the weak key recovery attack on 8-round Tiaoxin will require the usage of a weak constant occurring with probability 2−32. All the attacks reach half of the total number of initialization rounds. We expect that this work can advance the understanding of the designs similar to AEGIS and Tiaoxin.
papers.abstract_zh: AEGIS-128和Tiaoxin-346(简称Tiaoxin)是提交给CAESAR竞赛的两个基于AES的原语。其中，AEGIS-128已被选入高性能应用的最终组合，而Tiaoxin是第三轮候选。虽然这两个原语都采用了基于流密码的设计，但它们与众所周知的面向位的流密码(如Trivium和Grain系列)有很大不同。它们的共同特征在于循环更新功能，其中状态被分成几个128位字，每个字都可以选择是否通过AES循环。在6年的CAESAR竞赛期间，令人惊讶的是，对于这两种原语，初始化阶段都没有第三方密码分析。由于这两种原语的相似性，我们有动力研究是否有一种通用的方法来评估它们初始化阶段的安全性。我们的技术贡献是通过将128位的字视为一个单元，根据随机数和密钥来编写内部状态的表达式，然后仔细研究如何通过添加适当的条件来简化这些表达式。结果，我们发现在5轮AEGIS-128和8轮Tiaoxin中存在多组296个密钥的弱密钥，这使得我们可以构造时间复杂度为232、数据复杂度为232的整数鉴别器。基于该鉴别器，对于5轮AEGIS-128，恢复弱密钥的时间复杂度为272。然而，对8轮调整信的弱密钥恢复攻击将需要使用以概率232出现的弱常数。所有攻击达到初始化回合总数的一半。我们期望这项工作可以促进对类似于宙斯盾和调芯的设计的理解。
papers.title_zh: 简化的保护和调节中的弱键

papers.title: Improved Rectangle Attacks on SKINNY and CRAFT
papers.authors: Hosein Hadipour, Nasour Bagheri, Ling Song
papers.abstract: The boomerang and rectangle attacks are adaptions of differential cryptanalysis that regard the target cipher E as a composition of two sub-ciphers, i.e., E = E1 ∘ E0, to construct a distinguisher for E with probability p2q2 by concatenating two short differential trails for E0 and E1 with probability p and q respectively. According to the previous research, the dependency between these two differential characteristics has a great impact on the probability of boomerang and rectangle distinguishers. Dunkelman et al. proposed the sandwich attack to formalise such dependency that regards E as three parts, i.e., E = E1 ∘ Em ∘ E0, where Em contains the dependency between two differential trails, satisfying some differential propagation with probability r. Accordingly, the entire probability is p2q2r. Recently, Song et al. have proposed a general framework to identify the actual boundaries of Em and systematically evaluate the probability of Em with any number of rounds, and applied their method to accurately evaluate the probabilities of the best SKINNY’s boomerang distinguishers. In this paper, using a more advanced method to search for boomerang distinguishers, we show that the best previous boomerang distinguishers for SKINNY can be significantly improved in terms of probability and number of rounds. More precisely, we propose related-tweakey boomerang distinguishers for up to 19, 21, 23, and 25 rounds of SKINNY-64-128, SKINNY-128-256, SKINNY-64-192 and SKINNY-128-384 respectively, which improve the previous boomerang distinguishers of these variants of SKINNY by 1, 2, 1, and 1 round respectively. Based on the improved boomerang distinguishers for SKINNY, we provide related-tweakey rectangle attacks on 23 rounds of SKINNY-64-128, 24 rounds of SKINNY-128-256, 29 rounds of SKINNY-64-192, and 30 rounds of SKINNY-128-384. It is worth noting that our improved related-tweakey rectangle attacks on SKINNY-64-192, SKINNY-128-256 and SKINNY-128-384 can be directly applied for the same number of rounds of ForkSkinny-64-192, ForkSkinny-128-256 and ForkSkinny-128-384 respectively. CRAFT is another SKINNY-like tweakable block cipher for which we provide the security analysis against rectangle attack for the first time. As a result, we provide a 14-round boomerang distinguisher for CRAFT in the single-tweak model based on which we propose a single-tweak rectangle attack on 18 rounds of this cipher. Moreover, following the previous research regarding the evaluation of switching in multiple rounds of boomerang distinguishers, we also introduce new tools called Double Boomerang Connectivity Table (DBCT), LBCT⫤, and UBCT⊨ to evaluate the boomerang switch through the multiple rounds more accurately.
papers.abstract_zh: 回飞镖攻击和矩形攻击是差分密码分析的改进，差分密码分析将目标密码e视为两个子密码的组合，即E = E1 ∘ E0，以通过分别以概率p和q连接E0和E1的两个短差分轨迹来构造概率为p2q2的e的区分符。根据先前的研究，这两个差分特征之间的依赖性对回飞镖和矩形区分器的概率有很大的影响。Dunkelman等人提出了三明治攻击来形式化这种依赖，将e看作三个部分，即E = E1 ∘ Em ∘ E0，其中Em包含两个差分尾迹之间的依赖，以概率r满足某种差分传播，相应地，整个概率为p2q2r。最近，Song等人提出了一个通用框架来识别Em的实际边界并系统地评估任意回合数的Em的概率，并应用他们的方法来精确地评估最佳SKINNY的回旋镖区分器的概率。在本文中，我们使用了一种更先进的方法来搜索回飞镖识别器，我们表明，针对SKINNY的最佳前回飞镖识别器可以在概率和回合数方面得到显著改善。更准确地说，我们分别为SKINNY-64-128、SKINNY-128-256、SKINNY-64-192和SKINNY-128-384提出了高达19、21、23和25轮的相关微调回旋镖识别器，它们分别将这些SKINNY变体的先前回旋镖识别器提高了1、2、1和1轮。基于改进的用于SKINNY的回飞镖区分器，我们提供了对23轮SKINNY-64-128、24轮SKINNY-128-256、29轮SKINNY-64-192和30轮SKINNY-128-384的相关调整矩形攻击。值得注意的是，我们对SKINNY-64-192、SKINNY-128-256和SKINNY-128-384改进的related-tweakey矩形攻击可以分别直接应用于ForkSkinny-64-192、ForkSkinny-128-256和ForkSkinny-128-384的相同回合数。CRAFT是另一个类似SKINNY的可调分组密码，我们首次对其进行了抗矩形攻击的安全性分析。因此，我们在单调整模型中为CRAFT提供了一个14轮的回飞镖区分器，在此基础上，我们提出了对该密码的18轮单调整矩形攻击。此外，根据之前关于多轮回飞镖识别器切换评估的研究，我们还引入了新的工具，称为双回飞镖连接表(DBCT)、LBCT⫤和UBCT⊨，以更准确地评估多轮回飞镖切换。
papers.title_zh: 改进了对瘦子和工匠的矩形攻击

papers.title: Linear Cryptanalyses of Three AEADs with GIFT-128 as Underlying Primitives
papers.authors: Ling Sun, Wei Wang, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: This paper considers the linear cryptanalyses of Authenticated Encryptions with Associated Data (AEADs) GIFT-COFB, SUNDAE-GIFT, and HyENA. All of these proposals take GIFT-128 as underlying primitives. The automatic search with the Boolean satisfiability problem (SAT) method is implemented to search for linear approximations that match the attack settings concerning these primitives. With the newly identified approximations, we launch key-recovery attacks on GIFT-COFB, SUNDAE-GIFT, and HyENA when the underlying primitives are replaced with 16-round, 17-round, and 16-round versions of GIFT-128. The resistance of GIFT-128 against linear cryptanalysis is also evaluated. We present a 24-round key-recovery attack on GIFT-128 with a newly obtained 19-round linear approximation. We note that the attack results in this paper are far from threatening the security of GIFT-COFB, SUNDAE-GIFT, HyENA, and GIFT-128.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文考虑了对GIFT-COFB、SUNDAE-GIFT和HyENA的认证加密的线性密码分析。所有这些建议都将GIFT-128作为基础原语。使用布尔可满足性问题(SAT)方法的自动搜索被实现来搜索与关于这些原语的攻击设置相匹配的线性近似。利用新确定的近似，当基础原语被16轮、17轮和16轮版本的GIFT-128替换时，我们对GIFT-COFB、SUNDAE-GIFT和HyENA发起密钥恢复攻击。还评估了GIFT-128对线性密码分析的抵抗性。我们提出了一个对GIFT-128的24轮密钥恢复攻击，并得到了一个新的19轮线性近似。我们注意到，本文中的攻击结果远没有威胁到GIFT-COFB、SUNDAE-GIFT、HyENA和GIFT-128的安全。
papers.title_zh: 以GIFT-128为基础的三种AEADs的线性密码分析

papers.title: (Quantum) Collision Attacks on Reduced Simpira v2
papers.authors: Boyu Ni, Xiaoyang Dong, Keting Jia, Qidi You
papers.abstract: Simpira v2 is an AES-based permutation proposed by Gueron and Mouha at ASIACRYPT 2016. In this paper, we build an improved MILP model to count the differential and linear active Sboxes for Simpira v2, which achieves tighter bounds of the minimum number of active Sboxes for a few versions of Simpira v2. Then, based on the new model, we find some new truncated differentials for Simpira v2 and give a series (quantum) collision attacks on two versions of reduced Simpira v2.
papers.abstract_zh: Simpira v2是由Gueron和Mouha在ASIACRYPT 2016上提出的基于AES的置换。在本文中，我们建立了一个改进的MILP模型来计算Simpira v2的差分和线性活动子盒，该模型为Simpira v2的几个版本实现了最小活动子盒数的更严格界限。然后，基于新的模型，我们为Simpira v2找到了一些新的截断差分，并给出了对两个版本的简化Simpira v2的系列(量子)碰撞攻击。
papers.title_zh: 简化Simpira v2上的(量子)碰撞攻击

papers.title: Automated Search Oriented to Key Recovery on Ciphers with Linear Key Schedule Applications to Boomerangs in SKINNY and ForkSkinny
papers.authors: Lingyue Qin, Xiaoyang Dong, Xiaoyun Wang, Keting Jia, Yunwen Liu
papers.abstract: Automatic modelling to search distinguishers with high probability covering as many rounds as possible, such as MILP, SAT/SMT, CP models, has become a very popular cryptanalysis topic today. In those models, the optimizing objective is usually the probability or the number of rounds of the distinguishers.
