If we want to recover the secret key for a round-reduced block cipher, there are usually two phases, i.e., finding an efficient distinguisher and performing key-recovery attack by extending several rounds before and after the distinguisher. The total number of attacked rounds is not only related to the chosen distinguisher, but also to the extended rounds before and after the distinguisher. In this paper, we try to combine the two phases in a uniform automatic model. Concretely, we apply this idea to automate the related-key rectangle attacks on SKINNY and ForkSkinny. We propose some new distinguishers with advantage to perform key-recovery attacks. Our key-recovery attacks on a few versions of roundreduced SKINNY and ForkSkinny cover 1 to 2 more rounds than the best previous attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 自动建模以搜索尽可能多轮的高概率区分符，如MILP、SAT/SMT、CP模型，已成为当今非常热门的密码分析课题。在这些模型中，优化目标通常是区分器的概率或回合数。如果要恢复一个轮约分组密码的密钥，通常需要两个阶段，即寻找一个有效的区分符和通过在区分符前后扩展几轮来进行密钥恢复攻击。被攻击的回合总数不仅与选择的区分符有关，还与区分符前后的扩展回合数有关。在本文中，我们试图将这两个阶段结合在一个统一的自动模型中。具体地说，我们应用这一思想来自动化SKINNY和ForkSkinny上的相关键矩形攻击。我们提出了一些新的区分器来执行密钥恢复攻击。我们的密钥恢复攻击在几个版本的回合中减少了SKINNY和ForkSkinny，比以前最好的攻击多覆盖1到2个回合。
papers.title_zh: 面向线性密钥表密码密钥恢复的自动搜索在SKINNY和ForkSkinny中的飞镖应用

papers.title: Maximums of the Additive Differential Probability of Exclusive-Or
papers.authors: Nicky Mouha, Nikolay Kolomeec, Danil Akhtiamov, Ivan Sutormin, Matvey Panferov, Kseniya Titova, Tatiana Bonich, Evgeniya Ishchukova, Natalia N. Tokareva, Bulat Zhantulikov
papers.abstract: At FSE 2004, Lipmaa et al. studied the additive differential probability adp⊕(α, β → γ) of exclusive-or where differences α, β, γ ∈ F2 are expressed using addition modulo 2. This probability is used in the analysis of symmetrickey primitives that combine XOR and modular addition, such as the increasingly popular Addition-Rotation-XOR (ARX) constructions. The focus of this paper is on maximal differentials, which are helpful when constructing differential trails. We provide the missing proof for Theorem 3 of the FSE 2004 paper, which states that maxα,β adp⊕(α, β → γ) = adp⊕(0, γ → γ) for all γ. Furthermore, we prove that there always exist either two or eight distinct pairs α, β such that adp⊕(α, β → γ) = adp⊕(0, γ → γ), and we obtain recurrence formulas for calculating adp⊕. To gain insight into the range of possible differential probabilities, we also study other properties such as the minimum value of adp⊕(0, γ → γ), and we find all γ that satisfy this minimum value.
papers.abstract_zh: 在FSE 2004上，Lipmaa等人研究了异或的加性差分概率adp⊕(α，β → γ，其中差α，β，γ ∈ F2用模2加法表示。这种概率用于分析组合了异或和模加的对称基元，例如越来越流行的加法-旋转-异或(ARX)构造。本文的重点是最大差异，这在构造差异轨迹时是有帮助的。我们对FSE 2004年论文中的定理3提供了缺失证明，该定理指出，对于所有γ，maxα，β adp⊕(α，β → γ) = adp⊕(0，γ → γ。此外，我们证明了总是存在两个或八个不同的对α，β使得adp⊕(α，β → γ) = adp⊕(0，γ → γ)，并得到了计算adp⊕.的递推公式为了深入了解可能的微分概率的范围，我们还研究了adp⊕(0的最小值(γ → γ)等其他性质，我们找到了满足这个最小值的所有γ。
papers.title_zh: 异或加性微分概率的最大值

papers.title: Proving Resistance Against Infinitely Long Subspace Trails: How to Choose the Linear Layer
papers.authors: Lorenzo Grassi, Christian Rechberger, Markus Schofnegger
papers.abstract: Designing cryptographic permutations and block ciphers using a substitutionpermutation network (SPN) approach where the nonlinear part does not cover the entire state has recently gained attention due to favorable implementation characteristics in various scenarios.For word-oriented partial SPN (P-SPN) schemes with a fixed linear layer, our goal is to better understand how the details of the linear layer affect the security of the construction. In this paper, we derive conditions that allow us to either set up or prevent attacks based on infinitely long truncated differentials with probability 1. Our analysis is rather broad compared to earlier independent work on this problem since we consider (1) both invariant and non-invariant/iterative trails, and (2) trails with and without active S-boxes.For these cases, we provide rigorous sufficient and necessary conditions for the matrix that defines the linear layer to prevent the analyzed attacks. On the practical side, we present a tool that can determine whether a given linear layer is vulnerable based on these results. Furthermore, we propose a sufficient condition for the linear layer that, if satisfied, ensures that no infinitely long truncated differential exists. This condition is related to the degree and the irreducibility of the minimal polynomial of the matrix that defines the linear layer. Besides P-SPN schemes, our observations may also have a crucial impact on the Hades design strategy, which mixes rounds with full S-box layers and rounds with partial S-box layers.
papers.abstract_zh: 使用替代置换网络(SPN)方法设计密码置换和分组密码，其中非线性部分不覆盖整个状态，由于在各种场景中有利的实现特性，最近已经获得了关注。对于具有固定线性层的面向字的部分SPN (P-SPN)方案，我们的目标是更好地理解线性层的细节如何影响构造的安全性。在本文中，我们推导了允许我们建立或防止基于概率为1的无限长截断差分的攻击的条件。我们的分析与之前关于这个问题的独立工作相比相当宽泛，因为我们考虑了(1)不变和非不变/迭代轨迹，以及(2)有和没有活动S盒的轨迹。对于这些情况，我们为定义线性层的矩阵提供了严格的充分必要条件，以防止被分析的攻击。在实践方面，我们提出了一种工具，可以根据这些结果确定给定的线性层是否易受攻击。此外，我们提出了一个充分条件，线性层，如果满足，确保没有无限长截断微分存在。这个条件与定义线性层的矩阵的最小多项式的次数和不可约性有关。除了P-SPN方案之外，我们的观察结果也可能对Hades设计策略有着至关重要的影响，该策略将轮与完全S盒层以及轮与部分S盒层混合。
papers.title_zh: 证明抵抗无限长子空间踪迹:如何选择线性层

papers.title: Provable Security of SP Networks with Partial Non-Linear Layers
papers.authors: Chun Guo, François-Xavier Standaert, Weijia Wang, Xiao Wang, Yu Yu
papers.abstract: Motivated by the recent trend towards low multiplicative complexity blockciphers (e.g., Zorro, CHES 2013; LowMC, EUROCRYPT 2015; HADES, EUROCRYPT 2020; MALICIOUS, CRYPTO 2020), we study their underlying structure partial SPNs, i.e., Substitution-Permutation Networks (SPNs) with parts of the substitution layer replaced by an identity mapping, and put forward the first provable security analysis for such partial SPNs built upon dedicated linear layers. For different instances of partial SPNs using MDS linear layers, we establish strong pseudorandom security as well as practical provable security against impossible differential attacks. By extending the well-established MDS code-based idea, we also propose the first principled design of linear layers that ensures optimal differential propagation. Our results formally confirm the conjecture that partial SPNs achieve the same security as normal SPNs while consuming less non-linearity, in a well-established framework.
papers.abstract_zh: 受近期低乘法复杂度分组密码趋势的推动(例如，Zorro，CHES 2013LowMC，EUROCRYPT 2015哈迪斯，欧洲地穴2020；恶意的，CRYPTO 2020)，我们研究了它们的底层结构部分SPN，即替换置换网络(SPN ),其中替换层的一部分被一个身份映射所替换，并首次提出了这种建立在专用线性层上的部分SPN的可证安全性分析。对于使用MDS线性层的部分SPNs的不同实例，我们建立了强伪随机安全性以及抵抗不可能差分攻击的实际可证明安全性。通过扩展成熟的基于MDS码的思想，我们还提出了确保最佳差分传播的线性层的第一个原则性设计。我们的结果正式证实了一个猜想，即在一个良好建立的框架中，部分SPN实现了与正常SPN相同的安全性，同时消耗了更少的非线性。
papers.title_zh: 具有部分非线性层的SP网络的可证明安全性

papers.title: Algorithm Substitution Attacks: State Reset Detection and Asymmetric Modifications
papers.authors: Philip W. Hodges, Douglas Stebila
papers.abstract: In this paper, we study algorithm substitution attacks (ASAs), where an algorithm in a cryptographic scheme is substituted for a subverted version. First, we formalize and study the use of state resets to detect ASAs, and show that many published stateful ASAs are detectable with simple practical methods relying on state resets. Second, we introduce two asymmetric ASAs on symmetric encryption, which are undetectable or unexploitable even by an adversary who knows the embedded subversion key. We also generalize this result, allowing for any symmetric ASA (on any cryptographic scheme) satisfying certain properties to be transformed into an asymmetric ASA. Our work demonstrates the broad application of the techniques first introduced by Bellare, Paterson, and Rogaway (Crypto 2014) and Bellare, Jaeger, and Kane (CCS 2015) and reinforces the need for precise definitions surrounding detectability of stateful ASAs.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们研究算法替换攻击(ASAs ),其中一个密码方案中的算法被替换为一个被颠覆的版本。首先，我们形式化并研究了使用状态重置来检测asa，并表明许多已发表的有状态asa可以通过依赖于状态重置的简单实用的方法来检测。其次，我们在对称加密上引入了两个非对称asa，即使知道嵌入的subversion密钥的对手也无法检测或利用它们。我们还推广了这一结果，允许任何对称ASA(在任何密码方案上)满足一定的性质被转换成非对称ASA。我们的工作展示了Bellare、Paterson和Rogaway (Crypto，2014年)以及Bellare、Jaeger和Kane (CCS，2015年)首先介绍的技术的广泛应用，并强调了围绕有状态反卫星武器可探测性的精确定义的必要性。
papers.title_zh: 算法替换攻击:状态重置检测和不对称修改

papers.title: On Length Independent Security Bounds for the PMAC Family
papers.authors: Bishwajit Chakraborty, Soumya Chattopadhyay, Ashwin Jha, Mridul Nandi
papers.abstract: At FSE 2017, Gaži et al. demonstrated a pseudorandom function (PRF) distinguisher (Gaži et al., ToSC 2016(2)) on PMAC with Ω(`q2/2n) advantage, where q, `, and n, denote the number of queries, maximum permissible query length (in terms of n-bit blocks), and block size of the underlying block cipher. This, in combination with the upper bounds of O(`q2/2n) (Minematsu and Matsushima, FSE 2007) and O(qσ/2) (Nandi and Mandal, J. Mathematical Cryptology 2008(2)), resolved the long-standing problem of exact security of PMAC. Gaži et al. also showed that the dependency on ` can be dropped (i.e. O(q2/2n) bound up to ` ≤ 2n/2) for a simplified version of PMAC, called sPMAC, by replacing the Gray code-based masking in PMAC with any 4-wise independent universal hash-based masking. Recently, Naito proposed another variant of PMAC with two powering-up maskings (Naito, ToSC 2019(2)) that achieves `-free bound of O(q2/2n), provided ` ≤ 2n/2. In this work, we first identify a flaw in the analysis of Naito’s PMAC variant that invalidates the security proof. Apparently, the flaw is not easy to fix under the existing proof setup. We then formulate an equivalent problem which must be solved in order to achieve `-free security bounds for this variant. Second, we show that sPMAC achieves O(q2/2n) bound for a weaker notion of universality as compared to the earlier condition of 4-wise independence.
papers.abstract_zh: 在FSE 2017上，Gai等人在PMAC上展示了一种伪随机函数(PRF)区分器(Gai等人，ToSC 2016(2))，具有ω(` Q2/2n)优势，其中q、`和n表示查询的数量、最大允许查询长度(以n位块为单位)和底层分组密码的块大小。这与O(`q2/2n) (Minematsu和Matsushima，FSE，2007年)和O(qσ/2) (Nandi和Mandal，j . Mathematical cryptography 2008(2))的上限相结合，解决了PMAC的精确安全性的长期问题。Gai等人还表明，对于被称为sPMAC的PMAC的简化版本，通过用任何4向独立的通用基于散列的掩码来替换PMAC中的基于格雷码的掩码，可以丢弃对的依赖性(即，O(q2/2n)上限为`≤ 2n/2)。最近，内藤提出了另一种具有两个上电掩码的PMAC变体(内藤，ToSC 2019(2))，其实现O(q2/2n)的“自由边界”，前提是“≤ 2n/2”。在这项工作中，我们首先确定了一个缺陷，在分析内藤的PMAC变种无效的安全证明。显然，在现有的证明设置下，该缺陷不容易修复。然后，我们提出了一个等价的问题，必须解决这个问题，以实现这个变体的“自由”安全边界。第二，我们证明了与早期的4-wise独立性条件相比，sPMAC对于较弱的普适性概念达到O(q2/2n)界。
papers.title_zh: PMAC族的长度独立安全界

papers.title: Power Yoga: Variable-Stretch Security of CCM for Energy-Efficient Lightweight IoT
papers.authors: Emiljano Gjiriti, Reza Reyhanitabar, Damian Vizár
papers.abstract: The currently ongoing NIST LWC project aims at identifying new standardization targets for lightweight authenticated encryption with associated data (AEAD) and (optionally) lightweight cryptographic hashing. NIST has deemed it important for performance and cost to be optimized on relevant platforms, especially for short messages. Reyhanitabar, Vaudenay and Vizár (Asiacrypt 2016) gave a formal treatment for security of nonce-based AEAD with variable stretch, i.e., when the length of the authentication tag is changed between encryptions without changing the key. They argued that AEAD supporting variable stretch is of practical interest for constrained applications, especially low-power devices operated by battery, due to the ability to flexibly trade communication overhead and level of integrity. In this work, we investigate this hypothesis with affirmative results. We present vCCM, a variable-stretch variant of the standard CCM and prove it is secure when used with variable stretch. We then experimentally measure the energy consumption of a real-world wireless sensor node when encrypting and sending messages with vCCM and CCM, respectively. Our projections show that the flexible trade of integrity level and ciphertext expansion can lead up to 21% overall energy consumption reduction in certain scenarios. As vCCM is obtained from the widely-used CCM by a black-box transformation, allowing any existing CCM implementations to be reused as-is, our results can be immediately put to use in practice. vCCM is all the more relevant because neither the NIST LWC project, nor any of the candidates give a consideration for the support of variable stretch and the related integrity-overhead trade-off.
papers.abstract_zh: 目前正在进行的NIST·LWC项目旨在为轻量级关联数据认证加密(AEAD)和(可选)轻量级加密散列确定新的标准化目标。NIST认为在相关平台上优化性能和成本非常重要，尤其是短信平台。Reyhanitabar、Vaudenay和Vizár (Asiacrypt 2016)对基于随机数的AEAD的安全性进行了正式处理，该AEAD具有可变长度，即，当认证标签的长度在两次加密之间发生变化而不改变密钥时。他们认为，支持可变伸展的AEAD对于受限的应用程序具有实际意义，特别是由电池供电的低功耗设备，因为它能够灵活地交换通信开销和完整性级别。在这项工作中，我们调查了这一假设肯定的结果。我们提出了vCCM，一种标准CCM的可变拉伸变体，并证明它在与可变拉伸一起使用时是安全的。然后，我们实验性地测量了一个真实世界的无线传感器节点分别用vCCM和CCM加密和发送消息时的能量消耗。我们的预测表明，在某些情况下，完整性级别和密文扩展的灵活交易可以导致高达21%的整体能耗降低。由于vCCM是通过黑盒转换从广泛使用的CCM中获得的，允许任何现有的CCM实现按原样重用，因此我们的结果可以立即投入实践。vCCM更相关，因为NIST·LWC项目和任何候选项目都没有考虑支持可变拉伸和相关的完整性开销权衡。
papers.title_zh: Power Yoga:节能轻量级物联网CCM的可变拉伸安全性

papers.title: 1, 2, 3, Fork: Counter Mode Variants based on a Generalized Forkcipher
papers.authors: Elena Andreeva, Amit Singh Bhati, Bart Preneel, Damian Vizár
papers.abstract: A multi-forkcipher (MFC) is a generalization of the forkcipher (FC) primitive introduced by Andreeva et al. at ASIACRYPT’19. An MFC is a tweakable cipher that computes s output blocks for a single input block, with s arbitrary but fixed. We define the MFC security in the ind-prtmfp notion as indistinguishability from s tweaked permutations. Generalizing tweakable block ciphers (TBCs, s = 1), as well as forkciphers (s = 2), MFC lends itself well to building simple-to-analyze modes of operation that support any number of cipher output blocks.Our main contribution is the generic CTR encryption mode GCTR that makes parallel calls to an MFC to encrypt a message M. We analyze the set of all 36 “simple and natural” GCTR variants under the nivE security notion by Peyrin and Seurin rom CRYPTO’16. Our proof method makes use of an intermediate abstraction called tweakable CTR (TCTR) that captures the core security properties of GCTR common to all variants, making their analyses easier. Our results show that many of the schemes achieve from well beyond birthday bound (BBB) to full n-bit security under nonce respecting adversaries and some even BBB and close to full n-bit security in the face of realistic nonce misuse conditions.We finally present an efficiency comparison of GCTR using ForkSkinny (an MFC with s = 2) with the traditional CTR and the more recent CTRT modes, both are instantiated with the SKINNY TBC. Our estimations show that any GCTR variant with ForkSkinny can achieve an efficiency advantage of over 20% for moderately long messages, illustrating that the use of an efficient MFC with s ≥ 2 brings a clear speed-up.
papers.abstract_zh: 多叉密码(MFC)是Andreeva等人在ASIACRYPT'19上介绍的forkcipher (FC)原语的推广。MFC是一个可调整的密码，它为单个输入块计算s个输出块，s是任意的但固定的。我们将ind-prtmfp概念中的MFC安全性定义为与调整的置换不可区分。概括了可调整的块密码(TBCs，s = 1)以及fork cipher(s = 2)，MFC非常适合于构建支持任意数量的密码输出块的易于分析的操作模式。我们的主要贡献是通用CTR加密模式GCTR，它对MFC进行并行调用以加密消息m。我们分析了Peyrin和Seurin rom CRYPTO'16的nivE安全概念下所有36个“简单而自然”的GCTR变体集。我们的证明方法利用了一种称为可调CTR (TCTR)的中间抽象，它捕获了所有变体共有的GCTR的核心安全属性，使它们的分析更容易。我们的结果表明，在随机数尊重对手的情况下，许多方案实现了从远远超出生日界限(BBB)到全n位的安全性，而在现实的随机数滥用情况下，一些方案甚至实现了BBB和接近全n位的安全性。最后，我们展示了使用ForkSkinny(一个s = 2的MFC)的GCTR与传统的CTR和最近的CTRT模式的效率比较，两者都是用SKINNY TBC实例化的。我们的估计表明，对于中等长度的消息，任何具有ForkSkinny的GCTR变体都可以实现超过20%的效率优势，这说明使用s ≥ 2的高效MFC带来了明显的加速。
papers.title_zh: 1，2，3，Fork:基于广义Forkcipher的计数器模式变体

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of the SoDark Cipher for HF Radio Automatic Link Establishment
papers.authors: Marcus Dansarie
papers.abstract: The SoDark cipher is used to protect transmitted frames in the second and third generation automatic link establishment (ALE) standards for high frequency (HF) radios. The cipher is primarily meant to prevent unauthorized linking and attacks on the availability of HF radio networks. This paper represents the first known security analysis of the cipher used by the second generation ALE protocol—the de facto world standard—and presents a related-tweak attack on the full eight round version of the algorithm. Under certain conditions, collisions of intermediate states several rounds into the cipher can be detected from the ciphertext with high probability. This enables testing against the intermediate states using only parts of the key. The best attack is a chosen-ciphertext attack which can recover the secret key in about an hour with 100% probability, using 29 chosen ciphertexts.
papers.abstract_zh: SoDark密码用于保护高频(HF)无线电的第二代和第三代自动链路建立(ALE)标准中的传输帧。这种密码主要是为了防止未经授权的链接和对高频无线电网络可用性的攻击。本文代表了对第二代ALE协议(事实上的世界标准)使用的密码的第一次已知安全分析，并介绍了对该算法的完整八轮版本的相关调整攻击。在某些条件下，可以以很高的概率从密文中检测到密码中几轮中间状态的冲突。这使得能够仅使用密钥的一部分来测试中间状态。最好的攻击是选择密文攻击，使用29个选择密文，可以在大约一个小时内以100%的概率恢复密钥。
papers.title_zh: 短波无线电自动链路建立的SoDark密码分析

papers.title: Improved guess-and-determine and distinguishing attacks on SNOW-V
papers.authors: Jing Yang, Thomas Johansson, Alexander Maximov
papers.abstract: In this paper, we investigate the security of SNOW-V, demonstrating two guess-and-determine (GnD) attacks against the full version with complexities 2384 and 2378, respectively, and one distinguishing attack against a reduced variant with complexity 2303. Our GnD attacks use enumeration with recursion to explore valid guessing paths, and try to truncate as many invalid guessing paths as possible at early stages of the recursion by carefully designing the order of guessing. In our first GnD attack, we guess three 128-bit state variables, determine the remaining four according to four consecutive keystream words. We finally use the next three keystream words to verify the correct guess. The second GnD attack is similar but exploits one more keystream word as side information helping to truncate more guessing paths. Our distinguishing attack targets a reduced variant where 32-bit adders are replaced with exclusive-OR operations. The samples can be collected from short keystream sequences under different (key, IV) pairs. These attacks do not threaten SNOW-V, but provide more in-depth details for understanding its security and give new ideas for cryptanalysis of other ciphers.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们研究了SNOW-V的安全性，演示了对完整版本的两个猜测和确定(GnD)攻击，复杂度分别为2384和2378，以及对简化版本的一个区分攻击，复杂度为2303。我们的GnD攻击使用递归枚举来探索有效的猜测路径，并通过仔细设计猜测的顺序，试图在递归的早期阶段截断尽可能多的无效猜测路径。在我们的第一次GnD攻击中，我们猜测了三个128位状态变量，根据四个连续的密钥流字确定了剩余的四个。我们最后使用接下来的三个密钥流字来验证正确的猜测。第二种GnD攻击与此类似，但是利用了多一个密钥流字作为辅助信息来帮助截断更多的猜测路径。我们独特的攻击目标是一个简化的变体，其中32位加法器被异或运算取代。可以从不同(key，IV)对下的短密钥流序列中收集样本。这些攻击并不威胁SNOW-V，但为理解其安全性提供了更深入的细节，并为其他密码的密码分析提供了新的思路。
papers.title_zh: 改进了对SNOW-V的猜测-确定和区分攻击

papers.title: Improved Preimage Attacks on 3-Round Keccak-224/256
papers.authors: Xiaoen Lin, Le He, Hongbo Yu
papers.abstract: In this paper, we provide an improved method on preimage attacks of standard 3-round Keccak-224/256. Our method is based on the work by Li and Sun. Their strategy is to find a 2-block preimage instead of a 1-block one by constructing the first and second message blocks in two stages. Under this strategy, they design a new linear structure for 2-round Keccak-224/256 with 194 degrees of freedom left, which is able to construct the second message block with a complexity of 231/262. However, the bottleneck of this strategy is that the first stage needs much more expense than the second one. Therefore, we improve the first stage by using two techniques. The first technique is constructing multi-block messages rather than one-block message in the first stage, which can reach a better inner state. The second technique is setting restricting equations more efficiently, which can work in 3-round Keccak-256. As a result, the complexity of finding a preimage for 3-round Keccak-224/256 can be decreased from 238/281 to 232/265.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇文章中，我们提供了一种改进的方法对原像攻击的标准3轮Keccak-224/256。我们的方法是以李和孙的工作为基础的。他们的策略是通过分两个阶段构建第一个和第二个消息块，找到一个2块原像，而不是1块原像。在这种策略下，他们为2轮Keccak-224/256设计了一种新的线性结构，剩下194个自由度，能够构造复杂度为231/262的第二个消息块。然而，这种策略的瓶颈是第一阶段比第二阶段需要更多的开销。因此，我们通过使用两种技术来改进第一阶段。第一种技术是在第一阶段构造多块消息而不是一个块消息，这样可以达到更好的内部状态。第二种技术是更有效地设置约束方程，这可以在3轮Keccak-256中工作。结果，找到3轮Keccak-224/256的原像的复杂度可以从238/281降低到232/265。
papers.title_zh: 改进了3回合Keccak-224/256的原像攻击

papers.title: Exploring Differential-Based Distinguishers and Forgeries for ASCON
papers.authors: David Gérault, Thomas Peyrin, Quan Quan Tan
papers.abstract: Automated methods have become crucial components when searching for distinguishers against symmetric-key cryptographic primitives. While MILP and SAT solvers are among the most popular tools to model ciphers and perform cryptanalysis, other methods with different performance profiles are appearing. In this article, we explore the use of Constraint Programming (CP) for differential cryptanalysis on the Ascon authenticated encryption family (first choice of the CAESAR lightweight applications portfolio and current finalist of the NIST LWC competition) and its internal permutation. We first present a search methodology for finding differential characteristics for Ascon with CP, which can easily find the best differential characteristics already reported by the Ascon designers. This shows the capability of CP in generating easily good differential results compared to dedicated search heuristics. Based on our tool, we also parametrize the search strategies in CP to generate other differential characteristics with the goal of forming limited-birthday distinguishers for 4, 5, 6 and 7 rounds and rectangle attacks for 4 and 5 rounds of the Ascon internal permutation. We propose a categorization of the distinguishers into black-box and non-black-box to better differentiate them as they are often useful in different contexts. We also obtained limited-birthday distinguishers which represent currently the best known distinguishers for 4, 5 and 6 rounds under the category of non-black-box distinguishers. Leveraging again our tool, we have generated forgery attacks against both reduced-rounds Ascon-128 and Ascon-128a, improving over the best reported results at the time of writing. Finally, using the best differential characteristic we have found for 2 rounds, we could also improve a recent attack on round-reduced Ascon-Hash.
papers.abstract_zh: 当针对对称密钥加密原语搜索区分符时，自动化方法已经成为至关重要的组件。虽然MILP解算器和SAT解算器是模拟密码和执行密码分析的最流行的工具，但是具有不同性能特征的其他方法正在出现。在本文中，我们探索了使用约束编程(CP)对Ascon认证加密家族(CAESAR轻量级应用产品组合的首选，目前是NIST LWC竞赛的决赛选手)及其内部置换进行差分密码分析。我们首先提出了一种搜索方法，用于寻找具有CP的Ascon的不同特性，这种方法可以很容易地找到Ascon设计者已经报告的最佳不同特性。这表明，与专用搜索试探法相比，CP能够轻松生成良好的差分结果。基于我们的工具，我们还对CP中的搜索策略进行参数化，以生成其他差分特征，目标是形成针对4、5、6和7轮的有限生日区分符以及针对Ascon内部置换的4和5轮的矩形攻击。我们建议将区分器分为黑盒和非黑盒，以便更好地区分它们，因为它们通常在不同的上下文中有用。我们还获得了有限的生日区分器，它们代表了目前在非黑盒区分器类别下最著名的4轮、5轮和6轮区分器。再次利用我们的工具，我们已经生成了针对缩减轮数的Ascon-128和Ascon-128a的伪造攻击，比撰写本文时报告的最佳结果有所改进。最后，使用我们为2轮找到的最佳差分特征，我们还可以改进最近对轮简化的Ascon-Hash的攻击。
papers.title_zh: 探索ASCON的基于差分的鉴别器和伪造

papers.title: Boomeyong: Embedding Yoyo within Boomerang and its Applications to Key Recovery Attacks on AES and Pholkos
papers.authors: Mostafizar Rahman, Dhiman Saha, Goutam Paul
papers.abstract: This work investigates a generic way of combining two very effective and well-studied cryptanalytic tools, proposed almost 18 years apart, namely the boomerang attack introduced by Wagner in FSE 1999 and the yoyo attack by Ronjom et al. in Asiacrypt 2017. In doing so, the s-box switch and ladder switch techniques are leveraged to embed a yoyo trail inside a boomerang trail. As an immediate application, a 6-round key recovery attack on AES-128 is mounted with time complexity of 278. A 10-round key recovery attack on recently introduced AES-based tweakable block cipher Pholkos is also furnished to demonstrate the applicability of the new technique on AES-like constructions. The results on AES are experimentally verified by applying and implementing them on a small scale variant of AES. We provide arguments that draw a relation between the proposed strategy with the retracing boomerang attack devised in Eurocrypt 2020. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first attempt to merge the yoyo and boomerang techniques to analyze SPN ciphers and warrants further attention as it has the potential of becoming an important cryptanalysis tool.
papers.abstract_zh: 这项工作研究了一种结合两种非常有效和经过充分研究的密码分析工具的通用方法，这两种工具相隔近18年提出，即Wagner 1999年在FSE推出的boomerang攻击和Ronjom等人在Asiacrypt 2017年推出的yoyo攻击。在这样做的时候，s盒开关和梯形开关技术被用来在回飞镖轨迹中嵌入一个yoyo轨迹。作为直接应用，对AES-128的6轮密钥恢复攻击以278的时间复杂度安装。还提供了对最近推出的基于AES的可调分组密码Pholkos的10轮密钥恢复攻击，以证明新技术在类似AES的构造上的适用性。AES上的结果通过在AES的小规模变体上应用和实现它们而得到实验验证。我们提供的论据在提出的策略和Eurocrypt 2020中设计的折返式回旋镖攻击之间建立了联系。据我们所知，这是第一次尝试将yoyo和boomerang技术结合起来分析SPN密码，值得进一步关注，因为它有可能成为一种重要的密码分析工具。
papers.title_zh: Boomeyong:在Boomerang中嵌入Yoyo及其在AES和Pholkos密钥恢复攻击中的应用

papers.title: PLCrypto: A Symmetric Cryptographic Library for Programmable Logic Controllers
papers.authors: Zheng Yang, Zhiting Bao, Chenglu Jin, Zhe Liu, Jianying Zhou
papers.abstract: Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs) are control devices widely used in industrial automation. They can be found in critical infrastructures like power grids, water systems, nuclear plants, manufacturing systems, etc. This paper introduces PLCrypto, a software cryptographic library that implements lightweight symmetric cryptographic algorithms for PLCs using a standard PLC programming language called structured text (ST). To the best of our knowledge, PLCrypto is the first ST-based cryptographic library that is executable on commercial off-the-shelf PLCs. PLCrypto includes a wide range of commonly used algorithms, totaling ten algorithms, including one-way functions, message authentication codes, hash functions, block ciphers, and pseudo-random functions/generators. PLCrypto can be used to protect the confidentiality and integrity of data on PLCs without additional hardware or firmware modification. This paper also presents general optimization methodologies and techniques used in PLCrypto for implementing primitive operations like bit-shifting/rotation, substitution, and permutation. The optimization tricks we distilled from our practice can also guide future implementation of other computationheavy programs on PLCs. To demonstrate a use case of PLCrypto in practice, we further realize a cryptographic protocol called proof of aliveness as a case study. We benchmarked the algorithms and protocols in PLCrypto on a commercial PLC, Allen Bradley ControlLogix 5571, which is widely used in the real world. Also, we make our source codes publicly available, so plant operators can freely deploy our library in practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 可编程逻辑控制器(PLC)是广泛应用于工业自动化的控制设备。它们可以在电网、供水系统、核电站、制造系统等关键基础设施中找到。本文介绍了PLCrypto，这是一个软件加密库，它使用一种称为结构化文本(ST)的标准PLC编程语言为PLC实现轻量级对称加密算法。据我们所知，PLCrypto是第一个基于st的加密库，可在商用现成PLC上执行。PLCrypto包含了广泛的常用算法，共计十种算法，包括单向函数、消息认证码、哈希函数、分组密码、伪随机函数/生成器等。PLCrypto可用于保护PLC上数据的机密性和完整性，无需额外的硬件或固件修改。本文还介绍了PLCrypto中用于实现移位/旋转、替换和置换等原语操作的一般优化方法和技术。我们从实践中总结出的优化技巧也可以指导未来在PLC上实现其他计算密集型程序。为了在实践中演示PLCrypto的一个用例，我们进一步实现了一个称为有效性证明的加密协议作为案例研究。我们在现实世界中广泛使用的商用PLC Allen Bradley control logix 5571上对PLCrypto中的算法和协议进行了基准测试。此外，我们公开我们的源代码，因此工厂运营商可以在实践中自由部署我们的库。
papers.title_zh: PLCrypto:用于可编程逻辑控制器的对称密码库

papers.title: CTET+: A Beyond-Birthday-Bound Secure Tweakable Enciphering Scheme Using a Single Pseudorandom Permutation
papers.authors: Benoît Cogliati, Jordan Ethan, Virginie Lallemand, ByeongHak Lee, Jooyoung Lee, Marine Minier
papers.abstract: In this work, we propose a construction of 2-round tweakable substitutionpermutation networks using a single secret S-box. This construction is based on non-linear permutation layers using independent round keys, and achieves security beyond the birthday bound in the random permutation model. When instantiated with an n-bit block cipher with ωn-bit keys, the resulting tweakable block cipher, dubbed CTET+, can be viewed as a tweakable enciphering scheme that encrypts ωκ-bit messages for any integer ω ≥ 2 using 5n + κ-bit keys and n-bit tweaks, providing 2n/3-bit security.Compared to the 2-round non-linear SPN analyzed in [CDK+18], we both minimize it by requiring a single permutation, and weaken the requirements on the middle linear layer, allowing better performance. As a result, CTET+ becomes the first tweakable enciphering scheme that provides beyond-birthday-bound security using a single permutation, while its efficiency is still comparable to existing schemes including AES-XTS, EME, XCB and TET. Furthermore, we propose a new tweakable enciphering scheme, dubbed AES6-CTET+, which is an actual instantiation of CTET+ using a reduced round AES block cipher as the underlying secret S-box. Extensivecryptanalysis of this algorithm allows us to claim 127 bits of security.Such tweakable enciphering schemes with huge block sizes become desirable in the context of disk encryption, since processing a whole sector as a single block significantly worsens the granularity for attackers when compared to, for example, AES-XTS, which treats every 16-byte block on the disk independently. Besides, as a huge amount of data is being stored and encrypted at rest under many different keys in clouds, beyond-birthday-bound security will most likely become necessary in the short term.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个使用单个秘密S盒的双轮可调替换置换网络的构造。这种构造基于使用独立轮密钥的非线性置换层，并且在随机置换模型中实现了超越生日界限的安全性。当使用具有ωn位密钥的n位分组密码实例化时，所产生的可调整分组密码(称为CTET+)可以被视为可调整加密方案，该方案使用5n + κ位密钥和n位调整对任意整数ω ≥ 2的ωτ位消息进行加密，提供2n/3位安全性。与[CDK+18]中分析的2轮非线性SPN相比，我们通过要求单个置换来最小化它，并且削弱了对中间线性层的要求，从而允许更好的性能。因此，CTET+成为第一个可调整的加密方案，使用单一排列提供超越生日限制的安全性，而其效率仍可与现有方案媲美，包括AES-XTS、eme、XCB和TET。此外，我们提出了一个新的可调加密方案，称为AES6-CTET+，它是CTET+的一个实际实例，使用一个简化的循环AES分组密码作为底层秘密S盒。对这个算法的广泛的加密分析允许我们宣称127位的安全性。这种具有巨大块大小的可调整的加密方案在磁盘加密的环境中变得合乎需要，因为与例如AES-XTS相比，将整个扇区作为单个块来处理显著恶化了攻击者的粒度，AES-独立地处理磁盘上的每个16字节的块。此外，由于大量数据被存储和加密在云端的许多不同密钥下，超越生日界限的安全性在短期内很可能变得必要。
papers.title_zh: CTET+:一种使用单一伪随机置换的超越生日限制的安全可调加密方案

papers.title: Perfect Trees: Designing Energy-Optimal Symmetric Encryption Primitives
papers.authors: Andrea Caforio, Subhadeep Banik, Yosuke Todo, Willi Meier, Takanori Isobe, Fukang Liu, Bin Zhang
papers.abstract: Energy efficiency is critical in battery-driven devices, and designing energyoptimal symmetric-key ciphers is one of the goals for the use of ciphers in such environments. In the paper by Banik et al. (IACR ToSC 2018), stream ciphers were identified as ideal candidates for low-energy solutions. One of the main conclusions of this paper was that Trivium, when implemented in an unrolled fashion, was by far the most energy-efficient way of encrypting larger quantity of data. In fact, it was shown that as soon as the number of databits to be encrypted exceeded 320 bits, Trivium consumed the least amount of energy on STM 90 nm ASIC circuits and outperformed the Midori family of block ciphers even in the least energy hungry ECB mode (Midori was designed specifically for energy efficiency).In this work, we devise the first heuristic energy model in the realm of stream ciphers that links the underlying algebraic topology of the state update function to the consumptive behaviour. The model is then used to derive a metric that exhibits a heavy negative correlation with the energy consumption of a broad range of stream cipher architectures, i.e., the families of Trivium-like, Grain-like and Subterranean-like constructions. We demonstrate that this correlation is especially pronounced for Trivium-like ciphers which leads us to establish a link between the energy consumption and the security guarantees that makes it possible to find several alternative energy-optimal versions of Trivium that meet the requirements but consume less energy. We present two such designs Trivium-LE(F) and Trivium-LE(S) that consume around 15% and 25% less energy respectively making them the to date most energy-efficient encryption primitives. They inherit the same security level as Trivium, i.e., 80-bit security. We further present Triad-LE as an energy-efficient variant satisfying a higher security level. The simplicity and wide applicability of our model has direct consequences for the conception of future hardware-targeted stream ciphers as for the first time it is possible to optimize for energy during the design phase. Moreover, we extend the reach of our model beyond plain encryption primitives and propose a novel energy-efficient message authentication code Trivium-LE-MAC.
papers.abstract_zh: 在电池驱动的设备中，能效至关重要，设计能效最优的对称密钥密码是在此类环境中使用密码的目标之一。在Banik等人的论文(IACR ToSC 2018)中，流密码被确定为低能耗解决方案的理想候选方案。本文的主要结论之一是，Trivium在以展开的方式实现时，是迄今为止最节能的加密大量数据的方式。事实上，事实表明，一旦要加密的数据位数超过320位，Trivium在STM 90 nm ASIC电路上消耗的能量最少，甚至在最不耗能的ECB模式下(美岛莉专门针对能效而设计)，其性能也超过了美岛莉系列的分组密码。在这项工作中，我们设计了流密码领域中的第一个启发式能量模型，该模型将状态更新函数的基本代数拓扑结构与消耗行为联系起来。然后，该模型被用于导出一种度量，该度量显示出与大范围的流密码体系结构(即类Trivium、类Grain和类substrate-like构造的族)的能量消耗的严重负相关。我们证明，这种相关性对于Trivium类密码尤其明显，这使我们能够在能量消耗和安全保证之间建立联系，从而有可能找到Trivium的几种替代能量最优版本，这些版本满足要求但消耗更少的能量。我们提出了两个这样的设计Trivium-LE(F)和Trivium-LE(S ),它们分别消耗大约15%和25%的能量，使它们成为迄今为止最节能的加密原语。它们继承了与Trivium相同的安全级别，即80位安全。我们进一步提出Triad-LE作为一种满足更高安全级别的节能变体。我们模型的简单性和广泛适用性对未来硬件目标流密码的概念有直接影响，因为第一次有可能在设计阶段优化能量。此外，我们将模型扩展到普通加密原语之外，并提出了一种新的节能消息认证码Trivium-LE-MAC。
papers.title_zh: 完美树:设计能量最优的对称加密原语

papers.title: Diving Deep into the Weak Keys of Round Reduced Ascon
papers.authors: Raghvendra Rohit, Santanu Sarkar
papers.abstract: At ToSC 2021, Rohit et al. presented the first distinguishing and key recovery attacks on 7 rounds Ascon without violating the designer’s security claims of nonce-respecting setting and data limit of 264 blocks per key. So far, these are the best attacks on 7 rounds Ascon. However, the distinguishers require (impractical) 260 data while the data complexity of key recovery attacks exactly equals 264. Whether there are any practical distinguishers and key recovery attacks (with data less than 264) on 7 rounds Ascon is still an open problem.In this work, we give positive answers to these questions by providing a comprehensive security analysis of Ascon in the weak key setting. Our first major result is the 7-round cube distinguishers with complexities 246 and 233 which work for 282 and 263 keys, respectively. Notably, we show that such weak keys exist for any choice (out of 64) of 46 and 33 specifically chosen nonce variables. In addition, we improve the data complexities of existing distinguishers for 5, 6 and 7 rounds by a factor of 28, 216 and 227, respectively. Our second contribution is a new theoretical framework for weak keys of Ascon which is solely based on the algebraic degree. Based on our construction, we identify 2127.99, 2127.97 and 2116.34 weak keys (out of 2128) for 5, 6 and 7 rounds, respectively. Next, we present two key recovery attacks on 7 rounds with different attack complexities. The best attack can recover the secret key with 263 data, 269 bits of memory and 2115.2 time. Our attacks are far from threatening the security of full 12 rounds Ascon, but we expect that they provide new insights into Ascon’s security.
papers.abstract_zh: 在ToSC 2021上，Rohit等人提出了对7轮Ascon的第一次区分和密钥恢复攻击，而没有违反设计者关于随机数尊重设置和每个密钥264个块的数据限制的安全声明。到目前为止，这是7轮Ascon中最好的攻击。然而，区分器需要(不切实际的)260个数据，而密钥恢复攻击的数据复杂度正好等于264。在7轮Ascon上是否有实用的区分器和密钥恢复攻击(数据小于264)还是一个公开的问题。在本文中，我们通过对Ascon在弱密钥环境下的安全性进行全面的分析，给出了这些问题的肯定答案。我们的第一个主要结果是复杂度为246和233的7轮立方体区分器，它们分别适用于282和263个密钥。值得注意的是，我们证明了这种弱密钥对于46个和33个特别选择的随机数变量中的任何一个(从64个中)都存在。此外，对于5、6和7轮，我们将现有区分器的数据复杂度分别提高了28、216和227倍。我们的第二个贡献是为Ascon的弱密钥建立了一个新的理论框架，它完全基于代数次数。基于我们的构造，我们分别为5、6和7轮识别出2127.99、2127.97和2116.34个弱密钥(在2128个弱密钥中)。接下来，我们提出两种不同攻击复杂度的7轮密钥恢复攻击。最好的攻击可以用263个数据、269位内存和2115.2次恢复密钥。我们的攻击远未威胁到Ascon全部12轮比赛的安全，但我们希望它们能为Ascon的安全提供新的见解。
papers.title_zh: 深入到弱键圆简化阿森松

papers.title: Automatic Search of Cubes for Attacking Stream Ciphers
papers.authors: Yao Sun
papers.abstract: Cube attack was proposed by Dinur and Shamir, and it has become an important tool for analyzing stream ciphers. As the problem that how to recover the superpolys accurately was resolved by Hao et al. in EUROCRYPT 2020, another important problem is how to find “good” superpolys, which is equivalent to finding “good” cubes. However, there are two difficulties in finding “good” cubes. Firstly, the number of candidate cubes is enormous and most of the cubes are not “good”. Secondly, it is costly to evaluate whether a cube is “good”.In this paper, we present a new algorithm to search for a kind of “good” cubes, called valuable cubes. A cube is called valuable, if its superpoly has (at least) a balanced secret variable. A valuable cube is “good”, because its superpoly brings in 1 bit of information about the key. More importantly, the superpolys of valuable cubes could be used in both theoretical and practical analyses. To search for valuable cubes, instead of testing a set of cubes one by one, the new algorithm deals with the set of cubes together, such that the common computations can be done only once for all candidate cubes and duplicated computations are avoided. Besides, the new algorithm uses a heuristic method to reject useless cubes efficiently. This heuristic method is based on the divide-and-conquer strategy as well as an observation.For verifications of this new algorithm, we applied it to Trivium and Kreyvium, and obtained three improvements. Firstly, we found two valuable cubes for 843-round Trivium, such that we proposed, as far as we know, the first theoretical key-recovery attack against 843-round Trivium, while the previous highest round of Trivium that can be attacked was 842, given by Hao et al. in EUROCRYPT 2020. Secondly, by finding many small valuable cubes, we presented practical attacks against 806- and 808-round Trivium for the first time, while the previous highest round of Trivium that can be attacked practically was 805. Thirdly, based on the cube used to attack 892-round Kreyvium in EUROCRYPT 2020, we found more valuable cubes and mounted the key-recovery attacks against Kreyvium to 893-round.
papers.abstract_zh: 立方体攻击是由Dinur和Shamir提出的，它已经成为分析流密码的重要工具。正如郝等人在EUROCRYPT 2020中解决了如何精确恢复超多子的问题一样，另一个重要的问题是如何找到“好的”超多子，这相当于找到“好的”立方体。然而，要找到“好的”立方体有两个困难。首先，候选立方体的数量是巨大的，并且大多数立方体不是“好的”。其次，评价一个立方体是否“好”是有成本的。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的算法来寻找一类“好的”立方体，称为有价值的立方体。一个立方体叫做有价值的，如果它的超级立方体(至少)有一个平衡的秘密变量。一个有价值的立方体是“好”的，因为它的超级立方体带来了关于密钥的1比特信息。更重要的是，超多的有价值的立方体可以用于理论和实践分析。为了搜索有价值的立方体，新算法不是逐个测试一组立方体，而是一起处理一组立方体，这样对于所有候选立方体只需进行一次普通计算，避免了重复计算。此外，新算法使用启发式方法有效地拒绝无用的立方体。这种启发式方法基于分治策略和观察。为了验证这个新算法，我们将它应用于Trivium和Kreyvium，得到了三个改进。首先，我们为843轮Trivium找到了两个有价值的立方体，因此，据我们所知，我们提出了第一个针对843轮Trivium的理论密钥恢复攻击，而之前可以攻击的最高轮Trivium是842，由Hao等人在EUROCRYPT 2020中给出。其次，通过发现许多有价值的小立方体，我们首次提出了针对806轮和808轮Trivium的实际攻击，而之前Trivium实际可攻击的最高轮数是805。第三，基于EUROCRYPT 2020中用于攻击892轮Kreyvium的立方体，我们发现了更多有价值的立方体，并将针对Kreyvium的密钥恢复攻击安装到893轮。
papers.title_zh: 攻击流密码的立方体自动搜索

papers.title: Statistical Model of Correlation Difference and Related-Key Linear Cryptanalysis
papers.authors: Kaisa Nyberg
papers.abstract: The goal of this work is to propose a related-key model for linear cryptanalysis. We start by giving the mean and variance of the difference of sampled correlations of two Boolean functions when using the same sample of inputs to compute both correlations. This result is further extended to determine the mean and variance of the difference of correlations of a pair of Boolean functions taken over a random data sample of fixed size and over a random pair of Boolean functions. We use the properties of the multinomial distribution to achieve these results without independence assumptions. Using multivariate normal approximation of the multinomial distribution we obtain that the distribution of the difference of related-key correlations is approximately normal. This result is then applied to existing related-key cryptanalyses. We obtain more accurate right-key and wrong-key distributions and remove artificial assumptions about independence of sampled correlations. We extend this study to using multiple linear approximations and propose a Χ2-type statistic, which is proven to be Χ2 distributed if the linear approximations are independent. We further examine this statistic for multidimensional linear approximation and discuss why removing the assumption about independence of linear approximations does not work in the related-key setting the same way as in the single-key setting.
papers.abstract_zh: 这项工作的目标是提出一个线性密码分析的相关密钥模型。当使用相同的输入样本来计算两个相关性时，我们首先给出两个布尔函数的采样相关性的差异的均值和方差。这一结果被进一步扩展以确定在固定大小的随机数据样本上和在一对随机布尔函数上获得的一对布尔函数的相关差的均值和方差。我们使用多项式分布的性质来实现这些结果，而不需要独立的假设。使用多项式分布的多元正态近似，我们得到相关键相关性的差的分布近似正态。然后将这一结果应用于现有的相关密钥密码分析。我们获得了更精确的正确密钥和错误密钥分布，并且去除了关于采样相关性的独立性的人工假设。我们将这项研究扩展到使用多个线性近似，并提出一个χ2型统计量，如果线性近似是独立的，则证明它是χ2分布的。我们进一步检查多维线性近似的统计量，并讨论为什么去除线性近似独立性的假设在相关键设置中与在单键设置中不一样。
papers.title_zh: 相关差统计模型和相关密钥线性密码分析

papers.title: Improved Security Bound of (E/D)WCDM
papers.authors: Nilanjan Datta, Avijit Dutta, Kushankur Dutta
papers.abstract: In CRYPTO’16, Cogliati and Seurin proposed a block cipher based nonce based MAC, called Encrypted Wegman-Carter with Davies-Meyer (EWCDM), that gives 2n/3 bit MAC security in the nonce respecting setting and n/2 bit security in the nonce misuse setting, where n is the block size of the underlying block cipher. However, this construction requires two independent block cipher keys. In CRYPTO’18, Datta et al. came up with a single-keyed block cipher based nonce based MAC, called Decrypted Wegman-Carter with Davies-Meyer (DWCDM), that also provides 2n/3 bit MAC security in the nonce respecting setting and n/2 bit security in the nonce misuse setting. However, the drawback of DWCDM is that it takes only 2n/3 bit nonce. In fact, authors have shown that DWCDM cannot achieve beyond the birthday bound security with n bit nonces. In this paper, we prove that DWCDM with 3n/4 bit nonces provides MAC security up to O(23n/4) MAC queries against all nonce respecting adversaries. We also improve the MAC bound of EWCDM from 2n/3 bit to 3n/4 bit. The backbone of these two results is a refined treatment of extended mirror theory that systematically estimates the number of solutions to a system of bivariate affine equations and non-equations, which we apply on the security proofs of the constructions to achieve 3n/4 bit security.
papers.abstract_zh: 在CRYPTO'16中，Cogliati和Seurin提出了一种基于随机数的分组密码MAC，称为加密的weg man-Carter with Davies-Meyer(EWCDM ),它在随机数尊重设置中提供2n/3位MAC安全性，在随机数误用设置中提供n/2位安全性，其中n是底层分组密码的块大小。然而，这种构造需要两个独立的分组密码密钥。在CRYPTO’18中，达塔等人提出了一种基于随机数的单密钥分组密码MAC，称为解密的weg man-Carter with Davies-Meyer(dw CDM)，它还在随机数尊重设置中提供2n/3位MAC安全性，在随机数误用设置中提供n/2位安全性。然而，DWCDM的缺点是它只需要2n/3比特的nonce。事实上，作者已经证明DWCDM不能实现超过生日界限的n比特随机数的安全性。在本文中，我们证明了具有3n/4比特随机数的DWCDM提供了高达O(23n/4) MAC查询的MAC安全性。我们还将EWCDM的MAC界限从2n/3比特提高到3n/4比特。这两个结果的基础是扩展镜像理论的改进处理，该扩展镜像理论系统地估计二元仿射方程和非方程系统的解的数量，我们将其应用于构造的安全性证明以实现3n/4位安全性。
papers.title_zh: 改进了WCDM的安全界限

2022.journals_title: IACR Transactions on Symmetric Cryptology, Volume 2022

papers.title: Preface to Volume 2022, Issue 1
papers.authors: Itai Dinur, Bart Mennink
papers.abstract: IACR Transactions on Symmetric Cryptology (ToSC) is a forum for original results in all areas of symmetric cryptography, including the design and analysis of block ciphers, stream ciphers, encryption schemes, hash functions, message authentication codes, (cryptographic) permutations, authenticated encryption schemes, cryptanalysis and evaluation tools, and security issues and solutions regarding their implementation. ToSC implements an open-access journal/conference hybrid model following some other communities in computer science. All articles undergo a journal-style reviewing process and accepted papers are published in gold open access (in our case the Creative Commons License CC-BY 4.0). The review procedures that we have followed strictly adhere to the traditions of the journal world. The ToSC review process strives to maintain a high quality of published articles. Full papers are assigned to at least three members of the Editorial Board; for submissions by Editorial Board members this was increased to at least four. These members write detailed and careful reviews (usually without relying on subreviewers). Moreover, we have had a rebuttal phase, allowing authors to respond to the review comments before the final decisions. If necessary, the review process enables further interactions between the authors and the reviewers, mediated by the Co-Editors-in-Chief. The Editorial Board can also decide to ask for a minor or major revision of the paper when changes are deemed necessary to improve its quality. Furthermore, the Editorial Board can give a “reject and resubmit” decision in case a submission is considered to have potential, but there are significant issues to address before it can be properly evaluated. Next to regular submissions, ToSC also accepts submissions of addendum and errata papers. Addendum papers aim at extending an existing ToSC paper in a novel, yet succinct way. Errata papers aim at correcting an error in an existing ToSC paper. Overall, we are very pleased with the quality and quantity of submissions, the detailed review reports written by the reviewers and the substantial efforts by the authors to further improve the quality of their work. We think that the review process, and in particular the use of major revisions, leads to an increased quality of the papers that are published. The papers selected by the Editorial Board for publication are presented at the conference Fast Software Encryption (FSE). This gives the authors the opportunity to advertize their results and engage in discussions on further work. In 2022, FSE was held during March 20-25, 2022 in Athens, Greece. However, due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the conference was organized in a different way than usual. Most importantly, the conference was held in a hybrid format, accommodating both in-person and online participation. In addition, as FSE 2021 was cancelled, part of the papers originally scheduled for FSE 2021 were postponed to FSE 2022. In detail, papers from the following six issues of ToSC have been presented at FSE 2022: 2020(4), 2021(1), 2021(2), 2021(3), 2021(4) and 2022(1). In addition to the scientific papers from the journal, FSE 2022 had two invited talks: Orr Dunkelman on optimizing cryptanalysis and Christian Rechberger on symmetric cryptography for new applications.
papers.abstract_zh: IACR对称密码学汇刊(ToSC)是一个关于对称密码学所有领域的原创成果的论坛，包括分组密码、流密码、加密方案、哈希函数、消息认证码、(密码)置换、认证加密方案、密码分析和评估工具的设计和分析，以及关于其实施的安全问题和解决方案。ToSC效仿计算机科学领域的其他一些团体，实现了一个开放获取的期刊/会议混合模型。所有的文章都经过了期刊式的审查过程，被接受的论文发表在gold open access上(在我们的例子中是Creative Commons License CC-BY 4.0)。我们遵循的审核程序严格遵循《华尔街日报》的传统。ToSC审查流程致力于保持发表文章的高质量。完整的论文分配给至少三名编辑委员会成员；对于编辑委员会成员提交的稿件，这一数字增加到至少四份。这些成员撰写详细而仔细的评论(通常不依赖于子评论者)。此外，我们有一个反驳阶段，允许作者在最终决定之前对审查意见做出回应。如有必要，在共同主编的调解下，审查过程使作者和审查者之间能够进一步互动。当认为有必要修改以提高论文质量时，编辑委员会也可以决定要求对论文进行小的或大的修改。此外，编辑委员会可以做出“拒绝并重新提交”的决定，以防提交的作品被认为有潜力，但在对其进行适当评估之前有重大问题需要解决。除了常规提交之外，ToSC还接受补遗和勘误表的提交。附录论文旨在以一种新颖而简洁的方式扩展现有的ToSC论文。勘误表论文旨在纠正现有ToSC论文中的一个错误。总体而言，我们对提交材料的质量和数量、审评员编写的详细审评报告以及作者为进一步提高工作质量所做的大量努力感到非常满意。我们认为，审查过程，特别是重大修改的使用，会提高发表论文的质量。编辑委员会选择发表的论文在快速软件加密(FSE)会议上发表。这让作者有机会宣传他们的成果，并参与进一步工作的讨论。2022年FSE于2022年3月20日至25日在希腊雅典举行。然而，由于新冠肺炎疫情，会议的组织方式与往常不同。最重要的是，会议以混合形式举行，既有现场参与，也有在线参与。此外，由于FSE 2021被取消，原定于FSE 2021的部分论文被推迟至FSE 2022。具体而言，来自以下六期ToSC的论文已在FSE 2022上展示:2020(4)、2021(1)、2021(2)、2021(3)、2021(4)和2022(1)。除了该杂志的科学论文，FSE 2022还邀请了两场演讲:Orr Dunkelman关于优化密码分析，Christian Rechberger关于新应用的对称加密。
papers.title_zh: 第2022卷第1期前言

papers.title: The Legendre Symbol and the Modulo-2 Operator in Symmetric Schemes over Fnp Preimage Attack on Full Grendel
papers.authors: Lorenzo Grassi, Dmitry Khovratovich, Sondre Rønjom, Markus Schofnegger
papers.abstract: Motivated by modern cryptographic use cases such as multi-party computation (MPC), homomorphic encryption (HE), and zero-knowledge (ZK) protocols, several symmetric schemes that are efficient in these scenarios have recently been proposed in the literature. Some of these schemes are instantiated with low-degree nonlinear functions, for example low-degree power maps (e.g., MiMC, HadesMiMC, Poseidon) or the Toffoli gate (e.g., Ciminion). Others (e.g., Rescue, Vision, Grendel) are instead instantiated via high-degree functions which are easy to evaluate in the target application. A recent example for the latter case is the hash function Grendel, whose nonlinear layer is constructed using the Legendre symbol. In this paper, we analyze high-degree functions such as the Legendre symbol or the modulo-2 operation as building blocks for the nonlinear layer of a cryptographic scheme over Fp . Our focus regards the security analysis rather than the efficiency in the mentioned use cases. For this purpose, we present several new invertible functions that make use of the Legendre symbol or of the modulo-2 operation. Even though these functions often provide strong statistical properties and ensure a high degree after a few rounds, the main problem regards their small number of possible outputs, that is, only three for the Legendre symbol and only two for the modulo-2 operation. By guessing them, it is possible to reduce the overall degree of the function significantly. We exploit this behavior by describing the first preimage attack on full Grendel, and we verify it in practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 受现代密码用例(如多方计算(MPC)、同态加密(HE)和零知识(ZK)协议)的推动，最近在文献中提出了几种在这些场景中有效的对称方案。这些方案中的一些用低阶非线性函数来例示，例如低阶功率图(例如MiMC、HadesMiMC、Poseidon)或Toffoli门(例如Ciminion)。其他(例如，救援、视觉、格伦戴尔)则通过在目标应用中易于评估的高级函数来实例化。后一种情况的最近的例子是散列函数格伦戴尔，其非线性层是使用勒让德符号构造的。在本文中，我们分析了高阶函数，如Legendre符号或模2运算，作为Fp上密码方案非线性层的构造块。在提到的用例中，我们关注的是安全性分析，而不是效率。为此，我们提出了几个新的可逆函数，它们利用了勒让德符号或模2运算。尽管这些函数通常提供很强的统计特性，并在几轮后确保很高的程度，但主要问题在于它们可能的输出数量很少，也就是说，勒让德符号只有三个，模2运算只有两个。通过猜测它们，可以显著降低函数的整体程度。我们通过描述对全格伦戴尔的第一次原像攻击来利用这种行为，并在实践中验证了这一点。
papers.title_zh: 全格伦戴尔上Fnp原像攻击下对称方案中的Legendre符号和模2算子

papers.title: Weak Tweak-Keys for the CRAFT Block Cipher
papers.authors: Gregor Leander, Shahram Rasoolzadeh
papers.abstract: CRAFT is a lightweight tweakable Substitution-Permutation-Network (SPN) block cipher optimized for efficient protection of its implementations against Differential Fault Analysis (DFA) attacks. In this paper, we present an equivalent description of CRAFT up to a simple mapping on the plaintext, ciphertext and round tweakeys. We show that the new representation, for a sub-class of keys, leads to a new structure which is a Feistel network, with non-linear operation and key addition only on half the state. Consequently, it reveals a class of weak keys for which CRAFT is less resistant against differential and linear cryptanalyses. As a result, we present one weak-key single-tweak differential attack on 23 rounds (with time complexity of 294 encryptions and data complexity of 274 chosen plaintext/tweak/ciphertext tuples and works for 2112 weak keys) and one weak-key related-tweak attack on 26 rounds of the cipher (with time complexity of 2105 encryptions and data complexity 273 chosen plaintext/tweak/ciphertext tuples and works for 2108 weak keys). Note that these attacks do not break the security claim of the CRAFT block cipher.
papers.abstract_zh: CRAFT是一种轻量级可调整替代置换网络(SPN)分组密码，针对差分故障分析(DFA)攻击的有效保护进行了优化。在本文中，我们给出了一个等价的CRAFT描述，它是明文、密文和轮密钥上的一个简单映射。我们表明，新的表示，对于一个子类的关键，导致了一个新的结构，这是一个Feistel网络，非线性运算和关键添加只在一半的状态。因此，它揭示了一类弱密钥，对于这类密钥，CRAFT对差分和线性密码分析的抵抗力较差。结果，我们提出了一个在23轮上的弱密钥单调整差分攻击(时间复杂度为294次加密，数据复杂度为274个选择的明文/调整/密文元组，适用于2112个弱密钥)和一个在26轮密码上的弱密钥相关调整攻击(时间复杂度为2105次加密，数据复杂度为273个选择的明文/调整/密文元组，适用于2108个弱密钥)。注意，这些攻击没有破坏CRAFT分组密码的安全性声明。
papers.title_zh: CRAFT分组密码的弱密钥

papers.title: Bounds for the Security of Ascon against Differential and Linear Cryptanalysis
papers.authors: Johannes Erlacher, Florian Mendel, Maria Eichlseder
papers.abstract: The NIST Lightweight Cryptography project aims to standardize symmetric cryptographic designs, including authenticated encryption and hashing, suitable for constrained devices. One essential criterion for the evaluation of the 10 finalists is the evidence for their security against attacks like linear and differential cryptanalysis. For Ascon, one of the finalists and previous winner of the CAESAR competition in the ‘lightweight’ category, there is a large gap between the proven bounds and the best known characteristics found with heuristic tools: The bounds only cover up to 3 rounds with 15 differentially and 13 linearly active S-boxes, insufficient for proving a level of security for the full constructions.In this paper, we propose a new modeling strategy for SAT solvers and derive strong bounds for the round-reduced Ascon permutation. We prove that 4 rounds already ensure that any single characteristic has a differential probability or squared correlation of at most 2−72, and 6 rounds at most 2−108. This is significantly below the bound that could be exploited within the query limit for keyed Ascon modes. These bounds are probably not tight. To achieve this result, we propose a new search strategy of dividing the search space into a large number of subproblems based on ‘girdle patterns’, and show how to exploit the rotational symmetry of Ascon using necklace theory. Additionally, we evaluate and optimize several aspects of the pure SAT model, including the counter implementation and parallelizability, which we expect to be useful for future applications to other models.
papers.abstract_zh: NIST轻量级加密项目旨在标准化对称加密设计，包括认证加密和哈希，适用于受限制的设备。评估10个决赛入围者的一个基本标准是他们对攻击的安全性证据，如线性和差分密码分析。Ascon是CAESAR竞赛“轻量级”类别的决赛选手之一，也是上届冠军。对于Ascon而言，已证明的界限与使用启发式工具发现的最佳已知特性之间存在很大差距:界限仅涵盖最多3轮15个差分S盒和13个线性活动S盒，不足以证明完整构造的安全性水平。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的SAT求解器建模策略，并推导出了轮约Ascon置换的强界。我们证明，4轮已经确保任何单个特征的差分概率或平方相关性最多为272，6轮最多为2108。这大大低于在键控Ascon模式的查询限制内可以利用的界限。这些界限可能并不严格。为了实现这个结果，我们提出了一种新的搜索策略，基于“环带模式”将搜索空间划分为大量子问题，并展示了如何利用项链理论开发Ascon的旋转对称性。此外，我们评估和优化了纯SAT模型的几个方面，包括计数器实现和并行性，我们希望这对于其他模型的未来应用是有用的。
papers.title_zh: Ascon对差分和线性密码分析的安全性界限

papers.title: A Formal Analysis of Boomerang Probabilities
papers.authors: Andreas B. Kidmose, Tyge Tiessen
papers.abstract: In the past 20 years since their conception, boomerang attacks have become an important tool in the cryptanalysis of block ciphers. In the classical estimate of their success probability, assumptions are made about the independence of the underlying differential trails that are not well-founded. We underline the problems inherent in these independence assumptions by using them to prove that for any boomerang there exists a differential trail over the entire cipher with a higher probability than the boomerang.While cryptanalysts today have a clear understanding that the trails can be dependent, the focus of previous research has mostly gone into using these dependencies to improve attacks but little effort has been put into giving boomerangs and their success probabilities a stronger theoretical underpinning. With this publication, we provide such a formalization.We provide a framework which allows us to formulate and prove rigorous statements about the probabilities involved in boomerang attacks without relying on independence assumptions of the trails. Among these statements is a proof that two-round boomerangs on SPNs with differentially 4-uniform S-boxes always deviate from the classical probability estimate to the largest degree possible.We applied the results of this formalization to analyze the validity of some of the first boomerang attacks. We show that the boomerang constructed in the amplified boomerang attack on Serpent by Kelsey, Kohno, and Schneier has probability zero. For the rectangle attack on Serpent by Dunkelman, Biham, and Keller, we demonstrate that a minuscule fraction of only 2−43.4 of all differential trail combinations used in the original attack have a non-zero probability. In spite of this, the probability of the boomerang is in fact a little higher than the original estimate suggests as the non-zero trails have a vastly higher probability than the classical estimate predicts.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的20年里，回飞镖攻击已经成为分组密码分析中的一个重要工具。在对成功概率的经典估计中，对潜在差异轨迹的独立性做出的假设是没有充分根据的。我们强调这些独立性假设中固有的问题，通过使用它们来证明对于任何回飞棒，在整个密码中存在一个比回飞棒更高概率的微分轨迹。虽然今天的密码分析者已经清楚地认识到踪迹可能是依赖的，但以前的研究重点主要是利用这些依赖性来改善攻击，而很少努力为回飞棒及其成功概率提供更强的理论基础。通过这份出版物，我们提供了这样一种形式化。我们提供了一个框架，允许我们制定和证明关于回飞镖攻击概率的严格陈述，而不依赖于轨迹的独立性假设。在这些陈述中，有一个证明是，具有不同的4-均匀S盒的SPN上的两轮回飞镖总是尽可能最大程度地偏离经典概率估计。我们应用这种形式化的结果来分析第一批回旋镖攻击的有效性。我们证明了Kelsey，Kohno和Schneier在对Serpent的放大回飞棒攻击中构造的回飞棒的概率为零。对于Dunkelman、Biham和Keller对Serpent的矩形攻击，我们证明了在原始攻击中使用的所有差分轨迹组合中只有243.4的极小部分具有非零概率。尽管如此，回旋镖的概率实际上比最初的估计略高，因为非零尾迹的概率远远高于经典估计的预测。
papers.title_zh: 回旋镖概率的形式分析

papers.title: Influence of the Linear Layer on the Algebraic Degree in SP-Networks
papers.authors: Carlos Cid, Lorenzo Grassi, Aldo Gunsing, Reinhard Lüftenegger, Christian Rechberger, Markus Schofnegger
papers.abstract: We consider SPN schemes, i.e., schemes whose non-linear layer is defined as the parallel application of t ≥ 1 independent S-Boxes over F2n and whose linear layer is defined by the multiplication with a (n · t) × (n · t) matrix over F2. Even if the algebraic representation of a scheme depends on all its components, upper bounds on the growth of the algebraic degree in the literature usually only consider the details of the non-linear layer. Hence a natural question arises: (how) do the details of the linear layer influence the growth of the algebraic degree? We show that the linear layer plays a crucial role in the growth of the algebraic degree and present a new upper bound on the algebraic degree in SP-networks. As main results, we prove that in the case of low-degree round functions with large S-Boxes: (a) an initial exponential growth of the algebraic degree can be followed by a linear growth until the maximum algebraic degree is reached; (b) the rate of the linear growth is proportional to the degree of the linear layer over Ft2n. Besides providing a theoretical insight, our analysis is particularly relevant for assessing the security of the security of cryptographic permutations designed to be competitive in applications like MPC, FHE, SNARKs, and STARKs, including permutations based on the Hades design strategy. We have verified our findings on small-scale instances and we have compared them against the currently best results in the literature, showing a substantial improvement of upper bounds on the algebraic degree in case of low-degree round functions with large S-Boxes.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们考虑SPN方案，即其非线性层定义为F2n上t ≥ 1个独立S盒的并行应用，其线性层定义为与F2上的(n t) × (n t)矩阵相乘。即使一个方案的代数表示依赖于它的所有组成部分，文献中代数次数增长的上界通常只考虑非线性层的细节。因此，一个自然的问题出现了:(如何)线性层的细节影响代数次数的增长？我们证明了线性层在SP-网络代数度的增长中起着至关重要的作用，并给出了SP-网络代数度的一个新的上界。作为主要结果，我们证明了对于具有大S盒的低次圆函数:(a)代数次数的初始指数增长之后可以是线性增长，直到达到最大代数次数；(b)线性生长的速率与Ft2n上线性层的程度成比例。除了提供理论见解之外，我们的分析还特别适用于评估在MPC、FHE、SNARKs和STARKs等应用中具有竞争力的加密置换的安全性，包括基于Hades设计策略的置换。我们已经在小规模实例上验证了我们的发现，并且我们已经将它们与文献中目前的最佳结果进行了比较，显示了在具有大S盒的低次圆函数的情况下代数次数上界的实质性改进。
papers.title_zh: SP网络中线性层对代数次数的影响

papers.title: Security of COFB against Chosen Ciphertext Attacks
papers.authors: Mustafa Khairallah
papers.abstract: COFB is a lightweight Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD) mode based on block ciphers. It was proposed in CHES 2017 and is the basis for GIFT-COFB, a finalist in the NIST lightweight standardization project. It comes with provable security results that guarantee its security up to the birthday bound in the nonce-respecting model. However, the designers offer multiple versions of the analysis with different details and the implications of attacks against the scheme are not discussed deeply. In this article, we look at a group of possible forgery and privacy attacks against COFB. We show that the security for both forgery and privacy is bounded by the number of forgery attempts. We show the existence of forgery and privacy attacks with success probability qd/2n/2, given qd forgery attempts. In particular, we show an attack with 2n/2 attempts using only a single known-plaintext encryption query against COFB. While these attacks do not contradict the claims made by the designers of GIFT-COFB, they show its limitations in terms of the number of forgery attempts. They also show that, while COFB generates a 128-bit tag, it behaves in a very similar manner to an AEAD scheme with 64-bit tag. As a result of independent interest, our analysis provides a contradiction to the main theorem of Journal of Cryptology volume 33, pages 703–741 (2020), which includes an improved security proof of COFB compared to the CHES 2017 version. Finally, we discuss the term nqd/2n/2 that appears in the security proof of GIFT-COFB and CHES 2017, showing why there is a security gap between the provable results and the attacks. We emphasize that the results in this article do not threaten the security of GIFT-COFB in the scope of the NIST lightweight cryptography requirements or the claims made by the designers in the specification document of the design.
papers.abstract_zh: COFB是一种基于块密码的轻量级关联数据认证加密(AEAD)模式。它是在CHES 2017中提出的，是NIST轻量级标准化项目决赛选手GIFT-COFB的基础。它带来了可证明的安全结果，保证了它在随机数模型中的安全性。然而，设计者提供了具有不同细节的分析的多个版本，并且没有深入讨论针对该方案的攻击的含义。在本文中，我们研究了一组针对COFB的可能的伪造和隐私攻击。我们证明了伪造和隐私的安全性受到伪造尝试次数的限制。给定qd次伪造尝试，我们证明了成功概率为qd/2n/2的伪造和隐私攻击的存在性。特别地，我们展示了针对COFB的仅使用单个已知明文加密查询的2n/2次尝试的攻击。虽然这些攻击与GIFT-COFB的设计者的说法并不矛盾，但它们显示了GIFT-COFB在伪造尝试次数方面的局限性。它们还表明，虽然COFB生成128位标签，但其行为方式与64位标签的AEAD方案非常相似。作为独立兴趣的结果，我们的分析提供了与《密码学杂志》第33卷第703–741页(2020)的主要定理的矛盾，其中包括与CHES 2017版本相比改进的COFB的安全证明。最后，我们讨论了在GIFT-COFB和CHES 2017的安全证明中出现的术语nqd/2n/2，说明了为什么在可证明的结果和攻击之间存在安全差距。我们强调，在NIST轻量级加密要求或设计者在设计的规范文档中所做的声明的范围内，本文中的结果不会威胁GIFT-COFB的安全性。
papers.title_zh: COFB抵抗选择密文攻击的安全性

papers.title: Towards Low-Latency Implementation of Linear Layers
papers.authors: Qun Liu, Weijia Wang, Yanhong Fan, Lixuan Wu, Ling Sun, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: Lightweight cryptography features a small footprint and/or low computational complexity. Low-cost implementations of linear layers usually play an important role in lightweight cryptography. Although it has been shown by Boyar et al. that finding the optimal implementation of a linear layer is a Shortest Linear Program (SLP) problem and NP-hard, there exist a variety of heuristic methods to search for near-optimal solutions. This paper considers the low-latency criteria and focuses on the heuristic search of lightweight implementation for linear layers. Most of the prior approach iteratively combines the inputs (of linear layers) to reach the output, which can be regarded as the forward search. To better adapt the low-latency criteria, we propose a new framework of backward search that attempts to iteratively split every output (into an XORing of two bits) until all inputs appear. By bounding the time of splitting, the new framework can find a sub-optimal solution with a minimized depth of circuits.We apply our new search algorithm to linear layers of block ciphers and find many low-latency candidates for implementations. Notably, for AES Mixcolumns, we provide an implementation with 103 XOR gates with a depth of 3, which is among the best hardware implementations of the AES linear layer. Besides, we obtain better implementations in XOR gates for 54.3% of 4256 Maximum Distance Separable (MDS) matrices proposed by Li et al. at FSE 2019. We also achieve an involutory MDS matrix (in M4(GL(8, F2))) whose implementation uses the lowest number (i.e., 86, saving 2 from the state-of-the-art result) of XORs with the minimum depth.
papers.abstract_zh: 轻量级加密的特点是占用空间小和/或计算复杂度低。线性层的低成本实现通常在轻量级加密中扮演重要角色。尽管Boyar等人已经表明，寻找线性层的最优实现是最短线性规划(SLP)问题并且是NP-hard的，但是存在多种启发式方法来搜索接近最优的解决方案。本文考虑了低延迟标准，并侧重于线性层轻量级实现的启发式搜索。大多数现有方法迭代地组合(线性层的)输入以达到输出，这可以被视为前向搜索。为了更好地适应低延迟标准，我们提出了一种新的后向搜索框架，试图迭代地分割每个输出(分成两个比特的异或)，直到所有输入都出现。通过限制分裂的时间，新的框架可以找到一个电路深度最小的次优解。我们将新的搜索算法应用于分组密码的线性层，并找到了许多低延迟的候选实现。值得注意的是，对于AES混合列，我们提供了深度为3的103个XOR门的实现，这是AES线性层的最佳硬件实现之一。此外，对于李等人在2019上提出的4256个最大距离可分(MDS)矩阵中的54.3%，我们获得了更好的异或门实现。我们还实现了对合MDS矩阵(在M4(GL(8，F2)))，其实现使用具有最小深度的最少数量(即，86，从最先进的结果节省2)的xor。
papers.title_zh: 线性层的低延迟实现

papers.title: Quantum Period Finding is Compression Robust
papers.authors: Alexander May, Lars Schlieper
papers.abstract: We study quantum period finding algorithms such as Simon and Shor (and its variant Ekerå-Håstad). For a periodic function f these algorithms produce – via some quantum embedding of f – a quantum superposition ∑x |x〉 |f(x)〉, which requires a certain amount of output qubits that represent |f(x)〉. We show that one can lower this amount to a single output qubit by hashing f down to a single bit in an oracle setting.Namely, we replace the embedding of f in quantum period finding circuits by oracle access to several embeddings of hashed versions of f. We show that on expectation this modification only doubles the required amount of quantum measurements, while significantly reducing the total number of qubits. For example, for Simon’s algorithm that finds periods in f : Fn2 → Fn2 our hashing technique reduces the required output qubits from n down to 1, and therefore the total amount of qubits from 2n to n + 1. We also show that Simon’s algorithm admits real world applications with only n + 1 qubits by giving a concrete realization of a hashed version of the cryptographic Even-Mansour construction. Moreover, for a variant of Simon’s algorithm on Even-Mansour that requires only classical queries to Even-Mansour we save a factor of (roughly) 4 in the qubits.Our oracle-based hashed version of the Ekerå-Håstad algorithm for factoring n-bit RSA reduces the required qubits from (3/2 + o(1))n down to (1/2+ o(1))n.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们研究量子周期寻找算法，如Simon和Shor(及其变体eker-h stad)。对于周期函数f，这些算法通过f的一些量子嵌入产生了一个量子叠加∑x |x〉 |f(x)〉，这需要一定数量的输出量子位来表示|f(x)〉.我们证明，在oracle设置中，通过将f散列到单个比特，可以将这个数量降低到单个输出量子比特。也就是说，我们通过oracle访问f的散列版本的几个嵌入来代替f在量子周期寻找电路中的嵌入。我们表明，根据预期，这种修改仅使所需的量子测量量加倍，同时显著减少了量子位的总数。例如，对于在f : Fn2 → Fn2中寻找周期的Simon算法，我们的散列技术将所需的输出量子位从n减少到1，因此量子位的总量从2n减少到n + 1。我们还通过给出加密偶数曼苏尔构造的散列版本的具体实现，表明西蒙的算法允许只有n + 1个量子位的真实世界应用。此外，对于Simon在偶数曼苏尔上的算法的一个变体，它只需要对偶数曼苏尔进行经典查询，我们在量子位中节省了(大约)4的因子。我们用于分解n位RSA的eker-h stad算法的基于oracle的哈希版本将所需的量子位从(3/2 + o(1))n减少到(1/2+ o(1))n。
papers.title_zh: 量子周期发现是压缩鲁棒的

papers.title: Addendum to Linear Cryptanalyses of Three AEADs with GIFT-128 as Underlying Primitives
papers.authors: Ling Sun, Wei Wang, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: This paper considers the linear cryptanalyses of Authenticated Encryptions with Associated Data (AEADs) GIFT-COFB, SUNDAE-GIFT, and HyENA. All of these proposals take GIFT-128 as underlying primitives. The automatic search with the Boolean satisfiability problem (SAT) method is implemented to search for linear approximations that match the attack settings concerning these primitives. With the newly identified approximations, we launch key-recovery attacks on GIFT-COFB, SUNDAE-GIFT, and HyENA when the underlying primitives are replaced with 16-round, 17-round, and 16-round versions of GIFT-128. The resistance of GIFT-128 against linear cryptanalysis is also evaluated. We present a 24-round key-recovery attack on GIFT-128 with a newly obtained 19-round linear approximation. We note that the attack results in this paper are far from threatening the security of GIFT-COFB, SUNDAE-GIFT, HyENA, and GIFT-128.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文考虑了对GIFT-COFB、SUNDAE-GIFT和HyENA的认证加密的线性密码分析。所有这些建议都将GIFT-128作为基础原语。使用布尔可满足性问题(SAT)方法的自动搜索被实现来搜索与关于这些原语的攻击设置相匹配的线性近似。利用新确定的近似，当基础原语被16轮、17轮和16轮版本的GIFT-128替换时，我们对GIFT-COFB、SUNDAE-GIFT和HyENA发起密钥恢复攻击。还评估了GIFT-128对线性密码分析的抵抗性。我们提出了一个对GIFT-128的24轮密钥恢复攻击，并得到了一个新的19轮线性近似。我们注意到，本文中的攻击结果远没有威胁到GIFT-COFB、SUNDAE-GIFT、HyENA和GIFT-128的安全。
papers.title_zh: 对以GIFT-128为基元的三种AEADs的线性密码分析的补充

papers.title: The DRACO Stream Cipher A Power-efficient Small-state Stream Cipher with Full Provable Security against TMDTO Attacks
papers.authors: Matthias Hamann, Alexander Moch, Matthias Krause, Vasily Mikhalev
papers.abstract: . Stream ciphers are vulnerable to generic time-memory-data tradeoff attacks. These attacks reduce the security level to half of the cipher’s internal state size. The conventional way to handle this vulnerability is to design the cipher with an internal state twice as large as the desired security level. In lightweight cryptography and heavily resource constrained devices, a large internal state size is a big drawback for the cipher. This design principle can be found in the eSTREAM portfolio members Grain and Trivium. Recently proposals have been made that reduce the internal state size. These ciphers distinguish between a volatile internal state and a non-volatile internal state. The volatile part would typically be updated during a state update while the non-volatile part remained constant. Cipher proposals like Sprout, Plantlet , Fruit and Atom reuse the secret key as non-volatile part of the cipher. However, when considering indistinguishability none of the ciphers mentioned above provides security beyond the birthday bound with regard to the volatile internal state. Partially this is due to the lack of a proper proof of security. We present a new stream cipher proposal called Draco which implements a construction scheme called CIVK . In contrast to the ciphers mentioned above, CIVK uses the initial value and a key prefix as its non-volatile state. Draco builds upon CIVK and uses a 128-bit key and a 96-bit initial value and requires 23 % less area and 31 % less power than Grain-128a at 10 MHz. Further, we present a proof that CIVK provides full security with regard to the volatile internal state length against distinguishing attacks. This makes Draco a suitable cipher choice for ultra-lightweight devices like RFID tags.
papers.abstract_zh: 。流密码容易受到一般的时间-存储-数据权衡攻击。这些攻击将安全级别降低到密码内部状态大小的一半。处理这种漏洞的传统方法是设计具有两倍于所需安全级别的内部状态的密码。在轻量级加密和资源严重受限的设备中，大的内部状态大小是密码的一个大缺点。这一设计原则可以在eSTREAM组合成员Grain和Trivium中找到。最近已经提出了减少内部状态大小的建议。这些密码区分易失性内部状态和非易失性内部状态。易失性部分通常在状态更新期间被更新，而非易失性部分保持不变。像萌芽、幼苗、果实和原子这样的密码提案将密钥作为密码的非易失性部分重复使用。然而，当考虑到不可区分性时，上面提到的密码没有一个提供超出关于易变内部状态的生日界限的安全性。部分原因是缺乏适当的安全证明。我们提出了一个新的称为Draco的流密码方案，它实现了一个称为CIVK的构造方案。与上面提到的密码不同，CIVK使用初始值和一个密钥前缀作为其非易失状态。Draco基于CIVK构建，使用128位密钥和96位初始值，在10 MHz时所需面积和功耗比Grain-128a低23 %和31 %。此外，我们提出了一个证明，即CIVK针对不同的攻击提供了关于易变内部状态长度的完全安全性。这使得Draco成为RFID标签等超轻设备的合适密码选择。
papers.title_zh: DRACO流密码是一种低功耗的小状态流密码，对TMDTO攻击具有完全可证明的安全性

papers.title: New Key-Recovery Attack on Reduced-Round AES
papers.authors: Navid Ghaedi Bardeh, Vincent Rijmen
papers.abstract: A new fundamental 4-round property of AES, called the zero-difference property, was introduced by Rønjom, Bardeh and Helleseth at Asiacrypt 2017. Our work characterizes it in a simple way by exploiting the notion of related differences which was introduced and well analyzed by the AES designers. We extend the 4-round property by considering some further properties of related differences over the AES linear layer, generalizing the zero-difference property. This results in a new key-recovery attack on 7-round AES which is the first attack on 7-round AES by exploiting the zero-difference property.
papers.abstract_zh: rn jom、Bardeh和Helleseth在Asiacrypt 2017上介绍了AES的一个新的基本4轮属性，称为零差属性。我们的工作通过利用AES设计者引入并分析的相关差异的概念，以简单的方式对其进行了表征。我们通过考虑AES线性层上的相关差的一些进一步的属性来扩展4轮属性，从而推广零差属性。这导致对7轮AES的新的密钥恢复攻击，这是通过利用零差特性对7轮AES的第一次攻击。
papers.title_zh: 一种新的对缩减轮AES的密钥恢复攻击

papers.title: Improved MITM Cryptanalysis on Streebog
papers.authors: Jialiang Hua, Xiaoyang Dong, Siwei Sun, Zhiyu Zhang, Lei Hu, Xiaoyun Wang
papers.abstract: At ASIACRYPT 2012, Sasaki et al. introduced the guess-and-determine approach to extend the meet-in-the-middle (MITM) preimage attack. At CRYPTO 2021, Dong et al. proposed a technique to derive the solution spaces of nonlinear constrained neutral words in the MITM preimage attack. In this paper, we try to combine these two techniques to further improve the MITM preimage attacks. Based on the previous MILP-based automatic tools for MITM attacks, we introduce new constraints due to the combination of guess-and-determine and nonlinearly constrained neutral words to build a new automatic model.As a proof of work, we apply it to the Russian national standard hash function Streebog, which is also an ISO standard. We find the first 8.5-round preimage attack on Streebog-512 compression function and the first 7.5-round preimage attack on Streebog-256 compression function. In addition, we give the 8.5-round preimage attack on Streebog-512 hash function. Our attacks extend the best previous attacks by one round. We also improve the time complexity of the 7.5-round preimage attack on Streebog-512 hash function and 6.5-round preimage attack on Streebog-256 hash function.
papers.abstract_zh: 在ASIACRYPT 2012上，Sasaki等人推出了猜测并确定的方法来扩展中间相遇(MITM)原像攻击。在CRYPTO 2021，Dong等人提出了一种在原像攻击中导出非线性约束中性词的解空间的技术。在本文中，我们尝试结合这两种技术来进一步改进MITM原像攻击。在先前基于MILP的MITM攻击自动工具的基础上，我们引入了新的约束，由于结合了猜测和确定以及非线性约束中性词来建立新的自动模型。作为工作证明，我们将其应用于俄罗斯国家标准哈希函数Streebog，这也是一个ISO标准。我们发现对Streebog-512压缩函数的第一个8.5轮原像攻击和对Streebog-256压缩函数的第一个7.5轮原像攻击。此外，我们给出了对Streebog-512哈希函数的8.5轮原像攻击。我们的攻击将之前最好的攻击延长了一轮。我们还改进了对Streebog-512哈希函数的7.5轮原像攻击和对Streebog-256哈希函数的6.5轮原像攻击的时间复杂度。
papers.title_zh: Streebog上改进的MITM密码分析

papers.title: Integral Cryptanalysis of WARP based on Monomial Prediction
papers.authors: Hosein Hadipour, Maria Eichlseder
papers.abstract: WARP is a 128-bit block cipher published by Banik et al. at SAC 2020 as a lightweight alternative to AES. It is based on a generalized Feistel network and achieves the smallest area footprint among 128-bit block ciphers in many settings. Previous analysis results include integral key-recovery attacks on 21 out of 41 rounds. In this paper, we propose integral key-recovery attacks on up to 32 rounds by improving both the integral distinguisher and the key-recovery approach substantially. For the distinguisher, we show how to model the monomial prediction technique proposed by Hu et al. at ASIACRYPT 2020 as a SAT problem and thus create a bit-oriented model of WARP taking the key schedule into account. Together with two additional observations on the properties of WARP’s construction, we extend the best previous distinguisher by 2 rounds (as a classical integral distinguisher) or 4 rounds (for a generalized integral distinguisher). For the key recovery, we create a graph-based model of the round function and demonstrate how to manipulate the graph to obtain a cipher representation amenable to FFT-based key recovery.
papers.abstract_zh: WARP是Banik等人在SAC 2020上发布的128位分组密码，作为AES的轻量级替代方案。它基于广义Feistel网络，在许多设置中实现了128位分组密码中最小的面积足迹。先前的分析结果包括对41轮中的21轮的整体密钥恢复攻击。在这篇文章中，我们通过改进整数鉴别器和密钥恢复方法，提出了32轮整数密钥恢复攻击。首先，我们展示了如何将胡等人在ASIACRYPT 2020上提出的单项预测技术建模为一个SAT问题，从而在考虑关键调度的情况下创建一个面向比特的WARP模型。连同对WARP构造的属性的两个附加观察，我们将先前的最佳区分器扩展了2轮(作为经典的整数区分器)或4轮(对于广义的整数区分器)。对于密钥恢复，我们创建了一个基于图的round函数模型，并演示了如何操作该图来获得一个适合于基于FFT的密钥恢复的密码表示。
papers.title_zh: 基于单项预测的WARP整体密码分析

papers.title: Automatic Search of Rectangle Attacks on Feistel Ciphers: Application to WARP
papers.authors: Virginie Lallemand, Marine Minier, Loïc Rouquette
papers.abstract: In this paper we present a boomerang analysis of WARP, a recently proposed Generalized Feistel Network with extremely compact hardware implementations. We start by looking for boomerang characteristics that directly take into account the boomerang switch effects by showing how to adapt Delaune et al. automated tool to the case of Feistel ciphers, and discuss several improvements to keep the execution time reasonable. This technique returns a 23-round distinguisher of probability 2−124, which becomes the best distinguisher presented on WARP so far. We then look for an attack by adding the key recovery phase to our model and we obtain a 26-round rectangle attack with time and data complexities of 2115.9 and 2120.6 respectively, again resulting in the best result presented so far. Incidentally, our analysis discloses how an attacker can take advantage of the position of the key addition (put after the S-box application to avoid complementation properties), which in our case offers an improvement of a factor of 275 of the time complexity in comparison to a variant with the key addition positioned before. Note that our findings do not threaten the security of the cipher which iterates 41 rounds.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了WARP的回飞镖分析，WARP是最近提出的具有极其紧凑的硬件实现的广义Feistel网络。我们首先通过展示如何使Delaune等人的自动化工具适应Feistel密码的情况来寻找直接考虑回飞镖开关效应的回飞镖特征，并讨论保持合理的执行时间的若干改进。这个技术返回一个概率为2124的23轮区分器，它成为目前为止WARP上最好的区分器。然后，我们通过将密钥恢复阶段添加到我们的模型中来寻找攻击，我们获得了26轮矩形攻击，其时间和数据复杂度分别为2115.9和2120.6，再次产生了迄今为止呈现的最佳结果。顺便提一下，我们的分析揭示了攻击者如何利用密钥添加的位置(放在S-box应用程序之后以避免互补属性)，在我们的情况下，与之前放置了密钥添加的变体相比，时间复杂度提高了275倍。注意，我们的发现不会威胁到迭代41轮的密码的安全性。
papers.title_zh: Feistel密码矩形攻击的自动搜索:在WARP中的应用

papers.title: Truncated Differential Attacks on Contracting Feistel Ciphers
papers.authors: Tim Beyne, Yunwen Liu
papers.abstract: We improve truncated differential attacks on t-branch contracting Feistel ciphers with a domain size of Nt. Based on new truncated differentials, a generic distinguisher for t2 + t − 2 rounds using O(Nt−1) data and time is obtained. In addition, we obtain a key-recovery attack on t2 + 1 rounds with Õ(Nt−2) data and Õ(Nt−1) time. Compared to previous results by Guo et al. (ToSC 2016), our attacks cover more rounds with a lower data-complexity. Applications of the generic truncated differential to concrete ciphers include full-round attacks on some instances of GMiMC-crf, and the best-known key-recovery attack on 17 rounds of the Chinese block cipher standard SM4. In addition, we propose an automated search method for truncated differentials using SMT, which is effective even for trails with probability below the probability of the truncated differential for a random permutation.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们改进了对域大小为n t的t分支收缩Feistel密码的截断差分攻击。基于新的截断差分，获得了使用O(Nt-1)数据和时间的T2+T2轮的通用区分符。此外，我们获得了在t2 + 1轮上用\(Nt-2)数据和\(Nt-1)时间的密钥恢复攻击。与郭等人之前的结果(ToSC 2016)相比，我们的攻击覆盖了更多轮次，数据复杂度更低。一般截断差分对具体密码的应用包括对GMiMC-crf的一些实例的整轮攻击，以及对中国分组密码标准SM4的17轮最著名的密钥恢复攻击。此外，我们提出了一种使用SMT的截断差分的自动搜索方法，该方法即使对于概率低于随机排列的截断差分的概率的轨迹也是有效的。
papers.title_zh: 对收缩Feistel密码的截断差分攻击

papers.title: Revisiting the Extension of Matsui's Algorithm 1 to Linear Hulls: Application to TinyJAMBU
papers.authors: Muzhou Li, Nicky Mouha, Ling Sun, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: At EUROCRYPT ’93, Matsui introduced linear cryptanalysis. Both Matsui’s Algorithm 1 and 2 use a linear approximation involving certain state bits. Algorithm 2 requires partial encryptions or decryptions to obtain these state bits after guessing extra key bits. For ciphers where only part of the state can be obtained, like some stream ciphers and authenticated encryption schemes, Algorithm 2 will not work efficiently since it is hard to implement partial encryptions or decryptions. In this case, Algorithm 1 is a good choice since it only involves these state bits, and one bit of key information can be recovered using a single linear approximation trail. However, when there are several strong trails containing the same state bits, known as the linear hull effect, recovering key bits with Algorithm 1 is infeasible. To overcome this, Röck and Nyberg extended Matsui’s Algorithm 1 to linear hulls. However, Röck and Nyberg found that their theoretical estimates are quite pessimistic for low success probabilities and too optimistic for high success probabilities. To deal with this, we construct new statistical models where the theoretical success probabilities are in a good accordance with experimental ones, so that we provide the first accurate analysis of the extension of Matsui’s Algorithm 1 to linear hulls. To illustrate the usefulness of our new models, we apply them to one of the ten finalists of the NIST Lightweight Cryptography (LWC) Standardization project: TinyJAMBU. We provide the first cryptanalysis under the nonce-respecting setting on the full TinyJAMBU v1 and the round-reduced TinyJAMBU v2, where partial key bits are recovered. Our results do not violate the security claims made by the designers.
papers.abstract_zh: 在EUROCRYPT '93上，Matsui介绍了线性密码分析。Matsui的算法1和2都使用涉及某些状态位的线性近似。算法2需要部分加密或解密，以在猜测额外的密钥位之后获得这些状态位。对于只能获得部分状态的密码，如一些流密码和认证加密方案，算法2将不能有效地工作，因为它很难实现部分加密或解密。在这种情况下，算法1是一个很好的选择，因为它只涉及这些状态位，并且可以使用单个线性近似轨迹来恢复一位密钥信息。然而，当存在几个包含相同状态位的强踪迹时，即所谓的线性外壳效应，用算法1恢复密钥位是不可行的。为了克服这一点，洛克和尼伯格将松井的算法1扩展到线性外壳。然而，洛克和尼伯格发现，他们的理论估计对低成功概率相当悲观，对高成功概率过于乐观。为了解决这个问题，我们构建了新的统计模型，其中理论上的成功概率与实验上的成功概率很好地一致，因此我们提供了Matsui算法1到线性外壳的扩展的第一个精确分析。为了说明我们的新模型的有用性，我们将它们应用于NIST轻量级加密(LWC)标准化项目的十个决赛选手之一:TinyJAMBU。我们在完整TinyJAMBU v1和舍入TinyJAMBU v2上提供了在随机数相关设置下的第一次密码分析，其中恢复了部分密钥位。我们的结果没有违反设计者的安全声明。
papers.title_zh: 再论Matsui算法1对线性外壳的扩展:应用于TinyJAMBU

papers.title: Accelerating the Best Trail Search on AES-Like Ciphers
