We take our exploration beyond the conventional small (and even) S-box sizes. Our investigation is twofold: (1) we note that implementations of existing S-boxes are not optimized for the criteria which define masking complexity (AND depth and AND gate complexity) and improve a tool published at FSE 2016 by Stoffelen in order to fill this gap. (2) We search for new S-box designs which take these implementation properties into account from the start. We perform a systematic search based on the properties of not only the S-box but also its inverse as well as an exploration of larger S-box sizes using length-doubling structures. The result of our investigation is not only a wide selection of very good S-boxes, but we also provide complete descriptions of their circuits, enabling their integration into future work.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项工作中，我们进行了广泛的研究，并构建了一个适用于安全轻量级实现的S盒组合，这与正在进行的NIST轻量级加密竞赛非常吻合。特别是，我们一方面追求良好的功能特性，另一方面追求深度和与门复杂度方面的高效实现。此外，我们还考虑了反向S盒的实现以及它与正向S盒共享资源的可能性。我们的探索超越了传统的小(甚至)S盒尺寸。我们的研究有两个方面:(1)我们注意到现有S盒的实现没有针对定义掩蔽复杂度(以及深度和与门复杂度)的标准进行优化，并且改进了Stoffelen在2016年FSE会议上发表的一个工具，以填补这一空白。(2)我们寻找从一开始就考虑到这些实现特性的新S盒设计。我们不仅根据S盒的性质，而且根据其逆性质进行了系统的搜索，并且使用长度加倍结构探索了更大的S盒尺寸。我们调查的结果不仅是广泛选择了非常好的S盒，而且我们还提供了完整的电路描述，使它们能够集成到未来的工作中。
papers.title_zh: 低深度和高效反转:低延迟屏蔽的S盒指南

papers.title: Swap and Rotate: Lightweight Linear Layers for SPN-based Blockciphers
papers.authors: Subhadeep Banik, Fatih Balli, Francesco Regazzoni, Serge Vaudenay
papers.abstract: In CHES 2017, Jean et al. presented a paper on “Bit-Sliding” in which the authors proposed lightweight constructions for SPN based block ciphers like AES, PRESENT and SKINNY. The main idea behind these constructions was to reduce the length of the datapath to 1 bit and to reformulate the linear layer for these ciphers so that they require fewer scan flip-flops (which have built-in multiplexer functionality and so larger in area as compared to a simple flip-flop). In this paper, we develop their idea even further in few separate directions.First, we prove that given an arbitrary linear transformation, it is always possible to construct the linear layer using merely 2 scan flip-flops. This points to an optimistic venue to follow to gain further GE reductions, yet the straightforward application of the techniques in our proof to PRESENT and GIFT leads to inefficient implementations of the linear layer, as reducing ourselves to 2 scan flip-flops setting requires thousands of clock cycles and leads to very high latency.Equipped with the well-established formalism on permutation groups, we explore whether we can reduce the number of clock cycles to a practical level, i.e. few hundreds, by adding few more pairs of scan flip flops. For PRESENT, we show that 4 (resp. 8, 12) scan flip-flops are sufficient to complete the permutation layer in 384 (resp. 256, 128) clock cycles. For GIFT, we show that 4 (resp. 8, 10) scan flip flops correspond to 320 (resp. 192, 128) clock cycles. Finally, in order to provide the best of the two worlds (i.e. circuit area and latency), we push our scan flip-flop choices even further to completely eliminate the latency incurred by the permutation layer, without compromising our stringent GE budget. We show that not only 12 scan flip flops are sufficient to execute PRESENT permutation in 64 clock cycles, but also the same scan flip flops can be used readily in a combined encryption decryption circuit. Our final design of PRESENT and GIFT beat the record of Jean et al. and Banik et al. in both latency and in circuit-size metric. We believe that the techniques presented in our work can also be used at choosing bit-sliding-friendly linear layer permutations for the future SPN-based designs.
papers.abstract_zh: 在CHES 2017中，Jean等人提交了一篇关于“位滑动”的论文，其中作者提出了基于SPN的分组密码(如AES、PRESENT和SKINNY)的轻量级构造。这些结构背后的主要思想是将数据路径的长度减少到1位，并重新形成这些密码的线性层，使得它们需要更少的扫描触发器(其具有内置的多路复用器功能，因此与简单的触发器相比面积更大)。在本文中，我们在几个不同的方向上进一步发展了他们的观点。首先，我们证明了给定一个任意的线性变换，仅仅使用2个扫描触发器就可以构建线性层。这为进一步降低GE指明了一个乐观的方向，但在我们的演示和礼品中直接应用这些技术会导致线性层的低效实施，因为将我们自己减少到2个扫描触发器设置需要数千个时钟周期，并导致非常高的延迟。有了关于置换群的成熟的形式，我们探索是否可以通过增加几对扫描触发器来将时钟周期的数量减少到实用水平，即几百个。目前，我们证明了4(分别为。8，12)扫描触发器足以完成384(相应地256，128)个时钟周期。对于礼物，我们显示4 (resp。8，10)扫描触发器对应于320(分别为。192，128)个时钟周期。最后，为了提供两个世界的最佳(即电路面积和延迟)，我们将扫描触发器的选择推得更远，以完全消除置换层引起的延迟，而不影响我们严格的GE预算。我们表明，不仅12个扫描触发器足以在64个时钟周期内执行当前的置换，而且相同的扫描触发器可以容易地用于组合的加密解密电路中。我们最终设计的礼物和礼物在延迟和电路尺寸方面都打破了Jean等人和Banik等人的记录。我们相信，在我们的工作中提出的技术也可以用于为未来基于SPN的设计选择位滑动友好的线性层置换。
papers.title_zh: 交换和旋转:基于SPN的块密码的轻量级线性层

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of Forkciphers
papers.authors: Augustin Bariant, Nicolas David, Gaëtan Leurent
papers.abstract: The forkcipher framework was designed in 2018 by Andreeva et al. for authenticated encryption of short messages. Two dedicated ciphers were proposed in this framework: ForkAES based on the AES (and its tweakable variant Kiasu-BC), and ForkSkinny based on Skinny. The main motivation is that the forked ciphers should keep the same security as the underlying ciphers, but offer better performances thanks to the larger output. Recent cryptanalysis results at ACNS ’19 have shown that ForkAES actually offers a reduced security margin compared to the AES with an 8-round attack, and this was taken into account in the design of ForkSkinny.In this paper, we present new cryptanalysis results on forkciphers. First we improve the previous attack on ForkAES in order to attack the full 10 rounds. This is the first attack challenging the security of full ForkAES. Then we present the first analysis of ForkSkinny, showing that the best attacks on Skinny can be extended to one round for most ForkSkinny variants, and up to three rounds for ForkSkinny-128-256. This allows to evaluate the security degradation between ForkSkinny and the underlying block cipher.Our analysis shows that all components of a forkcipher must be carefully designed: the attack against ForkAES uses the weak diffusion of the middle rounds in reconstruction queries (going from one ciphertext to the other), but the attack against ForkSkinny uses a weakness of the tweakey schedule in encryption queries (when one branch of the tweakey schedule is skipped).
papers.abstract_zh: forkcipher框架由Andreeva等人于2018年设计，用于短信的认证加密。在这个框架中提出了两个专用密码:基于AES的ForkAES(及其可调整的变体Kiasu-BC)和基于Skinny的ForkSkinny。主要动机是分叉密码应该保持与底层密码相同的安全性，但由于更大的输出而提供更好的性能。最近在ACNS 19上的密码分析结果表明，与具有8轮攻击的AES相比，ForkAES实际上提供了降低的安全裕度，这在ForkSkinny的设计中已经考虑到了。在本文中，我们给出了关于fork密码的新的密码分析结果。首先，我们改进了之前对福卡斯的攻击，以便攻击完整的10轮。这是第一次挑战full ForkAES安全性的攻击。然后我们提出了对ForkSkinny的第一次分析，表明对Skinny的最佳攻击对于大多数ForkSkinny变体可以扩展到一轮，对于ForkSkinny-128-256可以扩展到三轮。这允许评估ForkSkinny和底层分组密码之间的安全性降级。我们的分析表明，必须仔细设计forkcipher的所有组件:针对ForkAES的攻击使用重建查询中中间轮的弱扩散(从一个密文到另一个密文)，但针对ForkSkinny的攻击使用加密查询中tweakey调度的弱点(当tweakey调度的一个分支被跳过时)。
papers.title_zh: Forkciphers的密码分析

papers.title: Spectral analysis of ZUC-256
papers.authors: Jing Yang, Thomas Johansson, Alexander Maximov
papers.abstract: In this paper we develop a number of generic techniques and algorithms in spectral analysis of large linear approximations for use in cryptanalysis. We apply the developed tools for cryptanalysis of ZUC-256 and give a distinguishing attack with complexity around 2236. Although the attack is only 220 times faster than exhaustive key search, the result indicates that ZUC-256 does not provide a source with full 256-bit entropy in the generated keystream, which would be expected from a 256-bit key. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first known academic attack on full ZUC-256 with a computational complexity that is below exhaustive key search.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇论文中，我们发展了许多用于密码分析的大线性近似谱分析的通用技术和算法。我们应用已开发的工具对ZUC-256进行了密码分析，并给出了一个复杂度约为2236的区别攻击。虽然这种攻击只比穷举密钥搜索快220倍，但结果表明ZUC-256在生成的密钥流中不提供具有256位熵的源，而这是256位密钥所期望的。据我们所知，这是第一个已知的对全ZUC-256的学术攻击，其计算复杂度低于穷举密钥搜索。
papers.title_zh: ZUC-256的光谱分析

papers.title: Algebraic and Higher-Order Differential Cryptanalysis of Pyjamask-96
papers.authors: Christoph Dobraunig, Yann Rotella, Jan Schoone
papers.abstract: Cryptographic competitions, like the ongoing NIST call for lightweight cryptography, always provide a thriving research environment, where new interesting ideas are proposed and new cryptographic insights are made. One proposal for this NIST call that is accepted for the second round is Pyjamask. Pyjamask is an authenticated encryption scheme that builds upon two block ciphers, Pyjamask-96 and Pyjamask-128, that aim to minimize the number of AND operations at the cost of a very strong linear layer. A side-effect of this goal is a slow growth in the algebraic degree. In this paper, we focus on the block cipher Pyjamask-96 and are able to provide a theoretical key-recovery attack reaching 14 (out of 14) rounds as well as a practical attack on 8 rounds. We do this by combining higher-order differentials with an in-depth analysis of the system of equations gotten for 2.5 rounds of Pyjamask-96. The AEAD-scheme Pyjamask itself is not threatened by the work in this paper.
papers.abstract_zh: 密码竞赛，如正在进行的NIST轻量级密码呼吁，总是提供一个蓬勃发展的研究环境，在这里提出新的有趣的想法，并提出新的密码见解。第二轮被接受的NIST呼叫的一个提议是Pyjamask。Pyjamask是一种基于两种分组密码Pyjamask-96和Pyjamask-128的认证加密方案，旨在以非常强大的线性层为代价，最大限度地减少and运算的数量。这个目标的副作用是代数次数的缓慢增长。在本文中，我们主要研究分组密码Pyjamask-96，它能够提供一个理论上达到14轮的密钥恢复攻击和一个实际上达到8轮的攻击。我们通过将高阶微分与对2.5轮Pyjamask-96得到的方程组的深入分析相结合来做到这一点。AEAD-scheme Pyjamask本身并没有受到本文工作的威胁。
papers.title_zh: Pyjamask-96的代数和高阶差分密码分析

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of the Legendre PRF and Generalizations
papers.authors: Ward Beullens, Tim Beyne, Aleksei Udovenko, Giuseppe Vitto
papers.abstract: The Legendre PRF relies on the conjectured pseudorandomness properties of the Legendre symbol with a hidden shift. Originally proposed as a PRG by Damgård at CRYPTO 1988, it was recently suggested as an efficient PRF for multiparty computation purposes by Grassi et al. at CCS 2016. Moreover, the Legendre PRF is being considered for usage in the Ethereum 2.0 blockchain.This paper improves previous attacks on the Legendre PRF and its higher-degree variant due to Khovratovich by reducing the time complexity from O(< (p log p/M) to O(p log2 p/M2) Legendre symbol evaluations when M ≤ 4√ p log2 p queries are available. The practical relevance of our improved attack is demonstrated by breaking three concrete instances of the PRF proposed by the Ethereum foundation. Furthermore, we generalize our attack in a nontrivial way to the higher-degree variant of the Legendre PRF and we point out a large class of weak keys for this construction. Lastly, we provide the first security analysis of two additional generalizations of the Legendre PRF originally proposed by Damgård in the PRG setting, namely the Jacobi PRF and the power residue PRF.
papers.abstract_zh: 勒让德PRF依赖于推测的具有隐藏移位的勒让德符号的伪随机性。最初由Damgå rd在CRYPTO 1988上提出作为PRG，最近由Grassi等人在CCS 2016上提出作为用于多方计算目的的有效PRF。此外，勒让德PRF正在考虑用于以太坊2.0区块链。当M ≤ 4√ p log2 p查询可用时，通过将时间复杂度从O(<(p log2p/M)降低到O(p log2 p/M2) Legendre符号评估，改进了先前由Khovratovich提出的对Legendre PRF及其更高阶变体的攻击。我们改进的攻击的实际相关性通过破坏以太坊基金会提出的PRF的三个具体实例来展示。此外，我们以一种非平凡的方式将我们的攻击推广到Legendre PRF的高阶变体，并且我们指出了这种构造的一大类弱密钥。最后，我们提供了最初由Damgå rd在PRG环境中提出的Legendre PRF的另外两个推广的第一个安全性分析，即Jacobi PRF和幂剩余PRF。
papers.title_zh: Legendre PRF及其推广的密码学分析

papers.title: On the Feistel Counterpart of the Boomerang Connectivity Table Introduction and Analysis of the FBCT
papers.authors: Hamid Boukerrou, Paul Huynh, Virginie Lallemand, Bimal Mandal, Marine Minier
papers.abstract: At Eurocrypt 2018, Cid et al. introduced the Boomerang Connectivity Table (BCT), a tool to compute the probability of the middle round of a boomerang distinguisher from the description of the cipher’s Sbox(es). Their new table and the following works led to a refined understanding of boomerangs, and resulted in a series of improved attacks. Still, these works only addressed the case of Substitution Permutation Networks, and completely left out the case of ciphers following a Feistel construction. In this article, we address this lack by introducing the FBCT, the Feistel counterpart of the BCT. We show that the coefficient at row Δi, ∇o corresponds to the number of times the second order derivative at points Δi, ∇o) cancels out. We explore the properties of the FBCT and compare it to what is known on the BCT. Taking matters further, we show how to compute the probability of a boomerang switch over multiple rounds with a generic formula.
papers.abstract_zh: 在Eurocrypt 2018上，Cid等人推出了回飞棒连接表(BCT)，这是一种根据密码Sbox的描述来计算回飞棒中间一轮的概率的工具。他们的新表格和接下来的工作导致了对回旋镖的更精确的理解，并导致了一系列改进的攻击。尽管如此，这些工作只解决了替换置换网络的情况，而完全忽略了遵循Feistel构造的密码的情况。在本文中，我们通过介绍FBCT，BCT的Feistel副本来解决这一不足。我们表明，行δI，∇o处的系数对应于点δI，∇o处的二阶导数抵消的次数。我们探索了FBCT的特性，并将其与BCT上已知的特性进行了比较。更进一步，我们展示了如何用一个通用公式来计算多轮回旋镖切换的概率。
papers.title_zh: 关于飞去来器连通性表的Feistel对应物FBCT的介绍与分析

papers.title: Links between Division Property and Other Cube Attack Variants
papers.authors: Yonglin Hao, Lin Jiao, Chaoyun Li, Willi Meier, Yosuke Todo, Qingju Wang
papers.abstract: A theoretically reliable key-recovery attack should evaluate not only the non-randomness for the correct key guess but also the randomness for the wrong ones as well. The former has always been the main focus but the absence of the latter can also cause self-contradicted results. In fact, the theoretic discussion of wrong key guesses is overlooked in quite some existing key-recovery attacks, especially the previous cube attack variants based on pure experiments. In this paper, we draw links between the division property and several variants of the cube attack. In addition to the zero-sum property, we further prove that the bias phenomenon, the non-randomness widely utilized in dynamic cube attacks and cube testers, can also be reflected by the division property. Based on such links, we are able to provide several results: Firstly, we give a dynamic cube key-recovery attack on full Grain-128. Compared with Dinur et al.’s original one, this attack is supported by a theoretical analysis of the bias based on a more elaborate assumption. Our attack can recover 3 key bits with a complexity 297.86 and evaluated success probability 99.83%. Thus, the overall complexity for recovering full 128 key bits is 2125. Secondly, now that the bias phenomenon can be efficiently and elaborately evaluated, we further derive new secure bounds for Grain-like primitives (namely Grain-128, Grain-128a, Grain-V1, Plantlet) against both the zero-sum and bias cube testers. Our secure bounds indicate that 256 initialization rounds are not able to guarantee Grain-128 to resist bias-based cube testers. This is an efficient tool for newly designed stream ciphers for determining the number of initialization rounds. Thirdly, we improve Wang et al.’s relaxed term enumeration technique proposed in CRYPTO 2018 and extend their results on Kreyvium and ACORN by 1 and 13 rounds (reaching 892 and 763 rounds) with complexities 2121.19 and 2125.54 respectively. To our knowledge, our results are the current best key-recovery attacks on these two primitives.
papers.abstract_zh: 理论上可靠的密钥恢复攻击不仅应该评估正确密钥猜测的非随机性，还应该评估错误密钥猜测的随机性。前者一直是关注的焦点，但后者的缺失也会导致自相矛盾的结果。事实上，在一些现有的密钥恢复攻击中，尤其是以前基于纯实验的立方体攻击变体中，忽略了对错误密钥猜测的理论讨论。在本文中，我们将除法性质与立方体攻击的几种变体联系起来。除了零和性质之外，我们进一步证明了在动态立方体攻击和立方体测试器中广泛使用的偏倚现象，即非随机性，也可以通过除法性质来反映。基于这样的联系，我们能够提供几个结果:首先，我们给出了一个对全粒度-128的动态立方体密钥恢复攻击。与Dinur等人最初的攻击相比，这种攻击得到了基于更精细假设的偏差理论分析的支持。我们的攻击可以恢复3个密钥位，复杂度为297.86，估计成功概率为99.83%。因此，恢复全部128个密钥位的总复杂度是2125。其次，既然偏差现象可以被有效且精细地评估，我们进一步针对零和及偏差立方体测试器推导出新的类晶粒基元(即晶粒-128、晶粒-128a、晶粒-V1、小植株)的安全界限。我们的安全界限表明256轮初始化不能保证Grain-128抵抗基于偏差的立方体测试器。对于新设计的流密码来说，这是一个确定初始化轮数的有效工具。第三，我们改进了王等人在CRYPTO 2018中提出的宽松项枚举技术，并将他们在Kreyvium和ACORN上的结果分别扩展了1轮和13轮(达到892轮和763轮)，复杂度分别为2121.19和2125.54。据我们所知，我们的结果是目前最好的密钥恢复攻击这两个原语。
papers.title_zh: Division属性和其他多维数据集攻击变体之间的链接

papers.title: Finding Bit-Based Division Property for Ciphers with Complex Linear Layers
papers.authors: Kai Hu, Qingju Wang, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: The bit-based division property (BDP) is the most effective technique for finding integral characteristics of symmetric ciphers. Recently, automatic search tools have become one of the most popular approaches to evaluating the security of designs against many attacks. Constraint-aided automatic tools for the BDP have been applied to many ciphers with simple linear layers like bit-permutation. Constructing models of complex linear layers accurately and efficiently remains hard. A straightforward method proposed by Sun et al. (called the S method), decomposes a complex linear layer into basic operations like COPY and XOR, then models them one by one. However, this method can easily insert invalid division trails into the solution pool, which results in a quicker loss of the balanced property than the cipher itself would. In order to solve this problem, Zhang and Rijmen propose the ZR method to link every valid trail with an invertible sub-matrix of the matrix corresponding to the linear layer, and then generate linear inequalities to represent all the invertible sub-matrices. Unfortunately, the ZR method is only applicable to invertible binary matrices (defined in Definition 3).To avoid generating a huge number of inequalities for all the sub-matrices, we build a new model that only includes that the sub-matrix corresponding to a valid trail should be invertible. The computing scale of our model can be tackled by most of SMT/SAT solvers, which makes our method practical. For applications, we improve the previous BDP for LED and MISTY1. We also give the 7-round BDP results for Camellia with FL/FL−1, which is the longest to date.Furthermore, we remove the restriction of the ZR method that the matrix has to be invertible, which provides more choices for future designs. Thanks to this, we also reproduce 5-round key-dependent integral distinguishers proposed at Crypto 2016 which cannot be obtained by either the S or ZR methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于比特的除法性质(BDP)是发现对称密码的整数特征的最有效的技术。最近，自动搜索工具已经成为评估设计对许多攻击的安全性的最流行的方法之一。用于BDP的约束辅助自动工具已经应用于许多具有简单线性层的密码，如比特置换。准确有效地构建复杂线性图层的模型仍然很困难。Sun等人提出了一种简单的方法(称为S方法)，将复杂的线性层分解为复制和异或等基本操作，然后逐一建模。然而，这种方法可以容易地将无效的分割轨迹插入到解池中，这导致比密码本身更快地失去平衡属性。为了解决这个问题，张和Rijmen提出了ZR方法，将每个有效迹与线性层对应的矩阵的一个可逆子矩阵联系起来，然后生成线性不等式来表示所有的可逆子矩阵。遗憾的是，ZR方法只适用于可逆二元矩阵(定义3中定义)。为了避免对所有子矩阵产生大量的不等式，我们建立了一个新的模型，该模型只包括对应于有效轨迹的子矩阵应该是可逆的。我们模型的计算规模可以被大多数SMT/SAT求解器处理，这使得我们的方法具有实用性。对于应用，我们针对LED和MISTY1改进了之前的BDP。我们还给出了具有FL/FL-1的山茶花的7轮BDP结果，这是迄今为止最长的结果。此外，我们还取消了ZR方法中矩阵必须可逆的限制，为以后的设计提供了更多的选择。由于这一点，我们还复制了在Crypto 2016上提出的5轮密钥相关的整数区分符，这些区分符无法通过S或ZR方法获得。
papers.title_zh: 寻找具有复杂线性层的密码的基于比特的除法性质

papers.title: Improved Security Bounds for Generalized Feistel Networks
papers.authors: Yaobin Shen, Chun Guo, Lei Wang
papers.abstract: We revisit the security of various generalized Feistel networks. Concretely, for unbalanced, alternating, type-1, type-2, and type-3 Feistel networks built from random functions, we substantially improve the coupling analyzes of Hoang and Rogaway (CRYPTO 2010). For a tweakable blockcipher-based generalized Feistelnetwork proposed by Coron et al. (TCC 2010), we present a coupling analysis and for the first time show that with enough rounds, it achieves 2n-bit security, and this provides highly secure, double-length tweakable blockciphers.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们重温各种广义Feistel网络的安全性。具体而言，对于从随机函数构建的不平衡、交替、1型、2型和3型Feistel网络，我们显著改进了Hoang和Rogaway (CRYPTO 2010)的耦合分析。对于由Coron等人(TCC 2010)提出的基于可调分组密码的广义Feistelnetwork，我们提出了一种耦合分析，并首次表明，在足够的轮数下，它实现了2n位安全性，这提供了高度安全的双倍长度可调分组密码。
papers.title_zh: 广义Feistel网络的改进安全界

papers.title: Preface to Volume 2020, Special Issue on Designs for the NIST Lightweight Standardisation Process
papers.authors: Itai Dinur, Gaëtan Leurent
papers.title_zh: 第2020卷前言，NIST轻量级标准化过程设计特刊

papers.title: Dumbo, Jumbo, and Delirium: Parallel Authenticated Encryption for the Lightweight Circus
papers.authors: Tim Beyne, Yu Long Chen, Christoph Dobraunig, Bart Mennink
papers.abstract: With the trend to connect more and more devices to the Internet, authenticated encryption has become a major backbone in securing the communication, not only between these devices and servers, but also the direct communication among these devices. Most authenticated encryption algorithms used in practice are developed to perform well on modern high-end devices, but are not necessarily suited for usage on resource-constrained devices. We present a lightweight authenticated encryption scheme, called Elephant. Elephant retains the advantages of GCM such as parallelism, but is tailored to the needs of resource-constrained devices. The two smallest instances of Elephant, Dumbo and Jumbo, are based on the 160-bit and 176-bit Spongent permutation, respectively, and are particularly suited for hardware; the largest instance of Elephant, Delirium, is based on 200-bit Keccak and is developed towards software use. All three instances are parallelizable, have a small state size while achieving a high level of security, and are constant time by design.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着将越来越多的设备连接到互联网的趋势，认证加密已经成为保护通信的主要支柱，不仅在这些设备和服务器之间，而且在这些设备之间的直接通信。实践中使用的大多数认证加密算法被开发为在现代高端设备上运行良好，但是不一定适合在资源受限的设备上使用。我们提出了一个轻量级的认证加密方案，称为大象。Elephant保留了GCM的并行性等优点，但针对资源受限设备的需求进行了定制。Elephant的两个最小的实例Dumbo和Jumbo分别基于160位和176位Spongent排列，特别适合硬件；Elephant的最大实例Delirium基于200位Keccak，是面向软件使用开发的。所有这三个实例都是可并行化的，在实现高级别安全性的同时具有较小的状态大小，并且被设计为恒定时间。
papers.title_zh: Dumbo、Jumbo和Delirium:轻量级马戏团的并行认证加密

papers.title: Pyjamask: Block Cipher and Authenticated Encryption with Highly Efficient Masked Implementation
papers.authors: Dahmun Goudarzi, Jérémy Jean, Stefan Kölbl, Thomas Peyrin, Matthieu Rivain, Yu Sasaki, Siang Meng Sim
papers.abstract: This paper introduces Pyjamask, a new block cipher family and authenticated encryption proposal submitted to the NIST lightweight cryptography standardization process. Pyjamask targets side-channel resistance as one of its main goal. More precisely, it strongly minimizes the number of nonlinear gates used in its internal primitive in order to allow efficient masked implementations, especially for high-order masking in software. Compared to other block ciphers, our proposal has thus among the smallest number of binary AND computations per input bit at the time of writing. Even though Pyjamask minimizes such an important criterion, it remains rather lightweight and efficient, thanks to a general bitslice construction that enables to computation of all nonlinear gates in parallel. For authenticated encryption, we adopt the provably secure AEAD mode OCB which has been extensively studied and has the benefit to offer full parallelization. Of course, other block cipher-based modes can be considered as well if other performance profiles are to be targeted.The paper first gives the specification of the Pyjamask block cipher and the associated AEAD proposal. We also provide a detailed design rationale for the block cipher which is guided by our aim of software efficiency in the presence of high-order masking. The security of the design is analyzed against most commonly known cryptanalysis techniques. We finally describe efficient (masked) implementations in software and provide implementation results with aggressive performances for masking of very high orders (up to 128). We also provide a rough estimation of the hardware performances which remain much better than those of an AES round-based implementation.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文介绍了Pyjamask，这是一个新的分组密码家族，也是提交给NIST轻量级密码标准化进程的认证加密提案。Pyjamask将侧信道电阻作为其主要目标之一。更准确地说，它极大地减少了内部原语中使用的非线性门的数量，以便实现高效的掩蔽实现，特别是对于软件中的高阶掩蔽。与其他分组密码相比，我们的建议在编写时每个输入比特具有最小数量的二进制和计算。尽管Pyjamask最小化了这样一个重要的标准，但它仍然相当轻便和有效，这要归功于一个通用的位片结构，它能够并行计算所有的非线性门。对于认证加密，我们采用可证明安全的AEAD模式OCB，该模式已经过广泛研究，具有提供完全并行化的优势。当然，如果要以其他性能配置文件为目标，也可以考虑其他基于分组密码的模式。论文首先给出了Pyjamask分组密码的规范和相关的AEAD建议。我们还为分组密码提供了详细的设计原理，这是由我们在存在高阶掩蔽的情况下软件效率的目标所指导的。针对大多数公知的密码分析技术来分析该设计的安全性。最后，我们描述了软件中的高效(屏蔽)实现，并提供了对非常高阶(高达128)的屏蔽具有积极性能的实现结果。我们还提供了硬件性能的粗略估计，它仍然比基于AES循环的实现好得多。
papers.title_zh: Pyjamask:高效掩码实现的分组密码和认证加密

papers.title: Xoodyak, a lightweight cryptographic scheme
papers.authors: Joan Daemen, Seth Hoffert, Michaël Peeters, Gilles Van Assche, Ronny Van Keer
papers.abstract: In this paper, we present Xoodyak, a cryptographic primitive that can be used for hashing, encryption, MAC computation and authenticated encryption. Essentially, it is a duplex object extended with an interface that allows absorbing strings of arbitrary length, their encryption and squeezing output of arbitrary length. It inherently hashes the history of all operations in its state, allowing to derive its resistance against generic attacks from that of the full-state keyed duplex. Internally, it uses the Xoodoo[12] permutation that, with its width of 48 bytes, allows for very compact implementations. The choice of 12 rounds justifies a security claim in the hermetic philosophy: It implies that there are no shortcut attacks with higher success probability than generic attacks. The claimed security strength is 128 bits. We illustrate the versatility of Xoodyak by describing a number of use cases, including the ones requested by NIST in the lightweight competition. For those use cases, we translate the relatively detailed security claim that we make for Xoodyak into simple ones.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇文章中，我们提出了Xoodyak，一种可以用于散列、加密、MAC计算和认证加密的密码原语。本质上，它是一个双工对象，扩展了一个接口，该接口允许吸收任意长度的字符串，对它们进行加密，并压缩任意长度的输出。它固有地散列其状态中所有操作的历史，允许从全状态键控双工的抵抗中获得其对一般攻击的抵抗。在内部，它使用Xoodoo[12]置换，其48字节的宽度允许非常紧凑的实现。选择12轮证明了赫密斯哲学中的安全声明:它意味着没有比一般攻击更高成功概率的捷径攻击。声称的安全强度是128位。我们通过描述大量用例来说明Xoodyak的多功能性，包括NIST在轻量级比赛中要求的用例。对于这些用例，我们将Xoodyak的相对详细的安全声明转化为简单的声明。
papers.title_zh: Xoodyak，一种轻量级加密方案

papers.title: SKINNY-AEAD and SKINNY-Hash
papers.authors: Christof Beierle, Jérémy Jean, Stefan Kölbl, Gregor Leander, Amir Moradi, Thomas Peyrin, Yu Sasaki, Pascal Sasdrich, Siang Meng Sim
papers.abstract: We present the family of authenticated encryption schemes SKINNY-AEAD and the family of hashing schemes SKINNY-Hash. All of the schemes employ a member of the SKINNY family of tweakable block ciphers, which was presented at CRYPTO 2016, as the underlying primitive. In particular, for authenticated encryption, we show how to instantiate members of SKINNY in the Deoxys-I-like ΘCB3 framework to fulfill the submission requirements of the NIST lightweight cryptography standardization process. For hashing, we use SKINNY to build a function with larger internal state and employ it in a sponge construction. To highlight the extensive amount of third-party analysis that SKINNY obtained since its publication, we briefly survey the existing cryptanalysis results for SKINNY-128-256 and SKINNY-128-384 as of February 2020. In the last part of the paper, we provide a variety of ASIC implementations of our schemes and propose new simple SKINNY-AEAD and SKINNY-Hash variants with a reduced number of rounds while maintaining a very comfortable security margin.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了认证加密方案SKINNY-AEAD族和哈希方案SKINNY-Hash族。所有的方案都采用了SKINNY系列可调分组密码中的一员作为底层原语，该系列在CRYPTO 2016上展示过。特别地，对于认证加密，我们展示了如何在类代欧奇希斯CB3框架中实例化SKINNY的成员，以满足NIST轻量级加密标准化过程的提交要求。对于散列，我们使用SKINNY构建一个具有更大内部状态的函数，并在海绵结构中使用它。为了突出SKINNY自发表以来获得的大量第三方分析，我们简要调查了截至2020年2月SKINNY-128-256和SKINNY-128-384的现有密码分析结果。在论文的最后一部分，我们提供了我们的方案的各种ASIC实现，并提出了新的简单的SKINNY-AEAD和SKINNY-Hash变体，减少了循环次数，同时保持了非常舒适的安全裕度。
papers.title_zh: 瘦骨伶仃和瘦骨伶仃

papers.title: WAGE: An Authenticated Encryption with a Twist
papers.authors: Riham AlTawy, Guang Gong, Kalikinkar Mandal, Raghvendra Rohit
papers.abstract: This paper presents WAGE, a new lightweight sponge-based authenticated cipher whose underlying permutation is based on a 37-stage Galois NLFSR over F27. At its core, the round function of the permutation consists of the well-analyzed Welch-Gong permutation (WGP), primitive feedback polynomial, a newly designed 7-bit SB sbox and partial word-wise XORs. The construction of the permutation is carried out such that the design of individual components is highly coupled with cryptanalysis and hardware efficiency. As such, we analyze the security of WAGE against differential, linear, algebraic and meet/miss-in-the-middle attacks. For 128-bit authenticated encryption security, WAGE achieves a throughput of 535 Mbps with hardware area of 2540 GE in ASIC ST Micro 90 nm standard cell library. Additionally, WAGE is designed with a twist where its underlying permutation can be efficiently turned into a pseudorandom bit generator based on the WG transformation (WG-PRBG) whose output bits have theoretically proved randomness properties.
papers.abstract_zh: 提出了WAGE，一种新的轻量级海绵认证密码，其底层置换基于F27上的37级Galois NLFSR。在它的核心，置换的循环函数由分析良好的Welch-Gong置换(WGP)、原始反馈多项式、新设计的7位SB sbox和部分字方式xor组成。执行置换的构造，使得各个组件的设计与密码分析和硬件效率高度结合。因此，我们分析了WAGE对差分攻击、线性攻击、代数攻击和中间缺失攻击的安全性。对于128位认证加密安全，WAGE在ASIC ST Micro 90 nm标准单元库中以2540 GE的硬件面积实现了535 Mbps的吞吐量。此外，WAGE设计了一个扭曲，其底层排列可以有效地转换为基于WG变换(WG-PRBG)的伪随机位生成器，其输出位在理论上证明了随机性。
papers.title_zh: 工资:一种经过认证的加密技术

papers.title: Saturnin: a suite of lightweight symmetric algorithms for post-quantum security
papers.authors: Anne Canteaut, Sébastien Duval, Gaëtan Leurent, María Naya-Plasencia, Léo Perrin, Thomas Pornin, André Schrottenloher
papers.abstract: The cryptographic algorithms needed to ensure the security of our communications have a cost. For devices with little computing power, whose number is expected to grow significantly with the spread of the Internet of Things (IoT), this cost can be a problem. A simple answer to this problem is a compromise on the security level: through a weaker round function or a smaller number of rounds, the security level can be decreased in order to cheapen the implementation of the cipher. At the same time, quantum computers are expected to disrupt the state of the art in cryptography in the near future. For public-key cryptography, the NIST has organized a dedicated process to standardize new algorithms. The impact of quantum computing is harder to assess in the symmetric case but its study is an active research area. In this paper, we specify a new block cipher, Saturnin, and its usage in different modes to provide hashing and authenticated encryption in such a way that we can rigorously argue its security in the post-quantum setting. Its security analysis follows naturally from that of the AES, while our use of components that are easily implemented in a bitsliced fashion ensures a low cost for our primitives. Our aim is to provide a new lightweight suite of algorithms that performs well on small devices, in particular micro-controllers, while providing a high security level even in the presence of quantum computers. Saturnin is a 256-bit block cipher with a 256-bit key and an additional 9-bit parameter for domain separation. Using it, we built two authenticated ciphers and a hash function. • Saturnin-CTR-Cascade is an authenticated cipher using the counter mode and a separate MAC. It requires two passes over the data but its implementation does not require the inverse block cipher. • Saturnin-Short is an authenticated cipher intended for messages with a length strictly smaller than 128 bits which uses only one call to Saturnin to provide confidentiality and integrity. • Saturnin-Hash is a 256-bit hash function. In this paper, we specify this suite of algorithms and argue about their security in both the classical and the post-quantum setting.
papers.abstract_zh: 确保通信安全所需的加密算法是有成本的。对于计算能力很低的设备，其数量预计将随着物联网(IoT)的普及而显著增长，这种成本可能是一个问题。对这个问题的简单回答是在安全级别上的折衷:通过更弱的轮函数或更少的轮数，可以降低安全级别，以便降低密码实现的成本。与此同时，量子计算机有望在不久的将来颠覆密码学的发展水平。对于公钥加密，NIST组织了一个专门的过程来标准化新的算法。量子计算的影响在对称情况下更难评估，但它的研究是一个活跃的研究领域。在本文中，我们指定了一个新的分组密码Saturnin，以及它在不同模式下的使用，以提供哈希和认证加密，这样我们就可以严格地论证它在后量子环境下的安全性。它的安全分析自然地遵循AES的安全分析，而我们使用以位片方式容易实现的组件确保了我们原语的低成本。我们的目标是提供一套新的轻量级算法，在小型设备上运行良好，特别是微控制器，同时即使在量子计算机存在的情况下也能提供高安全级别。Saturnin是一种256位分组密码，具有256位密钥和用于域分隔的附加9位参数。利用它，我们建立了两个认证密码和一个散列函数。Saturnin-CTR-Cascade是一种使用计数器模式和独立MAC的认证密码。它需要对数据进行两次传递，但是它的实现不需要逆分组密码。Saturnin-Short是一种经过验证的密码，用于长度严格小于128位的消息，只需调用一次Saturnin即可提供机密性和完整性。Saturnin-Hash是一个256位哈希函数。在本文中，我们详细说明了这套算法，并讨论了它们在经典和后量子环境下的安全性。
papers.title_zh: Saturnin:一套用于后量子安全的轻量级对称算法

papers.title: Lightweight AEAD and Hashing using the Sparkle Permutation Family
papers.authors: Christof Beierle, Alex Biryukov, Luan Cardoso dos Santos, Johann Großschädl, Léo Perrin, Aleksei Udovenko, Vesselin Velichkov, Qingju Wang
papers.abstract: We introduce the Sparkle family of permutations operating on 256, 384 and 512 bits. These are combined with the Beetle mode to construct a family of authenticated ciphers, Schwaemm, with security levels ranging from 120 to 250 bits. We also use them to build new sponge-based hash functions, Esch256 and Esch384. Our permutations are among those with the lowest footprint in software, without sacrificing throughput. These properties are allowed by our use of an ARX component (the Alzette S-box) as well as a carefully chosen number of rounds. The corresponding analysis is enabled by the long trail strategy which gives us the tools we need to efficiently bound the probability of all the differential and linear trails for an arbitrary number of rounds. We also present a new application of this approach where the only trails considered are those mapping the rate to the outer part of the internal state, such trails being the only relevant trails for instance in a differential collision attack. To further decrease the number of rounds without compromising security, we modify the message injection in the classical sponge construction to break the alignment between the rate and our S-box layer.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们推出了Sparkle系列排列，适用于256、384和512位。这些与甲壳虫模式相结合，构成了一个认证密码家族Schwaemm，其安全级别从120位到250位不等。我们还使用它们来构建新的基于海绵的散列函数Esch256和Esch384。我们的排列是在软件中占用空间最小的排列之一，而且不会牺牲吞吐量。这些特性是通过我们使用ARX组件(Alzette S盒)以及精心选择的回合数来实现的。相应的分析是由长轨迹策略实现的，该策略为我们提供了所需的工具，以有效地限制任意轮次的所有微分和线性轨迹的概率。我们还提出了这种方法的新应用，其中考虑的唯一踪迹是那些将速率映射到内部状态的外部的踪迹，这种踪迹是唯一相关的踪迹，例如在差分碰撞攻击中。为了在不损害安全性的情况下进一步减少循环次数，我们修改了传统海绵结构中的消息注入，以打破rate和我们的S-box层之间的对齐。
papers.title_zh: 使用Sparkle Permutation系列的轻量级AEAD和散列

papers.title: The Subterranean 2.0 Cipher Suite
papers.authors: Joan Daemen, Pedro Maat Costa Massolino, Alireza Mehrdad, Yann Rotella
papers.abstract: This paper presents the Subterranean 2.0 cipher suite that can be used for hashing, MAC computation, stream encryption and several types of authenticated encryption schemes. At its core it has a duplex object with a 257-bit state and a lightweight single-round permutation. This makes Subterranean 2.0 very well suited for low-area and low-energy implementations in dedicated hardware.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文介绍了地下2.0密码套件，该套件可用于哈希、MAC计算、流加密和几种类型的认证加密方案。它的核心是一个257位状态的双工对象和一个轻量级的单轮置换。这使得suburban 2.0非常适合在专用硬件中实现低面积和低能耗。
papers.title_zh: 地下2.0密码套件

papers.title: Spook: Sponge-Based Leakage-Resistant Authenticated Encryption with a Masked Tweakable Block Cipher
papers.authors: Davide Bellizia, Francesco Berti, Olivier Bronchain, Gaëtan Cassiers, Sébastien Duval, Chun Guo, Gregor Leander, Gaëtan Leurent, Itamar Levi, Charles Momin, Olivier Pereira, Thomas Peters, François-Xavier Standaert, Balazs Udvarhelyi, Friedrich Wiemer
papers.abstract: This paper defines Spook: a sponge-based authenticated encryption with associated data algorithm. It is primarily designed to provide security against side-channel attacks at a low energy cost. For this purpose, Spook is mixing a leakageresistant mode of operation with bitslice ciphers enabling efficient and low latency implementations. The leakage-resistant mode of operation leverages a re-keying function to prevent differential side-channel analysis, a duplex sponge construction to efficiently process the data, and a tag verification based on a Tweakable Block Cipher (TBC) providing strong data integrity guarantees in the presence of leakages. The underlying bitslice ciphers are optimized for the masking countermeasures against side-channel attacks. Spook is an efficient single-pass algorithm. It ensures state-of-the-art black box security with several prominent features: (i) nonce misuse-resilience, (ii) beyond-birthday security with respect to the TBC block size, and (iii) multiuser security at minimum cost with a public tweak. Besides the specifications and design rationale, we provide first software and hardware implementation results of (unprotected) Spook which confirm the limited overheads that the use of two primitives sharing internal components imply. We also show that the integrity of Spook with leakage, so far analyzed with unbounded leakages for the duplex sponge and a strongly protected TBC modeled as leak-free, can be proven with a much weaker unpredictability assumption for the TBC. We finally discuss external cryptanalysis results and tweaks to improve both the security margins and efficiency of Spook.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文定义了Spook:一种基于海绵的认证加密和相关数据算法。它主要设计用于以较低的能量成本提供对抗侧信道攻击的安全性。为此，斯布克将防泄漏操作模式与位片密码相结合，实现了高效、低延迟的实施。抗泄漏操作模式利用重新加密功能来防止差分侧信道分析，利用双工海绵结构来高效处理数据，并利用基于可调分组密码(TBC)的标签验证来在出现泄漏时提供强大的数据完整性保证。底层位片密码针对针对旁路攻击的掩蔽对策进行了优化。Spook是一种高效的单遍算法。它以几个突出的特征确保了最先进的黑盒安全性:(i) nonce误用弹性，(ii)关于TBC块大小的生日后安全性，以及(iii)具有公共调整的最小成本的多用户安全性。除了规范和设计原理之外，我们还提供了(未受保护的)Spook的第一批软件和硬件实现结果，这些结果证实了使用两个共享内部组件的原语所隐含的有限开销。我们还表明，到目前为止，对于双层海绵和被模拟为无泄漏的强保护TBC的无界泄漏进行分析，可以用TBC的弱得多的不可预测性假设来证明有泄漏的Spook的完整性。我们最后讨论了外部密码分析的结果和调整，以提高安全边际和效率的斯布克。
papers.title_zh: Spook:基于海绵的防泄漏认证加密，带屏蔽的可调分组密码

papers.title: ESTATE: A Lightweight and Low Energy Authenticated Encryption Mode
papers.authors: Avik Chakraborti, Nilanjan Datta, Ashwin Jha, Cuauhtemoc Mancillas-López, Mridul Nandi, Yu Sasaki
papers.abstract: NIST has recently initiated a standardization project for efficient lightweight authenticated encryption schemes. SUNDAE, a candidate in this project, achieves optimal state size which results in low circuit overhead on top of the underlying block cipher. In addition, SUNDAE provides security in nonce-misuse scenario as well. However, in addition to the block cipher circuit, SUNDAE also requires some additional circuitry for multiplication by a primitive element. Further, it requires an additional block cipher invocation to create the starting state. In this paper, we propose a new lightweight and low energy authenticated encryption family, called ESTATE, that significantly improves the design of SUNDAE in terms of implementation costs (both hardware area and energy) and efficient processing of short messages. In particular, ESTATE does not require an additional multiplication circuit, and it reduces the number of block cipher calls by one. Moreover, it provides integrity security even under the release of unverified plaintext (or RUP) model. ESTATE is based on short-tweak tweakable block ciphers (or tBC, small ’t’ denotes short tweaks) and we instantiate it with two recently designed tBCs: TweAES and TweGIFT. We also propose a low latency variant of ESTATE, called sESTATE, that uses a round-reduced (6 rounds) variant of TweAES called TweAES-6. We provide comprehensive FPGA based hardware implementation for all the three instances. The implementation results depict that ESTATE_TweGIFT-128 (681 LUTs, 263 slices) consumes much lesser area as compared to SUNDAE_GIFT-128 (931 LUTs, 310 slices). When we moved to the AES variants, along with the area-efficiency (ESTATE_TweAES consumes 1901 LUTs, 602 slices while SUNDAE_AES-128 needs 1922 LUTs, 614 slices), we also achieve higher throughput for short messages (For 16-byte message, a throughput of 1251.10 and 945.36 Mbps for ESTATE_TweAES and SUNDAE_AES-128 respectively).
papers.abstract_zh: NIST最近启动了一个高效轻量级认证加密方案的标准化项目。SUNDAE是该项目的候选，它实现了最佳的状态大小，从而在底层分组密码的基础上降低了电路开销。此外，在nonce-误用场景中，SUNDAE也提供了安全性。然而，除了分组密码电路之外，SUNDAE还需要一些额外的电路来与原始元素相乘。此外，它需要额外的块密码调用来创建起始状态。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的轻量级和低能耗的认证加密系列，称为ESTATE，它在实现成本(硬件面积和能源)和有效处理短消息方面显著改进了SUNDAE的设计。特别地，ESTATE不需要额外的乘法电路，并且它将分组密码调用的次数减少了一次。此外，即使在未经验证的明文(或RUP)模型下，它也能提供完整性安全性。ESTATE基于短调整可调整分组密码(或tBC，小“t”表示短调整),我们用两个最近设计的tBC实例化它:TweAES和TweGIFT。我们还提出了一个低延迟的ESTATE变体，称为sESTATE，它使用了一个轮数减少(6轮)的TweAES变体，称为TweAES-6。我们为所有三种情况提供全面的基于FPGA的硬件实现。实现结果表明，ESTATE_TweGIFT-128 (681个lut，263个切片)与SUNDAE_GIFT-128 (931个lut，310个切片)相比，占用的面积要小得多。当我们转向AES变体时，除了面积效率(ESTATE_TweAES消耗1901个lut，602个片，而SUNDAE_AES-128需要1922个lut，614个片)，我们还实现了更高的短消息吞吐量(对于16字节消息，ESTATE_TweAES和SUNDAE_AES-128的吞吐量分别为1251.10和945.36 Mbps)。
papers.title_zh: ESTATE:一种轻量级低能耗认证加密模式

papers.title: Isap v2.0
papers.authors: Christoph Dobraunig, Maria Eichlseder, Stefan Mangard, Florian Mendel, Bart Mennink, Robert Primas, Thomas Unterluggauer
papers.abstract:
We specify Isap v2.0, a lightweight permutation-based authenticated encryption algorithm that is designed to ease protection against side-channel and fault attacks. This design is an improved version of the previously published Isap v1.0, and offers increased protection against implementation attacks as well as more efficient implementations. Isap v2.0 is a candidate in NIST’s LightWeight Cryptography (LWC) project, which aims to identify and standardize authenticated ciphers that are well-suited for applications in constrained environments. We provide a self-contained specification of the new Isap v2.0 mode and discuss its design rationale. We formally prove the security of the Isap v2.0 mode in the leakage-resilient setting. Finally, in an extensive implementation overview, we show that Isap v2.0 can be implemented securely with very low area requirements. 
https://isap.iaik.tugraz.at
papers.abstract_zh:
我们指定Isap v2.0，这是一种轻量级的基于置换的认证加密算法，旨在减轻对旁路和故障攻击的保护。这种设计是以前发布的Isap v1.0的改进版本，提供了对实现攻击的增强保护以及更有效的实现。Isap v2.0是NIST轻量级密码术(LWC)项目的候选，该项目旨在识别和标准化非常适合于受限环境中的应用的认证密码。我们提供了新的Isap v2.0模式的自包含规范，并讨论了其设计原理。我们正式证明了Isap v2.0模式在泄漏弹性设置下的安全性。最后，在广泛的实施概述中，我们展示了Isap v2.0可以以非常低的面积需求安全地实施。
https://isap.iaik.tugraz.at
papers.title_zh: 吸v2.0

papers.title: From Combined to Hybrid: Making Feedback-based AE even Smaller
papers.authors: Avik Chakraborti, Nilanjan Datta, Ashwin Jha, Snehal Mitragotri, Mridul Nandi
papers.abstract: In CHES 2017, Chakraborti et al. proposed COFB, a rate-1 sequential block cipher-based authenticated encryption (AE) with only 1.5n-bit state, where n denotes the block size. They used a novel approach, the so-called combined feedback, where each block cipher input has a combined effect of the previous block cipher output and the current plaintext block. In this paper, we first study the security of a general rate-1 feedback-based AE scheme in terms of its overall internal state size. For a large class of feedback functions, we show that the overlying AE scheme can be attacked in 2r queries if the internal state size is n + r bits for some r ≥ 0. This automatically shows that a birthday bound (i.e. 2n/2 queries) secure AE scheme must have at least 1.5n-bit state, whence COFB is almost-optimal (use 1.5n-bit state and provides security up to 2n/2/n queries). We propose a new feedback function, called the hybrid feedback or HyFB, which is a hybrid composition of plaintext and ciphertext feedbacks. HyFB has a key advantage of lower XOR counts over the combined feedback function. This essentially helps in reducing the hardware footprint. Based on HyFB we propose a new AE scheme, called HyENA, that achieves the state size, rate, and security of COFB. In addition, HyENA has significantly lower XOR counts as compared to COFB, whence it is expected to have a smaller implementation as compared to COFB.
papers.abstract_zh: 在CHES 2017中，Chakraborti等人提出了COFB，这是一种基于速率为1的序列分组密码的认证加密(AE)，只有1.5n位状态，其中n表示块大小。他们使用了一种新的方法，即所谓的组合反馈，其中每个分组密码输入都具有前一个分组密码输出和当前明文块的组合效果。在这篇文章中，我们首先研究了一般的基于速率1反馈的AE方案的安全性。对于一大类反馈函数，我们证明了对于某些r ≥ 0，如果内部状态大小为n + r比特，覆盖AE方案在2r查询中可以被攻击。这自动表明生日界限(即2n/2个查询)安全AE方案必须具有至少1.5n位状态，由此COFB几乎是最佳的(使用1.5n位状态并提供高达2n/2/n个查询的安全性)。我们提出了一种新的反馈函数，称为混合反馈或HyFB，它是明文和密文反馈的混合组合。与组合反馈功能相比，HyFB具有XOR计数更低的关键优势。这在本质上有助于减少硬件占用空间。基于HyFB，我们提出了一种新的AE方案，称为HyENA，它实现了COFB的状态大小、速率和安全性。此外，与COFB相比，HyENA的XOR计数明显较低，因此与COFB相比，它的实现规模较小。
papers.title_zh: 从组合到混合:让基于反馈的AE更小

papers.title: On the Composition of Single-Keyed Tweakable Even-Mansour for Achieving BBB Security
papers.authors: Avik Chakraborti, Mridul Nandi, Suprita Talnikar, Kan Yasuda
papers.abstract: Observing the growing popularity of random permutation (RP)-based designs (e.g, Sponge), Bart Mennink in CRYPTO 2019 has initiated an interesting research in the direction of RP-based pseudorandom functions (PRFs). Both are claimed to achieve beyond-the-birthday-bound (BBB) security of 2n/3 bits (n being the input block size in bits) but require two instances of RPs and can handle only oneblock inputs. In this work, we extend research in this direction by providing two new BBB-secure constructions by composing the tweakable Even-Mansour appropriately. Our first construction requires only one instance of an RP and requires only one key. Our second construction extends the first to a nonce-based Message Authentication Code (MAC) using a universal hash to deal with multi-block inputs. We show that the hash key can be derived from the original key when the underlying hash is the Poly hash. We provide matching attacks for both constructions to demonstrate the tightness of the proven security bounds.
papers.abstract_zh: 观察到基于随机排列(RP)的设计(如海绵)越来越受欢迎，Bart Mennink在CRYPTO 2019中发起了一项基于RP的伪随机函数(PRFs)方向的有趣研究。两者都声称实现了2n/3位(n是以位为单位的输入模块大小)的超越生日界限(BBB)安全性，但需要两个RPs实例，并且只能处理一个模块输入。在这篇文章中，我们通过适当地组合可调整的Even-Mansour来提供两个新的BBB-secure构造，从而扩展了这个方向的研究。我们的第一个构造只需要一个RP实例，并且只需要一个键。我们的第二个构造将第一个构造扩展为基于随机数的消息认证码(MAC ),使用通用散列来处理多块输入。我们证明了当底层散列是Poly散列时，散列密钥可以从原始密钥导出。我们为这两种构造提供了匹配的攻击，以证明安全界限的紧密性。
papers.title_zh: 实现BBB安全的单键可调偶数曼苏尔的合成

papers.title: Key Assignment Schemes with Authenticated Encryption, revisited
papers.authors: Jeroen Pijnenburg, Bertram Poettering
papers.abstract: A popular cryptographic option to implement Hierarchical Access Control in organizations is to combine a key assignment scheme with a symmetric encryption scheme. In brief, key assignment associates with each object in the hierarchy a unique symmetric key, and provides all higher-ranked “authorized” subjects with a method to recover it. This setup allows for encrypting the payloads associated with the objects so that they can be accessed by the authorized and remain inaccessible for the unauthorized. Both key assignment and symmetric encryption have been researched for roughly four decades now, and a plethora of efficient constructions have been the result. Surprisingly, a treatment of the joint primitive (key assignment combined with encryption, as used in practice) in the framework of provable security was conducted only very recently, leading to a publication in ToSC 2018(4). We first carefully revisit this publication. We then argue that there are actually two standard use cases for the combined primitive, which also require individual treatment. We correspondingly propose a fresh set of security models and provably secure constructions for each of them. Perhaps surprisingly, the two constructions call for different symmetric encryption primitives: While standard AEAD is the right tool for the one, we identify a less common tool called Encryptment as best fitting the other.
papers.abstract_zh: 在组织中实现分级访问控制的一个流行的加密选项是将密钥分配方案与对称加密方案相结合。简而言之，密钥分配将层次结构中的每个对象与唯一的对称密钥相关联，并为所有更高级别的“授权”主体提供恢复它的方法。这种设置允许对与对象相关联的有效载荷进行加密，使得它们可以被授权的人访问，并且对于未授权的人保持不可访问。密钥分配和对称加密已经被研究了大约四十年，并且产生了大量有效的构造。令人惊讶的是，在可证明安全性的框架中对联合原语(结合加密的密钥分配，如在实践中使用的)的处理仅在最近才进行，导致在ToSC 2018(4)中发表。我们首先仔细重温这份出版物。然后，我们认为组合原语实际上有两个标准用例，它们也需要单独处理。我们相应地提出了一组新的安全模型，并为每个模型给出了可证明的安全结构。也许令人惊讶的是，这两种构造需要不同的对称加密原语:虽然标准AEAD是一种合适的工具，但我们认为一种不太常用的工具encryption最适合另一种。
papers.title_zh: 带认证加密的密钥分配方案，再探

papers.title: Beyond-Birthday-Bound Secure Cryptographic Permutations from Ideal Ciphers with Long Keys
papers.authors: Ryota Nakamichi, Tetsu Iwata
papers.abstract: Coron et al. showed a construction of a 3-round 2n-bit cryptographic permutation from three independent n-bit ideal ciphers with n-bit keys (TCC 2010). Guo and Lin showed a construction of a (2d − 1)-round dn-bit cryptographic permutation from 2d − 1 independent n-bit ideal ciphers with kn-bit keys, where d = k + 1 (Cryptography and Communications, 2015). These constructions have an indifferentiability security bound of O(q2/2n) against adversaries that make at most q queries. The bound is commonly referred to as birthday-bound security. In this paper, we show that a 5-round version of Coron et al.’s construction and (2d+1)-round version of Guo and Lin’s construction yield a cryptographic permutation with an indifferentiability security bound of O(q2/22n), i.e., by adding two more rounds, these constructions have beyond-birthday-bound security. Furthermore, under the assumption that q ≤ 2n, we show that Guo and Lin’s construction with 2d+2l−1 rounds yields a cryptographic permutation with a security bound of O(q2/2(l+1)n), where 1 ≤ l ≤ d − 1, i.e., the security bound exponentially improves by adding every two more rounds, up to 4d − 3 rounds. To the best of our knowledge, our result gives the first cryptographic permutation that is built from n-bit ideal ciphers and has a full n-bit indifferentiability security bound.
papers.abstract_zh: Coron等人展示了由三个独立的n位理想密码和n位密钥构成的3轮2n位密码置换的构造(TCC 2010)。郭和林展示了从具有kn位密钥的2d 1独立n位理想密码构造(2d 1)轮dn位密码置换，其中d = k+1(Cryptography and communication s，2015)。对于最多进行q次查询的对手，这些构造具有O(q2/2n)的不可微性安全界。这种绑定通常被称为生日绑定证券。在本文中，我们证明了Coron等人的5轮构造和郭和林的(2d+1)轮构造产生了一个不可微安全界为O(q2/22n)的密码置换，即通过增加两轮，这些构造具有超越生日界的安全性。此外，在假设q ≤ 2n的情况下，我们证明了郭和林的2d+2l-1轮构造产生了一个安全界为O(q2/2(l+1)n)的密码排列，其中1≤l≤D1，即通过每增加两轮，直到4d-3轮，安全界以指数方式提高。据我们所知，我们的结果给出了第一个密码置换，它是由n位理想密码构造的，并且具有完整的n位不可微安全界。
papers.title_zh: 基于长密钥理想密码的超生日安全密码置换

papers.title: On the Security of Sponge-type Authenticated Encryption Modes
papers.authors: Bishwajit Chakraborty, Ashwin Jha, Mridul Nandi
papers.abstract: The sponge duplex is a popular mode of operation for constructing authenticated encryption schemes. In fact, one can assess the popularity of this mode from the fact that around 25 out of the 56 round 1 submissions to the ongoing NIST lightweight cryptography (LwC) standardization process are based on this mode. Among these, 14 sponge-type constructions are selected for the second round consisting of 32 submissions. In this paper, we generalize the duplexing interface of the duplex mode, which we call Transform-then-Permute. It encompasses Beetle as well as a new sponge-type mode SpoC (both are round 2 submissions to NIST LwC). We show a tight security bound for Transform-then-Permute based on b-bit permutation, which reduces to finding an exact estimation of the expected number of multi-chains (defined in this paper). As a corollary of our general result, authenticated encryption advantage of Beetle and SpoC is about T(D+r2r)/2b where T, D and r denotes the number of offline queries (related to time complexity of the attack), number of construction queries (related to data complexity) and rate of the construction (related to efficiency). Previously the same bound has been proved for Beetle under the limitation that T << min{2r, 2b/2} (that compels to choose larger permutation with higher rate). In the context of NIST LwC requirement, SpoC based on 192-bit permutation achieves the desired security with 64-bit rate, which is not achieved by either duplex or Beetle (as per the previous analysis).
papers.abstract_zh: 海绵双工是用于构造认证加密方案的流行操作模式。事实上，从正在进行的NIST轻量级密码术(LwC)标准化过程的56个第一轮提交中的大约25个是基于该模式的事实，可以评估该模式的受欢迎程度。在这些作品中，有14个海绵型建筑入选第二轮，共有32个作品。在本文中，我们概括了双工模式的双工接口，我们称之为转换然后置换。它包括甲壳虫以及一个新的海绵型模式SpoC(都是第二轮提交给NIST LwC)。我们展示了基于b位置换的变换-置换的紧安全界限，这简化为寻找多链(在本文中定义)的期望数目的精确估计。作为我们的一般结果的推论，Beetle和SpoC的认证加密优势大约是T(D+r2r)/2b，其中T、D和r表示离线查询的数量(与攻击的时间复杂度有关)、构造查询的数量(与数据复杂度有关)和构造的速率(与效率有关)。以前，在T << min{2r，2b/2}(这迫使选择具有更高速率的更大排列)的限制下，对于甲虫已经证明了相同的界限。在NIST LwC要求的背景下，基于192位置换的SpoC以64位速率实现了所需的安全性，这是双工或Beetle(根据前面的分析)都无法实现的。
papers.title_zh: 海绵型认证加密模式的安全性研究

papers.title: Optimizing Implementations of Linear Layers
papers.authors: Zejun Xiang, Xiangyong Zeng, Da Lin, Zhenzhen Bao, Shasha Zhang
papers.abstract: In this paper, we propose a new heuristic algorithm to search efficient implementations (in terms of Xor count) of linear layers used in symmetric-key cryptography. It is observed that the implementation cost of an invertible matrix is related to its matrix decomposition if sequential-Xor (s-Xor) metric is considered, thus reducing the implementation cost is equivalent to constructing an optimized matrix decomposition. The basic idea of this work is to find various matrix decompositions for a given matrix and optimize those decompositions to pick the best implementation. In order to optimize matrix decompositions, we present several matrix multiplication rules over F2, which are proved to be very powerful in reducing the implementation cost. We illustrate this heuristic by searching implementations of several matrices proposed recently and matrices already used in block ciphers and Hash functions, and the results show that our heuristic performs equally good or outperforms Paar’s and Boyar-Peralta’s heuristics in most cases.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了一种新的启发式算法来搜索对称密钥加密中使用的线性层的有效实现(根据Xor计数)。观察到，如果考虑顺序异或(s-Xor)度量，可逆矩阵的实现成本与其矩阵分解相关，因此降低实现成本等同于构造优化的矩阵分解。这项工作的基本思想是找到给定矩阵的各种矩阵分解，并优化这些分解以选择最佳实现。为了优化矩阵分解，我们提出了几个F2上的矩阵乘法规则，这些规则被证明在降低实现成本方面是非常有效的。我们通过搜索最近提出的几个矩阵和已经在分组密码和散列函数中使用的矩阵的实现来说明这种启发式算法，并且结果表明我们的启发式算法在大多数情况下表现得同样好或者优于Paar和Boyar-Peralta的启发式算法。
papers.title_zh: 优化线性图层的实现

papers.title: Design of Symmetric-Key Primitives for Advanced Cryptographic Protocols
papers.authors: Abdelrahaman Aly, Tomer Ashur, Eli Ben-Sasson, Siemen Dhooghe, Alan Szepieniec
papers.abstract: While traditional symmetric algorithms like AES and SHA-3 are optimized for efficient hardware and software implementations, a range of emerging applications using advanced cryptographic protocols such as multi-party computation and zero knowledge proofs require optimization with respect to a different metric: arithmetic complexity.In this paper we study the design of secure cryptographic algorithms optimized to minimize this metric. We begin by identifying the differences in the design space between such arithmetization-oriented ciphers and traditional ones, with particular emphasis on the available tools, efficiency metrics, and relevant cryptanalysis. This discussion highlights a crucial point—the considerations for designing arithmetization-oriented ciphers are oftentimes different from the considerations arising in the design of software- and hardware-oriented ciphers.The natural next step is to identify sound principles to securely navigate this new terrain, and to materialize these principles into concrete designs. To this end, we present the Marvellous design strategy which provides a generic way to easily instantiate secure and efficient algorithms for this emerging domain. We then show two examples for families following this approach. These families — Vision and Rescue — are benchmarked with respect to three use cases: the ZK-STARK proof system, proof systems based on Rank-One Constraint Satisfaction (R1CS), and Multi-Party Computation (MPC). These benchmarks show that our algorithms achieve a highly compact algebraic description, and thus benefit the advanced cryptographic protocols that employ them.
papers.abstract_zh: 虽然AES和SHA-3等传统对称算法针对高效的硬件和软件实现进行了优化，但使用高级加密协议的一系列新兴应用(如多方计算和零知识证明)需要针对不同的指标进行优化:算术复杂度。在本文中，我们研究了安全密码算法的设计优化，以尽量减少这一措施。我们首先确定这种面向算术的密码和传统密码在设计空间上的差异，特别强调可用的工具、效率度量和相关的密码分析。这个讨论强调了一个关键点——设计面向算术化的密码的考虑因素通常不同于设计面向软件和硬件的密码的考虑因素。自然的下一步是确定合理的原则来安全地导航这个新领域，并将这些原则具体化为具体的设计。为此，我们提出了奇妙的设计策略，它提供了一种通用的方法来轻松地实例化这个新兴领域的安全和有效的算法。然后，我们展示了两个家庭遵循这种方法的例子。这些家族——Vision和Rescue——针对三种用例进行了基准测试:ZK-斯塔克证明系统、基于秩一约束满足的证明系统(R1CS)和多方计算(MPC)。这些基准测试表明，我们的算法实现了高度紧凑的代数描述，因此有利于使用它们的高级密码协议。
papers.title_zh: 高级密码协议的对称密钥原语设计

papers.title: Dasta - Alternative Linear Layer for Rasta
papers.authors: Phil Hebborn, Gregor Leander
papers.abstract: Progress in the areas of multi-party computation (MPC) and fully homomorphic encryption (FHE) caused the demand of new design strategies, that minimize the number of multiplications in symmetric primitives. Rasta is an approach for a family of stream ciphers with an exceptional low AND depth, which equals the number of ANDs per encrypted bit. This is achieved in particular by randomizing parts of the computation with the help of a PRNG, implying that the security arguments rely on the provided randomness and the encryption/ decryption is potentially slowed down by this generation. In this paper we propose a variant of Rasta that achieves the same performance with respect to the AND depth and the number of ANDs per encrypted bit, but does not rely on a PRNG, i.e. is based on fixed linear layers.
papers.abstract_zh: 多方计算(MPC)和全同态加密(FHE)领域的进展引起了对新的设计策略的需求，该策略最小化对称原语中的乘法次数。Rasta是一种具有非常低的AND深度的流密码家族的方法，其等于每个加密比特的AND数。这尤其是通过在PRNG的帮助下随机化部分计算来实现的，这意味着安全参数依赖于所提供的随机性，并且加密/解密可能会被这一代减慢。在本文中，我们提出了一种Rasta的变体，其在and深度和每个加密比特的AND数方面实现了相同的性能，但是不依赖于PRNG，即基于固定的线性层。
papers.title_zh: dasta-Rasta的替代线性图层

papers.title: Fast Decryption: a New Feature of Misuse-Resistant AE
papers.authors: Kazuhiko Minematsu
papers.abstract: Misuse-resistant AE (MRAE) is a class of authenticated encryption (AE) that has a resistance against a potential misuse (repeat) of nonce. MRAE has received significant attention from the initial proposal by Rogaway and Shrimpton. They showed a generic MRAE construction called SIV. SIV becomes a de-facto scheme for MRAE, however, one notable drawback is its two-pass operation for both encryption and decryption. This implies that MRAE built on SIV is slower than the integrated nonce-based AE schemes, such as OCB.In this paper, we propose a new method to improve this situation. Particularly, our MRAE proposal (decryption-fast SIV or DFV) allows to decrypt as fast as a plain decryption, hence theoretically doubles its speed from the original SIV, while keeping the encryption speed equivalent to SIV. We present several generic compositions for DFV and their instantiations.
papers.abstract_zh: 防误用AE (MRAE)是一类认证加密(AE ),可以防止nonce的潜在误用(重复)。罗加威和施莱姆顿的最初提议引起了人们对MRAE的极大关注。他们展示了一个叫SIV的MRAE建筑。SIV成为MRAE的一个事实上的方案，然而，一个显著的缺点是它的加密和解密都需要两遍操作。这意味着建立在SIV上的MRAE比基于随机数的AE方案(如OCB)要慢。本文提出了一种新的方法来改善这种情况。特别是，我们的MRAE提案(解密快速SIV或DFV)允许解密速度与普通解密一样快，因此理论上其速度是原始SIV的两倍，同时保持加密速度与SIV相当。我们给出了几个DFV的通用组合及其实例。
papers.title_zh: 快速解密:防误用AE的新特性

papers.title: Differential Attacks on CRAFT Exploiting the Involutory S-boxes and Tweak Additions
papers.authors: Hao Guo, Siwei Sun, Danping Shi, Ling Sun, Yao Sun, Lei Hu, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: CRAFT is a lightweight tweakable block cipher proposed at FSE 2019, which allows countermeasures against Differential Fault Attacks to be integrated into the cipher at the algorithmic level with ease. CRAFT employs a lightweight and involutory S-box and linear layer, such that the encryption function can be turned into decryption at a low cost. Besides, the tweakey schedule algorithm of CRAFT is extremely simple, where four 64-bit round tweakeys are generated and repeatedly used. Due to a combination of these features which makes CRAFT exceedingly lightweight, we find that some input difference at a particular position can be preserved through any number of rounds if the input pair follows certain truncated differential trails. Interestingly, in contrast to traditional differential analysis, the validity of this invariant property is affected by the positions where the constant additions take place. We use this property to construct “weak-tweakey” truncated differential distinguishers of CRAFT in the single-key model. Subsequently, we show how the tweak additions allow us to convert these weak-tweakey distinguishers into ordinary secret-key distinguishers based on which key-recovery attacks can be performed. Moreover, we show how to construct MILP models to search for truncated differential distinguishers exploiting this invariant property. As a result, we find a 15-round truncated differential distinguisher of CRAFT and extend it to a 19-round key-recovery attack with 260.99 data, 268 memory, 294.59 time complexity, and success probability 80.66%. Also, we find a 14-round distinguisher with probability 2−43 (experimentally verified), a 16-round distinguisher with probability 2−55, and a 20-round weak-key distinguisher (2118 weak keys) with probability 2−63. Experiments on round-reduced versions of the distinguishers show that the experimental probabilities are sometimes higher than predicted. Finally, we note that our result is far from threatening the security of the full CRAFT.
papers.abstract_zh: CRAFT是FSE 2019年提出的一种轻量级可调整分组密码，它允许在算法层面轻松地将针对差分故障攻击的对策集成到密码中。CRAFT采用了轻量级的对合S盒和线性层，使得加密函数可以低成本地转化为解密函数。此外，CRAFT的tweakey调度算法非常简单，生成四个64位轮tweakey并重复使用。由于这些特征的组合使得CRAFT非常轻便，我们发现，如果输入对遵循某些截断的差分轨迹，则在特定位置的一些输入差可以通过任意轮次被保留。有趣的是，与传统的微分分析相反，这一不变性质的有效性受到常数相加发生的位置的影响。我们利用这个性质在单键模型中构造了CRAFT的“弱扭键”截断差分鉴别器。随后，我们展示了tweak附加物如何允许我们根据可以执行的密钥恢复攻击，将这些弱tweak密钥区分器转换成普通的密钥区分器。此外，我们展示了如何利用这一不变特性构建MILP模型来搜索截断差分鉴别器。结果，我们找到了一个15轮截断差分鉴别器，并将其推广到19轮密钥恢复攻击，数据量为260.99，内存为268，时间复杂度为294.59，成功概率为80.66%。此外，我们发现一个概率为243的14轮区分器(实验验证)、一个概率为255的16轮区分器和一个概率为263的20轮弱密钥区分器(2118个弱密钥)。对区分器的舍入版本的实验表明，实验概率有时比预测的要高。最后，我们注意到我们的结果远没有威胁到整个飞船的安全。
papers.title_zh: 对利用对合S盒和扭曲加法的工艺的差分攻击

papers.title: On the Security Margin of TinyJAMBU with Refined Differential and Linear Cryptanalysis
papers.authors: Dhiman Saha, Yu Sasaki, Danping Shi, Ferdinand Sibleyras, Siwei Sun, Yingjie Zhang
papers.abstract: This paper presents the first third-party security analysis of TinyJAMBU, which is one of 32 second-round candidates in NIST’s lightweight cryptography standardization process. TinyJAMBU adopts an NLFSR based keyed-permutation that computes only a single NAND gate as a non-linear component per round. The designers evaluated the minimum number of active AND gates, however such a counting method neglects the dependency between multiple AND gates. There also exist previous works considering such dependencies with stricter models, however those are known to be too slow. In this paper, we present a new model that provides a good balance of efficiency and accuracy by only taking into account the first-order correlation of AND gates that frequently occurs in TinyJAMBU. With the refined model, we show a 338-round differential with probability 2−62.68 that leads to a forgery attack breaking 64-bit security. This implies that the security margin of TinyJAMBU with respect to the number of unattacked rounds is approximately 12%. We also show a differential on full 384 rounds with probability 2−70.64, thus the security margin of full rounds with respect to the data complexity, namely the gap between the claimed security bits and the attack complexity, is less than 8 bits. Our attacks also point out structural weaknesses of the mode that essentially come from the minimal state size to be lightweight.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文给出了TinyJAMBU的第一个第三方安全性分析，TinyJAMBU是NIST轻量级密码标准化过程中的32个第二轮候选之一。TinyJAMBU采用基于NLFSR的键控排列，每轮只计算一个与非门作为非线性组件。设计者评估了有效与门的最小数量，但是这种计数方法忽略了多个与门之间的相关性。也有先前的工作考虑了这种具有更严格模型的依赖性，然而这些已知太慢。在本文中，我们提出了一个新的模型，该模型通过仅考虑TinyJAMBU中频繁出现的与门的一阶相关性，提供了效率和准确性之间的良好平衡。在改进的模型中，我们显示了338轮的差异，其概率为262.68，导致伪造攻击破坏64位安全性。这意味着TinyJAMBU相对于未被击中的子弹数量的安全系数约为12%。我们还显示了完整的384轮的差异，概率为270.64，因此完整轮相对于数据复杂性的安全裕度，即要求的安全位和攻击复杂性之间的差距，小于8位。我们的攻击还指出了该模式的结构弱点，这些弱点本质上来自于轻量级的最小状态大小。
papers.title_zh: 基于精细差分和线性密码分析的TinyJAMBU的安全裕度

papers.title: Practical seed-recovery for the PCG Pseudo-Random Number Generator
papers.authors: Charles Bouillaguet, Florette Martinez, Julia Sauvage
papers.abstract: The Permuted Congruential Generators (PCG) are popular conventional (non-cryptographic) pseudo-random generators designed in 2014. They are used by default in the NumPy scientific computing package. Even though they are not of cryptographic strength, their designer stated that predicting their output should nevertheless be "challenging".In this article, we present a practical algorithm that recovers all the hidden parameters and reconstructs the successive internal states of the generator. This enables us to predict the next “random” numbers, and output the seeds of the generator. We have successfully executed the reconstruction algorithm using 512 bytes of challenge input; in the worst case, the process takes 20 000 CPU hours.This reconstruction algorithm makes use of cryptanalytic techniques, both symmetric and lattice-based. In particular, the most computationally expensive part is a guessand-determine procedure that solves about 252 instances of the Closest Vector Problem on a very small lattice.
papers.abstract_zh: 置换同余发生器(PCG)是2014年设计的流行的常规(非密码)伪随机发生器。默认情况下，它们在NumPy科学计算包中使用。尽管它们不具备加密能力，但它们的设计者表示，预测它们的输出仍然具有“挑战性”。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个实用的算法，恢复所有的隐藏参数，并重建发电机的连续内部状态。这使我们能够预测下一个“随机”数字，并输出生成器的种子。我们已经使用512字节的挑战输入成功地执行了重构算法；在最坏的情况下，这个过程需要20 000个CPU小时。这种重建算法利用了对称和基于格的密码分析技术。特别是，计算量最大的部分是猜测和确定过程，该过程在非常小的网格上解决了大约252个最近向量问题的实例。
papers.title_zh: PCG伪随机数发生器的实用种子恢复

papers.title: Extended Truncated-differential Distinguishers on Round-reduced AES
papers.authors: Zhenzhen Bao, Jian Guo, Eik List
papers.abstract: Distinguishers on round-reduced AES have attracted considerable attention in the recent years. While the number of rounds covered in key-recovery attacks did not increase, subspace, yoyo, mixture-differential, and multiple-of-n cryptanalysis advanced the understanding of the properties of the cipher.For substitution-permutation networks, integral attacks are a suitable target for extension since they usually end after a linear layer sums several subcomponents. Based on results by Patarin, Chen et al. already observed that the expected number of collisions for a sum of permutations differs slightly from that for a random primitive. Though, their target remained lightweight primitives.The present work illustrates how the well-known integral distinguisher on three-round AES resembles a sum of PRPs and can be extended to truncated-differential distinguishers over 4 and 5 rounds. In contrast to previous distinguishers by Grassi et al., our approach allows to prepend a round that starts from a diagonal subspace. We demonstrate how the prepended round can be used for key recovery with a new differential key-recovery attack on six-round AES. Moreover, we show how the prepended round can also be integrated to form a six-round distinguisher. For all distinguishers and the key-recovery attack, our results are supported by implementations with Cid et al.’s established Small-AES version. While the distinguishers do not threaten the security of the AES, they try to shed more light on its properties.
papers.abstract_zh: 近几年来，轮约AES上的识别符吸引了相当多的关注。虽然密钥恢复攻击所覆盖的轮数没有增加，但子空间、yoyo、混合差分和n的倍数密码分析促进了对密码特性的理解。对于替换置换网络，整数攻击是扩展的合适目标，因为它们通常在线性层将几个子组件相加之后结束。根据Patarin的结果，Chen等人已经观察到置换和的预期碰撞数与随机基元的略有不同。尽管如此，他们的目标仍然是轻量级原语。本工作说明了三轮AES上众所周知的整数鉴别器如何类似于PRPs的和，并且可以扩展到4轮和5轮上的截断差分鉴别器。与Grassi等人以前的区分器相比，我们的方法允许预先考虑从对角子空间开始的一轮。我们通过对六轮AES的新的差分密钥恢复攻击，演示了如何将预先考虑的轮用于密钥恢复。此外，我们还展示了如何将预先计划好的回合整合成一个六回合区分符。对于所有的区分符和密钥恢复攻击，我们的结果得到了Cid等人建立的小型AES版本的实现的支持。虽然区分器不会威胁到AES的安全性，但它们试图揭示更多有关其属性的信息。
papers.title_zh: 舍入归约AES上的扩展截断差分鉴别器

papers.title: On the Usage of Deterministic (Related-Key) Truncated Differentials and Multidimensional Linear Approximations for SPN Ciphers
papers.authors: Ling Sun, David Gérault, Wei Wang, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: Among the few works realising the search of truncated differentials (TD) and multidimensional linear approximations (MDLA) holding for sure, the optimality of the distinguisher should be confirmed via an exhaustive search over all possible input differences/masks, which cannot be afforded when the internal state of the primitive has a considerable number of words. The incomplete search is also a long-term problem in the search of optimal impossible differential (ID) and zerocorrelation linear approximation (ZCLA) since all available automatic tools operate under fixed input and output differences/masks, and testing all possible combinations of differences/masks is impracticable for now. In this paper, we start by introducing an automatic approach based on the constraint satisfaction problem for the exploration of deterministic TDs and MDLAs. Since we transform the exhaustive search into an inherent feature of the searching model, the issue of incomplete search is settled. This tool is applied to search for related-key (RK) TDs of AES-192, and a new related-key differential-linear (DL) distinguisher is identified with a TD with certainty. Due to the novel property of the distinguisher, the previous RK DL attack on AES-192 is improved. Also, the new distinguisher is explained from the viewpoint of differentiallinear connectivity table (DLCT) and thus can be regarded as the first application of DLCT in the related-key attack scenario. As the second application of the tool, we propose a method to construct (RK) IDs and ZCLAs automatically. Benefiting from the control of the nonzero fixed differential pattern and the inherent feature of exhaustive search, the new searching scheme can discover longer distinguishers and hence possesses some superiorities over the previous methods. This technique is implemented with several primitives, and the provable security bounds of SKINNY and Midori64 against impossible differential distinguishing attack are generalised.
papers.abstract_zh: 在实现对截尾差分(TD)和多维线性近似(MDLA)的搜索的少数作品中，区分器的最优性应该通过对所有可能的输入差异/掩码的穷举搜索来确认，当原语的内部状态具有相当多的字时，这是不可能的。在搜索最佳不可能微分(ID)和零相关线性近似(ZCLA)时，不完全搜索也是一个长期问题，因为所有可用的自动工具都在固定的输入和输出差异/掩码下操作，并且测试差异/掩码的所有可能组合目前是不可行的。在本文中，我们首先介绍一种基于约束满足问题的自动方法来探索确定性TDs和MDLAs。由于我们将穷举搜索转化为搜索模型的固有特征，不完全搜索的问题得以解决。该工具被用于搜索AES-192的相关密钥(RK)TD，并且新的相关密钥差分线性(DL)鉴别器被确定地与TD一起识别。由于区分符的新颖特性，改进了以前对AES-192的RK DL攻击。此外，新的区分器从微分线性连接表(DLCT)的角度进行了解释，因此可以被视为DLCT在相关密钥攻击场景中的首次应用。作为该工具的第二个应用，我们提出了一种自动构造(RK) IDs和ZCLAs的方法。得益于非零固定差分模式的控制和穷举搜索的固有特性，新的搜索方案能发现更长的区分符，因而比以前的方法具有一些优势。这种技术是用几个原语实现的，并且推广了SKINNY和Midori64抵抗不可能的差分区分攻击的可证明安全界。
papers.title_zh: 确定性(相关密钥)截断差分和多维线性近似在SPN密码中的应用

papers.title: Exploring Secret Keys in Searching Integral Distinguishers Based on Division Property
papers.authors: Senpeng Wang, Bin Hu, Jie Guan, Kai Zhang, Tairong Shi
papers.abstract: Division property proposed by Todo at EUROCRYPT 2015 is a generalized integral property. Then, conventional bit-based division property (CBDP) and bitbased division property using three subsets (BDPT) were proposed by Todo and Morii at FSE 2016. At ASIACRYPT 2016, Xiang et al. extended Mixed Integer Linear Programming (MILP) method to search integral distinguishers based on CBDP. And at ASIACRYPT 2019, Wang et al. proposed an MILP-aided method of searching integral distinguishers based on BDPT. Although BDPT is powerful in searching integral distinguishers, the accuracy is not perfect.For block cipher SPECK32, as the block size is only 32 bits, we can experimentally observe the behaviors of all the plaintexts under a fixed key. By testing 210 random secret keys, we experimentally find a better integral distinguisher of 6-round SPECK32 with 30 active bits. But this experimental integral distinguisher cannot be proved by existing methods. So there still exists a gap between the proved distinguisher and the experimental one.To fill the gap, we explore secret keys in searching integral distinguishers based on BDPT. We put forward a situation where “Xor with The Secret Key” operation can be bypassed. Based on the new BDPT propagation rule, an improved automatic algorithm of searching integral distinguishers is proposed. For SPECK32, our improved algorithm can find the 6-round integral distinguisher with 230 chosen plaintexts. The gap between the proved distinguisher and the experimental one is filled. Moreover, we apply this improved method to search the integral distinguishers of SPECK, KATAN/KTANTAN, SIMON, SIMECK, SIMON(102), PRESENT and RECTANGLE block ciphers. The integral distinguishers found by our improved method are better than or consistent with the previous longest distinguishers.
papers.abstract_zh: Todo在EUROCRYPT 2015上提出的除法性质是一种广义积分性质。然后，Todo和Morii在2016年FSE会议上提出了传统的基于比特的划分属性(CBDP)和使用三个子集的基于比特的划分属性(BDPT)。在ASIACRYPT 2016上，向等人在的基础上扩展了混合整数线性规划(MILP)方法来搜索整数鉴别器。在ASIACRYPT 2019上，王等人提出了一种基于的辅助搜索整数区分符的方法。尽管BDPT搜索积分微分器的能力很强，但精度并不理想。对于分组密码SPECK32，由于分组大小只有32位，我们可以通过实验观察所有明文在固定密钥下的行为。通过测试210个随机密钥，我们实验性地找到了一个较好的具有30个有效位的6轮SPECK32整数鉴别器。但是这种实验性的积分区分器不能用现有的方法证明。因此，在证明的区分器和实验的区分器之间仍然存在差距。为了填补这一空白，我们在基于BDPT的整数鉴别器搜索中探索了密钥。我们提出了一种可以绕过“与密钥异或”运算的情况。基于新的BDPT传播规则，提出了一种改进的自动搜索整数鉴别器的算法。对于SPECK32，我们的改进算法可以用230个选择的明文找到6轮整数鉴别符。填补了证明的区分器和实验的区分器之间的空白。此外，我们将这种改进的方法应用于寻找SPECK，KATAN/KTANTAN，SIMON，SIMECK，SIMON(102)，PRESENT和矩形分组密码的整数区分符。由我们改进的方法找到的整数区分器比以前的最长区分器更好或一致。
papers.title_zh: 基于除法性质的整数鉴别器搜索中密钥的探索

papers.title: Beyond-Birthday-Bound Security for 4-round Linear Substitution-Permutation Networks
papers.authors: Yuan Gao, Chun Guo, Meiqin Wang, Weijia Wang, Jiejing Wen
papers.abstract: Recent works of Cogliati et al. (CRYPTO 2018) have initiated provable treatments of Substitution-Permutation Networks (SPNs), one of the most popular approach to construct modern blockciphers. Such theoretical SPN models may employ non-linear diffusion layers, which enables beyond-birthday-bound provable security. Though, for the model of real world blockciphers, i.e., SPN models with linear diffusion layers, existing provable results are capped at birthday security up to 2n/2 adversarial queries, where n is the size of the idealized S-boxes.In this paper, we overcome this birthday barrier and prove that a 4-round SPN with linear diffusion layers and independent round keys is secure up to 22n/3 queries. For this, we identify conditions on the linear layers that are sufficient for such security, which, unsurprisingly, turns out to be slightly stronger than Cogliati et al.’s conditions for birthday security. These provides additional theoretic supports for real world SPN blockciphers.
papers.abstract_zh: Cogliati等人(CRYPTO 2018)最近的工作启动了替换置换网络(SPNs)的可证明处理，这是构造现代分组密码的最流行的方法之一。这种理论上的SPN模型可以采用非线性扩散层，这使得超越生日界限的可证明安全性成为可能。然而，对于真实世界分组密码的模型，即具有线性扩散层的SPN模型，现有的可证明结果在生日安全性上被限制到2n/2个对抗查询，其中n是理想化S盒的大小。在本文中，我们克服了生日障碍，证明了具有线性扩散层和独立轮密钥的4轮SPN对于22n/3个查询是安全的。为此，我们确定了线性层上足以实现这种安全性的条件，不出所料，这比Cogliati等人的生日安全性条件稍强。这为真实世界的SPN分组密码提供了额外的理论支持。
papers.title_zh: 4轮线性替换置换网络的超生日安全

papers.title: Efficient MILP Modelings for Sboxes and Linear Layers of SPN ciphers
papers.authors: Christina Boura, Daniel Coggia
papers.abstract: Mixed Integer Linear Programming (MILP) solvers are regularly used by designers for providing security arguments and by cryptanalysts for searching for new distinguishers. For both applications, bitwise models are more refined and permit to analyze properties of primitives more accurately than word-oriented models. Yet, they are much heavier than these last ones. In this work, we first propose many new algorithms for efficiently modeling any subset of Fn2 with MILP inequalities. This permits, among others, to model differential or linear propagation through Sboxes. We manage notably to represent the differential behaviour of the AES Sbox with three times less inequalities than before. Then, we present two new algorithms inspired from coding theory to model complex linear layers without dummy variables. This permits us to represent many diffusion matrices, notably the ones of Skinny-128 and AES in a much more compact way. To demonstrate the impact of our new models on the solving time we ran experiments for both Skinny-128 and AES. Finally, our new models allowed us to computationally prove that there are no impossible differentials for 5-round AES and 13-round Skinny-128 with exactly one input and one output active byte, even if the details of both the Sbox and the linear layer are taken into account.
papers.abstract_zh: 混合整数线性规划(MILP)解算器通常被设计者用来提供安全参数，被密码分析者用来搜索新的区分符。对于这两个应用程序，按位模型比面向单词的模型更精确，并且允许更准确地分析原语的属性。然而，它们比上一批要重得多。在这项工作中，我们首先提出了许多新的算法，有效地建模与MILP不等式的Fn2的任何子集。这尤其允许模拟通过机顶盒的差分或线性传播。值得注意的是，我们设法用比以前少三倍的不平等性来表示AES Sbox的不同行为。然后，我们提出了两个新的算法，灵感来自编码理论，模型复杂的线性层没有虚拟变量。这使我们能够以更简洁的方式表示许多扩散矩阵，特别是Skinny-128和AES的扩散矩阵。为了展示我们的新模型对求解时间的影响，我们对Skinny-128和AES进行了实验。最后，我们的新模型允许我们通过计算证明，即使考虑到Sbox和线性层的细节，对于只有一个输入和一个输出有效字节的5轮AES和13轮Skinny-128也不存在不可能的差分。
papers.title_zh: SPN密码的盒和线性层的有效MILP模型

papers.title: Errata to Sound Hashing Modes of Arbitrary Functions, Permutations, and Block Ciphers
papers.authors: Aldo Gunsing, Joan Daemen, Bart Mennink
papers.abstract: In ToSC 2018(4), Daemen et al. performed an in-depth investigation of sound hashing modes based on arbitrary functions, permutations, or block ciphers. However, for the case of invertible primitives, there is a glitch. In this errata, we formally fix this glitch by adding an extra term to the security bound, q/2b−n, where q is query complexity, b the width of the permutation or the block size of the block cipher, and n the size of the hash digest. For permutations that are wider than two times the chaining value this term is negligible. For block cipher based hashing modes where the block size is close to the digest size, the term degrades the security significantly.
papers.abstract_zh: 在ToSC 2018(4)中，代蒙等人对基于任意函数、置换或分组密码的声音哈希模式进行了深入研究。然而，对于可逆原语的情况，有一个小故障。在本勘误表中，我们通过在安全界限q/2b n上增加一项来正式修复此故障，其中q是查询复杂度，b是置换的宽度或分组密码的块大小，n是哈希摘要的大小。对于比链接值宽两倍的排列，这一项可以忽略。对于块大小接近摘要大小的基于块密码的散列模式，该术语显著降低了安全性。
papers.title_zh: 任意函数、置换和分组密码的可靠散列模式勘误表

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of Curl-P and Other Attacks on the IOTA Cryptocurrency
papers.authors: Ethan Heilman, Neha Narula, Garrett Tanzer, James Lovejoy, Michael Colavita, Madars Virza, Tadge Dryja
papers.abstract: We present attacks on the cryptography formerly used in the IOTA blockchain, including under certain conditions the ability to forge signatures. We developed practical attacks on IOTA’s cryptographic hash function Curl-P-27, allowing us to quickly generate short colliding messages. These collisions work even for messages of the same length. Exploiting these weaknesses in Curl-P-27, we broke the EUCMA security of the former IOTA Signature Scheme (ISS). Finally, we show that in a chosen-message setting we could forge signatures and multi-signatures of valid spending transactions (called bundles in IOTA).
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了对以前在IOTA区块链中使用的加密技术的攻击，包括在某些条件下伪造签名的能力。我们对IOTA的加密哈希函数Curl-P-27进行了实际攻击，使我们能够快速生成简短的冲突消息。这些冲突甚至适用于相同长度的消息。利用Curl-P-27的这些弱点，我们破解了原IOTA签名方案(ISS)的EUCMA安全性。最后，我们证明了在选择消息设置中，我们可以伪造有效消费交易的签名和多重签名(在IOTA中称为捆绑包)。
papers.title_zh: 对IOTA加密货币Curl-P等攻击的分析

papers.title: LM-DAE: Low-Memory Deterministic Authenticated Encryption for 128-bit Security
papers.authors: Yusuke Naito, Yu Sasaki, Takeshi Sugawara
papers.abstract: This paper proposes a new lightweight deterministic authenticated encryption (DAE) scheme providing 128-bit security. Lightweight DAE schemes are practically important because resource-restricted devices sometimes cannot afford to manage a nonce properly. For this purpose, we first design a new mode LM-DAE that has a minimal state size and uses a tweakable block cipher (TBC). The design can be implemented with low memory and is advantageous in threshold implementations (TI) as a side-channel attack countermeasure. LM-DAE further reduces the implementation cost by eliminating the inverse tweak schedule needed in the previous TBC-based DAE modes. LM-DAE is proven to be indistinguishable from an ideal DAE up to the O(2n) query complexity for the block size n. To achieve 128-bit security, an underlying TBC must handle a 128-bit block, 128-bit key, and 128+4-bit tweak, where the 4-bit tweak comes from the domain separation. To satisfy this requirement, we extend SKINNY-128-256 with an additional 4-bit tweak, by applying the elastic-tweak proposed by Chakraborti et al. We evaluate the hardware performances of the proposed scheme with and without TI. Our LM-DAE implementation achieves 3,717 gates, roughly 15% fewer than state-of-the-art nonce-based schemes, thanks to removing the inverse tweak schedule.
papers.abstract_zh: 提出了一种新的轻量级确定性认证加密(DAE)方案，提供128位安全性。轻量级DAE方案实际上非常重要，因为资源受限的设备有时无法适当地管理nonce。为此，我们首先设计了一种新模式的LM-DAE，它具有最小的状态大小，并使用可调分组密码(TBC)。该设计可以用低存储器实现，并且在阈值实现(TI)中作为边信道攻击对策是有利的。LM-DAE通过消除以前基于TBC的DAE模式中所需的反向调整计划，进一步降低了实施成本。对于块大小n，LM-DAE已被证明与理想的DAE无法区分，查询复杂度高达O(2n)。为了实现128位安全性，底层TBC必须处理128位块、128位密钥和128+4位tweak，其中4位tweak来自域分隔。为了满足这一要求，我们通过应用Chakraborti等人提出的弹性调整，使用额外的4位调整来扩展SKINNY-128-256。我们评估了使用和不使用ti时所提方案的硬件性能。我们的LM-DAE实现实现了3，717个门，比最先进的基于随机数的方案大约少15%，这要归功于消除了反向调整调度。
papers.title_zh: LM-DAE:用于128位安全性的低内存确定性认证加密

papers.title: Highly Secure Nonce-based MACs from the Sum of Tweakable Block Ciphers
