papers.authors: Wonseok Choi, Akiko Inoue, ByeongHak Lee, Jooyoung Lee, Eik List, Kazuhiko Minematsu, Yusuke Naito
papers.abstract: Tweakable block ciphers (TBCs) have proven highly useful to boost the security guarantees of authentication schemes. In 2017, Cogliati et al. proposed two MACs combining TBC and universal hash functions: a nonce-based MAC called NaT and a deterministic MAC called HaT. While both constructions provide high security, their properties are complementary: NaT is almost fully secure when nonces are respected (i.e., n-bit security, where n is the block size of the TBC, and no security degradation in terms of the number of MAC queries when nonces are unique), while its security degrades gracefully to the birthday bound (n/2 bits) when nonces are misused. HaT has n-bit security and can be used naturally as a nonce-based MAC when a message contains a nonce. However, it does not have full security even if nonces are unique.This work proposes two highly secure and efficient MACs to fill the gap: NaT2 and eHaT. Both provide (almost) full security if nonces are unique and more than n/2-bit security when nonces can repeat. Based on NaT and HaT, we aim at achieving these properties in a modular approach. Our first proposal, Nonce-as-Tweak2 (NaT2), is the sum of two NaT instances. Our second proposal, enhanced Hash-as-Tweak (eHaT), extends HaT by adding the output of an additional nonce-depending call to the TBC and prepending nonce to the message. Despite the conceptual simplicity, the security proofs are involved. For NaT2 in particular, we rely on the recent proof framework for Double-block Hash-then-Sum by Kim et al. from Eurocrypt 2020.
papers.abstract_zh: 可调分组密码(TBC)已被证明对提高认证方案的安全性非常有用。2017年，Cogliati等人提出了两种结合TBC和通用哈希函数的MAC:一种基于nonce的MAC，称为NaT，一种确定性MAC，称为HaT。虽然这两种构造都提供了高安全性，但是它们的属性是互补的:当随机数被考虑时，NaT几乎是完全安全的(即，n位安全性，其中n是TBC的块大小，并且当随机数是唯一的时，在MAC查询的数量方面没有安全性降级)，而当随机数被误用时，其安全性适度降级到生日界限(n/2位)。HaT具有n位安全性，当消息包含随机数时，可以自然地用作基于随机数的MAC。然而，即使随机数是唯一的，它也不具有完全的安全性。这项工作提出了两个高度安全和有效的MAC来填补空白:NaT2和eHaT。如果随机数是唯一的，两者都提供(几乎)完全的安全性，而当随机数可以重复时，则提供超过n/2位的安全性。基于NaT和HaT，我们的目标是以模块化的方式实现这些特性。我们的第一个建议，Nonce-as-Tweak2 (NaT2)，是两个NaT实例的总和。我们的第二个建议是增强的Hash-as-Tweak (eHaT ),它通过向TBC添加一个额外的nonce-dependent调用的输出并在消息前添加nonce来扩展HaT。尽管概念上很简单，但安全性证明是很复杂的。特别是对于NaT2，我们依赖于最近由Kim等人在Eurocrypt 2020中提出的双块Hash-then-Sum证明框架。
papers.title_zh: 基于可调分组密码和的高安全性随机数MAC

papers.title: Forking Tweakable Even-Mansour Ciphers
papers.authors: Hwigyeom Kim, Yeongmin Lee, Jooyoung Lee
papers.abstract: A forkcipher is a keyed, tweakable function mapping an n-bit input to a 2nbit output, which is equivalent to concatenating two outputs from two permutations. A forkcipher can be a useful primitive to design authenticated encryption schemes for short messages. A forkcpher is typically designed within the iterate-fork-iterate (IFI) paradigm, while the provable security of such a construction has not been widely explored. In this paper, we propose a method of constructing a forkcipher using public permutations as its building primitives. It can be seen as applying the IFI paradigm to the tweakable Even-Mansour ciphers. So our construction is dubbed the forked tweakable Even-Mansour (FTEM) cipher. Our main result is to prove that a (1, 1)-round FTEM cipher (applying a single-round TEM to a plaintext, followed by two independent copies of a single-round TEM) is secure up to 2 2n 3 queries in the ideal permutation model.
papers.abstract_zh: forkcipher是一种键控、可调函数，将n位输入映射到2位输出，这相当于将两个排列的两个输出串联起来。forkcipher可以是设计短消息的认证加密方案的有用原语。forkcpher通常是在迭代-分叉-迭代(IFI)范式中设计的，而这种构造的可证明安全性还没有被广泛研究。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一种使用公共置换作为构建基元来构造fork密码的方法。这可以被视为将IFI范式应用于可调整的偶数曼苏尔密码。因此我们的构造被称为分叉可调偶数曼苏尔(FTEM)密码。我们的主要结果是证明了在理想置换模型中，一个(1，1)-轮FTEM密码(将单轮TEM应用于明文，然后是单轮TEM的两个独立副本)对于多达2 2n 3个查询是安全的。
papers.title_zh: 分叉可调整的偶数曼苏尔密码

papers.title: Fake Near Collisions Attacks
papers.authors: Patrick Derbez, Pierre-Alain Fouque, Victor Mollimard
papers.abstract: Fast Near collision attacks on the stream ciphers Grain v1 and A5/1 were presented at Eurocrypt 2018 and Asiacrypt 2019 respectively. They use the fact that the entire internal state can be split into two parts so that the second part can be recovered from the first one which can be found using the keystream prefix and some guesses of the key materials. In this paper we reevaluate the complexity of these attacks and show that actually they are inferior to previously known results. Basically, we show that their complexity is actually much higher and we point out the main problems of these papers based on information theoretic ideas. We also check that some distributions do not have the predicted entropy loss claimed by the authors. Checking cryptographic attacks with galactic complexity is difficult in general. In particular, as these attacks involve many steps it is hard to identify precisely where the attacks are flawed. But for the attack against A5/1, it could have been avoided if the author had provided a full experiment of its attack since the overall claimed complexity was lower than 232 in both time and memory.
papers.abstract_zh: 对流密码Grain v1和A5/1的快速近碰撞攻击分别在Eurocrypt 2018和Asiacrypt 2019上提出。他们利用了这样一个事实，即整个内部状态可以分成两部分，这样第二部分可以从第一部分恢复，第一部分可以使用密钥流前缀和对密钥材料的一些猜测来找到。在本文中，我们重新评估了这些攻击的复杂性，并表明它们实际上不如以前已知的结果。基本上，我们表明它们的复杂性实际上要高得多，并且我们基于信息论的思想指出了这些论文的主要问题。我们还检查了一些分布没有作者声称的预测熵损失。一般来说，检查非常复杂的密码攻击是很困难的。特别是，由于这些攻击涉及许多步骤，因此很难准确识别攻击的缺陷所在。但是对于对A5/1的攻击，如果作者提供了对其攻击的完整实验，它是可以避免的，因为声称的总复杂度在时间和内存上都低于232。
papers.title_zh: 假接近碰撞攻击

papers.title: Catching the Fastest Boomerangs Application to SKINNY
papers.authors: Stéphanie Delaune, Patrick Derbez, Mathieu Vavrille
papers.abstract: In this paper we describe a new tool to search for boomerang distinguishers. One limitation of the MILP model of Liu et al. is that it handles only one round for the middle part while Song et al. have shown that dependencies could affect much more rounds, for instance up to 6 rounds for SKINNY. Thus we describe a new approach to turn an MILP model to search for truncated characteristics into an MILP model to search for truncated boomerang characteristics automatically handling the middle rounds. We then show a new CP model to search for the best possible instantiations to identify good boomerang distinguishers. Finally we systematized the method initiated by Song et al. to precisely compute the probability of a boomerang. As a result, we found many new boomerang distinguishers up to 24 rounds in the TK3 model. In particular, we improved by a factor 230 the probability of the best known distinguisher against 18-round SKINNY-128/256.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇文章中，我们描述了一个新的工具来搜索回飞镖区分器。刘等人的模型的一个限制是它只处理中间部分的一个回合，而宋等人已经表明依赖关系可以影响更多回合，例如对于SKINNY多达6个回合。因此，我们描述了一种新的方法，将搜索截断特征的MILP模型转变为搜索截断回飞镖特征的MILP模型，自动处理中间回合。然后，我们展示了一个新的CP模型来搜索最佳可能的实例，以识别良好的回飞镖区分器。最后，我们将宋等人提出的精确计算回飞棒概率的方法系统化。因此，我们在TK3模型中发现了许多高达24轮的新回旋镖区分器。特别是，我们将最著名的识别器与18轮SKINNY-128/256相比的概率提高了230倍。
papers.title_zh: 抓住最快的飞去来器应用到瘦

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of LowMC instances using single plaintext/ciphertext pair
papers.authors: Subhadeep Banik, Khashayar Barooti, F. Betül Durak, Serge Vaudenay
papers.abstract: Arguably one of the main applications of the LowMC family ciphers is in the post-quantum signature scheme PICNIC. Although LowMC family ciphers have been studied from a cryptanalytic point of view before, none of these studies were directly concerned with the actual use case of this cipher in PICNIC signature scheme. Due to the design paradigm of PICNIC, an adversary trying to perform a forgery attack on the signature scheme instantiated with LowMC would have access to only a single given plaintext/ciphertext pair, i.e. an adversary would only be able to perform attacks with data complexity 1 in a known-plaintext attack scenario. This restriction makes it impossible to employ classical cryptanalysis methodologies such as differential and linear cryptanalysis. In this paper we introduce two key-recovery attacks, both in known-plaintext model and of data complexity 1 for two variants of LowMC, both instances of the LowMC cryptanalysis challenge.
papers.abstract_zh: 可以说，LowMC家族密码的主要应用之一是在后量子签名方案野餐中。虽然以前已经从密码分析的角度研究了LowMC族密码，但是这些研究都没有直接涉及该密码在野餐签名方案中的实际使用情况。由于PICNIC的设计范例，试图对用LowMC实例化的签名方案执行伪造攻击的对手将只能访问单个给定的明文/密文对，即对手在已知明文攻击场景中只能执行数据复杂度为1的攻击。这种限制使得不可能采用经典的密码分析方法，例如差分和线性密码分析。在本文中，我们介绍了两个密钥恢复攻击，都是在已知明文模型和数据复杂度为1的两个LowMC变种，都是LowMC密码分析挑战的实例。
papers.title_zh: 使用单一明文/密文对的LowMC实例的密码分析

papers.title: Improved Attacks on sLiSCP Permutation and Tight Bound of Limited Birthday Distinguishers
papers.authors: Akinori Hosoyamada, María Naya-Plasencia, Yu Sasaki
papers.abstract: Limited birthday distinguishers (LBDs) are widely used tools for the cryptanalysis of cryptographic permutations. In this paper we propose LBDs on several variants of the sLiSCP permutation family that are building blocks of two round 2 candidates of the NIST lightweight standardization process: Spix and SpoC. We improve the number of steps with respect to the previously known best results, that used rebound attack. We improve the techniques used for solving the middle part, called inbound, and we relax the external conditions in order to extend the previous attacks. The lower bound of the complexity of LBDs has been proved only against functions. In this paper, we prove for the first time the bound against permutations, which shows that the known upper bounds are tight.
papers.abstract_zh: 有限生日鉴别器(lbd)是广泛使用的密码置换分析工具。在本文中，我们提出了sLiSCP置换家族的几个变体的lbd，它们是NIST轻量级标准化过程的两个第二轮候选的构建块:Spix和SpoC。我们相对于以前已知的最佳结果，改进了使用反弹攻击的步数。我们改进了用于解决称为入站的中间部分的技术，并且我们放松了外部条件，以便扩展先前的攻击。lbd复杂度的下界仅针对函数得到了证明。本文首次证明了逆置换的界，表明已知的上界是紧的。
papers.title_zh: 对有限生日区分符的sLiSCP置换和紧界的改进攻击

papers.title: Increasing Precision of Division Property
papers.authors: Patrick Derbez, Pierre-Alain Fouque
papers.abstract: In this paper we propose new techniques related to division property. We describe for the first time a practical algorithm for computing the propagation tables of 16-bit Super-Sboxes, increasing the precision of the division property by removing a lot of false division trails. We also improve the complexity of the procedure introduced by Lambin et al. (Design, Codes and Cryptography, 2020) to extend a cipher with linear mappings and show how to decrease the number of transitions to look for. While search procedures for integral distinguishers most often rely on MILP or SAT solvers for their ease of programming the propagation constraints, such generic solvers can only handle small 4/8-bit Sboxes. Thus we developed an ad-hoc tool handling larger Sboxes and all the improvements described in the paper. As a result, we found new integral distinguishers on SKINNY-64, HIGHT and Midori-64.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇文章中，我们提出了与除法性质相关的新技术。我们首次描述了一种计算16位超盒传播表的实用算法，通过消除大量虚假的除法轨迹，提高了除法性质的精度。我们还改进了Lambin等人(Design，Codes and Cryptography，2020)介绍的程序的复杂性，以扩展具有线性映射的密码，并展示如何减少要寻找的转换的数量。尽管整数区分器的搜索过程通常依赖于MILP或SAT解算器来简化传播约束的编程，但这种通用解算器只能处理小的4/8位盒。因此，我们开发了一个专用工具来处理更大的Sboxes和本文中描述的所有改进。结果，我们在瘦子-64，海特和美岛莉-64上发现了新的积分区分器。
papers.title_zh: 提高除法运算的精度

papers.title: Tightness of the Suffix Keyed Sponge Bound
papers.authors: Christoph Dobraunig, Bart Mennink
papers.abstract: Generic attacks are a vital ingredient in the evaluation of the tightness of security proofs. In this paper, we evaluate the tightness of the suffix keyed sponge (SuKS) bound. As its name suggests, SuKS is a sponge-based construction that absorbs the key after absorbing the data, but before producing an output. This absorption of the key can be done via an easy to invert operation, like an XOR, or a hard to invert operation, like a PRF. Using SuKS with a hard to invert absorption provides benefits with respect to its resistance against side-channel attacks, and such a construction is used as part of the authenticated encryption scheme Isap. We derive two key recovery attacks against SuKS with easy to invert key absorption, and a forgery in case of hard to invert key absorption. The attacks closely match the terms in the PRF security bound of SuKS by Dobraunig and Mennink, ToSC 2019(4), and therewith show that these terms are justified, even if the function used to absorb the key is a PRF, and regardless of whether SuKS is used as a PRF or a MAC.
papers.abstract_zh: 一般性攻击是评估安全证据严密性的一个重要因素。在本文中，我们评估了后缀键控海绵(SuKS)绑定的紧密性。顾名思义，SuKS是一种基于海绵的结构，它在吸收数据之后，但在产生输出之前吸收密钥。密钥的这种吸收可以通过诸如XOR之类的容易反转的运算或者诸如PRF之类的难反转的运算来完成。使用具有难以反转吸收的SuKS提供了抵抗旁道攻击的好处，并且这种构造被用作认证加密方案Isap的一部分。我们推导了两种针对容易反转密钥吸收的SuKS的密钥恢复攻击，以及一种针对难以反转密钥吸收的伪造攻击。这些攻击与Dobraunig和Mennink在ToSC 2019(4)中的SuKS的PRF安全界限中的术语非常匹配，并由此表明这些术语是合理的，即使用于吸收密钥的函数是PRF，也不管SuKS是用作PRF还是MAC。
papers.title_zh: 后缀键控海绵装订的紧密度

2019.journals_title: IACR Transactions on Symmetric Cryptology, Volume 2019

papers.title: Preface to Volume 2019, Issue 1
papers.authors: Florian Mendel, Yu Sasaki
papers.abstract: IACR Transactions on Symmetric Cryptology (ToSC) is a forum for original results in all areas of symmetric cryptography, including the design and analysis of block ciphers, stream ciphers, encryption schemes, hash functions, message authentication codes, (cryptographic) permutations, authenticated encryption schemes, cryptanalysis and evaluation tools, and security issues and solutions regarding their implementation.
papers.abstract_zh: IACR对称密码学汇刊(ToSC)是一个关于对称密码学所有领域的原创成果的论坛，包括分组密码、流密码、加密方案、哈希函数、消息认证码、(密码)置换、认证加密方案、密码分析和评估工具的设计和分析，以及关于其实施的安全问题和解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 第2019卷第1期前言

papers.title: CRAFT: Lightweight Tweakable Block Cipher with Efficient Protection Against DFA Attacks
papers.authors: Christof Beierle, Gregor Leander, Amir Moradi, Shahram Rasoolzadeh
papers.abstract: Traditionally, countermeasures against physical attacks are integrated into the implementation of cryptographic primitives after the algorithms have been designed for achieving a certain level of cryptanalytic security. This picture has been changed by the introduction of PICARO, ZORRO, and FIDES, where efficient protection against Side-Channel Analysis (SCA) attacks has been considered in their design. In this work we present the tweakable block cipher CRAFT: the efficient protection of its implementations against Differential Fault Analysis (DFA) attacks has been one of the main design criteria, while we provide strong bounds for its security in the related-tweak model. Considering the area footprint of round-based hardware implementations, CRAFT outperforms the other lightweight ciphers with the same state and key size. This holds not only for unprotected implementations but also when fault-detection facilities, side-channel protection, and their combination are integrated into the implementation. In addition to supporting a 64-bit tweak, CRAFT has the additional property that the circuit realizing the encryption can support the decryption functionality as well with very little area overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 传统上，在算法已经被设计用于实现一定级别的密码分析安全性之后，针对物理攻击的对策被集成到密码原语的实现中。PICARO、ZORRO和FIDES的出现改变了这一局面，在它们的设计中考虑了有效防止旁道分析(SCA)攻击。在这篇文章中，我们提出了可调分组密码技术:其实现对差分故障分析(DFA)攻击的有效保护是主要的设计准则之一，同时我们在相关的可调模型中提供了其安全性的强界。考虑到基于循环的硬件实现的面积，CRAFT优于其他具有相同状态和密钥大小的轻量级密码。这不仅适用于未受保护的实施，也适用于将故障检测设施、侧通道保护及其组合集成到实施中的情况。除了支持64位调整之外，CRAFT还具有一个额外的特性，即实现加密的电路可以支持解密功能，而面积开销非常小。
papers.title_zh: CRAFT:轻量级可调分组密码，可有效抵御DFA攻击

papers.title: libInterMAC: Beyond Confidentiality and Integrity in Practice
papers.authors: Martin R. Albrecht, Torben Brandt Hansen, Kenneth G. Paterson
papers.abstract: Boldyreva et al. (Eurocrypt 2012) defined a fine-grained security model capturing ciphertext fragmentation attacks against symmetric encryption schemes. The model was extended by Albrecht et al. (CCS 2016) to include an integrity notion. The extended security model encompasses important security goals of SSH that go beyond confidentiality and integrity to include length hiding and denial-of-service resistance properties. Boldyreva et al. also defined and analysed the InterMAC scheme, while Albrecht et al. showed that InterMAC satisfies stronger security notions than all currently available SSH encryption schemes. In this work, we take the InterMAC scheme and make it fully ready for use in practice. This involves several steps. First, we modify the InterMAC scheme to support encryption of arbitrary length plaintexts and we replace the use of Encrypt-then-MAC in InterMAC with modern noncebased authenticated encryption. Second, we describe a reference implementation of the modified InterMAC scheme in the form of the library libInterMAC. We give a performance analysis of libInterMAC. Third, to test the practical performance of libInterMAC, we implement several InterMAC-based encryption schemes in OpenSSH and carry out a performance analysis for the use-case of file transfer using SCP. We measure the data throughput and the data overhead of using InterMAC-based schemes compared to existing schemes in OpenSSH. Our analysis shows that, for some network set-ups, using InterMAC-based schemes in OpenSSH only moderately affects performance whilst providing stronger security guarantees compared to existing schemes.
papers.abstract_zh: Boldyreva等人(Eurocrypt 2012)定义了一个细粒度的安全模型，用于捕获针对对称加密方案的密文分段攻击。Albrecht等人(CCS，2016年)对该模型进行了扩展，纳入了完整性概念。扩展的安全模型包含SSH的重要安全目标，这些目标超越了机密性和完整性，包括长度隐藏和拒绝服务抵抗属性。Boldyreva等人还定义并分析了InterMAC方案，而Albrecht等人表明InterMAC比所有当前可用的SSH加密方案满足更强的安全性概念。在这项工作中，我们采用了InterMAC方案，并使它完全准备好在实践中使用。这包括几个步骤。首先，我们修改了InterMAC方案以支持任意长度明文的加密，并且我们用现代的非基于认证的加密代替了InterMAC中的Encrypt-then-MAC。其次，我们以libInterMAC库的形式描述了修改后的InterMAC方案的参考实现。我们给出了libInterMAC的性能分析。第三，为了测试libInterMAC的实际性能，我们在OpenSSH中实现了几个基于InterMAC的加密方案，并对使用SCP的文件传输用例进行了性能分析。与OpenSSH中现有的方案相比，我们测量了使用基于InterMAC的方案的数据吞吐量和数据开销。我们的分析表明，对于一些网络设置，在OpenSSH中使用基于InterMAC的方案只会适度地影响性能，同时提供比现有方案更强的安全保证。
papers.title_zh: libInterMAC:超越实践中的保密性和完整性

papers.title: Constructing Low-latency Involutory MDS Matrices with Lightweight Circuits
papers.authors: Shun Li, Siwei Sun, Chaoyun Li, Zihao Wei, Lei Hu
papers.abstract: MDS matrices are important building blocks providing diffusion functionality for the design of many symmetric-key primitives. In recent years, continuous efforts are made on the construction of MDS matrices with small area footprints in the context of lightweight cryptography. Just recently, Duval and Leurent (ToSC 2018/FSE 2019) reported some 32 × 32 binary MDS matrices with branch number 5, which can be implemented with only 67 XOR gates, whereas the previously known lightest ones of the same size cost 72 XOR gates.In this article, we focus on the construction of lightweight involutory MDS matrices, which are even more desirable than ordinary MDS matrices, since the same circuit can be reused when the inverse is required. In particular, we identify some involutory MDS matrices which can be realized with only 78 XOR gates with depth 4, whereas the previously known lightest involutory MDS matrices cost 84 XOR gates with the same depth. Notably, the involutory MDS matrix we find is much smaller than the AES MixColumns operation, which requires 97 XOR gates with depth 8 when implemented as a block of combinatorial logic that can be computed in one clock cycle. However, with respect to latency, the AES MixColumns operation is superior to our 78-XOR involutory matrices, since the AES MixColumns can be implemented with depth 3 by using more XOR gates.We prove that the depth of a 32 × 32 MDS matrix with branch number 5 (e.g., the AES MixColumns operation) is at least 3. Then, we enhance Boyar’s SLP-heuristic algorithm with circuit depth awareness, such that the depth of its output circuit is limited. Along the way, we give a formula for computing the minimum achievable depth of a circuit implementing the summation of a set of signals with given depths, which is of independent interest. We apply the new SLP heuristic to a large set of lightweight involutory MDS matrices, and we identify a depth 3 involutory MDS matrix whose implementation costs 88 XOR gates, which is superior to the AES MixColumns operation with respect to both lightweightness and latency, and enjoys the extra involution property.
papers.abstract_zh: MDS矩阵是为许多对称密钥原语的设计提供扩散功能的重要构件。近年来，在轻量级密码学的背景下，人们一直致力于构造具有小面积足迹的MDS矩阵。就在最近，Duval和Leurent (ToSC 2018/FSE 2019)报告了大约32 × 32的二进制MDS矩阵，其分支数为5，仅用67个异或门就可以实现，而之前已知的相同大小的最轻矩阵需要72个异或门。在这篇文章中，我们集中讨论轻量级对合MDS矩阵的构造，它比普通的MDS矩阵更令人满意，因为当需要求逆时，可以重用相同的电路。特别地，我们确定了一些对合MDS矩阵，它们仅用78个深度为4的异或门就可以实现，而先前已知的最轻的对合MDS矩阵在相同深度下需要84个异或门。值得注意的是，我们发现的对合MDS矩阵比AES混合列运算小得多，AES混合列运算在实现为可以在一个时钟周期内计算的组合逻辑块时，需要97个深度为8的XOR门。然而，就延迟而言，AES混合列运算优于我们的78-XOR对合矩阵，因为AES混合列可以通过使用更多XOR门来实现深度3。我们证明了分支数为5的32 × 32 MDS矩阵的深度至少为3。然后，我们用电路深度感知来增强Boyar的SLP启发式算法，使得其输出电路的深度是有限的。同时，我们给出了一个公式，用于计算实现一组具有给定深度的信号的求和的电路的最小可实现深度，这是独立感兴趣的。我们将新的SLP启发式算法应用于一大组轻量级对合MDS矩阵，并识别出一个深度为3的对合MDS矩阵，其实现需要88个异或门，在轻量级和延迟方面都优于AES混合列运算，并享有额外的对合特性。
papers.title_zh: 用轻量级电路构造低延迟对合MDS矩阵

papers.title: Boomerang Connectivity Table Revisited. Application to SKINNY and AES
papers.authors: Ling Song, Xianrui Qin, Lei Hu
papers.abstract: The boomerang attack is a variant of differential cryptanalysis which regards a block cipher E as the composition of two sub-ciphers, i.e., E = E1 o E0, and which constructs distinguishers for E with probability p2q2 by combining differential trails for E0 and E1 with probability p and q respectively. However, the validity of this attack relies on the dependency between the two differential trails. Murphy has shown cases where probabilities calculated by p2q2 turn out to be zero, while techniques such as boomerang switches proposed by Biryukov and Khovratovich give rise to probabilities greater than p2q2. To formalize such dependency to obtain a more accurate estimation of the probability of the distinguisher, Dunkelman et al. proposed the sandwich framework that regards E as Ẽ1 o Em o Ẽ0, where the dependency between the two differential trails is handled by a careful analysis of the probability of the middle part Em. Recently, Cid et al. proposed the Boomerang Connectivity Table (BCT) which unifies the previous switch techniques and incompatibility together and evaluates the probability of Em theoretically when Em is composed of a single S-box layer. In this paper, we revisit the BCT and propose a generalized framework which is able to identify the actual boundaries of Em which contains dependency of the two differential trails and systematically evaluate the probability of Em with any number of rounds. To demonstrate the power of this new framework, we apply it to two block ciphers SKINNY and AES. In the application to SKINNY, the probabilities of four boomerang distinguishers are re-evaluated. It turns out that Em involves5 or 6 rounds and the probabilities of the full distinguishers are much higher than previously evaluated. In the application to AES, the new framework is used to exclude incompatibility and find high probability distinguishers of AES-128 under the related-subkey setting. As a result, a 6-round distinguisher with probability 2−109.42 is constructed. Lastly, we discuss the relation between the dependency of two differential trails in boomerang distinguishers and the properties of components of the cipher.
papers.abstract_zh: 回飞镖攻击是差分密码分析的变体，其将分组密码E视为两个子密码的组合，即E = E1 o E0，并且其通过组合分别具有概率p和q的E0和E1的差分踪迹来构造具有概率p2q2的E的区分符。然而，这种攻击的有效性依赖于两个不同踪迹之间的依赖性。Murphy已经展示了由p2q2计算的概率结果为零的情况，而Biryukov和Khovratovich提出的回飞棒开关等技术产生了大于p2q2的概率。为了形式化这种依赖性以获得区分符概率的更精确估计，Dunkelman等人提出了三明治框架，该框架将e视为ẽ1 o Em o ẽ0，其中通过仔细分析中间部分em的概率来处理两个差分轨迹之间的依赖性。最近，Cid等人提出了BCT(Boomerang Connectivity Table ),它将以前的交换技术和不兼容性统一在一起，并从理论上评估了Em由单个S盒层组成的概率。在本文中，我们重温了BCT，并提出了一个通用的框架，它能够识别Em的实际边界，该边界包含两个微分轨迹的相关性，并系统地评估Em在任意轮次下的概率。为了展示这个新框架的能力，我们将它应用于两个分组密码SKINNY和AES。在对SKINNY的应用中，重新评估了四个回飞镖区分器的概率。原来Em涉及5或6轮，并且完全区分的概率比先前估计的高得多。在AES的应用中，新框架用于排除不兼容性，并在相关子密钥设置下找到AES-128的高概率区分符。结果，构建了概率为2109.42的6轮区分器。最后，我们讨论了回飞镖鉴别器中两个微分轨迹的相关性与密码组成部分性质之间的关系。
papers.title_zh: 回旋镖连接表重访。适用于SKINNY和AES

papers.title: Boomerang Switch in Multiple Rounds. Application to AES Variants and Deoxys
papers.authors: Haoyang Wang, Thomas Peyrin
papers.abstract: The boomerang attack is a cryptanalysis technique that allows an attacker to concatenate two short differential characteristics. Several research results (ladder switch, S-box switch, sandwich attack, Boomerang Connectivity Table (BCT), ...) showed that the dependency between these two characteristics at the switching round can have a significant impact on the complexity of the attack, or even potentially invalidate it. In this paper, we revisit the issue of boomerang switching effect, and exploit it in the case where multiple rounds are involved. To support our analysis, we propose a tool called Boomerang Difference Table (BDT), which can be seen as an improvement of the BCT and allows a systematic evaluation of the boomerang switch through multiple rounds. In order to illustrate the power of this technique, we propose a new related-key attack on 10-round AES-256 which requires only 2 simple related-keys and 275 computations. This is a much more realistic scenario than the state-of-the-art 10-round AES-256 attacks, where subkey oracles, or several related-keys and high computational power is needed. Furthermore, we also provide improved attacks against full AES-192 and reduced-round Deoxys.
papers.abstract_zh: 回飞镖攻击是一种密码分析技术，它允许攻击者连接两个短差分特征。几项研究成果(阶梯开关、S盒开关、三明治攻击、回旋镖连接表(BCT)、...)表明，这两个特征之间的依赖性会对攻击的复杂性产生重大影响，甚至可能使其无效。在本文中，我们重新讨论了回旋镖转换效应的问题，并在涉及多轮的情况下对其进行了探讨。为了支持我们的分析，我们提出了一个名为回飞棒差异表(BDT)的工具，它可以被视为BCT的一个改进，并允许通过多轮对回飞棒开关进行系统评估。为了说明这种技术的威力，我们提出了一种新的对10轮AES-256的相关密钥攻击，它只需要2个简单的相关密钥和275次计算。这是一个比最先进的10轮AES-256攻击更现实的场景，其中需要子密钥神谕或几个相关密钥和高计算能力。此外，我们还提供了针对全AES-192和缩减轮代欧奇希斯的改进攻击。
papers.title_zh: 多轮回旋镖开关。适用于AES变体和代欧奇希斯

papers.title: A General Proof Framework for Recent AES Distinguishers
papers.authors: Christina Boura, Anne Canteaut, Daniel Coggia
papers.abstract: In this paper, a new framework is developed for proving and adapting the recently proposed multiple-of-8 property and mixture-differential distinguishers. The above properties are formulated as immediate consequences of an equivalence relation on the input pairs, under which the difference at the output of the round function is invariant. This approach provides a further understanding of these newly developed distinguishers. For example, it clearly shows that the branch number of the linear layer does not influence the validity of the property, on the contrary of what was previously believed. We further provide an extension of the mixture-differential distinguishers and multiple-of-8 property to any SPN and to a larger class of subspaces. These adapted properties can then be exhibited in a systematic way for other ciphers than the AES. We illustrate this with the examples of Midori, Klein, LED and Skinny.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了一个新的框架来证明和修改最近提出的8的倍数性质和混合差分区分器。上述性质被公式化为输入对上的等价关系的直接结果，在该等价关系下，循环函数的输出处的差异是不变的。这种方法提供了对这些新开发的区分器的进一步理解。例如，它清楚地表明，线性层的分支数不影响属性的有效性，这与以前的看法相反。我们进一步将混合差分区分符和8的倍数性质扩展到任何SPN和更大类的子空间。然后，这些适应的属性可以以系统的方式展示给除AES之外的其他密码。我们用美岛莉、克莱因、莱德和斯肯尼的例子来说明这一点。
papers.title_zh: 最新aes的通用证明框架区分

papers.title: Zero-Correlation Attacks on Tweakable Block Ciphers with Linear Tweakey Expansion
papers.authors: Ralph Ankele, Christoph Dobraunig, Jian Guo, Eran Lambooij, Gregor Leander, Yosuke Todo
papers.abstract: The design and analysis of dedicated tweakable block ciphers is a quite recent and very active research field that provides an ongoing stream of new insights. For instance, results of Kranz, Leander, and Wiemer from FSE 2017 show that the addition of a tweak using a linear tweak schedule does not introduce new linear characteristics. In this paper, we consider – to the best of our knowledge – for the first time the effect of the tweak on zero-correlation linear cryptanalysis for ciphers that have a linear tweak schedule. It turns out that the tweak can often be used to get zero-correlation linear hulls covering more rounds compared to just searching zero-correlation linear hulls on the data-path of a cipher. Moreover, this also implies the existence of integral distinguishers on the same number of rounds. We have applied our technique on round reduced versions of Qarma, Mantis, and Skinny. As a result, we can present – to the best of our knowledge – the best attack (with respect to number of rounds) on a round-reduced variant of Qarma.
papers.abstract_zh: 专用可调分组密码的设计和分析是一个相当新的和非常活跃的研究领域，提供了一个新的见解流。例如，FSE 2017年的克兰兹、利安德和维默的结果表明，使用线性调整计划添加调整不会引入新的线性特征。在本文中，就我们所知，我们首次考虑了对于具有线性调整时间表的密码，调整对零相关线性密码分析的影响。事实证明，与仅在密码的数据路径上搜索零相关线性外壳相比，这种调整通常可以用于获得覆盖更多轮次的零相关线性外壳。此外，这也意味着在相同的回合数上存在整数区分符。我们已经在Qarma、Mantis和Skinny的圆形简化版本上应用了我们的技术。因此，就我们所知，我们可以对Qarma的轮次缩减变体提出最佳攻击(就轮次数量而言)。
papers.title_zh: 线性可调分组密码的零相关攻击

papers.title: Related-Tweak Statistical Saturation Cryptanalysis and Its Application on QARMA
papers.authors: Muzhou Li, Kai Hu, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: Statistical saturation attack takes advantage of a set of plaintext with some bits fixed while the others vary randomly, and then track the evolution of a non-uniform plaintext distribution through the cipher. Previous statistical saturation attacks are all implemented under single-key setting, and there is no public attack models under related-key/tweak setting. In this paper, we propose a new cryptanalytic method which can be seen as related-key/tweak statistical saturation attack by revealing the link between the related-key/tweak statistical saturation distinguishers and KDIB (Key Difference Invariant Bias) / TDIB (Tweak Difference Invariant Bias) ones. KDIB cryptanalysis was proposed by Bogdanov et al. at ASIACRYPT’13 and utilizes the property that there can exist linear trails such that their biases are deterministically invariant under key difference. And this method can be easily extended to TDIB distinguishers if the tweak is also alternated. The link between them provides a new and more efficient way to find related-key/tweak statistical saturation distinguishers in ciphers. Thereafter, an automatic searching algorithm for KDIB/TDIB distinguishers is also given in this paper, which can be implemented to find word-level KDIB distinguishers for S-box based key-alternating ciphers. We apply this algorithm to QARMA-64 and give related-tweak statistical saturation attack for 10-round QARMA-64 with outer whitening key. Besides, an 11-round attack on QARMA-128 is also given based on the TDIB technique. Compared with previous public attacks on QARMA including outer whitening key, all attacks presented in this paper are the best ones in terms of the number of rounds.
papers.abstract_zh: 统计饱和攻击利用一组明文，其中一些位是固定的，而其他位是随机变化的，然后通过密码跟踪非均匀明文分布的演变。以往的统计饱和攻击都是在单键设置下实现的，没有相关键/tweak设置下的公开攻击模型。本文通过揭示相关密钥/tweak统计饱和鉴别器与KDIB(密钥差不变偏差)/ TDIB (Tweak差不变偏差)统计饱和鉴别器之间的联系，提出了一种新的密码分析方法，该方法可以看作是相关密钥/tweak统计饱和攻击。KDIB密码分析是由Bogdanov等人在ASIACRYPT’13上提出的，并且利用了可以存在线性踪迹使得它们的偏差在密钥差异下是确定性不变的性质。如果调整也是交替的，这个方法可以很容易地扩展到TDIB区分器。它们之间的联系提供了一种新的更有效的方法来寻找密码中的相关键/调整统计饱和区分符。在此基础上，本文还给出了一个KDIB/TDIB区分符的自动搜索算法，该算法可以用来搜索基于S盒的密钥交替密码的词级KDIB区分符。我们将该算法应用于QARMA-64，给出了10轮外白化密钥QARMA-64的相关调整统计饱和攻击。此外，还基于TDIB技术对QARMA-128进行了11轮攻击。与以往公开攻击QARMA(包括外白化密钥)相比，本文提出的所有攻击在轮数方面都是最好的。
papers.title_zh: 相关调整统计饱和密码分析及其在QARMA中的应用

papers.title: General Diffusion Analysis: How to Find Optimal Permutations for Generalized Type-II Feistel Schemes
papers.authors: Victor Cauchois, Clément Gomez, Gaël Thomas
papers.abstract: Type-II Generalized Feistel Schemes are one of the most popular versions of Generalized Feistel Schemes. Their round function consists in applying a classical Feistel transformation to p sub-blocks of two consecutive words and then shifting the k = 2p words cyclically. The low implementation costs it offers are balanced by a low diffusion, limiting its efficiency. Diffusion of such structures may however be improved by replacing the cyclic shift with a different permutation without any additional implementation cost. In this paper, we study ways to determine permutations with the fastest diffusion called optimal permutations.To do so, two ideas are used. First, we study the natural equivalence classes of permutations that preserve cryptographic properties; second, we use the representation of permutations as coloured trees.For both heuristic and historical reasons, we focus first on even-odd permutations, that is, those permutations for which images of even numbers are odd. We derive from their structure an upper bound on the number of their equivalence classes together with a strategy to perform exhaustive searches on classes. We performed those exhaustive searches for sizes k ≤ 24, while previous exhaustive searches on all permutations were limited to k ≤ 16. For sizes beyond the reach of this method, we use tree representations to find permutations with good intermediate diffusion properties. This heuristic leads to an optimal even-odd permutation for k = 26 and best-known results for sizes k = 64 and k = 128.Finally, we transpose these methods to all permutations. Using a new strategy to exhaust equivalence classes, we perform exhaustive searches on classes for sizes k ≤ 20 whose results confirmed the initial heuristic: there always exist optimal permutations that are even-odd and furthermore for k = 18 all optimal permutations are even-odd permutations.
papers.abstract_zh: II型广义Feistel格式是最流行的广义Feistel格式之一。它们的循环函数在于将经典的Feistel变换应用于两个连续字的p个子块，然后循环移位k = 2p个字。它提供的低实施成本由低扩散来平衡，限制了它的效率。然而，这种结构的扩散可以通过用不同的置换替换循环移位来改善，而没有任何额外的实现成本。在本文中，我们研究的方法，以确定置换最快的扩散称为最佳置换。为此，使用了两个想法。首先，我们研究保持密码特性的置换的自然等价类；第二，我们用彩色树来表示排列。出于启发和历史的原因，我们首先关注奇偶排列，即偶数图像为奇数的排列。我们从它们的结构中推导出等价类数目的上界，以及在类上进行穷举搜索的策略。我们对k ≤ 24的大小执行了这些穷举搜索，而之前对所有排列的穷举搜索被限制在k ≤ 16。对于超出这种方法范围的尺寸，我们使用树表示来寻找具有良好中间扩散特性的排列。这种试探导致k = 26的最佳奇偶排列和k = 64和k = 128的最佳结果。最后，我们转置这些方法到所有的排列。使用一种新的策略来穷尽等价类，我们对k ≤ 20的类进行穷尽搜索，其结果证实了最初的启发:总是存在奇偶最优排列，而且对于k = 18，所有最优排列都是奇偶排列。
papers.title_zh: 一般扩散分析:如何寻找广义II型Feistel方案的最佳排列

papers.title: Partitions in the S-Box of Streebog and Kuznyechik
papers.authors: Léo Perrin
papers.abstract: Streebog and Kuznyechik are the latest symmetric cryptographic primitives standardized by the Russian GOST. They share the same S-Box, π, whose design process was not described by its authors. In previous works, Biryukov, Perrin and Udovenko recovered two completely different decompositions of this S-Box.We revisit their results and identify a third decomposition of π. It is an instance of a fairly small family of permutations operating on 2m bits which we call TKlog and which is closely related to finite field logarithms. Its simplicity and the small number of components it uses lead us to claim that it has to be the structure intentionally used by the designers of Streebog and Kuznyechik.The 2m-bit permutations of this type have a very strong algebraic structure: they map multiplicative cosets of the subfield GF(2m)* to additive cosets of GF(2m)*. Furthermore, the function relating each multiplicative coset to the corresponding additive coset is always essentially the same. To the best of our knowledge, we are the first to expose this very strong algebraic structure.We also investigate other properties of the TKlog and show in particular that it can always be decomposed in a fashion similar to the first decomposition of Biryukov et al., thus explaining the relation between the two previous decompositions. It also means that it is always possible to implement a TKlog efficiently in hardware and that it always exhibits a visual pattern in its LAT similar to the one present in π. While we could not find attacks based on these new results, we discuss the impact of our work on the security of Streebog and Kuznyechik. To this end, we provide a new simpler representation of the linear layer of Streebog as a matrix multiplication in the exact same field as the one used to define π. We deduce that this matrix interacts in a non-trivial way with the partitions preserved by π.
papers.abstract_zh: Streebog和Kuznyechik是由俄罗斯GOST标准化的最新对称密码原语。它们共享同一个S-Boxπ，π的设计过程没有被作者描述。在以前的作品中，比留科夫、佩兰和乌多文科复原了这个S-Box的两种完全不同的分解。我们重温他们的结果，并确定π的第三种分解。它是在2m位上操作的相当小的置换家族的一个实例，我们称之为TKlog，它与有限域对数密切相关。它的简单性和它所使用的少量组件让我们认为这一定是斯特里博格和库兹涅切克的设计师有意使用的结构。这种类型的2m位置换具有非常强的代数结构:它们将子域GF(2m)*的乘法陪集映射到GF(2m)*的加法陪集。此外，将每个乘法陪集与相应的加法陪集相关联的函数本质上总是相同的。据我们所知，我们是第一个揭露这种非常强的代数结构的人。我们还研究了TKlog的其他性质，并特别指出它总是可以以类似于Biryukov等人的第一次分解的方式进行分解，从而解释了前两次分解之间的关系。这还意味着，在硬件中高效实现TKlog始终是可能的，并且其LAT中的视觉模式始终与π中的视觉模式相似。虽然我们无法根据这些新的结果发现攻击，但我们讨论了我们的工作对Streebog和Kuznyechik的安全性的影响。为此，我们提供了一种新的更简单的Streebog线性层的表示，作为与用于定义π的域完全相同的域中的矩阵乘法。我们推断这个矩阵以一种非平凡的方式与π保持的划分相互作用。
papers.title_zh: 斯特里堡和库兹涅切克S-Box的分区

papers.title: PEIGEN - a Platform for Evaluation, Implementation, and Generation of S-boxes
papers.authors: Zhenzhen Bao, Jian Guo, San Ling, Yu Sasaki
papers.abstract: In this paper, a platform named PEIGEN is presented to evaluate security, find efficient software/hardware implementations, and generate cryptographic S-boxes. Continuously developed for decades, S-boxes are constantly evolving in terms of the design criteria for both security requirements and software/hardware performances. PEIGEN is aimed to be a platform covering a comprehensive check-list of design criteria of S-boxes appearing in the literature. To do so, the security requirements are first intensively surveyed, existing tools of S-boxes are then comprehensively compared, and finally our platform PEIGEN is presented. The survey part is aimed to be a systematic reference for the theoretical study of S-boxes. The platform is aimed to be an assistant tool for the experimental study and practical use of S-boxes. PEIGEN not only integrates most of the features in existing tools, but also equips with functionalities to evaluate new security-related properties, improves the efficiency of the search algorithms for optimized implementations in several aspects. With the help of this powerful platform, many interesting observations are made in-between the security notations, as well as on the S-boxes used in the existing symmetrickey cryptographic primitives. PEIGEN will become an open platform and welcomes contributions from all parties to help the community to facilitate the research and use of S-boxes.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了一个名为培根的平台来评估安全性，寻找有效的软硬件实现，并生成密码S盒。经过几十年的不断发展，S-box在安全要求和软件/硬件性能的设计标准方面也在不断发展。培根的目标是成为一个涵盖文献中出现的S盒设计标准的综合清单的平台。为此，首先深入调查了安全需求，然后综合比较了现有的S盒工具，最后介绍了我们的平台培根。综述部分旨在为S盒的理论研究提供一个系统的参考。该平台旨在成为S盒实验研究和实际应用的辅助工具。培根不仅集成了现有工具中的大部分功能，还配备了评估新的安全相关属性的功能，提高了搜索算法的效率，在几个方面进行了优化。在这个强大平台的帮助下，在安全符号之间，以及在现有symmetrickey密码原语中使用的S盒上，进行了许多有趣的观察。培根将成为一个开放的平台，并欢迎各方的贡献，以帮助社区促进S-box的研究和使用。
papers.title_zh: 培根——评估、实施和生成S盒的平台

papers.title: ZOCB and ZOTR: Tweakable Blockcipher Modes for Authenticated Encryption with Full Absorption
papers.authors: Zhenzhen Bao, Jian Guo, Tetsu Iwata, Kazuhiko Minematsu
papers.abstract: We define ZOCB and ZOTR for nonce-based authenticated encryption with associated data, and analyze their provable security. These schemes use a tweakable blockcipher (TBC) as the underlying primitive, and fully utilize its input to process a plaintext and associated data (AD). This property is commonly referred to as full absorption, and this has been explored for schemes based on a permutation or a pseudorandom function (PRF). Our schemes improve the efficiency of TBC-based counterparts of OCB and OTR called OCB3 (Krovetz and Rogaway, FSE 2011) and OTR (Minematsu, EUROCRYPT 2014). Specifically, ΘCB3 and OTR have an independent part to process AD, and our schemes integrate this process into the encryption part of a plaintext by using the tweak input of the TBC. Up to a certain length of AD, ZOCB and ZOTR completely eliminate the independent process for it. Even for longer AD, our schemes process it efficiently by fully using the tweak input of the TBC. For this purpose, based on previous tweak extension schemes for TBCs, we introduce a scheme called XTX*. To our knowledge, ZOCB and ZOTR are the first efficiency improvement of ΘCB3 and OTR in terms of the number of TBC calls. Compared to Sponge-based and PRF-based schemes, ZOCB and ZOTR allow fully parallel computation of the underlying primitive, and have a unique design feature that an authentication tag is independent of a part of AD. We present experimental results illustrating the practical efficiency gain and clarifying the efficiency cost for it with a concrete instantiation. The results show that for long input data, our schemes have gains, while we have efficiency loss for short input data.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们定义了ZOCB和ZOTR，并分析了它们的可证安全性。这些方案使用可调分组密码(TBC)作为底层原语，并充分利用其输入来处理明文和相关数据(AD)。这种特性通常被称为完全吸收，并且这已经被探索用于基于置换或伪随机函数(PRF)的方案。我们的方案提高了OCB和OTR中基于TBC的对应方OCB3 (Krovetz和Rogaway，FSE，2011年)和OTR (Minematsu，EUROCRYPT，2014年)的效率。具体来说，CB3和OTR具有处理AD的独立部分，并且我们的方案通过使用TBC的tweak输入将该过程集成到明文的加密部分中。直到AD的一定长度，ZOCB和ZOTR完全消除了对它的独立处理。即使对于较长的广告，我们的方案通过充分利用TBC的tweak输入来有效地处理它。为此，基于以前的tweak扩展方案，我们引入了一个称为XTX*的方案。据我们所知，就TBC调用次数而言，ZOCB和ZOTR是CB3和OTR的第一次效率改进。与基于海绵和基于PRF的方案相比，ZOCB和ZOTR允许底层原语的完全并行计算，并且具有独特的设计特征，即认证标签独立于AD的一部分。我们给出的实验结果说明了实际的效率增益，并通过一个具体的实例阐明了效率成本。结果表明，对于长输入数据，我们的方案有增益，而对于短输入数据，我们有效率损失。
papers.title_zh: ZOCB和ZOTR:用于完全吸收认证加密的可调分组密码模式

papers.title: Quantum Security Analysis of AES
papers.authors: Xavier Bonnetain, María Naya-Plasencia, André Schrottenloher
papers.abstract: In this paper we analyze for the first time the post-quantum security of AES. AES is the most popular and widely used block cipher, established as the encryption standard by the NIST in 2001. We consider the secret key setting and, in particular, AES-256, the recommended primitive and one of the few existing ones that aims at providing a post-quantum security of 128 bits. In order to determine the new security margin, i.e., the lowest number of non-attacked rounds in time less than 2128 encryptions, we first provide generalized and quantized versions of the best known cryptanalysis on reduced-round AES, as well as a discussion on attacks that don’t seem to benefit from a significant quantum speed-up. We propose a new framework for structured search that encompasses both the classical and quantum attacks we present, and allows to efficiently compute their complexity. We believe this framework will be useful for future analysis.Our best attack is a quantum Demirci-Selçuk meet-in-the-middle attack. Unexpectedly, using the ideas underlying its design principle also enables us to obtain new, counter-intuitive classical TMD trade-offs. In particular, we can reduce the memory in some attacks against AES-256 and AES-128.One of the building blocks of our attacks is solving efficiently the AES S-Box differential equation, with respect to the quantum cost of a reversible S-Box. We believe that this generic quantum tool will be useful for future quantum differential attacks. Judging by the results obtained so far, AES seems a resistant primitive in the post-quantum world as well as in the classical one, with a bigger security margin with respect to quantum generic attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文首次分析了AES算法的后量子安全性。AES是最流行和最广泛使用的分组密码，由NIST在2001年建立为加密标准。我们考虑密钥设置，特别是AES-256，它是推荐的原语，也是旨在提供128位后量子安全性的少数现有原语之一。为了确定新的安全裕度，即在少于2128次加密的时间内未被攻击的最低轮数，我们首先提供了关于缩减轮AES的最佳已知密码分析的一般化和量化版本，以及关于似乎没有从显著的量子加速中受益的攻击的讨论。我们为结构化搜索提出了一个新的框架，它包含了我们提出的经典攻击和量子攻击，并允许有效地计算它们的复杂性。我们相信这个框架将有助于未来的分析。我们最好的攻击是量子德米尔西-塞尔丘克中间相遇攻击。出乎意料的是，使用其设计原理背后的思想也使我们能够获得新的、反直觉的经典TMD权衡。特别是在一些针对AES-256和AES-128的攻击中，我们可以减少内存。我们的攻击的构造块之一是有效地求解AES S-Box微分方程，关于可逆S-Box的量子成本。我们相信这种通用的量子工具将对未来的量子差分攻击有用。从目前所获得的结果来看，AES在后量子世界和经典世界中似乎都是一个抵抗的原语，对于量子一般性攻击具有更大的安全裕度。
papers.title_zh: AES的量子安全性分析

papers.title: New Conditional Cube Attack on Keccak Keyed Modes
papers.authors: Zheng Li, Xiaoyang Dong, Wenquan Bi, Keting Jia, Xiaoyun Wang, Willi Meier
papers.abstract: The conditional cube attack on round-reduced Keccak keyed modes was proposed by Huang et al. at EUROCRYPT 2017. In their attack, a conditional cube variable was introduced, whose diffusion was significantly reduced by certain key bit conditions. The attack requires a set of cube variables which are not multiplied in the first round while the conditional cube variable is not multiplied with other cube variables (called ordinary cube variables) in the first two rounds. This has an impact on the degree of the output of Keccak and hence gives a distinguisher. Later, the MILP method was applied to find ordinary cube variables. However, for some Keccak based versions with few degrees of freedom, one could not find enough ordinary cube variables, which weakens or even invalidates the conditional cube attack.In this paper, a new conditional cube attack on Keccak is proposed. We remove the limitation that no cube variables multiply with each other in the first round. As a result, some quadratic terms may appear in the first round. We make use of some new bit conditions to prevent the quadratic terms from multiplying with other cube variables in the second round, so that there will be no cubic terms in the first two rounds. Furthermore, we introduce the kernel quadratic term and construct a 6-2-2 pattern to reduce the diffusion of quadratic terms significantly, where the Θ operation even in the second round becomes an identity transformation (CP-kernel property) for the kernel quadratic term. Previous conditional cube attacks on Keccak only explored the CP-kernel property of Θ operation in the first round. Therefore, more degrees of freedom are available for ordinary cube variables and fewer bit conditions are used to remove the cubic terms in the second round, which plays a key role in the conditional cube attack on versions with very few degrees of freedom. We also use the MILP method in the search of cube variables and give key-recovery attacks on round-reduced Keccak keyed modes.As a result, we reduce the time complexity of key-recovery attacks on 7-round Keccak-MAC-512 and 7-round Ketje Sr v2 from 2111, 299 to 272, 277, respectively. Additionally, we have reduced the time complexity of attacks on 9-round KMAC256 and 7-round Ketje Sr v1. Besides, practical attacks on 6-round Ketje Sr v1 and v2 are also given in this paper for the first time.
papers.abstract_zh: 黄等人在EUROCRYPT 2017上提出了对轮约Keccak键控模式的条件立方体攻击。在他们的攻击中，引入了一个条件立方体变量，其扩散通过某些关键比特条件而显著减少。攻击需要一组在第一轮中不相乘的立方体变量，而条件立方体变量在前两轮中不与其他立方体变量(称为普通立方体变量)相乘。这对Keccak的输出程度有影响，因此给出了一个区分符。后来，MILP方法被用于寻找普通的立方体变量。然而，对于一些自由度很少的基于Keccak的版本，人们无法找到足够多的普通立方体变量，这削弱了条件立方体攻击，甚至使其无效。提出了一种新的对Keccak的条件立方体攻击。我们取消了第一轮中没有立方变量相乘的限制。这样一来，第一轮可能会出现一些二次项。我们利用一些新的位条件来防止二次项在第二轮中与其他立方变量相乘，这样在前两轮中将不会有三次项。此外，我们引入了核二次项，并构造了一个6-2-2模式来显著减少二次项的扩散，其中θ运算即使在第二轮也变成了核二次项的恒等式变换(CP-kernel性质)。之前对Keccak的条件立方体攻击只在第一轮探索了θ运算的CP-kernel性质。因此，更多的自由度可用于普通立方变量，并且在第二轮中使用更少的位条件来移除立方项，这在自由度非常少的版本上的条件立方攻击中起着关键作用。我们还使用MILP方法搜索立方体变量，并给出了对轮约Keccak键控模式的密钥恢复攻击。因此，我们将对7轮Keccak-MAC-512和7轮Ketje Sr v2的密钥恢复攻击的时间复杂度分别从2111，299降低到272，277。此外，我们还降低了攻击9轮KMAC256和7轮Ketje Sr v1的时间复杂度。此外，本文还首次给出了对6轮Ketje Sr v1和v2的实际攻击。
papers.title_zh: 对Keccak键控模式的新的条件立方体攻击

papers.title: The Exact Security of PMAC with Two Powering-Up Masks
papers.authors: Yusuke Naito
papers.abstract: PMAC is a rate-1, parallelizable, block-cipher-based message authentication code (MAC), proposed by Black and Rogaway (EUROCRYPT 2002). Improving the security bound is a main research topic for PMAC. In particular, showing a tight bound is the primary goal of the research, since Luykx et al.’s paper (EUROCRYPT 2016). Regarding the pseudo-random-function (PRF) security of PMAC, a collision of the hash function, or the difference between a random permutation and a random function offers the lower bound Ω(q2/2n) for q queries and the block cipher size n. Regarding the MAC security (unforgeability), a hash collision for MAC queries, or guessing a tag offers the lower bound Ω(q2m /2n + qv/2n) for qm MAC queries and qv verification queries (forgery attempts). The tight upper bound of the PRF-security O(q2/2n) of PMAC was given by Gaži et el. (ToSC 2017, Issue 1), but their proof requires a 4-wise independent masking scheme that uses 4 n-bit random values. Open problems from their work are: (1) find a masking scheme with three or less random values with which PMAC has the tight upper bound for PRF-security; (2) find a masking scheme with which PMAC has the tight upper bound for MAC-security.In this paper, we consider PMAC with two powering-up masks that uses two random values for the masking scheme. Using the structure of the powering-up masking scheme, we show that the PMAC has the tight upper bound O(q2/2n) for PRF-security, which answers the open problem (1), and the tight upper bound O(q2m /2n + qv/2n) for MAC-security, which answers the open problem (2). Note that these results deal with two-key PMACs, thus showing tight upper bounds of PMACs with single-key and/or with one powering-up mask are open problems.
papers.abstract_zh: PMAC是由Black和Rogaway (EUROCRYPT 2002)提出的一种速率为1的、可并行的、基于分组密码的消息认证码(MAC)。提高安全边界是PMAC的主要研究课题。特别是，显示一个紧界是该研究的主要目标，因为Luykx等人的论文(EUROCRYPT 2016)。关于PMAC的伪随机函数(PRF)安全性，哈希函数的冲突或随机排列和随机函数之间的差异提供了q查询和分组密码大小n的下限ω(Q2/2n)。关于MAC安全性(不可伪造性), MAC查询的哈希冲突或猜测标签提供了qm MAC查询和qv验证查询(伪造企图)的下限ω(q2m/2n+qv/2n)。Gai等人给出了PMAC的PRF-安全O(q2/2n)的紧上界。(ToSC 2017，第1期)，但他们的证明需要使用4个n位随机值的4向独立掩蔽方案。他们工作中的公开问题是:(1)找到一个具有三个或更少随机值的掩蔽方案，利用该方案，PMAC具有PRF安全性的紧上界；(2)找到一个PMAC具有MAC-security紧上界的掩蔽方案。在本文中，我们考虑具有两个加电屏蔽的PMAC，其使用两个随机值作为屏蔽方案。使用加电屏蔽方案的结构，我们证明了PMAC对于PRF安全具有紧上界O(q2/2n ),这回答了公开问题(1 ),并且对于MAC安全具有紧上界O(q2m /2n + qv/2n ),这回答了公开问题(2)。注意，这些结果处理两个键的PMAC，因此显示具有单个键和/或一个上电屏蔽的PMAC的严格上限是公开的问题。
papers.title_zh: PMAC的确切安全与两个开机面具

papers.title: On Beyond-Birthday-Bound Security: Revisiting the Development of ISO/IEC 9797-1 MACs
papers.authors: Yaobin Shen, Lei Wang
papers.abstract: ISO/IEC 9797-1 is an international standard for block-cipher-based Message Authentication Code (MAC). The current version ISO/IEC 9797-1:2011 specifies six single-pass CBC-like MAC structures that are capped at the birthday bound security. For a higher security that is beyond-birthday bound, it recommends to use the concatenation combiner of two single-pass MACs. In this paper, we reveal the invalidity of the suggestion, by presenting a birthday bound forgery attack on the concatenation combiner, which is essentially based on Joux’s multi-collision. Notably, our new forgery attack for the concatenation of two MAC Algorithm 1 with padding scheme 2 only requires 3 queries. Moreover, we look for patches by revisiting the development of ISO/IEC 9797-1 with respect to the beyond-birthday bound security. More specifically, we evaluate the XOR combiner of single-pass CBC-like MACs, which was used in previous version of ISO/IEC 9797-1.
papers.abstract_zh: ISO/IEC 9797-1是基于分组密码的消息认证码(MAC)的国际标准。当前版本的ISO/IEC 9797-1:2011指定了六个单通CBC类MAC结构，它们在生日绑定安全性上被封顶。对于超越生日界限的更高安全性，建议使用两个单通MAC的串联组合器。在本文中，我们通过对级联组合器提出生日界限伪造攻击来揭示该建议的无效性，该攻击本质上是基于Joux的多重碰撞。值得注意的是，我们针对两个MAC算法1与填充方案2的级联的新伪造攻击仅需要3次查询。此外，我们通过回顾ISO/IEC 9797-1在超越生日界限安全性方面的发展来寻找补丁。更具体地说，我们评估了单通类CBC MAC的XOR组合器，它用于ISO/IEC 9797-1的早期版本。
papers.title_zh: 超越生日界限的安全性:重温ISO/IEC 9797-1 MAC的发展

papers.title: Classification of Balanced Quadratic Functions
papers.authors: Lauren De Meyer, Begül Bilgin
papers.abstract: S-boxes, typically the only nonlinear part of a block cipher, are the heart of symmetric cryptographic primitives. They significantly impact the cryptographic strength and the implementation characteristics of an algorithm. Due to their simplicity, quadratic vectorial Boolean functions are preferred when efficient implementations for a variety of applications are of concern. Many characteristics of a function stay invariant under affine equivalence. So far, all 6-bit Boolean functions, 3- and 4-bit permutations have been classified up to affine equivalence. At FSE 2017, Bozoliv et al. presented the first classification of 5-bit quadratic permutations. In this work, we propose an adaptation of their work resulting in a highly efficient algorithm to classify n x m functions for n ≥ m. Our algorithm enables for the first time a complete classification of 6-bit quadratic permutations as well as all balanced quadratic functions for n ≤ 6. These functions can be valuable for new cryptographic algorithm designs with efficient multi-party computation or side-channel analysis resistance as goal. In addition, we provide a second tool for finding decompositions of length two. We demonstrate its use by decomposing existing higher degree S-boxes and constructing new S-boxes with good cryptographic and implementation properties.
papers.abstract_zh: s盒通常是分组密码中唯一的非线性部分，是对称密码原语的核心。它们会显著影响算法的加密强度和实现特征。由于二次矢量布尔函数的简单性，当关注各种应用的有效实现时，它们是优选的。在仿射等价下，函数的许多特征保持不变。到目前为止，所有6位布尔函数、3位和4位置换都被归类为仿射等价。在FSE 2017上，Bozoliv等人提出了第一个5位二次排列的分类。在这项工作中，我们对他们的工作进行了改进，得到了一个对n ≥ m的n×m函数进行分类的高效算法。我们的算法首次实现了6位二次置换以及n ≤ 6的所有平衡二次函数的完全分类。这些函数对于以高效多方计算或抗侧信道分析为目标的新密码算法设计是有价值的。另外，我们提供了第二个工具来寻找长度为2的分解。我们通过分解现有的高阶S盒并构造具有良好密码和实现特性的新S盒来展示它的用途。
papers.title_zh: 平衡二次函数的分类

papers.title: Reconstructing an S-box from its Difference Distribution Table
papers.authors: Orr Dunkelman, Senyang Huang
papers.abstract: In this paper we study the problem of recovering a secret S-box from its difference distribution table (DDT). While being an interesting theoretical problem on its own, the ability to recover the S-box from the DDT of a secret S-box can be used in cryptanalytic attacks where the attacker can obtain the DDT (e.g., in Bar-On et al.’s attack on GOST), in supporting theoretical analysis of the properties of difference distribution tables (e.g., in Boura et al.’s work), or in some analysis of S-boxes with unknown design criteria (e.g., in Biryukov and Perrin’s analysis).We show that using the well established relation between the DDT and the linear approximation table (LAT), one can devise an algorithm different from the straightforward guess-and-determine (GD) algorithm proposed by Boura et al. Moreover, we show how to exploit this relation, and embed the knowledge obtained from it in the GD algorithm. We tested our new algorithm on random S-boxes of different sizes, and for random 14-bit bijective S-boxes, our results outperform the GD attack by several orders of magnitude.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文研究了从秘密S盒的差分分布表中恢复秘密S盒的问题。虽然从秘密S盒的DDT中恢复S盒的能力本身是一个有趣的理论问题，但是这种能力可以用于攻击者可以获得DDT的密码分析攻击中(例如Bar-On等人对GOST的攻击)，用于支持差分分布表的特性的理论分析中(例如在Boura等人的工作中)，或者用于具有未知设计标准的S盒的一些分析中(例如在Biryukov和Perrin的分析中)。我们表明，使用DDT和线性近似表(LAT)之间的良好关系，可以设计一种不同于Boura等人提出的直接猜测和确定(GD)算法的算法。此外，我们还表明如何利用这种关系，并将从中获得的知识嵌入到GD算法中。我们在不同大小的随机S盒上测试了我们的新算法，对于随机14位双射S盒，我们的结果比GD攻击好几个数量级。
papers.title_zh: 从S盒的差异分布表重构S盒

papers.title: Efficient Search for Optimal Diffusion Layers of Generalized Feistel Networks
papers.authors: Patrick Derbez, Pierre-Alain Fouque, Baptiste Lambin, Victor Mollimard
papers.abstract: The Feistel construction is one of the most studied ways of building block ciphers. Several generalizations were then proposed in the literature, leading to the Generalized Feistel Network, where the round function first applies a classical Feistel operation in parallel on an even number of blocks, and then a permutation is applied to this set of blocks. In 2010 at FSE, Suzaki and Minematsu studied the diffusion of such construction, raising the question of how many rounds are required so that each block of the ciphertext depends on all blocks of the plaintext. They thus gave some optimal permutations, with respect to this diffusion criteria, for a Generalized Feistel Network consisting of 2 to 16 blocks, as well as giving a good candidate for 32 blocks. Later at FSE’19, Cauchois et al. went further and were able to propose optimal even-odd permutations for up to 26 blocks.In this paper, we complete the literature by building optimal even-odd permutations for 28, 30, 32, 36 blocks which to the best of our knowledge were unknown until now. The main idea behind our constructions and impossibility proof is a new characterization of the total diffusion of a permutation after a given number of rounds. In fact, we propose an efficient algorithm based on this new characterization which constructs all optimal even-odd permutations for the 28, 30, 32, 36 blocks cases and proves a better lower bound for the 34, 38, 40 and 42 blocks cases. In particular, we improve the 32 blocks case by exhibiting optimal even-odd permutations with diffusion round of 9. The existence of such a permutation was an open problem for almost 10 years and the best known permutation in the literature had a diffusion round of 10. Moreover, our characterization can be implemented very efficiently and allows us to easily re-find all optimal even-odd permutations for up to 26 blocks with a basic exhaustive search
papers.abstract_zh: Feistel构造是构造分组密码研究最多的方法之一。然后在文献中提出了几种推广，导致了广义Feistel网络，其中循环函数首先在偶数个块上并行应用经典Feistel运算，然后对这组块应用置换。2010年在FSE，Suzaki和Minematsu研究了这种结构的扩散，提出了需要多少轮才能使密文的每个块都依赖于明文的所有块的问题。因此，对于由2至16个块组成的广义Feistel网络，他们给出了关于该扩散标准的一些最佳排列，并且给出了32个块的良好候选。后来在FSE的19，柯乔斯等人走得更远，能够提出最佳的奇偶排列多达26块。在本文中，我们通过为28、30、32、36个块构造最佳奇偶排列来完善文献，据我们所知，这些块迄今为止还是未知的。我们的构造和不可能性证明背后的主要思想是给定轮数后置换的总扩散的新特征。事实上，我们基于这一新的特征提出了一种有效的算法，该算法构造了28、30、32、36块情况下的所有最优奇偶置换，并证明了34、38、40和42块情况下的更好的下界。特别地，我们通过展示扩散轮数为9的最优奇偶置换来改进32块的情况。这种排列的存在是近10年的公开问题，文献中最著名的排列具有10的扩散轮。此外，我们的特征化可以非常有效地实现，并允许我们通过基本的穷举搜索轻松地重新找到多达26个块的所有最佳奇偶排列
papers.title_zh: 广义Feistel网络最佳扩散层的有效搜索

papers.title: A new SNOW stream cipher called SNOW-V
papers.authors: Patrik Ekdahl, Thomas Johansson, Alexander Maximov, Jing Yang
papers.abstract: In this paper we are proposing a new member in the SNOW family of stream ciphers, called SNOW-V. The motivation is to meet an industry demand of very high speed encryption in a virtualized environment, something that can be expected to be relevant in a future 5G mobile communication system. We are revising the SNOW 3G architecture to be competitive in such a pure software environment, making use of both existing acceleration instructions for the AES encryption round function as well as the ability of modern CPUs to handle large vectors of integers (e.g. SIMD instructions). We have kept the general design from SNOW 3G, in terms of linear feedback shift register (LFSR) and Finite State Machine (FSM), but both entities are updated to better align with vectorized implementations. The LFSR part is new and operates 8 times the speed of the FSM. We have furthermore increased the total state size by using 128-bit registers in the FSM, we use the full AES encryption round function in the FSM update, and, finally, the initialization phase includes a masking with key bits at its end. The result is an algorithm generally much faster than AES-256 and with expected security not worse than AES-256.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了流密码SNOW家族中的一个新成员，称为SNOW-V。其动机是满足虚拟化环境中非常高速加密的行业需求，这有望在未来的5G移动通信系统中得到应用。我们正在修改SNOW 3G架构，以便在这样一个纯软件环境中具有竞争力，同时利用现有的AES加密循环函数加速指令以及现代CPU处理大整数向量的能力(例如SIMD指令)。在线性反馈移位寄存器(LFSR)和有限状态机(FSM)方面，我们保留了SNOW 3G的一般设计，但这两个实体都进行了更新，以更好地与矢量化实现保持一致。LFSR部分是新的，工作速度是FSM的8倍。此外，我们还通过在FSM中使用128位寄存器来增加总状态大小，在FSM更新中使用完整的AES加密循环功能，最后，初始化阶段包括一个以密钥位结尾的屏蔽。结果是一种通常比AES-256快得多的算法，并且预期安全性不会比AES-256差。
papers.title_zh: 一种新的雪流密码SNOW-V

papers.title: DoveMAC: A TBC-based PRF with Smaller State, Full Security, and High Rate
papers.authors: Tony Grochow, Eik List, Mridul Nandi
papers.abstract: Recent parallelizable message authentication codes (MACs) have demonstrated the benefit of tweakable block ciphers (TBCs) for authentication with high security guarantees. With ZMAC, Iwata et al. extended this line of research by showing that TBCs can simultaneously increase the number of message bits that are processed per primitive call. However, ZMAC and previous TBC-based MACs needed more memory than sequential constructions. While this aspect is less an issue on desktop processors, it can be unfavorable on resource-constrained platforms. In contrast, existing sequential MACs limit the number of message bits to the block length of the primitive n or below.This work proposes DoveMAC, a TBC-based PRF that reduces the memory of ZMAC-based MACs to 2n+ 2t+2k bits, where n is the state size, t the tweak length, and k the key length of the underlying primitive. DoveMAC provides (n+min(n+t))/2 bits of security, and processes n+t bits per primitive call. Our construction is the first sequential MAC that combines beyond-birthday-bound security with a rate above n bits per call. By reserving a single tweak bit for domain separation, we derive a single-key variant DoveMAC1k.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的可并行化消息认证码(MACs)已经证明了可调分组密码(TBCs)在具有高安全性保证的认证方面的优势。有了ZMAC，Iwata等人扩展了这一研究方向，表明TBC可以同时增加每个原语调用处理的消息位数。然而，ZMAC和以前的基于TBC的MAC比顺序结构需要更多的内存。虽然这在桌面处理器上不是什么问题，但在资源受限的平台上却是不利的。相比之下，现有的顺序MAC将消息比特数限制在基元n的块长度或以下。这项工作提出了DoveMAC，一个基于TBC的PRF，它将基于ZMAC的MAC的内存减少到2n+ 2t+2k位，其中n是状态大小，t是tweak长度，k是底层原语的密钥长度。DoveMAC提供(n+min(n+t))/2位的安全性，每个原语调用处理n+t位。我们的构造是第一个将超生日限制安全性与每呼叫n位以上的速率相结合的顺序MAC。通过为域分离保留一个tweak位，我们得到了一个单键变体DoveMAC1k。
papers.title_zh: DoveMAC:一种基于TBC的小状态、全安全、高速率的PRF

papers.title: Revisit Division Property Based Cube Attacks: Key-Recovery or Distinguishing Attacks?
papers.authors: Chen-Dong Ye, Tian Tian
papers.abstract: Cube attacks are an important type of key recovery attacks against stream ciphers. In particular, they are shown to be powerful against Trivium-like ciphers. Traditional cube attacks are experimental attacks which could only exploit cubes of size less than 40. At CRYPTO 2017, division property based cube attacks were proposed by Todo et al., and an advantage of introducing the division property to cube attacks is that large cube sizes which are beyond the experimental range could be explored, and so powerful theoretical attacks were mounted on many lightweight stream ciphers.In this paper, we revisit the division property based cube attacks. There is an important assumption, called Weak Assumption, proposed in division property based cube attacks to support the effectiveness of key recovery. Todo et al. in CRYPTO 2017 said that the Weak Assumption was expected to hold for theoretically recovered superpolies of Trivium according to some experimental results on small cubes. In this paper, it is shown that the Weak Assumption often fails in cube attacks against Trivium, and moreover a new method to recover the exact superpoly of a given cube is developed based on the bit-based division property. With our method, for the cube I proposed by Todo et al. at CRYPTO 2017 to attack the 832-round Trivium, we recover its superpoly pI(x, v) = v68v78 · (x58⊕v70) · (x59x60⊕x34⊕x61). Furthermore, we prove that some best key recovery results given at CRYPTO 2018 on Trivium are actually distinguishing attacks. Hopefully this paper gives some new insights on accurately recovering the superpolies with the bit-based division property and also attract some attention on the validity of division property based cube attacks against stream ciphers.
papers.abstract_zh: 立方体攻击是针对流密码的一种重要的密钥恢复攻击。特别是，它们被证明对Trivium类密码是强有力的。传统的立方体攻击是实验性攻击，只能利用尺寸小于40的立方体。在CRYPTO 2017上，Todo等人提出了基于分割属性的立方体攻击，将分割属性引入立方体攻击的一个优点是可以探索超出实验范围的大立方体大小，因此在许多轻量级流密码上安装了强大的理论攻击。在本文中，我们重新审视了基于划分属性的立方体攻击。在基于分割属性的立方体攻击中提出了一个重要的假设，称为弱假设，以支持密钥恢复的有效性。Todo等人在CRYPTO 2017中表示，根据对小立方体的一些实验结果，弱假设预计将适用于理论上恢复的Trivium超重迭。本文证明了弱假设在针对Trivium的立方体攻击中经常失效，并基于基于位的划分性质提出了一种恢复给定立方体的精确超多边形的新方法。利用我们的方法，对于Todo等人在CRYPTO 2017上提出的攻击832轮Trivium的立方体I，我们恢复了它的超级poly pI(x，v)= v68v 78(x58⊕v70)(x59x60⊕x34⊕x61).此外，我们证明了Trivium上CRYPTO 2018给出的一些最佳密钥恢复结果实际上是区分攻击。希望本文能对基于比特划分性质的超重叠的精确恢复提供一些新的见解，并对基于划分性质的立方体攻击对抗流密码的有效性引起一些关注。
papers.title_zh: 基于分部属性的立方体攻击:密钥恢复还是区分攻击？

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of Plantlet
papers.authors: Subhadeep Banik, Khashayar Barooti, Takanori Isobe
papers.abstract:
Plantlet is a lightweight stream cipher designed by Mikhalev, Armknecht and Müller in IACR ToSC 2017. It has a Grain-like structure with two state registers of size 40 and 61 bits. In spite of this, the cipher does not seem to lose in security against generic Time-Memory-Data Tradeoff attacks due to the novelty of its design. The cipher uses a 80-bit secret key and a 90-bit IV. In this paper, we first present a key recovery attack on Plantlet that requires around 276.26 Plantlet encryptions. The attack leverages the fact that two internal states of Plantlet that differ in the 43rd LFSR location are guaranteed to produce keystream that are either equal or unequal in 45 locations with probability 1. Thus an attacker can with some probability guess that when 2 segments of keystream blocks possess the 45 bit difference just mentioned, they have been produced by two internal states that differ only in the 43rd LFSR location. Thereafter by solving a system of polynomial equations representing the keystream bits, the attacker can find the secret key if his guess was indeed correct, or reach some kind of contradiction if his guess was incorrect. In the latter event, he would repeat the procedure for other keystream blocks with the given difference. We show that the process when repeated a finite number of times, does indeed yield the value of the secret key. 
In the second part of the paper, we observe that the previous attack was limited to internal state differences that occurred at time instances that were congruent to 0 mod 80. We further observe that by generalizing the attack to include internal state differences that are congruent to all equivalence classed modulo 80, we lower the total number of keystream bits required to perform the attack and in the process reduce the attack complexity to 269.98 Plantlet encryptions.
papers.abstract_zh:
小植株是由Mikhalev、Armknecht和Müller在IACR ToSC 2017上设计的轻量级流密码。它有一个颗粒状结构，有两个大小分别为40位和61位的状态寄存器。尽管如此，由于其设计的新颖性，该密码在抵抗一般时间-存储器-数据折衷攻击的安全性方面似乎并没有损失。该密码使用80位密钥和90位IV。在这篇文章中，我们首先提出了一个密钥恢复攻击的幼苗，需要大约276.26个幼苗加密。该攻击利用了这样的事实，即在第43个LFSR位置不同的小植株的两个内部状态被保证以概率1产生在45个位置相等或不相等的密钥流。因此，攻击者可以以一定的概率猜测，当密钥流分组的2个片段具有刚才提到的45比特差异时，它们是由两个内部状态产生的，这两个内部状态仅在第43个LFSR位置不同。此后，通过求解表示密钥流比特的多项式方程组，如果攻击者的猜测确实是正确的，则攻击者可以找到秘密密钥，或者如果他的猜测是不正确的，则达到某种矛盾。在后一种情况下，他将对具有给定差异的其他密钥流块重复该过程。我们证明，当这个过程重复有限次时，确实会产生密钥的值。
在论文的第二部分，我们观察到之前的攻击仅限于发生在0 mod 80的时间实例的内部状态差异。我们进一步观察到，通过将攻击一般化为包括与模80的所有等价类一致的内部状态差异，我们降低了执行攻击所需的密钥流比特的总数，并且在该过程中将攻击复杂度降低到269.98个小植株加密。
papers.title_zh: 小苗密码分析

papers.title: New Related-Tweakey Boomerang and Rectangle Attacks on Deoxys-BC Including BDT Effect
papers.authors: Boxin Zhao, Xiaoyang Dong, Keting Jia
papers.abstract: In the CAESAR competition, Deoxys-I and Deoxys-II are two important authenticated encryption schemes submitted by Jean et al. Recently, Deoxys-II together with Ascon, ACORN, AEGIS-128, OCB and COLM have been selected as the final CAESAR portfolio. Notably, Deoxys-II is also the primary choice for the use case “Defense in depth”. However, Deoxys-I remains to be one of the third-round candidates of the CAESAR competition. Both Deoxys-I and Deoxys-II adopt Deoxys-BC-256 and Deoxys-BC-384 as their internal tweakable block ciphers.In this paper, we investigate the security of round-reduced Deoxys-BC-256/-384 and Deoxys-I against the related-tweakey boomerang and rectangle attacks with some new boomerang distinguishers. For Deoxys-BC-256, we present 10-round related-tweakey boomerang and rectangle attacks for the popular setting (|tweak|, |key|) = (128, 128), which reach one more round than the previous attacks in this setting. Moreover, an 11-round related-tweakey rectangle attack on Deoxys-BC-256 is given for the first time. We also put forward a 13-round related-tweakey boomerang attack in the popular setting (|tweak|, |key|) = (128, 256) for Deoxys-BC-384, while the previous attacks in this setting only work for 12 rounds at most. In addition, the first 14-round relatedtweakey rectangle attack on Deoxys-BC-384 is given when (|tweak| < 98, |key| > 286), that attacks one more round than before. Besides, we give the first 10-round rectangle attack on the authenticated encryption mode Deoxys-I-128-128 with one more round than before, and we also reduce the complexity of the related-tweakey rectangle attack on 12-round Deoxys-I-256-128 by a factor of 228. Our attacks can not be applied to (round-reduced) Deoxys-II.
papers.abstract_zh: 在凯撒竞赛中，代欧奇希斯-I和代欧奇希斯-II是Jean等人提交的两个重要的认证加密方案，最近，代欧奇希斯-II与Ascon、ACORN、AEGIS-128、OCB和COLM一起被选为最终的凯撒组合。值得注意的是，代欧奇希斯-II也是用例“纵深防御”的主要选择。然而，代欧奇希斯-I仍然是凯撒竞争的第三轮候选人之一。代欧奇希斯-I和代欧奇希斯-II都采用代欧奇希斯-BC-256和代欧奇希斯-BC-384作为内部可调分组密码。在这篇文章中，我们用一些新的回飞镖区分符研究了轮约化的代欧奇希斯-BC-256/-384和代欧奇希斯-I在相关的扭曲回飞镖和矩形攻击下的安全性。对于代欧奇希斯-BC-256，我们提出了流行设置(|tweak|，|key|) = (128，128)的10轮相关tweakey回旋镖和矩形攻击，这比该设置中的先前攻击多到达一轮。此外，首次给出了对代欧奇希斯-BC-256的11轮相关扭键矩形攻击。我们还针对代欧奇希斯-BC-384提出了流行设置(|tweak|，|key|) = (128，256)下的13轮相关tweakey回旋镖攻击，而之前在该设置下的攻击最多只能工作12轮。此外，当(|tweak| < 98，|key| > 286)时，给出了代欧奇希斯-BC-384的第一个14轮相关矩形攻击，它比以前多攻击一轮。此外，我们给出了对认证加密模式代欧奇希斯-I-128-128的第一个10轮矩形攻击，比以前多了一轮，并且我们还将对12轮代欧奇希斯-I-256-128的相关扭曲矩形攻击的复杂度降低了228倍。我们的攻击不能应用于(四舍五入)代欧奇希斯-II。
papers.title_zh: 新的相关-扭曲的回旋镖和矩形攻击代欧奇希斯-公元前包括BDT效应

papers.title: Substitution Attacks against Message Authentication
papers.authors: Marcel Armour, Bertram Poettering
papers.abstract: This work introduces Algorithm Substitution Attacks (ASAs) on message authentication schemes. In light of revelations concerning mass surveillance, ASAs were initially introduced by Bellare, Paterson and Rogaway as a novel attack class against the confidentiality of encryption schemes. Such an attack replaces one or more of the regular scheme algorithms with a subverted version that aims to reveal information to an adversary (engaged in mass surveillance), while remaining undetected by users. While most prior work focused on subverting encryption systems, we study options to subvert symmetric message authentication protocols. In particular we provide powerful generic attacks that apply e.g. to HMAC or Carter–Wegman based schemes, inducing only a negligible implementation overhead. As subverted authentication can act as an enabler for subverted encryption (software updates can be manipulated to include replacements of encryption routines), we consider attacks of the new class highly impactful and dangerous.
papers.abstract_zh: 这项工作介绍了算法替代攻击(ASAs)的消息认证方案。鉴于有关大规模监控的揭露，ASAs最初是由Bellare、Paterson和Rogaway提出的，作为一种针对加密方案保密性的新型攻击类别。这种攻击将一个或多个常规方案算法替换为颠覆版本，旨在向对手(从事大规模监视)揭示信息，同时保持不被用户检测到。虽然大多数先前的工作集中在颠覆加密系统，我们研究颠覆对称消息认证协议的选项。特别是，我们提供了强大的通用攻击，例如适用于HMAC或卡特-威格曼为基础的方案，导致只有微不足道的实施开销。由于被破坏的身份验证可能成为被破坏的加密的促成因素(软件更新可能被操纵以包括加密例程的替换)，我们认为这种新类型的攻击极具影响力且非常危险。
papers.title_zh: 针对消息认证的替代攻击

papers.title: New Semi-Free-Start Collision Attack Framework for Reduced RIPEMD-160
papers.authors: Fukang Liu, Christoph Dobraunig, Florian Mendel, Takanori Isobe, Gaoli Wang, Zhenfu Cao
papers.abstract: RIPEMD-160 is a hash function published in 1996, which shares similarities with other hash functions designed in this time-period like MD4, MD5 and SHA-1. However, for RIPEMD-160, no (semi-free-start) collision attacks on the full number of steps are known. Hence, it is still used, e.g., to generate Bitcoin addresses together with SHA-256, and is an ISO/IEC standard. Due to its dual-stream structure, even semifree- start collision attacks starting from the first step only reach 36 steps, which were firstly shown by Mendel et al. at Asiacrypt 2013 and later improved by Liu, Mendel and Wang at Asiacrypt 2017. Both of the attacks are based on a similar freedom degree utilization technique as proposed by Landelle and Peyrin at Eurocrypt 2013. However, the best known semi-free-start collision attack on 36 steps of RIPEMD-160 presented at Asiacrypt 2017 still requires 255.1 time and 232 memory. Consequently, a practical semi-free-start collision attack for the first 36 steps of RIPEMD-160 still requires a significant amount of resources. Considering the structure of these previous semi-free-start collision attacks for 36 steps of RIPEMD-160, it seems hard to extend it to more steps. Thus, we develop a different semi-free-start collision attack framework for reduced RIPEMD-160 by carefully investigating the message expansion of RIPEMD-160. Our new framework has several advantages. First of all, it allows to extend the attacks to more steps. Second, the memory complexity of the attacks is negligible. Hence, we were able to mount semi-free-start collision attacks on 36 and 37 steps of RIPEMD-160 with practical time complexity 241 and 249 respectively. Additionally, we describe semi-free-start collision attacks on 38 and 40 (out of 80) steps of RIPEMD-160 with time complexity 252 and 274.6, respectively. To the best of our knowledge, these are the best semi-free-start collision attacks for RIPEMD-160 starting from the first step with respect to the number of steps, including the first practical colliding message pairs for 36 and 37 steps of RIPEMD-160.
papers.abstract_zh: RIPEMD-160是1996年发布的哈希函数，它与这一时期设计的其他哈希函数如MD4、MD5和SHA-1有相似之处。然而，对于RIPEMD-160，还不知道对全部步数的(半自由启动)碰撞攻击。因此，它仍然被用于，例如，与SHA-256一起生成比特币地址，并且是ISO/IEC标准。由于其双流结构，即使是从第一步开始的半自由启动碰撞攻击也只有36步，这是由Mendel等人在Asiacrypt 2013上首次提出的，随后由刘、Mendel和王在Asiacrypt 2017上进行了改进。这两种攻击都基于Landelle和Peyrin在Eurocrypt 2013上提出的类似自由度利用技术。然而，在Asiacrypt 2017上展示的RIPEMD-160的36步上最著名的半自由启动碰撞攻击仍然需要255.1时间和232内存。因此，RIPEMD-160前36步的实际半自由启动碰撞攻击仍然需要大量的资源。考虑到RIPEMD-160之前36步的这些半自由启动碰撞攻击的结构，似乎很难将其扩展到更多步。因此，我们通过仔细研究RIPEMD-160的消息扩展，为简化的RIPEMD-160开发了不同的半自由启动碰撞攻击框架。我们的新框架有几个优点。首先，它允许将攻击扩展到更多的步骤。第二，攻击的记忆复杂性可以忽略不计。因此，我们能够在RIPEMD-160的36步和37步上发起半自由启动碰撞攻击，实际时间复杂度分别为241和249。另外，我们描述了在RIPEMD-160的38步和40步(80步)上的半自由启动碰撞攻击，时间复杂度分别为252和274.6。据我们所知，这些是RIPEMD-160从第一步开始的关于步数的最佳半自由启动碰撞攻击，包括RIPEMD-160的36和37步的第一个实际碰撞消息对。
papers.title_zh: 简化的RIPEMD-160新的半自由启动碰撞攻击框架

papers.title: Security of Symmetric Primitives against Key-Correlated Attacks
papers.authors: Aisling Connolly, Pooya Farshim, Georg Fuchsbauer
papers.abstract: We study the security of symmetric primitives against key-correlated attacks (KCA), whereby an adversary can arbitrarily correlate keys, messages, and ciphertexts. Security against KCA is required whenever a primitive should securely encrypt key-dependent data, even when it is used under related keys. KCA is a strengthening of the previously considered notions of related-key attack (RKA) and key-dependent message (KDM) security. This strengthening is strict, as we show that 2-round Even–Mansour fails to be KCA secure even though it is both RKA and KDM secure. We provide feasibility results in the ideal-cipher model for KCAs and show that 3-round Even–Mansour is KCA secure under key offsets in the random-permutation model. We also give a natural transformation that converts any authenticated encryption scheme to a KCA-secure one in the random-oracle model. Conceptually, our results allow for a unified treatment of RKA and KDM security in idealized models of computation.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们研究对称原语对抗密钥相关攻击(KCA)的安全性，攻击者可以任意关联密钥、消息和密文。每当原语应该安全地加密依赖于密钥的数据时，即使是在相关密钥下使用，也需要针对KCA的安全性。KCA是对以前考虑的相关密钥攻击(RKA)和密钥相关消息(KDM)安全概念的加强。这种加强是严格的，因为我们证明了两轮偶数曼苏尔不能是KCA安全的，即使它是RKA和KDM安全的。我们提供了KCAs的理想密码模型的可行性结果，并表明在随机置换模型中，3轮偶数曼苏尔在密钥偏移下是KCA安全的。我们还给出了一个自然的变换，在随机预言模型下，它可以将任何认证加密方案转换成KCA安全的方案。从概念上讲，我们的结果允许在理想化的计算模型中统一处理RKA和KDM安全性。
papers.title_zh: 对称原语对抗密钥相关攻击的安全性

papers.title: Exhaustive Search for Various Types of MDS Matrices
papers.authors: Abhishek Kesarwani, Santanu Sarkar, Ayineedi Venkateswarlu
papers.abstract: MDS matrices are used in the design of diffusion layers in many block ciphers and hash functions due to their optimal branch number. But MDS matrices, in general, have costly implementations. So in search for efficiently implementable MDS matrices, there have been many proposals. In particular, circulant, Hadamard, and recursive MDS matrices from companion matrices have been widely studied. In a recent work, recursive MDS matrices from sparse DSI matrices are studied, which are of interest due to their low fixed cost in hardware implementation. In this paper, we present results on the exhaustive search for (recursive) MDS matrices over GL(4, F2). Specifically, circulant MDS matrices of order 4, 5, 6, 7, 8; Hadamard MDS matrices of order 4, 8; recursive MDS matrices from companion matrices of order 4; recursive MDS matrices from sparse DSI matrices of order 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 are considered. It is to be noted that the exhaustive search is impractical with a naive approach. We first use some linear algebra tools to restrict the search to a smaller domain and then apply some space-time trade-off techniques to get the solutions. From the set of solutions in the restricted domain, one can easily generate all the solutions in the full domain. From the experimental results, we can see the (non) existence of (involutory) MDS matrices for the choices mentioned above. In particular, over GL(4, F2), we provide companion matrices of order 4 that yield involutory MDS matrices, circulant MDS matrices of order 8, and establish the nonexistence of involutory circulant MDS matrices of order 6, 8, circulant MDS matrices of order 7, sparse DSI matrices of order 4 that yield involutory MDS matrices, and sparse DSI matrices of order 5, 6, 7, 8 that yield MDS matrices. To the best of our knowledge, these results were not known before. For the choices mentioned above, if such MDS matrices exist, we provide base sets of MDS matrices, from which all the MDS matrices with the least cost (with respect to d-XOR and s-XOR counts) can be obtained. We also take this opportunity to present some results on the search for sparse DSI matrices over finite fields that yield MDS matrices. We establish that there is no sparse DSI matrix S of order 8 over F28 such that S8 is MDS.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于MDS矩阵的最佳分支数，它们被用于许多分组密码和散列函数中扩散层的设计。但是一般来说，MDS矩阵的实现成本很高。因此，在寻找有效实现的MDS矩阵方面，已经有许多建议。特别是，循环矩阵，哈达玛矩阵和递归MDS矩阵从友矩阵已被广泛研究。在最近的工作中，研究了稀疏DSI矩阵的递归MDS矩阵，由于其在硬件实现中的低固定成本，这是令人感兴趣的。本文给出了GL(4，F2)上(递归)MDS矩阵穷举搜索的结果。具体地，4、5、6、7、8阶循环MDS矩阵；4、8阶哈达玛MDS矩阵；从4阶友矩阵得到递归MDS矩阵:考虑了来自4、5、6、7、8阶稀疏DSI矩阵的递归MDS矩阵。要注意的是，对于幼稚的方法，穷举搜索是不切实际的。我们首先使用一些线性代数工具将搜索限制在一个较小的范围内，然后应用一些时空折衷技术来获得解。从受限域中的解的集合，可以容易地生成全域中的所有解。从实验结果，我们可以看到(不)存在的(对合)MDS矩阵为上述选择。特别地，在GL(4，F2)上，我们提供了产生对合MDS矩阵的4阶伴随矩阵，8阶循环MDS矩阵，并且建立了不存在6，8阶对合循环MDS矩阵，7阶循环MDS矩阵，产生对合MDS矩阵的4阶稀疏DSI矩阵，以及产生MDS矩阵的5，6，7，8阶稀疏DSI矩阵。据我们所知，这些结果以前是未知的。对于上面提到的选择，如果这样的MDS矩阵存在，我们提供MDS矩阵的基集，从中可以获得所有具有最小成本(关于d-XOR和s-XOR计数)的MDS矩阵。我们也借此机会提出一些关于在产生MDS矩阵的有限域上寻找稀疏DSI矩阵的结果。我们建立了F28上没有8阶稀疏DSI矩阵S，使得S8是MDS。
papers.title_zh: 穷尽搜索各种类型的MDS矩阵

papers.title: Deck-Based Wide Block Cipher Modes and an Exposition of the Blinded Keyed Hashing Model
papers.authors: Aldo Gunsing, Joan Daemen, Bart Mennink
papers.abstract: We present two tweakable wide block cipher modes from doubly-extendable cryptographic keyed (deck) functions and a keyed hash function: double-decker and docked-double-decker. Double-decker is a direct generalization of Farfalle-WBC of Bertoni et al. (ToSC 2017(4)), and is a four-round Feistel network on two arbitrarily large branches, where the middle two rounds call deck functions and the first and last rounds call the keyed hash function. Docked-double-decker is a variant of double-decker where the bulk of the input to the deck functions is moved to the keyed hash functions. We prove that the distinguishing advantage of the resulting wide block ciphers is simply two times the sum of the pseudorandom function distinguishing advantage of the deck function and the blinded keyed hashing distinguishing advantage of the keyed hash functions. We demonstrate that blinded keyed hashing is more general than the conventional notion of XOR-universality, and that it allows us to instantiate our constructions with keyed hash functions that have a very strong claim on bkh security but not necessarily on XOR-universality, such as Xoofffie (ePrint 2018/767). The bounds of double-decker and docked-double-decker are moreover reduced tweak-dependent, informally meaning that collisions on the keyed hash function for different tweaks only have a limited impact. We describe two use cases that can exploit this property opportunistically to get stronger security than what would be achieved with prior solutions: SSD encryption, where each sector can only be written to a limited number of times, and incremental tweaks, where one includes the state of the system in the variable-length tweak and appends new data incrementally.
