papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了两种可调整的宽分组密码模式:双层密码和对接双层密码。双层是贝尔托尼等人的Farfalle-WBC(ToSC 2017(4))的直接推广，是两个任意大的分支上的四轮Feistel网络，中间两轮调用deck函数，第一轮和最后一轮调用keyed hash函数。Docked-double-decker是double-decker的变体，其中deck函数的大部分输入被移动到键控散列函数。我们证明了所得到的宽分组密码的区别优势仅仅是甲板函数的伪随机函数区别优势和带密钥散列函数的盲带密钥散列区别优势之和的两倍。我们证明了盲密钥哈希比XOR-普适性的传统概念更通用，并且它允许我们用密钥哈希函数来实例化我们的构造，这些函数对bkh安全性有很强的要求，但不一定对XOR-普适性有要求，例如Xoofffie (ePrint 2018/767)。此外，双层和停靠双层的界限减少了依赖于调整，非正式地意味着不同调整的键控散列函数上的冲突仅具有有限的影响。我们描述了两个用例，它们可以利用这一特性来获得比以前的解决方案更强的安全性:SSD加密，其中每个扇区只能被写入有限的次数，以及增量调整，其中一个在可变长度调整中包括系统的状态，并以增量方式附加新数据。
papers.title_zh: 基于卡片组的宽分组密码模式及盲密钥哈希模型的阐述

papers.title: Efficient Side-Channel Secure Message Authentication with Better Bounds
papers.authors: Chun Guo, François-Xavier Standaert, Weijia Wang, Yu Yu
papers.abstract: We investigate constructing message authentication schemes from symmetric cryptographic primitives, with the goal of achieving security when most intermediate values during tag computation and verification are leaked (i.e., mode-level leakage-resilience). Existing efficient proposals typically follow the plain Hash-then-MAC paradigm T = TGenK(H(M)). When the domain of the MAC function TGenK is {0, 1}128, e.g., when instantiated with the AES, forgery is possible within time 264 and data complexity 1. To dismiss such cheap attacks, we propose two modes: LRW1-based Hash-then-MAC (LRWHM) that is built upon the LRW1 tweakable blockcipher of Liskov, Rivest, and Wagner, and Rekeying Hash-then-MAC (RHM) that employs internal rekeying. Built upon secure AES implementations, LRWHM is provably secure up to (beyond-birthday) 278.3 time complexity, while RHM is provably secure up to 2121 time. Thus in practice, their main security threat is expected to be side-channel key recovery attacks against the AES implementations. Finally, we benchmark the performance of instances of our modes based on the AES and SHA3 and confirm their efficiency.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们研究从对称密码原语构建消息认证方案，目标是在标签计算和验证期间的大多数中间值泄漏时实现安全性(即模式级泄漏弹性)。现有的有效建议通常遵循简单的先散列后MAC范式T = TGenK(H(M))。当MAC函数TGenK的域是{0，1}128时，例如，当用AES实例化时，伪造可能在时间264和数据复杂度1内。为了消除这种廉价的攻击，我们提出了两种模式:基于LRW1的Hash-then-MAC (LRWHM ),它建立在Liskov、Rivest和Wagner的LRW1可调分组密码的基础上；以及采用内部密钥更新的密钥更新Hash-then-MAC (RHM)。基于安全AES实现，LRWHM是可证明安全的，时间复杂度为278.3倍，而RHM是可证明安全的，时间复杂度为2121倍。因此，在实践中，他们的主要安全威胁预计是针对AES实现的旁路密钥恢复攻击。最后，我们基于AES和SHA3对我们的模式实例的性能进行了基准测试，并确认了它们的效率。
papers.title_zh: 具有更好界限的高效边信道安全消息认证

papers.title: Iterative Block Ciphers from Tweakable Block Ciphers with Long Tweaks
papers.authors: Ryota Nakamichi, Tetsu Iwata
papers.abstract: We consider a problem of constructing a secure block cipher from a tweakable block cipher (TBC) with long tweaks. Given a TBC with n-bit blocks and Γn-bit tweaks for Γ ≥ 1, one of the constructions by Minematsu in DCC 2015 shows that a simple iteration of the TBC for 3d rounds yields a block cipher with dn-bit blocks that is secure up to 2dn/2 queries, where d = Γ + 1. In this paper, we show three results.1. Iteration of 3d − 2 rounds is enough for the security up to 2dn/2 queries, i.e., the security remains the same even if we reduce the number of rounds by two.2. When the number of queries is limited to 2n, d+1 rounds are enough, and with d + l rounds for 1 ≤ l ≤ d − 1, the security bound improves as l grows.3. A d-round construction gives a block cipher secure up to 2n/2 queries, i.e., it achieves the classical birthday-bound security. Our results show that a block cipher with beyond-birthday-bound (BBB) security (with respect to n) is obtained as low as d + 1 rounds, and we draw the security spectrum of d + l round version in the range of 1 ≤ l ≤ d−1 and l = 2d−2 for BBB security, and l = 0 for birthday-bound security.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们考虑一个从长调整的可调整分组密码(TBC)构造安全分组密码的问题。给定一个具有n比特块和γn比特调整的TBC，其中γ≥1，Minematsu在DCC 2015中的一个构造表明，对于3d轮，TBC的简单迭代产生一个具有dn比特块的分组密码，该分组密码在高达2dn/2次查询中是安全的，其中d =γ+1。在本文中，我们展示了三个结果:1 . 3d-2轮的迭代对于高达2dn/2次查询的安全性是足够的，即，即使我们将轮数减少两次，安全性也保持不变。2 .当查询数限制为2n时，d+1轮是足够的，并且对于1≤l≤D1的d+1轮，安全界限随着l的增长而提高。3 . d-轮构造给出了安全高达2n/2次查询的分组密码，即，它实现了经典的生日界限安全性。我们的结果表明，一个具有超越生日界限(BBB)安全性(相对于n)的分组密码可以低至d + 1轮获得，我们在1≤l≤D1和l = 2d 2的范围内绘制了d+1轮版本的BBB安全性谱，l = 0的生日界限安全性谱。
papers.title_zh: 基于长调整的可调整分组密码的迭代分组密码

papers.title: INT-RUP Secure Lightweight Parallel AE Modes
papers.authors: Avik Chakraborti, Nilanjan Datta, Ashwin Jha, Cuauhtemoc Mancillas-López, Mridul Nandi, Yu Sasaki
papers.abstract: Owing to the growing demand for lightweight cryptographic solutions, NIST has initiated a standardization process for lightweight cryptographic algorithms. Specific to authenticated encryption (AE), the NIST draft demands that the scheme should have one primary member that has key length of 128 bits, and it should be secure for at least 250 − 1 byte queries and 2112 computations. Popular (lightweight) modes, such as OCB, OTR, CLOC, SILC, JAMBU, COFB, SAEB, Beetle, SUNDAE etc., require at least 128-bit primitives to meet the NIST criteria, as all of them are just birthday bound secure. Furthermore, most of them are sequential, and they either use a two pass mode or they do not offer any security when the adversary has access to unverified plaintext (RUP model). In this paper, we propose two new designs for lightweight AE modes, called LOCUS and LOTUS, structurally similar to OCB and OTR, respectively. These modes achieve notably higher AE security bounds with lighter primitives (only a 64-bit tweakable block cipher). Especially, they satisfy the NIST requirements: secure as long as the data complexity is less than 264 bytes and time complexity is less than 2128, even when instantiated with a primitive with 64-bit block and 128-bit key. Both these modes are fully parallelizable and provide full integrity security under the RUP model. We use TweGIFT-64[4,16,16,4] (also referred as TweGIFT-64), a tweakable variant of the GIFT block cipher, to instantiate our AE modes. TweGIFT-64-LOCUS and TweGIFT-64-LOTUS are significantly light in hardware implementation. To justify, we provide our FPGA based implementation results, which demonstrate that TweGIFT-64-LOCUS consumes only 257 slices and 690 LUTs, while TweGIFT-64-LOTUS consumes only 255 slices and 664 LUTs.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于对轻量级加密解决方案的需求不断增长，NIST启动了轻量级加密算法的标准化进程。具体到认证加密(AE)，NIST草案要求该方案应该具有一个密钥长度为128位的主成员，并且对于至少2501字节的查询和2112次计算应该是安全的。流行(轻量级)模式，如OCB，OTR，CLOC，SILC，JAMBU，COFB，SAEB，甲壳虫，圣代等。，需要至少128位原语来满足NIST标准，因为它们都是生日绑定安全的。此外，它们中的大多数是顺序的，并且它们或者使用两次通过模式，或者当对手可以访问未经验证的明文时，它们不提供任何安全性(RUP模型)。在这篇论文中，我们提出了两种轻量级AE模式的新设计，称为LOCUS和LOTUS，结构上分别类似于OCB和OTR。这些模式以较轻的原语(只有一个64位可调分组密码)实现了显著更高的AE安全界限。特别地，它们满足NIST要求:只要数据复杂度小于264字节并且时间复杂度小于2128，即使当用具有64位块和128位密钥的原语进行实例化时，它们也是安全的。这两种模式都是完全并行的，并在RUP模式下提供完全的完整性安全性。我们使用TweGIFT-64[4，16，16，4](也称为TweGIFT-64)，这是GIFT分组密码的一个可调整的变体，来实例化我们的AE模式。TweGIFT-64-LOCUS和TweGIFT-64-LOTUS在硬件实现上要轻得多。为了证明这一点，我们提供了基于FPGA的实现结果，表明TweGIFT-64-LOCUS仅消耗257个切片和690个lut，而TweGIFT-64-LOTUS仅消耗255个切片和664个lut。
papers.title_zh: RUP安全轻量级并行AE模式

papers.title: Release of Unverified Plaintext: Tight Unified Model and Application to ANYDAE
papers.authors: Donghoon Chang, Nilanjan Datta, Avijit Dutta, Bart Mennink, Mridul Nandi, Somitra Sanadhya, Ferdinand Sibleyras
papers.abstract: Authenticated encryption schemes are usually expected to offer confidentiality and authenticity. In case of release of unverified plaintext (RUP), an adversary gets separated access to the decryption and verification functionality, and has more power in breaking the scheme. Andreeva et al. (ASIACRYPT 2014) formalized RUP security using plaintext awareness, informally meaning that the decryption functionality gives no extra power in breaking confidentiality, and INT-RUP security, covering authenticity in case of RUP. We describe a single, unified model, called AERUP security, that ties together these notions: we prove that an authenticated encryption scheme is AERUP secure if and only if it is conventionally secure, plaintext aware, and INT-RUP secure. We next present ANYDAE, a generalization of SUNDAE of Banik et al. (ToSC 2018/3). ANYDAE is a lightweight deterministic scheme that is based on a block cipher with block size n and arbitrary mixing functions that all operate on an n-bit state. It is particularly efficient for short messages, it does not rely on a nonce, and it provides maximal robustness to a lack of secure state. Whereas SUNDAE is not secure under release of unverified plaintext (a fairly simple attack can be mounted in constant time), ANYDAE is. We make handy use of the AERUP security model to prove that ANYDAE achieves both conventional security as RUP security, provided that certain modest conditions on the mixing functions are met. We describe two simple instances, called MONDAE and TUESDAE, that conform to these conditions and that are competitive with SUNDAE, in terms of efficiency and optimality.
papers.abstract_zh: 认证加密方案通常被期望提供机密性和真实性。在未经验证的明文(RUP)被释放的情况下，对手获得了对解密和验证功能的单独访问，并且在破解该方案方面具有更大的能力。Andreeva等人(ASIACRYPT 2014)使用明文感知形式化了RUP安全性，非正式地表示解密功能在破坏机密性方面没有额外的能力，以及RUP间安全性，涵盖了RUP的真实性。我们描述了一个单一的、统一的模型，称为AERUP安全，它将这些概念联系在一起:我们证明了一个认证加密方案是AERUP安全的当且仅当它是常规安全的、明文感知的和RUP间安全的。我们接下来介绍ANYDAE，它是Banik等人(ToSC 2018/3)的圣代的推广。ANYDAE是一种轻量级的确定性方案，它基于块大小为n的块密码和任意混合函数，所有这些函数都在n位状态下运行。它对于短消息特别有效，它不依赖于随机数，并且它对缺乏安全状态提供了最大的健壮性。尽管SUNDAE在发布未经验证的明文的情况下是不安全的(可以在恒定时间内发起相当简单的攻击)，但ANYDAE是安全的。我们方便地使用AERUP安全模型来证明ANYDAE实现了常规安全性和RUP安全性，前提是满足混合函数的某些适度条件。我们描述了两个简单的实例，称为MONDAE和TUESDAE，它们符合这些条件，并且在效率和最优性方面与SUNDAE竞争。
papers.title_zh: 未验证明文的发布:紧密统一模型及其在ANYDAE中的应用

papers.title: Lightweight Iterative MDS Matrices: How Small Can We Go?
papers.authors: Shun Li, Siwei Sun, Danping Shi, Chaoyun Li, Lei Hu
papers.abstract: As perfect building blocks for the diffusion layers of many symmetric-key primitives, the construction of MDS matrices with lightweight circuits has received much attention from the symmetric-key community. One promising way of realizing low-cost MDS matrices is based on the iterative construction: a low-cost matrix becomes MDS after rising it to a certain power. To be more specific, if At is MDS, then one can implement A instead of At to achieve the MDS property at the expense of an increased latency with t clock cycles. In this work, we identify the exact lower bound of the number of nonzero blocks for a 4 × 4 block matrix to be potentially iterative-MDS. Subsequently, we show that the theoretically lightest 4 × 4 iterative MDS block matrix (whose entries or blocks are 4 × 4 binary matrices) with minimal nonzero blocks costs at least 3 XOR gates, and a concrete example achieving the 3-XOR bound is provided. Moreover, we prove that there is no hope for previous constructions (GFS, LFS, DSI, and spares DSI) to beat this bound. Since the circuit latency is another important factor, we also consider the lower bound of the number of iterations for certain iterative MDS matrices. Guided by these bounds and based on the ideas employed to identify them, we explore the design space of lightweight iterative MDS matrices with other dimensions and report on improved results. Whenever we are unable to find better results, we try to determine the bound of the optimal solution. As a result, the optimality of some previous results is proved.
papers.abstract_zh: 作为许多对称密钥基元的扩散层的完美构造块，具有轻量级电路的MDS矩阵的构造受到了对称密钥团体的极大关注。实现低成本MDS矩阵的一种有希望的方式是基于迭代构造:低成本矩阵在自乘到某个幂后成为MDS。更具体地说，如果At是MDS，则可以实现A而不是At来实现MDS特性，代价是t个时钟周期的延迟增加。在这项工作中，我们确定了一个4 × 4分块矩阵的非零块数的准确下界是潜在的迭代MDS。随后，我们证明了具有最小非零块的理论上最轻的4 × 4迭代MDS块矩阵(其元素或块是4 × 4二进制矩阵)至少需要3个异或门，并给出了实现3-异或界的具体例子。此外，我们证明以前的构造(GFS、LFS、DSI和备用DSI)没有希望超越这个界限。由于电路等待时间是另一个重要因素，我们还考虑了某些迭代MDS矩阵的迭代次数的下限。在这些界限的指导下，基于用来识别它们的思想，我们探索了具有其他维度的轻量级迭代MDS矩阵的设计空间，并报告了改进的结果。每当我们无法找到更好的结果时，我们就试图确定最优解的界限。结果证明了一些已有结果的最优性。
papers.title_zh: 轻量级迭代MDS矩阵:我们能做到多小？

papers.title: Improved Security Evaluation of SPN Block Ciphers and its Applications in the Single-key Attack on SKINNY
papers.authors: Wenying Zhang, Meichun Cao, Jian Guo, Enes Pasalic
papers.abstract: In this paper, a new method for evaluating the integral property, truncated and impossible differentials for substitution-permutation network (SPN) block ciphers is proposed. The main assumption is an explicit description/expression of the internal state words in terms of the plaintext (ciphertext) words. By counting the number of times these words occur in the internal state expression, we can evaluate the resistance of a given block cipher to integral and impossible/truncated differential attacks more accurately than previous methods. More precisely, we explore the cryptographic consequences of uneven frequency of occurrences of plaintext (ciphertext) words appearing in the algebraic expression of the internal state words. This approach gives a new family of distinguishers employing different concepts such as the integral property, impossible/truncated differentials and the so-called zero-sum property. We then provide algorithms to determine the maximum number of rounds of such new types of distinguishers for SPN block ciphers. The potential and efficiency of this relatively simple method is confirmed through applications. For instance, in the case of SKINNY block cipher, several 10-round integral distinguishers, all of the 11-round impossible differentials, and a 7-round truncated differential could be determined. For the last case, using a single pair of plaintexts differing in three words so that (a = b = c) ≠ (a’ = b’ = c’), we are able to distinguish 7-round SKINNY from random permutations. More importantly, exploiting our distinguishers, we give the first practical attack on 11-round SKINNY-128-128 in the single-key setting (a theoretical attack reaches 16 rounds). Finally, using the same ideas, we provide a concise explanation on the existing distinguishers for round-reduced AES.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了一种新的评估替代置换网络(SPN)分组密码的积分性质、截断差分和不可能差分的方法。主要假设是根据明文(密文)字对内部状态字的显式描述/表达。通过统计这些字在内部状态表达式中出现的次数，我们可以比以前的方法更准确地评估给定分组密码对整数和不可能/截断差分攻击的抵抗能力。更准确地说，我们探索了明文(密文)字出现在内部状态字的代数表达式中的不均匀频率的密码后果。这种方法给出了一类新的区分器，它们采用了不同的概念，如积分性质、不可能/截断微分和所谓的零和性质。然后，我们提供算法来确定SPN分组密码的这种新型区分符的最大轮数。这种相对简单的方法的潜力和效率通过应用得到了证实。例如，在瘦分组密码的情况下，可以确定几个10轮整数区分符、所有11轮不可能差分和7轮截断差分。对于最后一种情况，使用三个单词不同的一对明文，使得(a = b = c)≨( a’= b’= c’)，我们能够从随机排列中区分7轮SKINNY。更重要的是，利用我们的区分符，我们给出了在单键设置下对11轮SKINNY-128-128的第一次实际攻击(理论攻击达到16轮)。最后，使用相同的思想，我们提供了一个简洁的解释，对现有的区分轮约简AES。
papers.title_zh: 改进的SPN分组密码安全性评估及其在SKINNY单键攻击中的应用

papers.title: Cube-Based Cryptanalysis of Subterranean-SAE
papers.authors: Fukang Liu, Takanori Isobe, Willi Meier
papers.abstract: Subterranean 2.0 designed by Daemen, Massolino and Rotella is a Round 2 candidate of the NIST Lightweight Cryptography Standardization process. In the official document of Subterranean 2.0, the designers have analyzed the state collisions in unkeyed absorbing by reducing the number of rounds to absorb the message from 2 to 1. However, little cryptanalysis of the authenticated encryption scheme Subterranean-SAE is made. For Subterranean-SAE, the designers introduce 8 blank rounds to separate the controllable input and output, and expect that 8 blank rounds can achieve a sufficient diffusion. Therefore, it is meaningful to investigate the security by reducing the number of blank rounds. Moreover, the designers make no security claim but expect a non-trivial effort to achieve full-state recovery in a nonce-misuse scenario. In this paper, we present the first practical full-state recovery attack in a nonce-misuse scenario with data complexity of 213 32-bit blocks. In addition, in a nonce-respecting scenario and if the number of blank rounds is reduced to 4, we can mount a key-recovery attack with 2122 calls to the internal permutation of Subterranean-SAE and 269.5 32-bit blocks. A distinguishing attack with 233 calls to the internal permutation of Subterranean-SAE and 233 32-bit blocks is achieved as well. Our cryptanalysis does not threaten the security claim for Subterranean-SAE and we hope it can enhance the understanding of Subterranean-SAE.
papers.abstract_zh: 由代蒙、马索利诺和罗泰拉设计的地下2.0是NIST轻量级加密标准化进程的第二轮候选。在地下2.0的官方文档中，设计者通过将吸收消息的回合数从2个减少到1个，分析了无密钥吸收中的状态碰撞。然而，很少对认证加密方案substrate-SAE进行密码分析。对于suburban-SAE，设计者引入了8个空白轮来分离可控的输入和输出，并期望8个空白轮可以实现充分的扩散。因此，通过减少空回合数来研究安全性是很有意义的。此外，设计者没有做出安全声明，但是期望在nonce-误用场景中实现完全状态恢复。在本文中，我们提出了第一个实际的完整状态恢复攻击，在一个nonce-误用场景中，数据复杂度为213个32位块。此外，在考虑随机数的情况下，如果空回合的数量减少到4，我们可以对地下SAE和269.5个32位块的内部置换发起2122次调用的密钥恢复攻击。还实现了对地下SAE的内部置换的233个调用和233个32位块的区别攻击。我们的密码分析没有威胁到substrate-SAE的安全声明，我们希望它能增强对substrate-SAE的理解。
papers.title_zh: 基于立方体的地下安全密码分析

papers.title: Security of the Suffix Keyed Sponge
papers.authors: Christoph Dobraunig, Bart Mennink
papers.abstract: We formalize and analyze the general suffix keyed sponge construction, a pseudorandom function built on top of a cryptographic permutation. The construction hashes its data using the (keyless) sponge construction, transforms part of the state using the secret key, and generates the tag from the output of a final permutation call. In its simplest form, if the key and tag size are at most the rate of the sponge, one can see the suffix keyed sponge as a simple sponge function evaluation whose input is the plaintext appended with the key. The suffix keyed sponge is, however, much more general: the key and tag size may exceed the rate without any need to make extra permutation calls. We prove that the suffix keyed sponge construction achieves birthday-bound PRF security in the capacity, even if key and tag size exceed the rate. Furthermore, we prove that if the absorption of the key into the state happens in a leakage resilient manner, the suffix keyed sponge itself is leakage resilient as well. Our findings show that the suffix keyed sponge compares favorably with the hash-then-MAC construction. For instance, to reach a security level of k bits, the side-channel protected component in the suffix keyed sponge just needs to process k bits of input besides the key, whereas schemes following the hash-then-MAC construction need a side-channel protected MAC function that processes 2k bits of input besides the key. Moreover, even if we just consider black-box attacks, the MAC function in a hash-then-MAC scheme needs to be cryptographically strong whereas in the suffix keyed sponge the key may be absorbed by a simple XOR. The security proofs are performed using the H-coefficient technique, and make effective use of the multicollision limit function results of Daemen et al. (ASIACRYPT 2017), both for arguing that state manipulation larger than the rate is tolerated after key processing and for upper bounding the amount of leakage an attacker may gain about the secret key.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们形式化和分析了一般后缀键控海绵结构，一个伪随机函数建立在一个加密置换。该构造使用(无密钥)海绵构造散列其数据，使用秘密密钥转换部分状态，并从最终置换调用的输出生成标签。在其最简单的形式中，如果密钥和标签大小至多是海绵的速率，则可以将后缀键控海绵视为简单的海绵函数评估，其输入是附加了密钥的明文。然而，后缀keyed sponge更加通用:密钥和标签大小可能超过速率，而不需要进行额外的置换调用。我们证明了后缀键控海绵结构在容量上实现生日绑定PRF安全性，即使密钥和标签大小超过速率。此外，我们证明了如果密钥对状态的吸收是以泄漏弹性方式发生的，那么后缀keyed sponge本身也是泄漏弹性的。我们的发现表明后缀键控海绵优于哈希然后MAC结构。例如，为了达到k位的安全级别，后缀键控海绵中的侧信道保护组件只需要处理除密钥之外的k位输入，而遵循先散列后MAC构造的方案需要处理除密钥之外的2k位输入的侧信道保护MAC功能。此外，即使我们只考虑黑盒攻击，先散列后MAC方案中的MAC函数也需要在加密上很强，而在后缀密钥海绵中，密钥可以通过简单的XOR来吸收。使用H系数技术执行安全性证明，并有效利用代蒙等人(ASIACRYPT 2017)的多冲突极限函数结果，既用于论证在密钥处理后大于速率的状态操纵是可容忍的，又用于对攻击者可能获得的关于秘密密钥的泄漏量进行上限。
papers.title_zh: 后缀键控海绵的安全性

papers.title: Vectorized linear approximations for attacks on SNOW 3G
papers.authors: Jing Yang, Thomas Johansson, Alexander Maximov
papers.abstract: SNOW 3G is a stream cipher designed in 2006 by ETSI/SAGE, serving in 3GPP as one of the standard algorithms for data confidentiality and integrity protection. It is also included in the 4G LTE standard. In this paper we derive vectorized linear approximations of the finite state machine in SNOW3G. In particular,we show one 24-bit approximation with a bias around 2−37 and one byte-oriented approximation with a bias around 2−40. We then use the approximations to launch attacks on SNOW 3G. The first approximation is used in a distinguishing attack resulting in an expected complexity of 2172 and the second one can be used in a standard fast correlation attack resulting in key recovery in an expected complexity of 2177. If the key length in SNOW 3G would be increased to 256 bits, the results show that there are then academic attacks on such a version faster than the exhaustive key search.
papers.abstract_zh: SNOW 3G是由ETSI/SAGE在2006年设计的流密码，在3GPP中作为数据机密性和完整性保护的标准算法之一。它也包含在4G LTE标准中。在本文中，我们推导了SNOW3G中有限状态机的向量化线性近似。特别是，我们展示了一个24位近似值，其偏置约为237，另一个面向字节的近似值，其偏置约为240。然后，我们使用这些近似值对SNOW 3G发起攻击。第一种近似用于导致预期复杂度为2172的区别攻击，第二种近似可用于导致预期复杂度为2177的密钥恢复的标准快速相关攻击。如果SNOW 3G中的密钥长度增加到256位，结果表明对这样的版本存在比穷举密钥搜索更快的学术攻击。
papers.title_zh: 对SNOW 3G攻击的矢量化线性逼近

papers.title: Weak Keys in the Rekeying Paradigm: Application to COMET and mixFeed
papers.authors: Mustafa Khairallah
papers.abstract: In this paper, we study a group of AEAD schemes that use rekeying as a technique to increase efficiency by reducing the state size of the algorithm. We provide a unified model to study the behavior of the keys used in these schemes, called Rekey-and-Chain (RaC). This model helps understand the design of several AEAD schemes. We show generic attacks on these schemes based on the existence of certain types of weak keys. We also show that the borderline between multi-key and single-key analyses of these schemes is not solid and the analysis can be performed independent of the master key, leading sometimes to practical attacks in the multi-key setting. More importantly, the multi-key analysis can be applied in the single key setting, since each message is encrypted with a different key. Consequently, we show gaps in the security analysis of COMET and mixFeed in the single key setting, which led the designers to provide overly optimistic security claims. In the case of COMET, full key recovery can be performed with 264 online queries and 264 offline queries in the single-key setting, or 246 online queries per user and 264 offline queries in the multi-key setting with ∼ 0.5 million users. In the case of mixFeed, we enhance the forgery adversarial advantage in the single-key setting with a factor of 267 compared to what the designers claim. More importantly, our result is just a lower bound of this advantage, since we show that the gap in the analysis of mixFeed depends on properties of the AES Key Schedule that are not well understood and require more cryptanalytic efforts to find a more tight advantage. After reporting these findings, the designers updated their security analyses and accommodated the proposed attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们研究了一组AEAD方案，这些方案使用密钥更新作为一种技术，通过减少算法的状态大小来提高效率。我们提供了一个统一的模型来研究这些方案中使用的密钥的行为，称为Rekey-and-Chain (RaC)。这个模型有助于理解几个AEAD方案的设计。我们展示了基于某些类型的弱密钥的存在对这些方案的一般攻击。我们还表明，这些方案的多密钥和单密钥分析之间的界限并不牢固，分析可以独立于主密钥执行，有时会导致在多密钥设置中的实际攻击。更重要的是，多密钥分析可以应用于单密钥设置，因为每个消息都是用不同的密钥加密的。因此，我们在单键设置中显示了COMET和mixFeed的安全分析中的缺口，这导致设计者提供了过于乐观的安全声明。在COMET的情况下，在单键设置中可以执行264次在线查询和264次离线查询，或者在有50万用户的多键设置中每个用户可以执行246次在线查询和264次离线查询。在mixFeed的情况下，与设计者声称的相比，我们在单键设置中增强了伪造对抗优势267倍。更重要的是，我们的结果只是这个优势的一个下限，因为我们表明，mixFeed分析中的差距取决于AES密钥表的属性，这些属性没有得到很好的理解，需要更多的密码分析工作来找到更紧密的优势。在报告了这些发现后，设计者更新了他们的安全分析并适应了提出的攻击。
papers.title_zh: 密钥更新范例中的弱密钥:在COMET和mixFeed中的应用

papers.title: Comprehensive security analysis of CRAFT
papers.authors: Hosein Hadipour, Sadegh Sadeghi, Majid M. Niknam, Ling Song, Nasour Bagheri
papers.abstract: CRAFT is a lightweight block cipher, designed to provide efficient protection against differential fault attacks. It is a tweakable cipher that includes 32 rounds to produce a ciphertext from a 64-bit plaintext using a 128-bit key and 64-bit public tweak. In this paper, compared to the designers’ analysis, we provide a more detailed analysis of CRAFT against differential and zero-correlation cryptanalysis, aiming to provide better distinguishers for the reduced rounds of the cipher. Our distinguishers for reduced-round CRAFT cover a higher number of rounds compared to the designers’ analysis. In our analysis, we observed that, for any number of rounds, the differential effect of CRAFT has an extremely higher probability compared to any differential trail. As an example, while the best trail for 11 rounds of the cipher has a probability of at least 2−80, we present a differential with probability 2−49.79, containing 229.66 optimal trails, all with the same optimum probability of 2−80. Next, we use a partitioning technique, based on optimal expandable truncated trails to provide a better estimation of the differential effect on CRAFT. Thanks to this technique, we are able to find differential distinguishers for 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, and 14 rounds of the cipher in single tweak model with the probabilities of at least 2−40.20, 2−45.12, 2−49.79, 2−54.49, 2−59.13, and 2−63.80, respectively. These probabilities should be compared with the best distinguishers provided by the designers in the same model for 9 and 10 rounds of the cipher with the probabilities of at least 2−54.67 and 2−62.61, respectively. In addition, we consider the security of CRAFT against the new concept of related tweak zero-correlation (ZC) linear cryptanalysis and present a new distinguisher which covers 14 rounds of the cipher, while the best previous ZC distinguisher covered 13 rounds. Thanks to the related tweak ZC distinguisher for 14 rounds of the cipher, we also present 14 rounds integral distinguishers in related tweak mode of the cipher. Although the provided analysis does not compromise the cipher, we think it provides a better insight into the designing of CRAFT.
papers.abstract_zh: CRAFT是一种轻量级分组密码，旨在提供针对差分故障攻击的有效保护。这是一个可调整的密码，包括32轮，使用128位密钥和64位公共调整从64位明文产生密文。与设计者的分析相比，本文对CRAFT抵抗差分和零相关分析进行了更详细的分析，旨在为减少的密码轮数提供更好的鉴别器。与设计师的分析相比，我们的减圆工艺区分器覆盖了更多的圆数。在我们的分析中，我们观察到，对于任何数量的回合，与任何差分轨迹相比，CRAFT的差分效应具有极高的概率。例如，虽然11轮密码的最佳轨迹的概率至少为280，但我们给出了一个概率为249.79的差值，其中包含229.66个最佳轨迹，所有最佳概率都是280。接下来，我们使用一种基于最佳可扩展截断轨迹的分割技术，以更好地估计对飞行器的不同影响。由于这种技术，我们能够在单个tweak模型中找到9、10、11、12、13和14轮密码的差分识别符，其概率分别至少为240.20、245.12、249.79、254.49、259.13和263.80。这些概率应与设计者在相同模型中为9轮和10轮密码提供的最佳区分器进行比较，其概率分别至少为254.67和262.61。此外，我们考虑了CRAFT的安全性和相关扭零相关(ZC)线性密码分析的新概念，提出了一个覆盖14轮密码的新鉴别器，而以前最好的ZC鉴别器覆盖13轮。得益于14轮密码的相关tweak ZC鉴别器，我们还提出了密码相关tweak模式下的14轮整数鉴别器。虽然所提供的分析并没有破坏密码，我们认为它提供了一个更好的工艺设计的洞察力。
papers.title_zh: 飞行器的综合安全性分析

papers.title: Improved Meet-in-the-Middle Preimage Attacks against AES Hashing Modes
papers.authors: Zhenzhen Bao, Lin Ding, Jian Guo, Haoyang Wang, Wenying Zhang
papers.abstract: Hashing modes are ways to convert a block cipher into a hash function, and those with AES as the underlying block cipher are referred to as AES hashing modes. Sasaki in 2011, introduced the first preimage attack against AES hashing modes with the AES block cipher reduced to 7 rounds, by the method of meet-in-the-middle. In his attack, the key-schedules are not taken into account. Hence, the same attack applies to all three versions of AES. In this paper, by introducing neutral bits from the key, extra degree of freedom is gained, which is utilized in two ways, i.e., to reduce the time complexity and to extend the attack to more rounds. As an immediate result, the complexities of 7-round pseudo-preimage attacks are reduced from 2120 to 2104, 296, and 296 for AES-128, AES-192, and AES-256, respectively. By carefully choosing the neutral bits from the key to cancel those from the state, the attack is extended to 8 rounds for AES-192 and AES-256 with complexities 2112 and 296. Similar results are obtained for Kiasu-BC, a tweakable block cipher based on AES-128, and interestingly the additional input tweak helps reduce the complexity and extend the attack to one more round. To the best of our knowledge, these are the first preimage attacks against 8-round AES hashing modes.
papers.abstract_zh: 哈希模式是将块密码转换为哈希函数的方式，使用AES作为底层块密码的模式称为AES哈希模式。Sasaki在2011年引入了第一个针对AES哈希模式的原像攻击，通过中间相遇的方法将AES分组密码减少到7轮。在他的攻击中，没有考虑到关键时刻表。因此，相同的攻击适用于AES的所有三个版本。本文通过在密钥中引入中性比特，获得了额外的自由度，并从两个方面加以利用，即降低时间复杂度和将攻击扩展到更多轮次。直接结果是，对于AES-128、AES-192和AES-256，7轮伪原像攻击的复杂度分别从2120降低到2104、296和296。通过仔细选择密钥中的中性位来消除状态中的中性位，对于复杂程度为2112和296的AES-192和AES-256，攻击扩展到8轮。对于Kiasu-BC，一种基于AES-128的可调整分组密码，也得到了类似的结果，有趣的是，额外的输入调整有助于降低复杂性，并将攻击扩展到多一轮。据我们所知，这是第一次针对8轮AES哈希模式的原像攻击。
papers.title_zh: 改进了针对AES哈希模式的中间相遇原像攻击

papers.title: Analyzing the Linear Keystream Biases in AEGIS
papers.authors: Maria Eichlseder, Marcel Nageler, Robert Primas
papers.abstract: AEGIS is one of the authenticated encryption designs selected for the final portfolio of the CAESAR competition. It combines the AES round function and simple Boolean operations to update its large state and extract a keystream to achieve an excellent software performance. In 2014, Minaud discovered slight biases in the keystream based on linear characteristics. For family member AEGIS-256, these could be exploited to undermine the confidentiality faster than generic attacks, but this still requires very large amounts of data. For final portfolio member AEGIS-128, these attacks are currently less efficient than generic attacks. We propose improved keystream approximations for the AEGIS family, but also prove upper bounds below 2−128 for the squared correlation contribution of any single suitable linear characteristic.
papers.abstract_zh: AEGIS是为CAESAR竞赛的最终作品集选择的认证加密设计之一。它结合了AES舍入函数和简单的布尔运算来更新其大状态并提取密钥流，以实现出色的软件性能。2014年，Minaud发现了基于线性特征的密钥流的轻微偏差。对于家庭成员AEGIS-256，这些可以被利用来比一般攻击更快地破坏机密性，但是这仍然需要非常大量的数据。对于最终组合成员AEGIS-128，这些攻击目前不如一般攻击有效。我们为AEGIS系列提出了改进的密钥流近似，但也证明了任何单个合适的线性特征的平方相关贡献的上限低于2128。
papers.title_zh: AEGIS中的线性密钥流偏移分析

papers.title: Multiple Linear Cryptanalysis Using Linear Statistics
papers.authors: Jung-Keun Lee, Woo-Hwan Kim
papers.abstract: We propose an improved and extended approach of the multiple linear cryptanalysis presented by A. Biryukov et al. at CRYPTO 2004 that exploits dominant and statistically independent linear trails. While they presented only rank based attacks with success probability 1, we present threshold based attacks as well as rank based ones using newly introduced statistic that is a linear combination of the component statistics for the trails and is an approximation of the LLR statistic. The rank based Algorithm 1 style attack yields the same estimate for the gain with Biryukov et al.’s Algorithm 1 style attack. For each of the threshold based Algorithm 1 style and Algorithm 2 style attacks, we provide a formula for its advantage in terms of the correlations of the trails, the data complexity, and the success probability in case the aimed success probability is not 1. Combining the threshold based attacks with the rank based ones, we get attacks each of which has better estimates for the advantage compared to the threshold based one in case the aimed success probability is close to 1. We then extend the methods to get a new framework of multiple linear attacks exploiting close-to-dominant linear trails that may not be statistically independent. We apply the methods to full DES and get linear attacks using 4 linear trails with about the same or better complexity compared to those presented at ASIACRYPT 2017 that use 4 additional trails. With data complexity less than 241, the attack has better complexity than existing attacks on DES.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种改进和扩展的多重线性密码分析方法，该方法由A. Biryukov等人在CRYPTO 2004上提出，利用了占优势的和统计上独立的线性轨迹。虽然他们只提出了成功概率为1的基于等级的攻击，但是我们提出了基于阈值的攻击以及使用新引入的统计量的基于等级的攻击，该统计量是踪迹的成分统计量的线性组合，并且是LLR统计量的近似。基于等级的算法1型攻击产生与Biryukov等人的算法1型攻击相同的增益估计。对于每种基于阈值的算法1型和算法2型攻击，我们提供了一个公式，说明其在目标成功概率不为1的情况下，在轨迹相关性、数据复杂性和成功概率方面的优势。将基于阈值的攻击与基于等级的攻击相结合，我们得到在目标成功概率接近1的情况下，与基于阈值的攻击相比，每种攻击都具有更好的优势估计。然后，我们扩展这些方法，得到一个新的多重线性攻击框架，利用可能不具有统计独立性的接近优势的线性踪迹。我们将这些方法应用于完全DES，并使用4条线性轨迹获得线性攻击，与ASIACRYPT 2017上展示的使用4条额外轨迹的攻击相比，其复杂性大约相同或更好。在数据复杂度小于241的情况下，该攻击比现有的DES攻击具有更好的复杂度。
papers.title_zh: 使用线性统计的多重线性密码分析

papers.title: New Techniques for Searching Differential Trails in Keccak
papers.authors: Guozhen Liu, Weidong Qiu, Yi Tu
papers.abstract: Keccak-f is the permutation used in the NIST SHA-3 hash function standard. Inspired by the previous exhaustive differential trail search methods by Mella et al. at ToSC 2017, we introduce in this paper new algorithms to cover 3-round trail cores with propagation weight at least 53, up from the previous best weight 45. To achieve the goal, the concept of ideal improvement assumption is proposed to construct theoretical representative of subspaces so as to efficiently cover the search space of 3-round trail cores with at least one out-Kernel α state. Of particular note is that the exhaustiveness in 3-round trail core search of at least one out-Kernel α is only experimentally verified. With the knowledge of all 3-round trail cores of weight up to 53, lower bounds on 4/5/6-round trails are tightened to 56/58/108, from the previous 48/50/92, respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: Keccak-f是NIST SHA-3散列函数标准中使用的排列。受Mella等人在ToSC 2017上提出的穷举差分踪迹搜索方法的启发，我们在本文中引入了新的算法，以覆盖传播权重至少为53的3轮踪迹核心，高于之前的最佳权重45。为了实现这一目标，提出了理想改进假设的概念来构造子空间的理论表示，以便有效地覆盖具有至少一个核外α状态的三轮踪迹核的搜索空间。特别值得注意的是，至少一个核外α的三轮踪迹核心搜索的穷举性仅通过实验验证。在了解了重量高达53的所有3轮踪迹核心之后，4/5/6轮踪迹的下限分别从之前的48/50/92收紧到56/58/108。
papers.title_zh: Keccak中搜索差异轨迹的新技术

papers.title: Improving the MILP-based Security Evaluation Algorithm against Differential/Linear Cryptanalysis Using A Divide-and-Conquer Approach
papers.authors: Chunning Zhou, Wentao Zhang, Tianyou Ding, Zejun Xiang
papers.abstract: In recent years, Mixed Integer Linear Programming (MILP) has been widely used in cryptanalysis of symmetric-key primitives. For differential and linear cryptanalysis, MILP can be used to solve two kinds of problems: calculation of the minimum number of differentially/linearly active S-boxes, and search for the best differential/linear characteristics. There are already numerous papers published in this area. However, the efficiency is not satisfactory enough for many symmetric-key primitives. In this paper, we greatly improve the efficiency of the MILP-based search algorithm for both problems. Each of the two problems for an r-round cipher can be converted to an MILP model whose feasible region is the set of all possible r-round differential/linear characteristics. Generally, high-probability differential/linear characteristics are likely to have a low number of active S-boxes at a certain round. Inspired by the idea of a divide-and-conquer approach, we divide the set of all possible differential/linear characteristics into several smaller subsets, then separately search them. That is to say, the search of the whole set is split into easier searches of smaller subsets, and optimal solutions within the smaller subsets are combined to give the optimal solution within the whole set. In addition, we use several techniques to further improve the efficiency of the search algorithm. As applications, we apply our search algorithm to five lightweight block ciphers: PRESENT, GIFT-64, RECTANGLE, LBLOCK and TWINE. For each cipher, we obtain better results than the best-known ones obtained from the MILP method. For the minimum number of differentially/linearly active S-boxes, we reach 31/31, 16/15, 16/16, 20/20 and 20/20 rounds for the five ciphers respectively. For the best differential/linear characteristics, we reach 18/18, 15/13, 15/14, 16/15 and 15/16 rounds for the five ciphers respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，混合整数线性规划(MILP)被广泛应用于对称密钥基元的密码分析。对于差分和线性密码分析，MILP可以用来解决两类问题:计算差分/线性活动S盒的最小数目，以及寻找最佳差分/线性特性。在这一领域已经发表了许多论文。然而，对于许多对称密钥原语来说，效率并不令人满意。在本文中，我们大大提高了基于MILP的搜索算法对这两个问题的效率。r轮密码的两个问题中的每一个都可以转换成MILP模型，其可行域是所有可能的r轮差分/线性特征的集合。一般来说，高概率微分/线性特征在某一轮很可能具有较低数量的活动S盒。受分而治之方法的启发，我们将所有可能的微分/线性特征集分成几个更小的子集，然后分别搜索它们。也就是说，整个集合的搜索被分割成更容易的更小子集的搜索，并且更小子集内的最优解被组合以给出整个集合内的最优解。此外，我们使用了几种技术来进一步提高搜索算法的效率。作为应用，我们将我们的搜索算法应用于五个轻量级分组密码:PRESENT、GIFT-64、RECTANGLE、LBLOCK和TWINE。对于每一个密码，我们都获得了比MILP方法更好的结果。对于最小数量的差分/线性活动S盒，我们对五个密码分别达到31/31、16/15、16/16、20/20和20/20轮。对于最好的差分/线性特性，我们对五个密码分别达到18/18、15/13、15/14、16/15和15/16轮。
papers.title_zh: 使用分治法改进基于MILP的抗差分/线性密码分析的安全性评估算法

papers.title: Key-Recovery Attacks on Full Kravatte
papers.authors: Colin Chaigneau, Thomas Fuhr, Henri Gilbert, Jian Guo, Jérémy Jean, Jean-René Reinhard, Ling Song
papers.abstract: This paper presents a cryptanalysis of full Kravatte, an instantiation of the Farfalle construction of a pseudorandom function (PRF) with variable input and output length. This new construction, proposed by Bertoni et al., introduces an efficiently parallelizable and extremely versatile building block for the design of symmetric mechanisms, e.g. message authentication codes or stream ciphers. It relies on a set of permutations and on so-called rolling functions: it can be split into a compression layer followed by a two-step expansion layer. The key is expanded and used to mask the inputs and outputs of the construction. Kravatte instantiates Farfalle using linear rolling functions and permutations obtained by iterating the Keccak round function. We develop in this paper several attacks against this PRF, based on three different attack strategies that bypass part of the construction and target a reduced number of permutation rounds. A higher order differential distinguisher exploits the possibility to build an affine space of values in the cipher state after the compression layer. An algebraic meet-in-the-middle attack can be mounted on the second step of the expansion layer. Finally, due to the linearity of the rolling function and the low algebraic degree of the Keccak round function, a linear recurrence distinguisher can be found on intermediate states of the second step of the expansion layer. All the attacks rely on the ability to invert a small number of the final rounds of the construction. In particular, the last two rounds of the construction together with the final masking by the key can be algebraically inverted, which allows to recover the key. The complexities of the devised attacks, applied to the Kravatte specifications published on the IACR ePrint in July 2017, or the strengthened version of Kravatte recently presented at ECC 2017, are far below the security claimed.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文给出了一个全Kravatte的密码分析，它是一个可变输入和输出长度的伪随机函数(PRF)的Farfalle构造的一个实例。由贝尔托尼等人提出的这种新结构引入了一种高效的可并行化和极其通用的构造块，用于对称机制的设计，例如消息认证码或流密码。它依赖于一组排列和所谓的滚动函数:它可以分为压缩层和两步扩展层。密钥被扩展并用于屏蔽构造的输入和输出。Kravatte使用线性滚动函数和通过迭代Keccak round函数获得的排列来实例化Farfalle。在本文中，我们开发了几种针对这种PRF的攻击，基于三种不同的攻击策略，它们绕过了部分构造，并以减少的置换轮数为目标。高阶差分区分器利用了在压缩层之后在密码状态中构建仿射值空间的可能性。代数中间相遇攻击可以安装在扩展层的第二级上。最后，由于滚动函数的线性和Keccak圆函数的低代数次数，在膨胀层第二步的中间态上可以找到一个线性递归判别器。所有的攻击都依赖于反转最后几轮建筑的能力。特别地，构造的最后两轮以及密钥的最终屏蔽可以被代数反转，这允许恢复密钥。应用于2017年7月在IACR ePrint上发布的Kravatte规范的设计攻击的复杂性，或者最近在ECC 2017上展示的Kravatte的加强版，远低于声称的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 对全Kravatte的密钥恢复攻击

papers.title: State-Recovery Attacks on Modified Ketje Jr
papers.authors: Thomas Fuhr, María Naya-Plasencia, Yann Rotella
papers.abstract: In this article we study the security of the authenticated encryption algorithm Ketje against divide-and-conquer attacks. Ketje is a third-round candidate in the ongoing CAESAR competition, which shares most of its design principles with the SHA-3 hash function. Several versions of Ketje have been submitted, with different sizes for its internal state. We describe several state-recovery attacks on the smaller variant, called Ketje Jr. We show that if one increases the amount of keystream output after each round from 16 bits to 40 bits, Ketje Jr becomes vulnerable to divide-and-conquer attacks with time complexities 271.5 for the original version and 282.3 for the current tweaked version, both with a key of 96 bits. We also propose a similar attack when considering rates of 32 bits for the non-tweaked version. Our findings do not threaten the security of Ketje, but should be taken as a warning against potential future modifications that would aim at increasing the performance of the algorithm.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文研究了认证加密算法Ketje抵抗分治攻击的安全性。Ketje是正在进行的CAESAR竞赛的第三轮候选人，该竞赛与SHA-3哈希函数共享其大部分设计原则。已经提交了几个版本的Ketje，其内部状态有不同的大小。我们描述了对称为Ketje Jr的较小变体的几种状态恢复攻击。我们表明，如果在每轮之后将密钥流输出量从16位增加到40位，Ketje Jr就容易受到分治攻击，原始版本的时间复杂度为271.5，当前调整版本的时间复杂度为282.3，两者的密钥都是96位。我们还提出了一个类似的攻击时，考虑到非调整版本的32位速率。我们的发现不会威胁到Ketje的安全，但应该被视为对未来旨在提高算法性能的潜在修改的警告。
papers.title_zh: 对改进型Ketje Jr的状态恢复攻击

papers.title: Distinguishing Attack on NORX Permutation
papers.authors: Tao Huang, Hongjun Wu
papers.abstract: NORX is a permutation-based authentication scheme which is currently a third-round candidate of the ongoing CAESAR competition. The security bound of NORX is derived from the sponge construction applied to an ideal underlying permutation. In this paper, we show that the NORX core permutation is non-ideal with a new distinguishing attack. More specifically, we can distinguish NORX64 permutation with 248.5 queries and distinguish NORX32 permutation with 264.7 queries using carefully crafted differential-linear attacks. We have experimentally verified the distinguishing attack on NORX64 permutation. Although the distinguishing attacks reveal the weakness of the NORX permutation, it does not directly threat the security of the NORX authenticated encryption scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: NORX是一种基于置换的认证方案，目前是正在进行的CAESAR竞赛的第三轮候选方案。NORX的安全界是从应用于理想基础置换的海绵构造中导出的。本文用一种新的区分攻击证明了NORX核置换是非理想的。更具体地说，使用精心制作的差分线性攻击，我们可以用248.5个查询区分NORX64排列，用264.7个查询区分NORX32排列。我们已经通过实验验证了对NORX64置换的区别攻击。虽然区别攻击暴露了NORX置换的弱点，但它并不直接威胁NORX认证加密方案的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 对NORX置换的区分攻击

papers.title: Searching for Subspace Trails and Truncated Differentials
papers.authors: Gregor Leander, Cihangir Tezcan, Friedrich Wiemer
papers.abstract: Grassi et al. [Gra+16] introduced subspace trail cryptanalysis as a generalization of invariant subspaces and used it to give the first five round distinguisher for Aes. While it is a generic method, up to now it was only applied to the Aes and Prince. One problem for a broad adoption of the attack is a missing generic analysis algorithm. In this work we provide efficient and generic algorithms that allow to compute the provably best subspace trails for any substitution permutation cipher.
papers.abstract_zh: Grassi等人[Gra+16]引入了子空间踪迹密码分析作为不变子空间的推广，并用它给出了Aes的前五轮区分符。虽然这是一种通用方法，但迄今为止，它仅适用于Aes和Prince。广泛采用这种攻击的一个问题是缺少通用的分析算法。在这项工作中，我们提供了有效的和通用的算法，允许计算任何置换置换密码的可证明的最佳子空间踪迹。
papers.title_zh: 搜索子空间踪迹和截断差分

papers.title: Multivariate Profiling of Hulls for Linear Cryptanalysis
papers.authors: Andrey Bogdanov, Elmar Tischhauser, Philip S. Vejre
papers.abstract: Extensions of linear cryptanalysis making use of multiple approximations, such as multiple and multidimensional linear cryptanalysis, are an important tool in symmetric-key cryptanalysis, among others being responsible for the best known attacks on ciphers such as Serpent and present. At CRYPTO 2015, Huang et al. provided a refined analysis of the key-dependent capacity leading to a refined key equivalence hypothesis, however at the cost of additional assumptions. Their analysis was extended by Blondeau and Nyberg to also cover an updated wrong key randomization hypothesis, using similar assumptions. However, a recent result by Nyberg shows the equivalence of linear dependence and statistical dependence of linear approximations, which essentially invalidates a crucial assumption on which all these multidimensional models are based. In this paper, we develop a model for linear cryptanalysis using multiple linearly independent approximations which takes key-dependence into account and complies with Nyberg’s result. Our model considers an arbitrary multivariate joint distribution of the correlations, and in particular avoids any assumptions regarding normality. The analysis of this distribution is then tailored to concrete ciphers in a practically feasible way by combining a signal/noise decomposition approach for the linear hulls with a profiling of the actual multivariate distribution of the signal correlations for a large number of keys, thereby entirely avoiding assumptions regarding the shape of this distribution. As an application of our model, we provide an attack on 26 rounds of present which is faster and requires less data than previous attacks, while using more realistic assumptions and far fewer approximations. We successfully extend the attack to present the first 27-round attack which takes key-dependence into account.
papers.abstract_zh: 利用多重近似的线性密码分析的扩展，例如多重和多维线性密码分析，是对称密钥密码分析中的重要工具，尤其是对诸如Serpent和present之类的密码的最著名的攻击。在CRYPTO 2015上，黄等人提供了对密钥依赖容量的精确分析，从而导致精确的密钥等价假设，然而这是以附加假设为代价的。Blondeau和Nyberg扩展了他们的分析，使用类似的假设，也涵盖了更新的错误密钥随机化假设。然而，Nyberg最近的一个结果显示了线性近似的线性相关性和统计相关性的等价性，这从本质上否定了所有这些多维模型所基于的一个至关重要的假设。在本文中，我们发展了一个使用多重线性独立近似的线性密码分析模型，该模型考虑了密钥依赖性并符合Nyberg的结果。我们的模型考虑了相关性的任意多元联合分布，特别是避免了任何关于正态性的假设。然后，通过将用于线性外壳的信号/噪声分解方法与用于大量密钥的信号相关性的实际多元分布的剖析相结合，以实际可行的方式对该分布的分析进行调整，从而完全避免关于该分布形状的假设。作为我们的模型的应用，我们提供了对26轮present的攻击，这比以前的攻击更快并且需要更少的数据，同时使用更现实的假设和更少的近似。我们成功地扩展了攻击，提出了考虑密钥依赖性的第一个27轮攻击。
papers.title_zh: 用于线性密码分析的外壳的多元剖析

papers.title: Column Parity Mixers
papers.authors: Ko Stoffelen, Joan Daemen
papers.abstract: We present column parity mixers (CPM), a generalization of the Θ mixing layer that is used in Keccak. Thanks to our description using matrix arithmetic, we can easily derive algebraic, diffusion, and mask propagation properties, leading to a surprising distinction between two types of CPMs. We compare CPMs to other popular types of mixing layers and argue that CPMs can be more efficient. While Keccak has a bit-oriented structure, we make the case that CPMs are also suitable for nibble- or byte-oriented designs. We outline a general substitution-permutation-network-based design strategy using a CPM, for which we show how one can attain strong bounds for differential and linear trails. We apply this strategy concretely to design a 256-bit permutation with an efficient inverse and strong trail bounds. Our permutation design uses a number of ideas that are of independent interest and allows a fast bitsliced implementation that compares quite well with other established ciphers and permutations.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了列奇偶混合器(CPM)，它是Keccak中使用的θ混合层的推广。由于我们使用矩阵运算的描述，我们可以很容易地推导出代数、扩散和掩模传播特性，从而在两种类型的CPM之间产生惊人的区别。我们将CPMs与其他流行的混合层类型进行比较，并认为CPMs可能更有效。虽然Keccak具有面向位的结构，但我们认为CPM也适用于面向半字节或字节的设计。我们使用CPM概述了一个一般的基于替换排列网络的设计策略，我们展示了如何获得差分和线性试验的强边界。我们具体应用这个策略来设计一个256位的置换，它有一个有效的逆和强踪迹边界。我们的置换设计使用了许多独立感兴趣的想法，并允许快速位片实现，与其他已建立的密码和置换相比相当好。
papers.title_zh: 列奇偶混合器

papers.title: On Efficient Constructions of Lightweight MDS Matrices
papers.authors: Lijing Zhou, Licheng Wang, Yiru Sun
papers.abstract: The paper investigates the maximum distance separable (MDS) matrix over the matrix polynomial residue ring. Firstly, by analyzing the minimal polynomials of binary matrices with 1 XOR count and element-matrices with few XOR counts, we present an efficient method for constructing MDS matrices with as few XOR counts as possible. Comparing with previous constructions, our corresponding constructions only cost 1 minute 27 seconds to 7 minutes, while previous constructions cost 3 days to 4 weeks. Secondly, we discuss the existence of several types of involutory MDS matrices and propose an efficient necessary-and-sufficient condition for identifying a Hadamard matrix being involutory. According to the condition, each involutory Hadamard matrix over a polynomial residue ring can be accurately and efficiently searched. Furthermore, we devise an efficient algorithm for constructing involutory Hadamard MDS matrices with as few XOR counts as possible. We obtain many new involutory Hadamard MDS matrices with much fewer XOR counts than optimal results reported before.
papers.abstract_zh: 研究矩阵多项式剩余环上的最大距离可分(MDS)矩阵。首先，通过分析异或次数为1的二元矩阵和异或次数较少的元素矩阵的最小多项式，我们提出了一种构造异或次数尽可能少的MDS矩阵的有效方法。与以前的施工相比，我们相应的施工只需要1分27秒到7分钟，而以前的施工需要3天到4周。其次，我们讨论了几类对合MDS矩阵的存在性，并给出了判定Hadamard矩阵是对合矩阵的一个有效的充要条件。根据该条件，可以准确有效地搜索多项式剩余环上的每个对合Hadamard矩阵。此外，我们设计了一个有效的算法来构造对合哈达玛MDS矩阵与尽可能少的异或计数。我们得到了许多新的对合哈达玛MDS矩阵，其异或计数比以前报道的最优结果少得多。
papers.title_zh: 轻量MDS矩阵的有效构造

papers.title: Functional Graphs and Their Applications in Generic Attacks on Iterated Hash Constructions
papers.authors: Zhenzhen Bao, Jian Guo, Lei Wang
papers.abstract: We provide a survey about generic attacks on cryptographic hash constructions including hash-based message authentication codes and hash combiners. We look into attacks involving iteratively evaluating identical mappings many times. The functional graph of a random mapping also involves iteratively evaluating the mapping. These attacks essentially exploit properties of the functional graph. We map the utilization space of those properties from numerous proposed known attacks, draw a comparison among classes of attacks about their advantages and limitations. We provide a systematic exposition of concepts of cycles, deep-iterate images, collisions and their roles in cryptanalysis of iterated hash constructions. We identify the inherent relationship between these concepts, such that case-by-case theories about them can be unified into one knowledge system, that is, theories on the functional graph of random mappings. We show that the properties of the cycle search algorithm, the chain evaluation algorithm and the collision search algorithm can be described based on statistic results on the functional graph. Thereby, we can provide different viewpoints to support previous beliefs on individual knowledge. In that, we invite more sophisticated analysis of the functional graph of random mappings and more future exploitations of its properties in cryptanalysis.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提供了一个关于密码哈希构造的一般攻击的调查，包括基于哈希的消息认证码和哈希组合器。我们研究涉及多次迭代计算相同映射的攻击。随机映射的功能图也包括迭代地评估映射。这些攻击本质上利用了功能图的属性。我们从众多提出的已知攻击中映射出这些属性的利用空间，比较了各类攻击的优缺点。我们提供了一个循环，深度迭代图像，碰撞和它们在迭代散列结构的密码分析中的作用的概念的系统阐述。我们确定了这些概念之间的内在联系，这样关于它们的个案理论就可以统一到一个知识体系中，即随机映射的泛函图上的理论。我们证明了循环搜索算法、链评估算法和碰撞搜索算法的特性可以基于功能图上的统计结果来描述。因此，我们可以提供不同的观点来支持先前对个人知识的信念。在这方面，我们邀请对随机映射的函数图进行更复杂的分析，以及在密码分析中对其性质进行更多的探索。
papers.title_zh: 函数图及其在迭代哈希构造一般性攻击中的应用

papers.title: Revisiting and Improving Algorithms for the 3XOR Problem
papers.authors: Charles Bouillaguet, Claire Delaplace, Pierre-Alain Fouque
papers.abstract: The 3SUM problem is a well-known problem in computer science and many geometric problems have been reduced to it. We study the 3XOR variant which is more cryptologically relevant. In this problem, the attacker is given black-box access to three random functions F,G and H and she has to find three inputs x, y and z such that F(x) ⊕ G(y) ⊕ H(z) = 0. The 3XOR problem is a difficult case of the more-general k-list birthday problem. This gives some leeway to target a solution of a specific form, at the expense of processing a huge amount of data. However, to handle such a huge amount of data can be very difficult in practice. This is why we first restricted our attention to solving the 3XOR problem for which the total number of queries to F, G and H is minimal. If they are n-bit random functions, it is possible to solve the problem with roughly
papers.abstract_zh: 3SUM问题是计算机科学中一个众所周知的问题，许多几何问题都归结为它。我们研究更具密码学相关性的3XOR变体。在这个问题中，攻击者被给予对三个随机函数f、g和h的黑盒访问，并且她必须找到三个输入x、y和z，使得F(x) ⊕ G(y) ⊕ H(z) = 0。3XOR问题是更一般的k列表生日问题的一个困难情况。瓦格纳著名的k-list生日算法，以及受其启发的算法，从信息论的角度来看，是通过查询比严格必要更多的函数来工作的。这为特定形式的解决方案提供了一些余地，但代价是要处理大量数据。然而，处理如此大量的数据在实践中可能非常困难。这就是为什么我们首先将注意力限制在解决3XOR问题上，对于这个问题，对F、G和H的查询总数是最小的。如果它们是n位随机函数，就有可能粗略地解决这个问题
papers.title_zh: 3XOR问题算法的回顾与改进

papers.title: Frequency-smoothing encryption: preventing snapshot attacks on deterministically encrypted data
papers.authors: Marie-Sarah Lacharité, Kenneth G. Paterson
papers.abstract: Statistical analysis of ciphertexts has been recently used to carry out devastating inference attacks on deterministic encryption (Naveed, Kamara, and Wright, CCS 2015), order-preserving/revealing encryption (Grubbs et al., S&P 2017), and searchable encryption (Pouliot and Wright, CCS 2016). At the heart of these inference attacks is classical frequency analysis. In this paper, we propose and evaluate another classical technique, homophonic encoding, as a means to combat these attacks. We introduce and develop the concept of frequency-smoothing encryption (FSE) which provably prevents inference attacks in the snapshot attack model, wherein the adversary obtains a static snapshot of the encrypted data, while preserving the ability to efficiently and privately make point queries. We provide provably secure constructions for FSE schemes, and we empirically assess their security for concrete parameters by evaluating them against real data. We show that frequency analysis attacks (and optimal generalisations of them for the FSE setting) no longer succeed.
papers.abstract_zh: 密文的统计分析最近已被用于对确定性加密(Naveed、Kamara和Wright，CCS 2015)、保序/揭示加密(Grubbs等人，S&P 2017)和可搜索加密(Pouliot和Wright，CCS 2016)进行毁灭性的推理攻击。这些推理攻击的核心是经典频率分析。在本文中，我们提出并评估了另一种经典的技术，谐音编码，作为一种手段来打击这些攻击。我们引入并发展了频率平滑加密(FSE)的概念，其可证明地防止快照攻击模型中的推断攻击，其中对手获得加密数据的静态快照，同时保持高效和秘密地进行点查询的能力。我们为FSE方案提供了可证明安全的构造，并且我们通过对真实数据进行评估来经验性地评估它们对于具体参数的安全性。我们表明，频率分析攻击(以及它们在FSE环境下的最优推广)不再成功。
papers.title_zh: 频率平滑加密:防止对确定性加密数据的快照攻击

papers.title: Revisiting Variable Output Length XOR Pseudorandom Function
papers.authors: Srimanta Bhattacharya, Mridul Nandi
papers.abstract: Let σ be some positive integer and C ⊆ {(i, j) : 1 ≤ i < j ≤ σ}. The theory behind finding a lower bound on the number of distinct blocks P1, . . . , Pσ ∈ {0, 1}n satisfying a set of linear equations {Pi ⊕Pj = ci,j : (i, j) ∈ C} for some ci,j ∈ {0, 1}n, is called mirror theory. Patarin introduced the mirror theory and provided a proof for this. However, the proof, even for a special class of equations, is complex and contains several non-trivial gaps. As an application of mirror theory, XORP[w] (known as XOR construction) returning (w−1) block output, is a pseudorandom function (PRF) for some parameter w, called width. The XOR construction can be seen as a basic structure of some encryption algorithms, e.g., the CENC encryption and the CHM authenticated encryption, proposed by Iwata in 2006. Due to potential application of XORP[w] and the nontrivial gaps in the proof of mirror theory, an alternative simpler analysis of PRF-security of XORP[w] would be much desired. Recently (in Crypto 2017) Dai et al. introduced a tool, called the χ2 method, for analyzing PRF-security. Using this tool, the authors have provided a proof of PRF-security of XORP[2] without relying on the mirror theory. In this paper, we resolve the general case; we apply the χ2 method to obtain a simpler security proof of XORP[w] for any w ≥ 2. For w = 2, we obtain a tighter bound for a wider range of parameters than that of Dai et al.. Moreover, we consider variable width construction XORP[∗] (in which the widths are chosen by adversaries adaptively), and also provide variable output length pseudorandom function (VOLPRF) security analysis for it. As an application of VOLPRF, we propose an authenticated encryption which is a simple variant of CHM or AES-GCM and provides much higher security than those at the cost of one extra blockcipher call for every message.
papers.abstract_zh: 设σ为某正整数，C ⊆ {(i，j) : 1 ≤ i < j ≤ σ}。寻找不同块数下限的理论P1。。。，Pσ ∈ {0，1}n满足一组线性方程组{Pi ⊕Pj = ci，j : (i，j) ∈ C}对于某些ci，j ∈ {0，1}n，称为镜像理论。帕塔林提出了镜像理论，并为此提供了一个证明。然而，即使对于一类特殊的方程，证明也是复杂的，并且包含几个非平凡的缺口。作为镜像理论的应用，返回(w1)模块输出的XORP[w](称为XOR构造)是一个伪随机函数(PRF ),其参数为宽度w。XOR构造可以被视为一些加密算法的基本结构，例如由Iwata在2006年提出的CENC加密和CHM认证加密。由于XORP[w]的潜在应用和镜像理论证明中的重要空白，XORP[w]的PRF安全性的更简单的分析将是非常期望的。最近(在Crypto 2017中)戴等人介绍了一种用于分析PRF安全性的工具，称为χ2方法。利用这个工具，作者在不依赖镜像理论的情况下，给出了XORP[2]的PRF安全性证明。在本文中，我们解决了一般情况；对于任意w ≥ 2，我们应用χ2方法得到了XORP[w]的一个更简单的安全性证明。对于w = 2，我们得到了一个比戴等人更严格的参数范围..此外，我们考虑了变宽度构造XORP[∫](其中宽度由对手自适应选择)，并对其进行了变输出长度伪随机函数(VOLPRF)安全性分析。作为VOLPRF的一个应用，我们提出了一个认证加密，它是CHM或AES-GCM的一个简单变体，并且提供了比那些以每条消息一个额外的分组密码调用为代价的加密更高的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 再谈可变输出长度异或伪随机函数

papers.title: Short Non-Malleable Codes from Related-Key Secure Block Ciphers
papers.authors: Serge Fehr, Pierre Karpman, Bart Mennink
papers.abstract: A non-malleable code is an unkeyed randomized encoding scheme that offers the strong guarantee that decoding a tampered codeword either results in the original message, or in an unrelated message. We consider the simplest possible construction in the computational split-state model, which simply encodes a message m as k||Ek(m) for a uniformly random key k, where E is a block cipher. This construction is comparable to, but greatly simplifies over, the one of Kiayias et al. (ACM CCS 2016), who eschewed this simple scheme in fear of related-key attacks on E. In this work, we prove this construction to be a strong non-malleable code as long as E is (i) a pseudorandom permutation under leakage and (ii) related-key secure with respect to an arbitrary but fixed key relation. Both properties are believed to hold for “good” block ciphers, such as AES-128, making this non-malleable code very efficient with short codewords of length |m|+2τ (where τ is the security parameter, e.g., 128 bits), without significant security penalty.
papers.abstract_zh: 不可延展代码是一种未加密的随机化编码方案，它提供了强有力的保证，即解码被篡改的代码字要么产生原始消息，要么产生不相关的消息。我们考虑计算分裂状态模型中最简单的可能构造，它简单地将消息m编码为k||Ek(m)用于均匀随机密钥k，其中E是分组密码。这种构造与Kiayias等人(ACM CCS 2016)的构造相当，但大大简化了后者，后者因担心对E的相关密钥攻击而避开了这种简单的方案。在本文中，我们证明了这种构造是一种强不可延展的码，只要E是(I)泄漏情况下的伪随机置换，以及(ii)关于任意但固定的密钥关系，相关密钥是安全的。这两个特性被认为适用于“好的”分组密码，例如AES-128，使得这种不可延展的代码对于长度为|m|+2τ(其中τ是安全参数，例如128比特)的短码字非常有效，而没有显著的安全损失。
papers.title_zh: 基于相关密钥安全分组密码的短非延展码

papers.title: Towards Low Energy Stream Ciphers
papers.authors: Subhadeep Banik, Vasily Mikhalev, Frederik Armknecht, Takanori Isobe, Willi Meier, Andrey Bogdanov, Yuhei Watanabe, Francesco Regazzoni
papers.abstract: Energy optimization is an important design aspect of lightweight cryptography. Since low energy ciphers drain less battery, they are invaluable components of devices that operate on a tight energy budget such as handheld devices or RFID tags. At Asiacrypt 2015, Banik et al. presented the block cipher family Midori which was designed to optimize the energy consumed per encryption and which reduces the energy consumption by more than 30% compared to previous block ciphers. However, if one has to encrypt/decrypt longer streams of data, i.e. for bulk data encryption/decryption, it is expected that a stream cipher should perform even better than block ciphers in terms of energy required to encrypt. In this paper, we address the question of designing low energy stream ciphers. To this end, we analyze for common stream cipher design components their impact on the energy consumption. Based on this, we give arguments why indeed stream ciphers allow for encrypting long data streams with less energy than block ciphers and validate our findings by implementations. Afterwards, we use the analysis results to identify energy minimizing design principles for stream ciphers.
papers.abstract_zh: 能量优化是轻量级加密的一个重要设计方面。由于低能耗密码消耗的电池更少，因此它们是手持设备或RFID标签等能源预算紧张的设备的宝贵组件。在Asiacrypt 2015上，Banik等人展示了分组密码家族美岛莉，该家族旨在优化每次加密所消耗的能量，与以前的分组密码相比，其能量消耗减少了30%以上。然而，如果必须加密/解密更长的数据流，即用于批量数据加密/解密，则期望流密码在加密所需的能量方面比块密码执行得更好。在本文中，我们提出了低能量流密码的设计问题。为此，我们分析了常见的流密码设计组件对能量消耗的影响。在此基础上，我们给出了为什么流密码可以用比分组密码更少的能量加密长数据流的论点，并通过实现验证了我们的发现。然后，我们使用分析结果来确定流密码的能量最小化设计原则。
papers.title_zh: 面向低能量流密码

papers.title: ShiftRows Alternatives for AES-like Ciphers and Optimal Cell Permutations for Midori and Skinny
papers.authors: Gianira N. Alfarano, Christof Beierle, Takanori Isobe, Stefan Kölbl, Gregor Leander
papers.abstract: We study possible alternatives for ShiftRows to be used as cell permutations in AES-like ciphers. As observed during the design process of the block cipher Midori, when using a matrix with a non-optimal branch number for the MixColumns operation, the choice of the cell permutation, i.e., an alternative for ShiftRows, can actually improve the security of the primitive. In contrast, when using an MDS matrix it is known that one cannot increase the minimum number of active S-boxes by deviating from the ShiftRows-type permutation. However, finding the optimal choice for the cell permutation for a given, non-optimal, MixColumns operation is a highly non-trivial problem. In this work, we propose techniques to speed up the search for the optimal cell permutations significantly. As case studies, we apply those techniques to Midori and Skinny and provide possible alternatives for their cell permutations. We finally state an easy-to-verify sufficient condition on a cell permutation, to be used as an alternative in Midori, that attains a high number of active S-boxes and thus provides good resistance against differential and linear attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们研究了在类似AES的密码中使用移位行作为单元置换的可能替代方案。正如在分组密码美岛莉的设计过程中所观察到的，当使用具有非最佳分支数的矩阵进行混合列运算时，单元置换的选择，即移位行的替换，实际上可以提高原语的安全性。相反，当使用MDS矩阵时，已知不能通过偏离移位行型置换来增加有效S盒的最小数量。然而，对于给定的非最优的混合列操作，找到单元排列的最优选择是一个非常重要的问题。在这项工作中，我们提出的技术，以加快搜索的最佳细胞排列显着。作为案例研究，我们将这些技术应用于美岛莉和斯肯尼，并为他们的细胞排列提供了可能的替代方案。最后，我们给出了一个易于验证的细胞置换的充分条件，作为美岛莉中的一个选择，它可以获得大量的有效S盒，从而提供良好的抵抗差分和线性攻击的能力。
papers.title_zh: AES类密码的移位行替代方案以及美岛莉和Skinny的最佳单元排列

papers.title: MDS Matrices with Lightweight Circuits
papers.authors: Sébastien Duval, Gaëtan Leurent
papers.abstract: MDS matrices are an important element for the design of block ciphers such as the AES. In recent years, there has been a lot of work on the construction of MDS matrices with a low implementation cost, in the context of lightweight cryptography. Most of the previous efforts focused on local optimization, constructing MDS matrices with coefficients that can be efficiently computed. In particular, this led to a matrix with a direct xor count of only 106, while a direct implementation of the MixColumn matrix of the AES requires 152 bitwise xors. More recently, techniques based on global optimization have been introduced, where the implementation can reuse some intermediate variables. In particular, Kranz et al. used optimization tools to find a good implementation from the description of an MDS matrix. They have lowered the cost of implementing the MixColumn matrix to 97 bitwise xors, and proposed a new matrix with only 72 bitwise xors, the lowest cost known so far. In this work we propose a different approach to global optimization. Instead of looking for an optimized circuit of a given matrix, we run a search through a space of circuits, to find optimal circuits yielding MDS matrices. This results in MDS matrices with an even lower cost, with only 67 bitwise xors.
papers.abstract_zh: MDS矩阵是设计分组密码(如AES)的重要元素。近年来，在轻量级密码术的背景下，已经有许多关于具有低实现成本的MDS矩阵的构造的工作。以前的大部分努力集中在局部优化上，用可以有效计算的系数构造MDS矩阵。特别是，这导致矩阵的直接xor计数只有106，而AES的混合列矩阵的直接实现需要152个逐位xor。最近，引入了基于全局优化的技术，其中实现可以重用一些中间变量。特别是，Kranz等人使用优化工具从MDS矩阵的描述中找到了一个好的实现。他们已经将实现MixColumn矩阵的成本降低到97位xor，并提出了一个只有72位xor的新矩阵，这是迄今为止已知的最低成本。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种不同的全局优化方法。我们不是寻找给定矩阵的最佳电路，而是在电路空间中进行搜索，以找到产生MDS矩阵的最佳电路。这导致MDS矩阵具有更低的成本，只有67位异或。
papers.title_zh: 具有轻型电路的MDS矩阵

papers.title: Separable Statistics and Multidimensional Linear Cryptanalysis
papers.authors: Stian Fauskanger, Igor A. Semaev
papers.abstract: Multidimensional linear cryptanalysis of block ciphers is improved in this work by introducing a number of new ideas. Firstly, formulae is given to compute approximate multidimensional distributions of the encryption algorithm internal bits. Conventional statistics like LLR (Logarithmic Likelihood Ratio) do not fit to work in Matsui’s Algorithm 2 for large dimension data, as the observation may depend on too many cipher key bits. So, secondly, a new statistic which reflects the structure of the cipher round is constructed instead. Thirdly, computing the statistic values that will fall into a critical region is presented as an optimisation problem for which an efficient algorithm is suggested. The algorithm works much faster than brute forcing all relevant key bits to compute the statistic. An attack for 16-round DES was implemented. We got an improvement over Matsui’s attack on DES in data and time complexity keeping success probability the same. With 241.81 plaintext blocks and success rate 0.83 (computed theoretically) we found 241.46 (which is close to the theoretically predicted number 241.81) key-candidates to 56-bit DES key. Search tree to compute the statistic values which fall into the critical region incorporated 245.45 nodes in the experiment and that is at least theoretically inferior in comparison with the final brute force. To get success probability 0.85, which is a fairer comparison to Matsui’s results, we would need 241.85 data and to brute force 241.85 key-candidates. That compares favourably with 243 achieved by Matsui.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项工作中，通过引入一些新的思想，对分组密码的多维线性密码分析进行了改进。首先，给出了计算加密算法内部比特近似多维分布的公式。像LLR(对数似然比)这样的传统统计不适合在用于大维度数据的Matsui算法2中工作，因为观察可能依赖于太多的密码密钥位。因此，第二，代之以构造反映密码轮结构的新统计量。第三，计算将落入临界区域的统计值被呈现为优化问题，针对该优化问题提出了有效的算法。该算法比强制所有相关的关键位来计算统计数据要快得多。实施了对16轮DES的攻击。在保持成功概率不变的情况下，我们在数据和时间复杂度上比Matsui攻击DES有所改进。利用241.81个明文块和成功率0.83(理论上计算的)，我们找到了241.46个(接近于理论上预测的数目241.81)56位DES密钥的候选密钥。在实验中，用于计算落入临界区域的统计值的搜索树包括245.45个节点，这至少在理论上不如最终的强力。为了获得成功概率0.85，这是与Matsui的结果的更公平的比较，我们将需要241.85个数据，并暴力破解241.85个关键候选项。这比松井的243分还要好。
papers.title_zh: 可分统计和多维线性密码分析

papers.title: Clustering Related-Tweak Characteristics: Application to MANTIS-6
papers.authors: Maria Eichlseder, Daniel Kales
papers.abstract: The TWEAKEY/STK construction is an increasingly popular approach for designing tweakable block ciphers that notably uses a linear tweakey schedule. Several recent attacks have analyzed the implications of this approach for differential cryptanalysis and other attacks that can take advantage of related tweakeys. We generalize the clustering approach of a recent differential attack on the tweakable block cipher MANTIS5 and describe a tool for efficiently finding and evaluating such clusters. More specifically, we consider the set of all differential characteristics compatible with a given truncated characteristic, tweak difference, and optional constraints for the differential. We refer to this set as a semi-truncated characteristic and estimate its probability by analyzing the distribution of compatible differences at each step. We apply this approach to find a semi-truncated differential characteristic for MANTIS6 with probability about 2−67.73 and derive a key-recovery attack with a complexity of about 255.09 chosen-plaintext queries and 255.52 computations. The data-time product is 2110.61 << 2126.
papers.abstract_zh: TWEAKEY/STK构造是一种越来越受欢迎的设计可调分组密码的方法，特别是使用线性TWEAKEY时间表。最近的一些攻击分析了这种方法对差分密码分析和其他可以利用相关调整密钥的攻击的影响。我们概括了最近对可调分组密码尾数5的差分攻击的聚类方法，并描述了一种有效地寻找和评估这种聚类的工具。更具体地说，我们考虑所有微分特征的集合与给定的截断特征、调整差和微分的可选约束相容。我们把这个集合称为半截尾特征，并通过分析每一步相容差异的分布来估计其概率。我们应用这种方法来寻找概率约为267.73的尾数6的半截断差分特征，并推导出具有约255.09个选择明文查询和255.52次计算的复杂性的密钥恢复攻击。数据时间乘积是2110.61 << 2126。
papers.title_zh: 聚类相关-调整特征:MANTIS-6的应用

papers.title: Mixture Differential Cryptanalysis: a New Approach to Distinguishers and Attacks on round-reduced AES
papers.authors: Lorenzo Grassi
papers.abstract: At Eurocrypt 2017 the first secret-key distinguisher for 5-round AES - based on the “multiple-of-8” property - has been presented. Although it allows to distinguish a random permutation from an AES-like one, it seems rather hard to implement a key-recovery attack different than brute-force like using such a distinguisher. In this paper we introduce “Mixture Differential Cryptanalysis” on round-reduced AESlike ciphers, a way to translate the (complex) “multiple-of-8” 5-round distinguisher into a simpler and more convenient one (though, on a smaller number of rounds). Given a pair of chosen plaintexts, the idea is to construct new pairs of plaintexts by mixing the generating variables of the original pair of plaintexts. Here we theoretically prove that for 4-round AES the corresponding ciphertexts of the original pair of plaintexts lie in a particular subspace if and only if the corresponding pairs of ciphertexts of the new pairs of plaintexts have the same property. Such secret-key distinguisher - which is independent of the secret-key, of the details of the S-Box and of the MixColumns matrix (except for the branch number equal to 5) - can be used as starting point to set up new key-recovery attacks on round-reduced AES. Besides a theoretical explanation, we also provide a practical verification both of the distinguisher and of the attack.
papers.abstract_zh: 在Eurocrypt 2017上，第一个基于“8的倍数”属性的5轮AES密钥识别器已经推出。虽然它允许区分随机排列和类似AES的排列，但似乎很难实现不同于使用这种区分器的暴力破解的密钥恢复攻击。在本文中，我们介绍了对轮约简AESlike密码的“混合差分密码分析”，这是一种将(复杂的)“8的倍数”5轮区分符转化为更简单和更方便的区分符的方法(尽管，在更少的轮数上)。给定一对选择的明文，想法是通过混合原始明文对的生成变量来构造新的明文对。这里，我们从理论上证明，对于4轮AES，原始明文对的对应密文位于特定的子空间中，当且仅当新明文对的对应密文对具有相同的属性。这种秘密密钥区分器独立于秘密密钥、S-Box的细节和混合列矩阵(除了分支数等于5之外)，可以被用作在轮约AES上建立新的密钥恢复攻击的起点。除了理论上的解释之外，我们也提供了区分器和攻击的实际验证。
papers.title_zh: 混合差分密码分析:鉴别和攻击轮约AES的新方法

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of AES-PRF and Its Dual
papers.authors: Patrick Derbez, Tetsu Iwata, Ling Sun, Siwei Sun, Yosuke Todo, Haoyang Wang, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: A dedicated pseudorandom function (PRF) called AES-PRF was proposed by Mennink and Neves at FSE 2018 (ToSC 2017, Issue 3). AES-PRF is obtained from AES by using the output of the 5-th round as the feed-forward to the output state. This paper presents extensive security analysis of AES-PRF and its variants. Specifically, we consider unbalanced variants where the output of the s-th round is used as the feed-forward. We also analyze the security of “dual” constructions of the unbalanced variants, where the input state is used as the feed-forward to the output of the s-th round. We apply an impossible differential attack, zero-correlation linear attack, traditional differential attack, zero correlation linear distinguishing attack and a meet-in-the-middle attack on these PRFs and reduced round versions. We show that AES-PRF is broken whenever s ≤ 2 or s ≥ 6, or reduced to 7 rounds, and Dual-AES-PRF is broken whenever s ≤ 4 or s ≥ 8. Our results on AES-PRF improve the initial security evaluation by the designers in various ways, and our results on Dual-AES-PRF give the first insight to its security.
papers.abstract_zh: Mennink和Neves在FSE 2018 (ToSC 2017，第3期)上提出了一种称为AES-PRF的专用伪随机函数(PRF)。AES-PRF通过使用第5轮的输出作为输出状态的前馈从AES获得。本文对AES-PRF及其变体进行了广泛的安全性分析。具体来说，我们考虑非平衡变量，其中第s轮的输出被用作前馈。我们还分析了非平衡变量的“双重”结构的安全性，其中输入状态被用作第s轮输出的前馈。我们对这些PRF和缩减轮版本应用了不可能差分攻击、零相关线性攻击、传统差分攻击、零相关线性区分攻击和中间相遇攻击。我们证明了当s ≤ 2或s ≥ 6时，AES-PRF被破坏，或者减少到7轮，当s ≤ 4或s ≥ 8时，双AES-PRF被破坏。我们在AES-PRF上的结果以各种方式改进了设计者的初始安全性评估，并且我们在Dual-AES-PRF上的结果给出了对其安全性的第一个洞察。
papers.title_zh: AES-PRF及其对偶的密码分析

papers.title: SUNDAE: Small Universal Deterministic Authenticated Encryption for the Internet of Things
papers.authors: Subhadeep Banik, Andrey Bogdanov, Atul Luykx, Elmar Tischhauser
papers.abstract: Lightweight cryptography was developed in response to the increasing need to secure devices for the Internet of Things. After significant research effort, many new block ciphers have been designed targeting lightweight settings, optimizing efficiency metrics which conventional block ciphers did not. However, block ciphers must be used in modes of operation to achieve more advanced security goals such as data confidentiality and authenticity, a research area given relatively little attention in the lightweight setting. We introduce a new authenticated encryption (AE) mode of operation, SUNDAE, specially targeted for constrained environments. SUNDAE is smaller than other known lightweight modes in implementation area, such as CLOC, JAMBU, and COFB, however unlike these modes, SUNDAE is designed as a deterministic authenticated encryption (DAE) scheme, meaning it provides maximal security in settings where proper randomness is hard to generate, or secure storage must be minimized due to expense. Unlike other DAE schemes, such as GCM-SIV, SUNDAE can be implemented efficiently on both constrained devices, as well as the servers communicating with those devices. We prove SUNDAE secure relative to its underlying block cipher, and provide an extensive implementation study, with results in both software and hardware, demonstrating that SUNDAE offers improved compactness and power consumption in hardware compared to other lightweight AE modes, while simultaneously offering comparable performance to GCM-SIV on parallel high-end platforms.
papers.abstract_zh: 轻量级加密技术是为了应对日益增长的保护物联网设备的需求而开发的。经过大量的研究工作，许多新的分组密码已经设计出来，目标是轻量级设置，优化传统分组密码没有的效率指标。然而，必须在操作模式中使用分组密码来实现更高级的安全目标，如数据机密性和真实性，这是一个在轻量级设置中相对较少关注的研究领域。我们引入了一种新的认证加密(AE)操作模式SUNDAE，专门针对受限环境。SUNDAE在实现方面小于其他已知的轻量级模式，如CLOC、JAMBU和COFB，但是与这些模式不同，SUNDAE被设计为确定性认证加密(DAE)方案，这意味着它在难以产生适当随机性的设置中提供最大的安全性，或者由于费用而必须最小化安全存储。与其他DAE方案(如GCM-SIV)不同，SUNDAE可以在受约束的设备以及与这些设备通信的服务器上高效地实现。我们证明了SUNDAE相对于其底层分组密码是安全的，并提供了广泛的实现研究，结果包括软件和硬件，表明SUNDAE与其他轻量级AE模式相比，在硬件上提供了改进的紧凑性和功耗，同时在并行高端平台上提供了与GCM-SIV相当的性能。
papers.title_zh: 圣代:用于物联网的小型通用确定性认证加密

papers.title: Double-block Hash-then-Sum: A Paradigm for Constructing BBB Secure PRF
papers.authors: Nilanjan Datta, Avijit Dutta, Mridul Nandi, Goutam Paul
papers.abstract: SUM-ECBC (Yasuda, CT-RSA 2010) is the first beyond birthday bound (BBB) secure block cipher based deterministic MAC. After this work, some more BBB secure deterministic MACs have been proposed, namely PMAC_Plus (Yasuda, CRYPTO 2011), 3kf9 (Zhang et al., ASIACRYPT 2012) and LightMAC_Plus (Naito, ASIACRYPT 2017). In this paper, we have abstracted out the inherent design principle of all these BBB secure MACs and present a generic design paradigm to construct a BBB secure pseudo random function, namely Double-block Hash-then- Sum or in short (DbHtS). A DbHtS construction, as the name implies, computes a double block hash on the message and then sum the encrypted output of the two hash blocks. Our result renders that if the underlying hash function meets certain security requirements (namely cover-free and block-wise universal advantage is low), DbHtS construction provides 2n/3-bit security. We demonstrate the applicability of our result by instantiating all the existing beyond birthday secure deterministic MACs (e.g., SUM-ECBC, PMAC_Plus, 3kf9, LightMAC_Plus) as well as a simple two-keyed variant for each of them and some algebraic hash based constructions.
papers.abstract_zh: SUM-ECBC (Yasuda，CT-RSA 2010)是第一个基于确定性MAC的超越生日界限(BBB)安全分组密码。在这项工作之后，一些更BBB安全的确定性MAC被提出，即_Plus (Yasuda，CRYPTO 2011)，3kf9 (Zhang等人，ASIACRYPT 2012)和LightMAC_Plus (Naito，ASIACRYPT 2017)。在本文中，我们抽象出了所有这些BBB安全MAC的内在设计原理，并提出了一种构造BBB安全伪随机函数的通用设计范式，即双块Hash-then- Sum(简称DbHtS)。顾名思义，DbHtS构造对消息计算双块散列，然后将两个散列块的加密输出相加。我们的结果表明，如果底层哈希函数满足一定的安全要求(即无覆盖和分块普适优势低)，DbHtS构造提供2n/3位安全性。我们通过实例化所有现有的超越生日安全确定性MAC(例如，SUM-ECBC、PMAC_Plus、3kf9、LightMAC_Plus)以及它们中每一个的简单双密钥变体和一些基于代数散列的构造来证明我们的结果的适用性。
papers.title_zh: 双块Hash-then-Sum:一种构造BBB安全PRF的范例

papers.title: More Accurate Differential Properties of LED64 and Midori64
papers.authors: Ling Sun, Wei Wang, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: In differential cryptanalysis, a differential is more valuable than the single trail belonging to it in general. The traditional way to compute the probability of the differential is to sum the probabilities of all trails within it. The automatic tool for the search of differentials based on Mixed Integer Linear Programming (MILP) has been proposed and realises the task of finding multiple trails of a given differential. The problem is whether it is reliable to evaluate the probability of the differential traditionally. In this paper, we focus on two lightweight block ciphers – LED64 and Midori64 and show the more accurate estimation of differential probability considering the key schedule. Firstly, an automated tool based on Boolean Satisfiability Problem (SAT) is put forward to accomplish the automatic search of differentials for ciphers with S-boxes and is applied to LED64 and Midori64. Secondly, we provide an automatic approach to detect the right pairs following a given differential, which can be exploited to calculate the differential property. Applying this technique to the STEP function of LED64, we discover some differentials with enhanced probability. As a result, the previous attacks relying upon high probability differentials can be improved definitely. Thirdly, we present a method to compute an upper-bound of the weak-key ratio for a given differential, which is utilised to analyse 4-round differentials of Midori64. We detect two differentials whose weak-key ratios are much lower than the expected 50%. More than 78% of the keys will make these two differentials being impossible differentials. The idea of the estimation for an upper-bound of the weak-key ratio can be employed for other ciphers and allows us to launch differential attacks more reliably. Finally, we introduce how to compute the enhanced differential probability and evaluate the size of keys achieving the improved probability. Such a property may incur an efficient weak-key attack. For a 4-round differential of Midori64, we obtain an improved differential property for a portion of keys.
papers.abstract_zh: 在差分密码分析中，差分比属于它的单个踪迹更有价值。计算差异概率的传统方法是将其中所有轨迹的概率相加。基于混合整数线性规划(MILP)的微分搜索自动化工具已经被提出，并实现了寻找给定微分的多个轨迹的任务。问题是传统上评估差异的概率是否可靠。在本文中，我们重点研究了两种轻量级分组密码——led 64和Midori64，并展示了考虑密钥调度时差分概率的更精确估计。首先，提出了一种基于布尔可满足性问题(SAT)的自动工具，用于自动搜索S盒密码的差分，并应用于LED64和Midori64。其次，我们提供了一种自动的方法来检测给定微分后的正确对，这可以用来计算微分性质。将该技术应用于LED64的阶跃函数，我们发现了一些具有增强概率的微分。因此，以前依赖于高概率差的攻击肯定会得到改进。第三，我们提出了一种计算给定微分的弱键比的上界的方法，该方法用于分析Midori64的4轮微分。我们检测到两个差异，其弱键比率远低于预期的50%。超过78%的键将使这两种差异成为不可能的差异。对弱密钥比率的上限进行估计的思想可以用于其他密码，并且允许我们更可靠地发起差分攻击。最后，我们介绍了如何计算增强的差分概率和评估实现改进概率的密钥大小。这样的属性可能招致有效的弱密钥攻击。对于Midori64的4轮微分，我们获得了一部分密钥的改进的微分性质。
papers.title_zh: LED64和Midori64更精确的微分特性

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of Reduced round SKINNY Block Cipher
papers.authors: Sadegh Sadeghi, Tahereh Mohammadi, Nasour Bagheri
papers.abstract: SKINNY is a family of lightweight tweakable block ciphers designed to have the smallest hardware footprint. In this paper, we present zero-correlation linear approximations and the related-tweakey impossible differential characteristics for different versions of SKINNY .We utilize Mixed Integer Linear Programming (MILP) to search all zero-correlation linear distinguishers for all variants of SKINNY, where the longest distinguisher found reaches 10 rounds. Using a 9-round characteristic, we present 14 and 18-round zero correlation attacks on SKINNY-64-64 and SKINNY- 64-128, respectively. Also, for SKINNY-n-n and SKINNY-n-2n, we construct 13 and 15-round related-tweakey impossible differential characteristics, respectively. Utilizing these characteristics, we propose 23-round related-tweakey impossible differential cryptanalysis by applying the key recovery attack for SKINNY-n-2n and 19-round attack for SKINNY-n-n. To the best of our knowledge, the presented zero-correlation characteristics in this paper are the first attempt to investigate the security of SKINNY against this attack and the results on the related-tweakey impossible differential attack are the best reported ones.
papers.abstract_zh: SKINNY是一个轻量级可调分组密码家族，旨在拥有最小的硬件占用空间。在这篇文章中，我们提出了零相关线性近似和相关的tweakey不可能微分特征的不同版本的SKINNY。我们利用混合整数线性规划(MILP)来搜索SKINNY的所有变体的所有零相关线性鉴别器，其中找到的最长鉴别器达到10轮。使用9轮特征，我们分别给出了对SKINNY-64-64和SKINNY- 64-128的14轮和18轮零相关攻击。同样，对于SKINNY-n-n和SKINNY-n-2n，我们分别构造了13轮和15轮相关的tweakey不可能微分特征。利用这些特性，我们通过对SKINNY-n-2n应用密钥恢复攻击和对SKINNY-n-n应用19轮攻击，提出了23轮相关-tweakey不可能差分密码分析。据我们所知，本文提出的零相关特性是研究SKINNY抵抗这种攻击的安全性的第一次尝试，关于相关-tweakey不可能差分攻击的结果是最好的报道。
papers.title_zh: 缩减圆形瘦分组密码的安全性分析

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of Low-Data Instances of Full LowMCv2
papers.authors: Christian Rechberger, Hadi Soleimany, Tyge Tiessen
papers.abstract: LowMC is a family of block ciphers designed for a low multiplicative complexity. The specification allows a large variety of instantiations, differing in block size, key size, number of S-boxes applied per round and allowed data complexity. The number of rounds deemed secure is determined by evaluating a number of attack vectors and taking the number of rounds still secure against the best of these. In this paper, we demonstrate that the attacks considered by the designers of LowMC in the version 2 of the round-formular were not sufficient to fend off all possible attacks. In the case of instantiations of LowMC with one of the most useful settings, namely with few applied S-boxes per round and only low allowable data complexities, efficient attacks based on difference enumeration techniques can be constructed. We show that it is most effective to consider tuples of differences instead of simple differences, both to increase the range of the distinguishers and to enable key recovery attacks.
