We propose a tool named LIGHTER, based on two related algorithms, that produces optimized implementations of small functions. To demonstrate the validity and usefulness of our tool, we applied it to two practical cases: first, linear permutations that define diffusion in most of SPN ciphers; second, non-linear 4-bit permutations that are used in many lightweight block ciphers. For linear permutations, we exhibit several new MDS diffusion matrices lighter than the state-of-the-art, and we also decrease the implementation cost of several already known MDS matrices. As for non-linear permutations, LIGHTER outperforms the area-optimized synthesis of the state-of-the-art academic tool ABC. Smaller circuits can also be reached when ABC and LIGHTER are used jointly.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们从硬件实现的角度研究了轻量级密码设计中用作构建模块的小函数的合成。这个阶段最显著地出现在密码原语的ASIC实现期间。这一步的质量直接影响输出电路，虽然存在执行这一任务的通用工具，但其中大多数属于专有软件套件，并对任何规模的功能应用试探法。在这项工作中，我们将重点放在小函数(4位和8位映射)上，并寻找它们在特定加权指令集上的最佳实现，这允许对技术进行微调。我们提出了一个名为LIGHTER的工具，它基于两个相关的算法，可以产生小函数的优化实现。为了证明我们的工具的有效性和实用性，我们将它应用于两个实际情况:第一，在大多数SPN密码中定义扩散的线性置换；第二，在许多轻量级分组密码中使用的非线性4位置换。对于线性置换，我们展示了几个比现有技术更轻的新的MDS扩散矩阵，并且我们还降低了几个已知的MDS矩阵的实现成本。至于非线性排列，LIGHTER优于最先进的学术工具ABC的区域优化合成。当ABC和打火机联合使用时，也可以达到更小的电路。
papers.title_zh: 优化轻量级构建块的实现

papers.title: Direct Construction of Optimal Rotational-XOR Diffusion Primitives
papers.authors: Zhiyuan Guo, Renzhang Liu, Si Gao, Wenling Wu, Dongdai Lin

papers.abstract_zh: 扩散层作为SPN分组密码和哈希函数的核心部件，主要由最大距离可分(MDS)码构造的矩阵引入。迄今为止，大多数MDS构造都需要进行等价的甚至穷举的搜索。在本文中，我们研究了旋转异或扩散层的循环结构
papers.title_zh: 最佳旋转异或扩散原语的直接构造

papers.title: Shorter Linear Straight-Line Programs for MDS Matrices
papers.authors: Thorsten Kranz, Gregor Leander, Ko Stoffelen, Friedrich Wiemer
papers.abstract: Recently a lot of attention is paid to the search for efficiently implementable MDS matrices for lightweight symmetric primitives. Most previous work concentrated on locally optimizing the multiplication with single matrix elements. Separate from this line of work, several heuristics were developed to find shortest linear straightline programs. Solving this problem actually corresponds to globally optimizing multiplications by matrices. In this work we combine those, so far largely independent lines of work. As a result, we achieve implementations of known, locally optimized, and new MDS matrices that significantly outperform all implementations from the literature. Interestingly, almost all previous locally optimized constructions behave very similar with respect to the globally optimized implementation. As a side effect, our work reveals the so far best implementation of the Aes Mix- Columns operation with respect to the number of XOR operations needed.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，大量的注意力集中在寻找轻量级对称原语的有效实现的MDS矩阵上。大多数以前的工作集中在用单个矩阵元素局部优化乘法。除了这一系列的工作之外，还开发了几种启发式方法来寻找最短的线性直线程序。解决这个问题实际上相当于全局优化矩阵乘法。在这项工作中，我们将那些迄今为止基本上独立的工作结合起来。结果，我们实现了已知的、局部优化的和新的MDS矩阵的实现，其显著优于文献中的所有实现。有趣的是，几乎所有先前的局部优化构造相对于全局优化实现表现得非常相似。作为一个副作用，我们的工作揭示了迄今为止Aes混合列运算在所需的XOR运算数量方面的最佳实现。
papers.title_zh: MDS矩阵的较短线性直线程序

papers.title: Asymptotic Analysis of Plausible Tree Hash Modes for SHA-3
papers.authors: Kevin Atighehchi, Alexis Bonnecaze
papers.abstract: Discussions about the choice of a tree hash mode of operation for a standardization have recently been undertaken. It appears that a single tree mode cannot address adequately all possible uses and specifications of a system. In this paper, we review the tree modes which have been proposed, we discuss their problems and propose remedies. We make the reasonable assumption that communicating systems have different specifications and that software applications are of different types (securing stored content or live-streamed content). Finally, we propose new modes of operation that address the resource usage problem for the three most representative categories of devices and we analyse their asymptotic behavior.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近已经开始讨论为标准化选择树散列操作模式。单一的树形模式似乎不能充分解决系统所有可能的用途和规格。在本文中，我们回顾了已提出的树模式，讨论了它们的问题，并提出了补救措施。我们合理地假设通信系统具有不同的规范，并且软件应用程序具有不同的类型(保护存储的内容或直播的内容)。最后，我们提出了新的操作模式，解决了三种最具代表性的设备类别的资源使用问题，并分析了它们的渐近行为。
papers.title_zh: SHA-3可信树哈希模式的渐近分析

papers.title: Reconsidering the Security Bound of AES-GCM-SIV
papers.authors: Tetsu Iwata, Yannick Seurin
papers.abstract: We make a number of remarks about the AES-GCM-SIV nonce-misuse resistant authenticated encryption scheme currently considered for standardization by the Crypto Forum Research Group (CFRG). First, we point out that the security analysis proposed in the ePrint report 2017/168 is incorrect, leading to overly optimistic security claims. We correct the bound and re-assess the security guarantees offered by the scheme for various parameters. Second, we suggest a simple modification to the key derivation function which would improve the security of the scheme with virtually no efficiency penalty.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们对AES-GCM-SIV抗随机数误用认证加密方案做了一些评论，该方案目前正由加密论坛研究组(CFRG)考虑标准化。首先，我们指出ePrint报告2017/168中提出的安全分析是不正确的，导致了过于乐观的安全主张。我们修正了界限，并重新评估了该方案对各种参数提供的安全保证。第二，我们建议对密钥导出函数进行简单的修改，这将在几乎没有效率损失的情况下提高方案的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 重新考虑AES-GCM-SIV的安全界限

papers.title: Single Key Variant of PMAC_Plus
papers.authors: Nilanjan Datta, Avijit Dutta, Mridul Nandi, Goutam Paul, Liting Zhang
papers.abstract: At CRYPTO 2011, Yasuda proposed the PMAC_Plus message authentication code based on an n -bit block cipher. Its design principle inherits the well known PMAC parallel network with a low additional cost. PMAC_Plus is a rate-1 construction like PMAC (i.e., one block cipher call per n -bit message block) but provides security against all adversaries (under black-box model) making queries altogether consisting of roughly upto 2 2 n /3 blocks (strings of n -bits). Even though PMAC_Plus gives higher security than the standard birthday bound security, with currently available best bound, it provides weaker security than PMAC for certain choices of adversaries. Moreover, unlike PMAC, PMAC_Plus operates with three independent block cipher keys. In this paper, we propose 1k-PMAC_Plus, the first rate-1 single keyed block cipher based BBB (Beyond Birthday Bound) secure (in standard model) deterministic MAC construction without arbitrary field multiplications. 1k-PMAC_Plus, as the name implies, is a simple one-key variant of PMAC_Plus. In addition to the key reduction, we obtain a higher security guarantee than what was proved originally for PMAC_Plus, thus an improvement in two directions.
papers.abstract_zh: 在CRYPTO 2011上，Yasuda提出了基于n位分组密码的PMAC加消息认证码。其设计原理继承了众所周知的PMAC并联网络，附加成本低。PMAC加是一种类似于PMAC的1级结构(即，每个n位消息块一次分组密码调用)，但是提供了针对所有对手(在黑盒模型下)的安全性，这些对手进行的查询总共包括大约2 ^ 2n/3个块(n位串)。尽管PMAC Plus提供了比标准的生日绑定安全性更高的安全性，但是对于对手的某些选择，它提供了比PMAC更弱的安全性。此外，与PMAC不同，PMAC Plus使用三个独立的分组密码密钥进行操作。在本文中，我们提出了1k-PMAC加，这是第一个基于速率为1的单密钥分组密码的BBB(彼永德·巴斯蒂约束)安全(在标准模型中)确定性MAC构造。1k-PMAC Plus，顾名思义，是PMAC Plus的简单一键变体。除了密钥减少之外，我们还获得了比最初为PMAC加所证明的更高的安全保证，从而在两个方向上有所改进。
papers.title_zh: PMAC加号的单键变体

papers.title: ZMAC+ - An Efficient Variable-output-length Variant of ZMAC
papers.authors: Eik List, Mridul Nandi
papers.abstract: There is an ongoing trend in the symmetric-key cryptographic community to construct highly secure modes and message authentication codes based on tweakable block ciphers (TBCs). Recent constructions, such as Cogliati et al.’s HaT or Iwata et al.’s ZMAC, employ both the n -bit plaintext and the t -bit tweak simultaneously for higher performance. This work revisits ZMAC, and proposes a simpler alternative finalization based on HaT. As a result, we propose HtTBC, and call its instantiation with ZHash as a hash function ZMAC + . Compared to HaT, ZMAC + (1) requires only a single key and a single primitive. Compared to ZMAC, our construction (2) allows variable, per-query parametrizable output lengths. Moreover, ZMAC + (3) avoids the complex finalization of ZMAC and (4) improves the security bound from Ο ( σ 2 /2 n + min ( n , t ) ) to Ο ( q /2 n + q ( q + σ )/2 n + min ( n , t ) ) while retaining a practical tweak space.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于可调分组密码(TBC)构造高度安全的模式和消息认证码是对称密钥密码领域的一个发展趋势。最近的构造，如Cogliati等人的HaT或Iwata等人的ZMAC，同时使用n位明文和t位tweak来获得更高的性能。这项工作重新审视了ZMAC，并提出了一个更简单的基于HaT的替代终结。于是，我们提出HtTBC，用ZHash调用它的实例化作为Hash函数ZMAC +。与HaT相比，ZMAC + (1)只需要一个键和一个原语。与ZMAC相比，我们的构造(2)允许可变的、每个查询可参数化的输出长度。此外，ZMAC + (3)避免了ZMAC的复杂终结，并且(4)将安全界限从ο(σ2/2n+min(n，t))提高到ο(q/2n+q(q+σ)/2n+min(n，t))，同时保留了实际的调整空间。
papers.title_zh: ZMAC+ -一种有效的可变输出长度的ZMAC变体
